card.title: Ancestral Sanctuary
card.subtitle: Netherworld Feng Shui Site
card.text: Limited. If one of your feng shui sites is seized or burned, you may immediately play this site face up at no cost. Gain 5 Power if an opponent forces you to discard Ancestral Sanctuary.

card.title: Ancestral Tomb
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Ancestral Tomb's Body is increased by the number of characters in your smoked pile. While Ancestral Tomb has damage counters on it, it does not count toward fulfilling its controller's victory conditions.

card.title: Ancient Temple
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Any character that is intercepted while attacking Ancient Temple inflicts no damage on Ancient Temple.

card.title: Auspicious Termites
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Cannot be burned. If smoked, Auspicious Termites returns to its owner's hand.

card.title: Birdhouse Cafe
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: If, at the end of your turn, an opponent is at least as close to fulfilling victory conditions as you are, characters that participated in attacks you declared this turn unturn.

card.title: Blessed Orchard
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Whenever a player declares an attack on Blessed Orchard, transfer 1 Power from his or her pool to yours.
card.flavor: Soil fed by cherry blosoms absorbs hostile energies.

card.title: Cave Network
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: If an attack is declared against Cave Network when you have no characters in play, you may turn Cave Network to play a character with a cost of 3 or less at no cost.You may play a character in this manner during an opponent's turn.

card.title: City Park
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: City Park heals at the end of the turn it is revealved. You may put City Park into play face up at no cost when a site you control is burned.
card.comments: Ruling: City Park does not heal when played face up. Feng shui sites played face up are not considered "revealed". Note: Feng shui sites cannot normally be played face up.

card.title: City Square
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Unique. Turn to redirect the damage inflicted on target site from a single source to any site you control.

card.title: Curio Shop
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Takes no damage from cards that have a cost of 1 that are controlled or played by an opponent.
card.flavor: "You've gotta have good chi to keep this much crockery intact."

card.title: Dragon Mountain
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Unique. Toughness: 1.
card.flavor: The dragon is hidden in the land. Its scales say, "Do not act."

card.title: Family Home
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Generates an additional point of Power if the Power of the player to your left is greater than yours.

card.title: Family Restaurant
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Regenerates. Body is reduced to 0 if damaged by a Hood card.

card.title: Festival Circle
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Turn Festival Circle when it is in your front row and inflict 2 points of damage on it to cancel an Event that targets characters you control. Damage may only be removed from Festival Circle when it is seized.

card.title: Field of Tentacles
card.subtitle: Netherworld Feng Shui Site
card.text: Turn and maintain to cancel the effects of target non-feng shui site controlled by an opponent. Treat target site's rules text as if it were blank. Target site can still generate Power.
card.flavor: "Tentacles coming up through the floorboards can really drive down property values."

card.title: Fortress of Shadow
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: If Fortress of Shadow is seized or burned by an opponent who controls more Power-generating sites than you, you gain Power equal to the highest cost among the characters who attacked the site this turn.

card.title: Fox Pass
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Limited. Turn to change the target of target attacking character's attack to any character or front-row site you control.
card.comments: Clarification: "Turn to change one attacking character's target to a character or front-row site you control."

card.title: Garden of Bronze
card.subtitle: Netherworld Feng Shui Site
card.text: Gain 3 Power when an opponent burns one of your other feng shui sites for Power.
card.flavor: "It's both an art installation and a chi-feedback resonance enhancer, Johnny."

card.title: Grove of Willows
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: If Grove of Willows is revealed due to damage inflicted in an attack, you gain Power equal to the number of characters that attacked it.

card.title: Hallowed Earth
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: If Hallowed Earth is seized or burned by a player who controls more feng shui sites than you, you gain Power equal to the number of feng shui sites he or she controls.

card.title: Hanging Coffins
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Unique. Turn to give target character Tactics until end of the turn.
card.flavor: Some of the greatest generals in history are buried here.

card.title: Heart of the Rainforest
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Heart of the Rainforest gains +2 Body for each State it is the subject of.

card.title: Hidden Sanctuary
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Limited. At the end of an attack you declared, you may remove X points of damage from each character you choose that participated in the attack. X = the number of Sanctuaries you control.

card.title: House of Mirrors
card.subtitle: Netherworld Feng Shui Site
card.text: Netherworld Site. If an opponent controls more Power-generating sites than you, you may play a feng shui site at a cost 1 less than normal. Effects of multiple Houses of Mirrors are not cumulative.

card.title: Inner Sanctum
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Once Inner Sanctum has been revealed, you may not place new feng shui sites into its column.
card.flavor: Too great a chi flow can be as hazardous as too little.

card.title: Jagged Cliffs
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: If Jagged Cliff's Body is reduced to zero, all characters at its location suffer 3 points of damage.
card.flavor: "The main thing I learned that day was that getting caught in a rockfall can extremely painful to your health."

card.title: Kinoshita House
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Unique. Turn to unturn target attacking character. Target attacking character inflicts and receives no damage during this attack.
card.flavor: The sublime meditation cottage of the great ninja leader Kinoshita retains the essence of his spirit.
card.comments: Errata: Kinoshita House not only unturns its target character, it removes the target character from the attack as well.

card.title: Lily Pond
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Turn to switch the location of Lily Pond with any other feng shui site you control. This may change which site is targeted by an attack.

card.title: Locksley Station
card.subtitle: Netherworld Feng Shui Site
card.text: Unique. If Locksley Station is in your front row, turn and maintain it to take control of target non-feng shui site.
card.flavor: "The train stays put, but the station moves around. Kind of like an optical collision."

card.title: Marsh
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Takes no damage from any character that is the subject of a vehicle state.
card.flavor: "When I get out of this mess, I'm gonna have some stern words with the weasel who called this an all-terrain vehicle."

card.title: Monkey House
card.subtitle: Netherworld Feng Shui Site
card.text: Limited. If an opponent controls more Power-generating sites than you, you may turn Monkey House to discard a feng shui site that is neither Unique nor Limited. You then gain 1 Power.

card.title: Mountain Retreat
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Once Mountain Retreat has been revealed, it can't be damaged by more than two characters in an attack. The defending player decides which two characters inflicting damage actually do so.

card.title: Mourning Tree
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Unique. Any player who attacks Mourning Tree may not declare any subsequent attacks this turn.

card.title: Night Market
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Limited. In response to an opponent playing an Event during your turn, turn Night Market to gain Power equal to the cost of that Event.

card.title: Peacock Summit
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Peacock Summit gains +2 Body for each different faction in your resource pool.

card.title: Perpetual Motion Machine
card.subtitle: Netherworld Feng Shui Site
card.text: You may discard an additional card of your choice whenever you discard.
card.flavor: "If it's impossible in the real world, you can bet it exists somewhere in the Inner Kingdom."

card.title: Pinball Hall
card.subtitle: Netherworld Feng Shui Site
card.text: If this site is seized or burned, or if it is smoked by an Event card played by an opponent, you may inflict 6 points of damage on any character in play.
card.flavor: You don't wanna be the triple-flipper light-up.

card.title: Proving Ground
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Proving Ground is turned when it is revealed. Turn to play a character at -2 cost. Multiple Proving Grounds cannot reduce the cost of the same character.
card.comments: Note: The first time you turn this card (when it's revealved) you *don't* get to use it.

card.title: Rainforest Grove
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Limited. Characters you control gain +1 Fighting until the end of the attack when they turn to attack a target controlled by a player who controls more cards than you.

card.title: Rainforest River
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: You may play Rainforest River face up into a location that contains a single face-up feng shui site. Rainforest River becomes the new front-row site. The other site moves to the back row.
card.flavor: "I swear there was a road here yesterday."

card.title: Rainforest Temple
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Turn Rainforest Temple to remove up to two damage counters from it and inflict the damage on another site you control that has a Body of 3 or more.

card.title: The Red Lantern Tavern
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Unique. Turn to give target character Assassinate against turned characters until the end of the turn.
card.flavor: Madam Yuan's notorious establishment sold pleasure and murder in equal measure.

card.title: Ring of Gates
card.subtitle: Netherworld Feng Shui Site
card.text: Turn to cancel an effect that would return a card or cards to one or more players' hands.
card.flavor: The Netherworld is the land of dead ends.

card.title: Rust Garden
card.subtitle: Netherworld Feng Shui Site
card.text: If an opponent seizes or burns Rust Garden, inflict 2 points of damage on every other site he or she controls.
card.flavor: "Right after we blew it up, we found old mufflers in the Sacred Grove and a junked robot in the Lily Pond."

card.title: Sacred Ground
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.flavor: "I still remember the first feng shui site I attuned to, back like it was yesterday. Back when I didn't know squat about the secret war."

card.title: Sacred Heart Hospital
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Unique. Turn Sacred Heart Hospital to heal target character.
card.flavor: Secret warriors spend a lot of time in hospitals.

card.title: Sampan Village
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: When an attack targeting Sampan Village ends, you may place each character that attacked the site at a location of your choice on its controller's side.

card.title: Stone Garden
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Turn to remove one damage counter from target site.
card.flavor: An artist in harmony with the earth can channel and focus chi.

card.title: Turtle Beach
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Unique. Turn Turtle Beach to redirect damage done to target character from a single source to Turtle Beach.
card.flavor: When protection becomes sacrifice, how much can the land withstand?

card.title: Turtle Island
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Turtle Island cannot be damaged or removed from play by Events played by opponents. Cannot be burned.

card.title: Wall of a Thousand Eyes
card.subtitle: Netherworld Feng Shui Site
card.text: Characters attacking sites you control cannot use Ambush, Stealth, Superleap or Tactics.
card.flavor: "The place wouldn't be half as creepy if the freaking eyes would just blink in unison."
card.designators: | wall thousand ey eye eyes netherworld |

card.title: Whirlpool of Blood
card.subtitle: Netherworld Feng Shui Site
card.text: Turn to cancel an effect generated by the turning of a feng shui site.
card.flavor: "When the pirates pushed us in, we found out it wasn't real blood. But by that point being grossed out was the least of our worries."

card.title: Drug Lab
card.subtitle: Hood Site
card.text: Limited. Drug Lab is smoked if damaged by a Cop card.
card.flavor: There's always been a brisk business selling fools their own destruction.

card.title: Forty-Story Inferno
card.subtitle: Battleground Site
card.text: If Forty-Story Inferno is in your front row, an opponent who is at least as close to fulfilling victory conditions as you are may not declare more interceptors than the number of characters you are currently attacking with. Any player who seizes this site gains 2 Power.

card.title: The Home Front
card.subtitle: Battleground Site
card.text: If The Home Front is in your front row, your sites gain +2 Body. Any player who seizes this site gains 2 Power.

card.title: Killing Ground
card.subtitle: Battleground Site
card.text: If Killing Ground is in your front row, all characters you control inflict +1 damage on intercepting characters and you may play non-Unique 0-cost non-feng shui sites even if you have already played a site that turn. Any player who seizes this site gains 2 Power.

card.title: Police Station
card.subtitle: Site
card.text: Turn and maintain Police Station to give target Cop character +2 Fighting or turn to inflict 2 points of damage on target Hood character or site.
card.comments: Clarification: "... target Hood character or Hood site."

card.title: Portal in Tower Square
card.subtitle: Battleground Site
card.text: Unique. If Portal in Tower Square is in your front row, you may turn and maintain it to target 2 characters. Target characters may not turn to change location. Any player who seizes this site gains 3 Power.

card.title: Secret Headquarters
card.subtitle: Site
card.text: Limited. All sites you control take 2 points of damage if Secret Headquarters is smoked.
card.flavor: If we told you about it, it wouldn't be a secret, would it?

card.title: Sniper Nest
card.subtitle: Battleground Site
card.text: If Sniper Nest is in your front row, you may turn it to inflict 2 points of damage on a character that has just turned to change location. Any player who seizes this site gains 1 Power.

card.title: Trade Center
card.subtitle: Site
card.text: Feng shui sites to the immediate right and left of Trade Center generate no Power.
card.flavor: "Old Mr. Tsang told me that it would cut off my chi, but I couldn't exactly cancel a billion-dollar contract, could I?

card.title: Art of War
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Unique. Your hand size increases by 2. When the opponent to your left declares an attack, you must predict whether the attack will be successful. If you are incorrect, control of Art of War shifts to the opponents to your left.
card.comments: Ruling: Forgetting to make a prediction is the same as if you had guessed wrong.

card.title: The Rackets
card.subtitle: Hood Edge
card.text: Comes into play turned. Turn during your turn to take 1 Power from target player's pool and add it to your own.

card.title: Safehouse
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Turn and maintain; no attacks can be declared against target character.

card.title: Attack Helicopter
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Vehicle. Subject character gains Mobility, Tactics, and +2 Fighting.
card.flavor: The airborne vehicle of choice for pocket-sized wars.

card.title: Elevator to the Netherworld
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Unique. Play on a front-row site. Turn to give target character at subject site's location Independent until end of turn.
card.flavor: "If you got enough chi happening, you can see the *special* button."

card.title: Explosives
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Play on any unturned character. When subject character damages a site in combat, you may sacrifice Explosives to inflict an additional 5 points of damage on the site.
card.flavor: Ka-BOOOOMM!
card.comments: Clarification: "*After* subject character damages site ..."

card.title: Grenade Launcher
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Weapon. Controlling character inflicts +3 damage on characters with vehicles or sites.
card.flavor: Grenades are much more effective in the movies than in real life. This ain't real life.

card.title: Motorcycle
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Vehicle. Turn Motorcycle to change location of controlling character.
card.flavor: "It wasn't a Harley, but considering I had about a dozen hopping vampires on my case, I decided not to be finicky.

card.title: Netherworld Passageway
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Play on any site. All characters located in front of subject site gain Mobility. Subject site is considered to be a Netherworld site in addition to any other designators.

card.title: Pump-Action Shotgun
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Weapon. Turn to have subject character inflict +3 damage for the duration of the turn. Pump-Action Shotgun unturns if a Unique character you control is smoked by an opponent.
card.flavor: "This time..." KA-CHINK "... I'm going for a little redemption action."

card.title: Really Big Gun
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Weapon. Controlling character inflicts +2 damage.
card.flavor: A persuasive member of any debating team.

card.title: Speed Boat
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Vehicle. Controlling character gains Mobility and Tactics.
card.flavor: Slice through the waters like a high-octane razor blade.

card.title: Sports Car
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Vehicle. Controlling character gains Toughness: 1 and Mobility.
card.flavor: It ain't action till you've got a bunch of cars rolling over and catching fire and stuff.

card.title: Throwing Star
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Weapon. Play on any character. When in combat, and after combat damage is dealt, subject character can inflict 1 point of damage on any character at its location.
card.comments: Clarification: Last sentence should say: "After surviving combat with another character, subject character may inflict 1 point of damage on any character at its location."

card.title: Water Sword
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Weapon. Unique. Subject character gains +1 Fighting. If subject character is smoked, return Water Sword to your hand instead of placing it in the smoked pile.

card.title: Cheap Punks
card.subtitle: Mercenary Hoods
card.text: Anytime during any turn in which Cheap Punks are smoked, you may play a single Hood card or a single Rabble card at -1 cost.
card.designators: | cheap punk punks mercenary hood hoods |

card.title: Dark Traveler
card.subtitle: Netherworld Hero
card.text: Dark Traveler's Fighting score is increased by 2 for each feng shui site in your smoked pile.

card.title: The Displaced
card.subtitle: Netherworld Rabble
card.text: If The Displaced are smoked, you may toast a card in an opponent's smoked pile. If an opponent forces you to discard The Displaced, you may smoke any card that opponent controls.

card.title: The Faceless
card.subtitle: Netherworld Rabble
card.text: You may take control of States on characters or sites damaged by The Faceless in combat and place the States on any legal subject.

card.title: Jimmy Wai
card.subtitle: Mastermind
card.text: Unique. Turn to cancel an effect that is being maintained by a card that turned and maintained.
card.flavor: He has a way of getting favors out of people.

card.title: The Losers
card.subtitle: Netherworld Rabble
card.text: If The Losers are a legal target or subject of an Event or State being played on a card you control, you may turn The Losers to make them the target or subject.

card.title: Luis Camacho
card.subtitle: Vengeful Hood
card.text: Unique. Gains +1 Fighting for each Hood card in your smoked pile.
card.flavor: He puts the *u* in "unforgiving."

card.title: Mooks
card.subtitle: Mercenary Hoods
card.flavor: Stupid, brutal punks are something the world never seems to run out of.

card.title: Mysterious Stranger
card.subtitle: Netherworld Outcast
card.text: The controller of a character who intercepts Mysterious Stranger loses all Power.
card.flavor: Don't ask us; even we don't know.

card.title: Nine Cuts
card.subtitle: Mercenary Assassin
card.text: Unique. Assassinate.
card.flavor: "I don't descriminate. I'll whack any target, accept any currency."

card.title: White Ninja
card.subtitle: Assassin
card.text: Unique. Stealth. Ambush.
card.flavor: She is known only by the distinctive sword wound she leaves in her victims.

card.title: White Ninja
card.subtitle: Assassin
card.text: Unique. Stealth. Ambush. Special abilities of a character or site targeted by White Ninja in an attack are cancelled until the end of the turn.

card.title: Yakuza Enforcer
card.subtitle: Killer Hood
card.text: Yakuza Enforcer takes no damage from cards you own. You may not redirect damage to Yakuza Enforcer.
card.flavor: "Traitors deserve no mercy."

card.title: Ze Botelho
card.subtitle: Lodge Outcast
card.text: Unique. Toughness: 2 against [a] characters. While Ze Botelho is in play, any card with an [a] symbol in its resource conditions has its cost increased by 1.

card.title: Alchemist's Lair
card.subtitle: Site
card.flavor: "You do not fool me, young one. Immortality is what you seek. It is what they all seek."
card.comments: Clarification: This was <i>supposed</i> to provide [M]. Flashpoint printings of this card provide [M].

card.title: Ancient Grove
card.subtitle: Site
card.flavor: "These bamboo shoots are the mirror of your soul, warrior. When you understand why, you will find the path to mastery."

card.title: Blade Palm
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Return target card to its owner's hand. Does not affect Event cards.
card.flavor: When a chi master whips out the Blade Palm, stand back. Stand way far back.

card.title: Dark's Soft Whisper
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play immediately after you have made an unsucessful attack, and when an opponent is closer to fulfilling victory conditions than you are, or is one feng shui site away from victory. You gain 2 Power.

card.title: Dawn of the Righteous
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Remove up to six damage counters from the cards you control.
card.flavor: Light always returns to shine upon the one wise enough to wait for it.

card.title: Healing Earth
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Remove a number of damage counters from the cards you control up to the number of [C] resources in your pool.
card.flavor: The regenerative powers of the earth are triggered by the transcendent soul.

card.title: Invincible Chi
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play during your turn. When you play Invincible Chi, choose one of the following card types: States, Edges, or sites. The effects and special abilities of all cards of that type are cancelled until the end of the turn.

card.title: Return to the Center
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: All States and non-damage tokens on target card are smoked.
card.flavor: Quan Lo's Principle of Principles: "Find the center within yourself; this you can never lose."

card.title: Violet Meditation
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Limited. Play at the start of your turn. No other cards generate Power during your establishing shot. Instead, Violet Meditation generates Power equal to the number of Edges and Power-generating sites controlled by target opponent.

card.title: Wing of the Crane
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Smoke target character. If the character is still in the smoked pile at the end of the next player's turn, it returns to play.

card.title: Armored in Life
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Play on any character. Subject character gains Toughness: 1.
card.flavor: "Master your internal energy, warrior, and use it to make your flesh harder than the sturdiest shield."

card.title: Claw of the Tiger
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Play on any character. Before combat damage is dealt, Claw of the Tiger inflicts 1 point of damage on all characters in combat with subject character.

card.title: Contract of the Fox
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Play on any character. Turn Contract of the Fox to unturn subject character.
card.flavor: The fox symbolizes swiftness, the unexpected, and reckless bravado.

card.title: Death Touch
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Play on any character. Any character in combat with subject character is smoked. Does not affect characters with [M] or [H] in their resource conditions.

card.title: Dim Mak
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Play on any character. Subject character gains +1 Fighting. Damage inflicted by subject character is not reduced by Toughness.

card.title: Drunken Stance
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Any intercepting character with a Fighting score of 2 or less that is about to enter combat with subject character returns to its owner's hand.
card.flavor: Few have the discipline to master complete dissolution.

card.title: Flying Windmill Kick
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Whenever subject character inflicts damage in combat, flip a coin twice. For each result of heads, double the damage the character inflicts.
card.flavor: "Ki" --- thwackthwackthwack --- "YAH!!"

card.title: Fortuitous Chi
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Play on a character you control. Subject character and all characters you control sharing a designator with it may not be damaged or removed from play by Events played by opponents, nor can these characters turn to attack characters.

card.title: Fortune of the Turtle
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Play on any character. Subject character is not affected by Event cards played by your opponents.
card.flavor: The turtle symbolizes protection, caution, and forethought.

card.title: The Fox Outfoxed
card.subtitle: State
card.text: All Power subject card generates or creates goes into your pool. May not be played on a feng shui site.
card.flavor: You taste prosperity. Your foe tastes air.

card.title: Hands Without Shadow
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Play on any character. In combat, subject character may inflict enough damage to reduce its opponent's Fighting score to 1 instead of inflicting its regular damage.

card.title: Rain of Fury
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Subject character gains +1 Fighting whenever an opponent plays an Event during your turn. Bonus is lost if subject character or Rain of Fury leaves play.

card.title: Shadowfist
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Play on any character. All damage inflicted on subject character by characters in combat is reduced to 0.

card.title: Ultimate Mastery
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Play on any character. For the duration of the attack, subject character gains the special abilities of each character it is in combat with until combat with that character is resolved.

card.title: Whirlwind Strike
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Play on any character. If subject character smokes a character it is intercepting, it may intercept another attacking character once combat is over.

card.title: RedGlare Chapel
card.subtitle: Netherworld Site
card.text: Unique. Turn to unturn Reverend RedGlare or turn to inflict 1 point of damage on every other turned site in play.
card.flavor: Thanks to its onboard computers, the Reverend's deadly chapel is smarter than he is.

card.title: Secret Laboratory
card.subtitle: Site
card.flavor: Access to the latest fruits of the miltary industrial complex is essential to the serious secret warrior.

card.title: CAT Tactics
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: If an opponent ends his or her turn without declaring an attack, put a counter on CAT Tactics. Remove X counters to give target character +X Fighting until the end of the turn. Remove all such counters from CAT Tactics at the end of your turn.

card.title: Doomsday Device
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Unique. Gain 1 Power whenever an opponent declares interception against an attack you declare. If Doomsday Device leaves play, toast a card in your burned-for-victory pile.

card.title: Smart Missile
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Comes into play turned. Turn and sacrifice to inflict 6 points of damage on target turned site, or on target character that is the subject of a vehicle State.

card.title: Supercomputer
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Unique. When you draw cards during your establishing shot, you may choose to draw 3 cards instead of the number of cards you would ordinarily draw.
card.comments: Ruling: Allows you to draw 3 cards during your establishing shot, even if your hand is at or above its normal limit.

card.title: Tank Warfare
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: You may play Tank States from your smoked pile at -1 cost. Tank characters or characters that are the subject of Tank States may not turn to attack sites if two or more players control such characters.

card.title: Orbital Laser Strike
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Target site takes damage equal to the number of [H] resources in your pool.
card.flavor: It was sold to the public as a purely defensive technology.

card.title: Salvage
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Return any [H] card in your smoked pile to your hand.
card.flavor: Waste not, want not.

card.title: Satellite Intelligence
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Target site switches positions with another target site its controller controls. This may change which site is targeted by an attack.

card.title: Satellite Surveillance
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: You may reveal a number of sites up to the number of [H] resouces in your pool.
card.flavor: "The J19 can read a newspaper from orbit. Locating your hideout is kid stuff."

card.title: Combat Aircar
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Vehicle. User gains Mobility, Tactics, and +4 Fighting.
card.flavor: Their phased grav stabilizers give them the maneuverability needed for surgical operations.

card.title: Desire Manipulator
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Play on a character. If subject character is controlled by an opponent and has not turned to attack at the end of its controller's turn, you gain 1 Power.
card.flavor: It implants new loyalties on the subconscious level.

card.title: Disintegrator Ray
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Weapon. Subject character gains +1 Fighting. If subject character inflicts enough damage to smoke a character, subject character toasts that character instead.

card.title: Floating Fortress
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Vehicle. Subject character gains Mobility and +8 Fighting.
card.flavor: It took a dozen Floating Fortresses less than an hour to level all of Acapulco.

card.title: Fusion Rifle
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Weapon. Turn Fusion Rifle to inflict 2 points of damage on any target at subject's location.
card.flavor: They still haven't got any fusion power plants on-line, but the armament spin-offs are kicking.

card.title: Fusion Tank
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Vehicle. Subject character gains Mobility and +4 Fighting.
card.flavor: "I survived the Dallas Uprising. I'll never forget the sight of the fusion tanks rolling down Commerce Street."

card.title: Havoc Suit
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Weapon. Add half the number of [H] resources in your pool, rounded down, to subject character's Fighting score.
card.comments: This may be corrected in a future edition to say HAVOC Suit (in caps). It will still count as the same card.

card.title: Hover Tank
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Vehicle. Subject character gains +3 Fighting, Mobility, and Tactics. When subject character turns to attack, you may choose one character in play to be unable to intercept subject character.

card.title: IKTV Rebroadcast Link
card.subtitle: Netherworld State
card.text: Turn IKTV Rebroadcast Link and flip a coin. Heads: subject site unturns. Tails: each opponent gains 1 power.
card.flavor: IKTV News: Always dramatic! Sometimes reliable.

card.title: MegaTank
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Vehicle. Subject character gains +7 Fighting and Toughness: 2. Subject character cannot be damaged or removed from play by [f] Events.
card.flavor: The only commuter vehicle you can drive on both sidewalks.

card.title: Robot Arm
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Play on any character. Subject character gains +2 Fighting and Toughness: 1 against damage inflicted by characters.

card.title: Alchemist's Lair
card.subtitle: Site
card.flavor: "You were right, old man. The power of immortality is what I sought --- and the misery of duality is what I found."

card.title: Illusory Bridge
card.subtitle: Site
card.text: May be placed in any legal position on an opponent's side.
card.flavor: Many have died defending it, yet it does not truly exist.
card.comments: Clarification: This card becomes controlled by the opponent who gets it.

card.title: The Hungry
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Gain 3 Power whenever you burn a site for victory. All your characters and sites suffer 2 points of damage if The Hungry leaves play.

card.title: I Ching
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Turn to look at the top three cards of any one player's deck and arrange them in whatever order you wish.

card.title: Soul Maze
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Turn to cause two characters in combat to swap, for the duration of the combat, their special abilities and the special abilities of any cards played on them.

card.title: Spirit Frenzy
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: You may turn a [M] character to do 1 point of damage to a character that has just been damaged.

card.title: Curtain of Fullness
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Target player must discard 3 cards at random from his or her hand.
card.flavor: The stars hold a thousand might-have-beens, none to be beheld by mortal eyes.

card.title: Discerning Fire
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Smoke X target cards that share a designator other than "Netherworld." X must be greater than one. Power-generating sites are not legal targets.

card.title: Killing Rain
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: All sites in play take 2 points of damage.
card.flavor: Corruption of the heavens; Corruption of the lake; Misfortune.

card.title: Larcenous Mist
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Any special abilities possessed by target character and any States on target character have no effect for the duration of this turn. Treat the character card and any State cards on it as if their card text were blank.

card.title: Memory Reprocessing
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Toast It. When you play Memory Reprocessing, you may play an Event from target opponents smoked pile at normal cost, but ignoring resource conditions. The Event goes back into his or her smoked pile. The opponent gains 1 Power.

card.title: Pocket Demon
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Limited. Play at start of your turn. No other card generates Power during your establishing shot. Instead, Pocket Demon generates Power equal to the number of Power-generating sites controlled by target opponent, plus the number of cards in his or her burned-for-victory pile.

card.title: Scroll of Incantation
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Search through your deck for an Event. Reshuffle your deck afterwards. You must play this Event immediately or it is toasted.
card.flavor: On the scroll is always writ precisely the ritual you need.

card.title: Shattering Fire
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Target character takes damage equal to the number of [M] resources in your pool.
card.flavor: The first spell any apprentice sorcerer wishes to learn --- with good reason.

card.title: Year of the Rat
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play anytime, except during an attack, to switch two target players' positions at the gaming table. You may only play a single Year of the Rat card in any game.

card.title: Alabaster Javelin
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Weapon. If subject character is smoked, you may inflict 3 points of damage on any target in play.
card.flavor: The provincial official regretted the day he confiscated the alchemist's spear.

card.title: Amulet of the Turtle
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Any damage inflicted on subject character is inflicted on Amulet of the Turtle instead. Amulet of the Turtle can sustain damage equal to your [M] resources before being smoked.

card.title: Anomaly Spirit
card.subtitle: Sorcerous Construct
card.text: Whenever a new column begins in an opponent's site structure, Anomaly Spirit gains +1 Fighting until it leaves play.

card.title: Eugene Fo
card.subtitle: Sorcerous Hood
card.text: Unique. At the end of each turn, you may remove one damage counter from Eugene Fo for each Hood card in play. He takes no damage from Cop and Police cards.

card.title: Mirror Dancer
card.subtitle: Netherworld Spirit
card.text: During an attack you declare, if Mirror Dancer damages a site in combat that has the same name as a site you control, you may seize that site.

card.title: Abominable Lab
card.subtitle: Site
card.text: Abominable Lab provides you with one [H] resource for each Buro or PubOrd character you control.

card.title: Arcanoseed
card.subtitle: Battleground Site
card.text: When Arcanoseed is in your front row, you may turn it when you declare an attack, to give target character Ambush against the first character it is in combat with during the attack. Any player who seizes the site gains 2 Power.

card.title: Arcanotower 2056
card.subtitle: Site
card.text: Unique. Cannot be seized. Reduces the number of feng shui sites you need for victory by one. Toughness: 2 against damage that is not inflicted by Unique characters. If Arcanotower 2056 is smoked, you do not generate Power during your next establishing shot.

card.title: Arcanotower Now
card.subtitle: Site
card.text: Unique. Cannot be seized. Reduces the number of feng shui sites you need for victory by one. Opponents must pay 1 Power in addition to the normal cost to play a State on a card you control.
card.flavor: The twisted shape of things to come.

card.title: Biomass Reprocessing Center
card.subtitle: Netherworld Site
card.text: Every time one of your attacking characters is smoked, you may discard a card and draw a card from your deck.
card.flavor: They can't explain it yet, but the Architects know that certain arcanowave prcedures work best in the netherworld.

card.title: Creche of the New Flesh
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: You must play Creche of the New Flesh face up, and at the printed cost rather than the normal cost to play a feng shui site.

card.title: Arcanowave Reinforcer
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: All of your characters inflict +1 damage and are considered Abominations.
card.comments: Clarification: should really say "all your characters <i>in play</i> ..."

card.title: Paradox Cube
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Unique. When Paradox Cube enters play, pick a non-Limited Edge in play. Paradox Cube copies the special abilities of that Edge.

card.title: Probability Manipulator
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Unique. Turn to increase or decrease the value of any number on target card by 1 until the end of the turn. You cannot reduce any digit to 0. Does not affect play costs.
card.comments: Errata: Should also say: "Does not affect play costs or numbers expressed as words."

card.title: Reinvigoration Process
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: You may play Abominations from your smoked pile.
card.comments: Errata: The rules text of this card should read: "Turn during your turn to play an Abomination from your smoked pile at normal cost."

card.title: Scorched Earth
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Limited. Place a counter on Scorched Earth when you burn a site or when a site you control is burned. Your hand size increases by the number of counters on Scorched Earth.

card.title: Seed of the New Flesh
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Each player must spend 1 Power at the start of each of his or her turns or one [C] card of his or her choice that he or she controls is smoked.

card.title: Abominable Wave
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Cancel and smoke a [C] card.
card.flavor: "You have the subtle powers of chi manipulation. I have an entire batallion of slavering, bioengineered ogres howling for blood. Wonder which of us is going to win, hmmm?"

card.title: Arcanowave Pulse
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Cancel and smoke a [g] card.
card.flavor: The Guiding Hand fights the secret war to erase the Architects from their future. These devices were developed to erase them right back.

card.title: Bzzzzzt!
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Target non-Unique character is toasted.
card.flavor: The purists are still a secret society.

card.title: Cellular Reinvigoration
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Until the end of the turn, target character gains Guts and is not smoked when damage inflicted on it equals or exceeds its Fighting score.

card.title: Code Red
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play immediately after you have been attacked. You may launch an attack. Characters that have attacked you this turn cannot intercept this attack.

card.title: Dangerous Experiment
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: You gain 5 Power. The opponent to your left may toast one card of his or her choice that you control.
card.flavor: Pressure from the Buro led to quality-control problems at the CDCA.

card.title: Disinformation Packet
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play, except during an attack, to move target back-row site to create a new location with it to the right of all current locations on its controller's side.
card.flavor: Betrayal starts as a good idea. Then it becomes a habit.

card.title: Expendable Unit
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Redirect all damage from one source to any character you control.
card.flavor: No one is indispensable when reinforcement troops can be grown in a vat.

card.title: Imprisoned
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Target character is returned to its owner's hand.
card.flavor: "Thank goodness Buro prisons are so poorly built 'cause it's sure easy to get thrown into them."

card.title: Napalm Sunrise
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play only during your turn. Inflict 2 points of damage on each character and site at target location.

card.title: Nerve Gas
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Target character is smoked. Does not affect characters with [M] or [H] in their play costs.
card.flavor: When you journey to the year 2056, always remember to pack a gas mask.
card.comments: Clarification: "play cost" should be "resource conditions".

card.title: Neutron Bomb
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: All characters in play are smoked.
card.flavor: Mondo death toll with no property value depreciation.

card.title: Police State
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Cancel and smoke a [d] card.
card.flavor: "As soon as I got the future, I knew freedom was hosed."

card.title: PubOrd Raid
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play only during your turn. All characters at target location become turned.
card.flavor: "FREEZE! Public Order!"

card.title: State of Emergency
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Limited. Draw a number of cards necessary to fill your hand to six cards.
card.flavor: When faced with insurrection, the Buro has three plans: overwhelming force, overwhelming force, and overwhelming force.

card.title: Superior Technology
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: All your characters inflict +1 damage until the end of the turn.
card.flavor: The Buro maintains its iron grip on the world through its terrifiying war machine.

card.title: Total War
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play in response to an opponent turning a character to attack. All unturned characters controlled by that opponent become turned and join the attack. No characters can turn in response to Total War.

card.title: Agony Grenade
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Weapon. When you declare an attack with subject character, sacrifice Agony Grenade to choose X characters that may not intercept subject. X = number of damage counters on subject.
card.flavor: These arcanowave grenades store your pain and allow you to redirect it at your enemies.

card.title: Arcanostriker
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Vehicle. Subject character gains Tactics and +2 Fighting and cannot be intercepted by characters with a Fighting score of 2 or less. If Arcanostriker is smoked, inflict 6 points of damage on subject character.

card.title: Arcanotank
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Vehicle. Subject character gains +3 Fighting and Toughness: 1. Turn Arcanotank to inflict 1 point of damage on all characters at Arcanotank's location.

card.title: Arcanoworms
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Inflict 2 points of damage on subject site whenever a character is smoked at its location.

card.title: Brain Bug EQ3200
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Play on any character. At the beginning of each of your turns, you may look at subject character's controller's hand or reveal one of his or her sites. Subject is smoked if Brain Bug EQ3200 leaves play.

card.title: Buro Godhammer
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Weapon. Subject character inflicts +3 damage in combat.
card.flavor: In 2056, God is dead, and the Architects have his hammer.

card.title: Helix Chewer
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Play on any character. Any damage that subject character inflicts in combat is reduced by 1. If subject character leaves play, Helix Chewer returns to your hand.
card.comments: The border on this card looks like an event. It's really a state like it says.

card.title: Helix Rethread
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Play on a character controlled by one of your opponents. If subject character is smoked, you gain 1 Power.
card.flavor: "Oops, forgot to have you sign the consent form! Ha ha ha haha!"

card.title: Resistance is Futile!
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Limited. Play on a front-row site controlled by an opponent. Characters you control inflict +1 damage at subject site's location. You may play Unique characters that have three or more resource conditions and a cost of 5 or more at -1 cost.

card.title: Sucker Rounds
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Weapon. Subject character's Fighting is increased by the Power in the pool of the opponent to your left.
card.flavor: Its shells contain foul demonic spoor.

card.title: Alpha Beast
card.subtitle: Abomination
card.flavor: "The Alpha Beasts were nothing compared to what came later, but they were still terrifying on the battlefield."

card.title: Arcanotechnician
card.subtitle: Buro Scientist
card.text: Turn Arcanotechnician and toast a character in your smoked pile to return any card in your smoked pile to your hand.

card.title: Arcanowave Researcher
card.subtitle: Scientist
card.text: Turn to force target player to discard a card at random from his or her hand.

card.title: Brain Eater
card.subtitle: Abomination
card.text: Ambush.
card.flavor: It feeds on gray matter. Hope you're wearing a helmet.

card.title: Brain Sucker
card.subtitle: Abomination
card.text: Special abilities of Masterminds are cancelled while Brain Sucker is in play.
card.flavor: It's eaten the best ideas of our generation.

card.title: Buro Assassin
card.subtitle: Covert Operator
card.text: Ambush
card.flavor: "That split second when you realize I've crept up on you --- that'll be the last split second you get, Consumer."

card.title: Buro Official
card.subtitle: Vile Bureaucrat
card.text: Turn to give Ambush until the end of the turn to a character with a play cost of no greater than 3.

card.title: BuroMil Elite
card.subtitle: Perfect Soldiers
card.text: Toughness: 1 against Rebels. Gains +1 Fighting while at a location that has a Battleground site in its front row.
card.flavor: First in, last out.
card.designators: | buro mil elite perfect soldier soldiers |

card.title: BuroMil Grunt
card.subtitle: Brutal Soldier
card.text: BuroMil Grunt is smoked at the end of the turn he is played. You may play BuroMil Grunt during an attack against you. BuroMil Grunt's abilities cannot be given to another character by any means.

card.title: BuroMil Ninja
card.subtitle: Shadowy Assassin
card.text: Ambush and Assassinate against characters whose controller also controls a turned site.

card.title: Capture Squad
card.subtitle: Monster Hunters
card.text: If Capture Squad damages a Demon or Abomination, you take control of that Demon or Abomination.
card.flavor: They do a Marlon Perkins number on slithering demons.

card.title: CHAR
card.subtitle: BuroMil Cyborg
card.text: Damage CHAR inflicts in combat is reduced as his Fighting score decreases but cannot be reduced or redirected by any other means. CHAR takes no damage from Fire cards.
card.comments: Ruling: CHAR damages characters who "take no damage," including Rah Rah Rasputine, Death Shadow, and the subject of Shadowfist. He also ignores Toughness.

card.title: Chi Sucker
card.subtitle: Netherworld Abomination
card.text: When Chi Sucker attacks, it gains +X Fighting. X = the number of Power-generating sites controlled by controller of its target.
card.flavor: Your feng shui is its idea of breakfast.
card.comments: Errata: Bonus lasts for duration of the attack.

card.title: Colonel Griffith
card.subtitle: BuroMil Mastermind
card.text: Unique. Turn and maintain to give target character +X Fighting and Tactics. X = the total number of that character's resource conditions and resources.

card.title: Desdemona Deathangel
card.subtitle: Abomination
card.text: Unique. Ambush.
card.flavor: "The people believed she was an incarnation of Kali, goddess of destruction."

card.title: DNA Mage
card.subtitle: Occult Scientist
card.text: Cannot turn to attack.
card.flavor: He mixes biotech and sorcery, with sinister results.

card.title: Dr. April Mucosa
card.subtitle: Mad Scientist
card.text: Unique. Turn to reduce the damage target character inflicts by 3 until the end of the turn.

card.title: Drop Troopers
card.subtitle: BuroMil Cyborgs
card.text: You may play Drop Troopers at no cost during an attack declared by an opponent who is one feng shui site away from fulfilling victory conditions.
card.designators: | drop trooper troopers buro mil cyborg cyborgs |

card.title: Dunwa Saleem
card.subtitle: Lodge Traitor
card.text: Unique. Turn to take control of an [a] character that lacks resource conditions. If Dunwa attacks successfully, you may toast the top 2 cards in the deck of the target's controller.

card.title: Encephalon Screamer
card.subtitle: Abomination
card.text: When Encephalon Screamer turns to attack, inflict 1 point of damage on each unturned character, and on turned sites, at the location of the target of the attack.

card.title: Flying Bladder
card.subtitle: Netherworld Abomination
card.text: Can only be intercepted by characters intercepting in chains.
card.flavor: There are some Things That Man Just Doesn't Want To Know...

card.title: Foul Hatchling
card.subtitle: Abomination
card.text: If you control Foul Hatchling at the beginning of your turn, it may inflict 1 point of damage on a target site.
card.flavor: Kill it before it grows.

card.title: Genghis X
card.subtitle: BuroMil Supersoldier
card.text: Unique. Genghis X has Guts when there are three or more damage counters on him.
card.flavor: The name Jason X has left a bad taste in his life.
card.designators: | genghi genghis x buro mil super soldier |

card.title: Gnarled Attuner
card.subtitle: Abomination
card.text: Unique. Damage that Gnarled Attuner inflicts in combat can never be removed.
card.flavor: So far the Architects have produced only one of these things, in their netherworld lab.

card.title: Homo Omega
card.subtitle: Buro Cyborg
card.text: Unique. Toughness: 2.
card.flavor: "I am the future of the species. You are a rival gene pool."

card.title: Johann Bonengel
card.subtitle: BuroPresident
card.text: Unique. Turn for 2 Power. While Johann is unturned, your opponents cannot play States on cards you control.

card.title: Midnight Whisperer
card.subtitle: Abomination
card.text: Ambush.
card.flavor: "I will crawl insssside your ssssoul, and there I will learn the ssssecretssss that will kill you, my delisssscious prey..."

card.title: Monster Hunter
card.subtitle: Timewalker
card.text: Turn and maintain to control a demon or spirit.

card.title: Mutoid
card.subtitle: Abomination
card.text: Guts. Mutoid's damage is increased by the number of damage counters on it.
card.flavor: Its pain is your pain.

card.title: Nirmal Yadav
card.subtitle: Supersoldier
card.text: Unique. Toughness: 1 when attacking.
card.flavor: Decorated by Bonengel himself for service to the Buro.
card.comments: One of the Operation Killdeer characters

card.title: Plasma Trooper
card.subtitle: BuroMil Cyborg
card.text: When Plasma Trooper turns to attack, it gains +X Fighting until the end of the attack. X = number of characters controlled by the controller of its target.

card.title: Pod Trooper
card.subtitle: Abomination in a Can
card.text: Toast It. X = the number of characters and back-row sites controlled by the opponent to your left. Toast Pod Trooper at the end of the turn it enters play.

card.title: Prototype X
card.subtitle: Abomination
card.text: Unique. Prototype X's Fighting score is reduced by the number of Chi characters in play.

card.title: PubOrd Officer
card.subtitle: Security Cop
card.flavor: She's just following orders.

card.title: PubOrd Sniper
card.subtitle: Cop
card.text: Turn to do 1 point of damage to an attacking character.

card.title: PubOrd Squad
card.subtitle: Buro Cops
card.flavor: The secret police of 2056 ruthlessly enforce the laws of the dictatorial Buro.
card.designators: | pub ord squad buro cop cops |

card.title: Purist
card.subtitle: Buro Sorcerer
card.text: Turn and maintain Purist to give a feng shui site you control the special abilities of a face-up feng shui site that is controlled by an opponent and that turns (or turns and maintains) to generate its effect.

card.title: The Reconstructed
card.subtitle: Abomination
card.flavor: "After they put down the India Insurgency, they became synonymous with terror."

card.title: Rhys Engel
card.subtitle: Purist Mastermind
card.text: Unique. Once per turn you may discard a card to look at an opponent's hand or reveal a feng shui site.
card.flavor: Your soul will be returned to you when your mission is complete.

card.title: Sergeant Blightman
card.subtitle: Mutating Soldier
card.text: Unique. Inflict 3 points of damage on Sergeant Blightman at the start of each of your turns. Cannot turn to heal. Sergeant Blightman is toasted if he leaves play.

card.title: Spawn of the New Flesh
card.subtitle: Unstable Abomination
card.text: Unique. Ambush. X = the number of columns in your site structure.

card.title: Super Soldier
card.subtitle: Fanatic Cop
card.text: Guts.
card.flavor: His loyalty is to the tumult of the battlefield.

card.title: Tactical Team
card.subtitle: Buro Cops
card.text: Can be played during an opponent's turn.
card.flavor: Their motto: "Respond Rapidly; React Decisively."

card.title: Test Subjects
card.subtitle: Abominations
card.flavor: "The plan was to turn demons from the ancient past into supersoldiers. Didn't work too well at first."

card.title: Undercover Agent
card.subtitle: Buro Operative
card.text: Gains your choice of Stealth or Ambush when she turns to attack a target controlled by a player who controls a [j] character.
card.flavor: The Jammers have been heavily compromised by Buro intelligence.

card.title: Vivisector
card.subtitle: Abomination Scientist
card.text: Turn Vivisector to sacrifice a character and gain Power equal to its play cost.

card.title: Family Estate
card.subtitle: Site
card.text: Turn to play a Pledged character at -1 cost. Family Estate takes 2 points of damage whenever a Lodge character is smoked.

card.title: Monkey King
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Turn Monkey King to return any [e] card to its owner's hand.

card.title: Open Season
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: All Assassins, Enforcers and Killers in play gain Assassinate. All characters in play may turn to attack other characters as if they had the ability Independent.

card.title: Paper Trail
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Gain 1 Power for each card an opponent discards. You cannot gain more than 2 Power a turn in this manner. If Paper Trail leaves play, all of your opponents gain 1 Power.

card.title: Political Lock
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: No character can turn to change location while Political Lock is in play.

card.title: Soul of the Dragon
card.subtitle: Triumvirate Edge
card.text: Limited. If you reduce a feng shui site's Body to 1 in an attack, you may burn that feng shui site for victory.

card.title: Tomb of the Beast
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Each player must spend 1 Power at the start of his or her turns or one [M] card of his or her choice that he or she controls is smoked.

card.title: Bite of the Jellyfish
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play after a feng shui site is burned. You gain all the Power in the pool of the player who burned that site, including any Power he or she may have gained from burning for Power.
card.comments: Ruling: When Bite of the Jellyfish is played in response to burning a site for power, you may respond to Bite of the Jellyfish with any effect (such as Confucian Stability) that specifically states it may be generated in response to an Event. You may use

card.title: Bull Market
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: All players gain 5 Power.
card.flavor: When the Unspoken Name sneezes, the Dow Jones index says, "Gesundheit."

card.title: Covert Operation
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Look at target player's hand. You may force that player to discard one card of your choice.
card.flavor: The Ascended prefer to zap you before you even hit the field.

card.title: Cry of the Forgotten Ancestor
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Cancel and smoke target [M] card.
card.flavor: The Lodge was founded in the 11th century with the express purpose of driving magic from the world.

card.title: Faked Death
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Take a character from your smoked pile and return it to your hand.
card.flavor: "You're overexposed, Brother Rooster. Time to pull an Elvis."

card.title: Hostile Takeover
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play during an auction. The highest current bidder must give you Power equal to his or her bid. You win the auction.

card.title: Lodge Politics
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: You take control of target [a] card. Lodge characters are not legal targets for Lodge Politics.
card.flavor: A thousand years of consensus ends *now*.

card.title: Mole Network
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play only during your turn. Take 1 Power from target player's pool and add it to your own.

card.title: Operation Green Strike
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Limited. Play only during your main shot. Inflict 3 points of damage on target non-feng shui site. If Operation Green Strike reduces target site's body to zero, you may seize that site.
card.flavor: "By the time we got back, Kar Fei's crib was crawling with ninjas."

card.title: Operation Killdeer
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Target character inflicts no damage this turn.

card.title: Realpolitik
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Smoke target Edge or State.
card.flavor: The Ascended will --- and can --- do nearly anything to maintain their power over our world.

card.title: Roar of the Beast
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Cancel and smoke target card.
card.flavor: The Unspoken Name contains his rage for the final confrontation.

card.title: Subterfuge
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: For the duration of this turn, target player must pay an additional 1 Power to play any card. No characters or sites may be played in response to this card.

card.title: Suicide Mission
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Smoke any card in play. Target card's controller may immediately smoke one of your cards of his or her choice.
card.flavor: The Pledge is a promise to do anything for the Unspoken Name --- even die.

card.title: We Know Where You Live
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play during your turn to look at target opponent's hand. You may inflict 1 point of damage on any card he or she controls that shares a designator with a card in his or her hand. For every three cards damaged in this way you gain 2 Power.

card.title: Marked for Death
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Play on any character. Flip a coin at the start of each of your turns. On a result of heads, subject character is smoked.
card.flavor: "When the Unspoken Name puts an X through your picture, you stay X-ed."

card.title: Seal of the Wheel
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Play on a character you control. Place one counter on Seal of the Wheel at the beginning of each of your turns. The number of feng shui sites you need for victory is reduced by one for every two counters on Seal of the Wheel. You must still seize or burn your last site.

card.title: Security
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Play on any site. Subject site gains +4 Body.
card.flavor: "Remote cameras, electronic sensors, automated machine gun emplacements --- all they cost is money, and the Ascended have that to burn."

card.title: Shadowy Mentor
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Play on any character. You control subject character; it comes to your side unturned. Subject character is now considered to be a Pledged character.

card.title: Adrienne Hart
card.subtitle: Pledged Martial Artist
card.text: Unique. No states may be played on Adrienne.
card.flavor: She plunges into battle to forget her forbidden love for the Unspoken Name.
card.comments: One of the Operation Killdeer characters

card.title: Bad Colonel
card.subtitle: Pledged Hood Warlord
card.text: Turn and maintain to take control of a Soldier. All Soldiers you control gain the designator "Hood" and inflict +1 damage.
card.flavor: One of the winners in the war on drugs.

card.title: Blade Freak
card.subtitle: Mercenary
card.text: When Blade Freak enters play, he may inflict 1 point of damage on any target.
card.flavor: His business card is six inches of steel.

card.title: Cabinet Minister
card.subtitle: Pledged Politician
card.text: Turn and maintain to control or cancel target Edge. If target Edge leaves play while under your control, Cabinet Minister is smoked.

card.title: Church Official
card.subtitle: Pledged Operative
card.text: Turn and pay 1 Power to cancel and smoke any [M] card as it is played.

card.title: Death Shadow
card.subtitle: Mercenary
card.text: Unique. Takes no damage from characters that intercept her.
card.flavor: "I shall slide through your blows as a shadow darts across a wall."

card.title: Draco
card.subtitle: Lodge Enforcer
card.text: Unique.
card.flavor: The dragon blood in his veins gives him the powers of all transformed animals.

card.title: Fist of the Bear
card.subtitle: Lodge Enforcer
card.flavor: The bear blood that flows in her veins makes her implacable and bold.

card.title: Gruff Lieutenant
card.subtitle: Pledged Cop
card.text: Stealth.
card.flavor: The Order of the Wheel recruits high-ranking police officiers to keep them hip to action on the streets.

card.title: Just a Rat
card.subtitle: Lodge Survivor
card.text: Stealth. Inflict 2 points of damage on any character that Just a Rat bypasses using Stealth.

card.title: Leatherback
card.subtitle: Lodge Survivor
card.text: Unturns when an opponent plays a [M] or [H] card.
card.flavor: The Lodge ain't sittin' pretty in 2056.

card.title: Liquidators
card.subtitle: Pledged Enforcers
card.text: +1 damage if you also control a Lodge character.

card.title: Might of the Elephant
card.subtitle: Lodge Enforcer
card.text: X = the number of [a] resources in your resource pool.

card.title: Military Commandant
card.subtitle: Pledged Mastermind
card.text: Turn and maintain to give target character +2 Fighting.

card.title: Mountain Warrior
card.subtitle: Pledged Survivor
card.text: Gains Ambush until the end of the turn if an opponent turns a site to use the site's special ability.
card.flavor: The winners rule the world. The losers keep the faith.

card.title: Mr. Big
card.subtitle: Hood Mastermind
card.text: Unique. All other Hoods you control gain +1 Fighting. Turn to unturn a Hood character. If someone seizes or burns a site you control, they may take control of one of your Hood cards.

card.title: Mr. X
card.subtitle: Lodge Mastermind
card.text: Unique. Turn and maintain to control a character with a play cost no greater than 3. It comes to your side unturned.
card.flavor: "I have places to go and people to be."

card.title: Muckraking Journalist
card.subtitle: Pledged Operative
card.text: Turn and maintain to prevent target character from unturning normally.

card.title: Phillipe Benoit
card.subtitle: Pledged Assassin
card.text: Unique. Stealth.
card.flavor: "Your pleading for mercy reminds me of a line from Sartre."

card.title: The Pledged
card.subtitle: Loyal Initiates
card.flavor: "At the lowest levels, the Order of the Wheel is like the Kiwanis Club. Go a little higher up, and the Colt 1911s come out."
card.designators: | the pledged loyal initiat initiate initiates |

card.title: Reverend RedGlare
card.subtitle: Mercenary
card.text: Unique. Select a designator when Reverend RedGlare is brought into play. Turn Reverend RedGlare to inflict 3 points of damage on target character bearing that designator.

card.title: Sam Mallory
card.subtitle: Lodge Killer
card.text: Unique. Toughness: X. X = number of damage counters on Sam Mallory.
card.flavor: For an unstoppable killer, he's a pretty decent guy.

card.title: Shell of the Tortoise
card.subtitle: Lodge Mastermind
card.text: Cannot turn to attack. Turn to redirect damage done to any feng shui site from a single source to Shell of the Tortoise.

card.title: Shinobu Yashida
card.subtitle: Pledged Master
card.text: Unique. Inflicts +3 damage on characters with Fighting of 8 or more.
card.flavor: "Only you are worthy of my sharpest blows, Wong Fei Hong."

card.title: Soul of the Shark
card.subtitle: Lodge Mastermind
card.text: Turn to change the subject of a State as the State is played. You must choose a legal subject with the same controller as the original subject or the State is played on its original subject.

card.title: Sting of the Scorpion
card.subtitle: Lodge Assassin
card.text: Assassinate.
card.flavor: She reatins not only the blood of her ancestors, but their poison as well.

card.title: Strike Force
card.subtitle: Commandos
card.text: Tactics. Stealth.
card.flavor: The armies of the world are in fact one force under the command of the Unspoken name.

card.title: Student of the Bear
card.subtitle: Pledged Martial Artist
card.flavor: Graduates of the Bear School don't bother with the subtle approach.

card.title: Student of the Shark
card.subtitle: Pledged Hood
card.text: Inflicts +1 damage on damaged characters and damaged sites.

card.title: Swat Team
card.subtitle: Cop Pawns
card.flavor: "Name any place in the world: the Lodge can have an emergency response team there in twenty minutes, tops."

card.title: Swiss Banker
card.subtitle: Pledged Financier
card.text: Turn for 1 Power. Swiss Banker is smoked if you have no Power in your pool.

card.title: Tatsuya Yanai
card.subtitle: Lodge Mastermind
card.text: Unique. Turn Tatsuya Yanai, except during an attack, to switch the locations of any two sites belonging to a single controller.

card.title: Tooth of the Snake
card.subtitle: Lodge Assassin
card.text: Stealth.
card.flavor: The blood of the snake lets him strike fast and true.

card.title: Triumvirate Dealmaker
card.subtitle: Pledged Mastermind
card.text: Turn to give an attacking character controlled by an opponent +2 Fighting until end of turn. If that character damages its target in the attack, you gain 1 Power.
card.flavor: "Your *new* terms are...."

card.title: Undercover Cop
card.subtitle: Pledged Operatives
card.text: Stealth. X = the number of Cop characters you control. Can attack back-row sites.
card.designators: | undercover cop pledged operativ operative operatives |

card.title: The Unspoken Name
card.subtitle: Lodge Chairperson
card.text: Unique. Cannot turn to attack. Turn to give Stealth until the end of the turn to any number of characters whose combined play cost does not exceed 7.

card.title: Vladimir Kovalov
card.subtitle: Lodge Mastermind
card.text: Unique. You may discard an additional card at the beginning of your turn.
card.flavor: His wolf soul suits him for the challenges of the new Russia.

card.title: Web of the Spider
card.subtitle: Lodge Mastermind
card.text: Turn, except during an attack, to change the position of target character to any location on its controller's side.

card.title: House on the Hill
card.subtitle: Site
card.text: Characters at House on the Hill's location have Toughness: 1 when intercepting attackers.

card.title: Kar Fai's Crib
card.subtitle: Site
card.text: Unique. You may play Dragon States at -1 cost. Turn to ignore one resource condition when playing a character.

card.title: Wind Across Heaven
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: [e] characters suffer 2 points of damage whenever they become turned.

card.title: "Now You've Made Us Mad"
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Gain 1 Power for each of your characters that is damaged.
card.flavor: Nietzsche said: "That which does not kill us makes us kick more butt." Or something like that.

card.title: Array of Stunts
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: You may change the locations of all your characters to new locations on your side as many columns right or left as you wish.

card.title: Assassins in Love
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: You are now the controller of all Assasins. They come to your side unturned.
card.flavor: They cared only for money --- until they saw each other.

card.title: Back for Seconds
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Unturn target character.
card.flavor: "Okay, pal, this time the gloves are off!"

card.title: Booby Trap
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play when one of your sites is attacked. Target site and all characters at its location suffer 3 points of damage.
card.flavor: "I knew we couldn't hold it, so I wired the joint to blow."
card.comments: Ruling: Booby Trap may be played at any time before the attack ends. (So do damage with interceptors first.) FAQ Clarification (seems to contradict): "Play on a site you control when the site is attacked. Target site ..."

card.title: Carnival of Carnage
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: For the duration of this turn, after each character is smoked, you may inflict 1 point of damage on any character in play. Each point of damage inflicted by Carnival of Carnage is a seperate source of damage.

card.title: The Crucible
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: All Demons in play are toasted.
card.flavor: "Funny... the foam that melted demons leave behind is a lot like oven cleaner."

card.title: Dirk Wisely's Gambit
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Limited. Play when you turn only one character to attack a target controlled by an opponent who controls four or more cards. If your character succeeds in damaging its target in combat, you gain 2 Power.

card.title: Fighting Spirit
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Toast It. Return exactly two randomly selected [d] Events to your hand from your smoked pile. If you select two identical Events, they are toasted instead of returned to your hand.

card.title: Final Brawl
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: All characters in play suffer 2 points of damage.
card.flavor: Hamlet, Oedipus, Dirty Harry --- the classic stories always end in blood.

card.title: Flying Kick
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Target character gains Superleap until end of turn.
card.flavor: "Yeah, yeah, we'll give it back to the Hand when we're done with it."

card.title: Golden Comeback
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: You may take a character from your smoked pile and return it to play.
card.flavor: "It'll take more than nine slugs in the chest to put me down when there are still creeps like you in the world!"

card.title: Kiii-YAAAH!
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play during your main shot, and only on target opponent who controls three or more Power-generating sites. Take up to 3 Power from target's pool and add it to your own.

card.title: Last Outpost
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: All your characters gain Toughness: 1 until the end of the turn.
card.flavor: "Looks like there's over fifty of them. Hope you're a good shot, cop."

card.title: Last Stand
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: All your characters gain +2 Fighting until the end of the turn if an opponent has more feng shui sites in play than you.
card.flavor: They got Mane, McCroun, Donovan --- but they ain't gettin' us!

card.title: Let's Book!
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play during an attack you declared. All attacking characters you control cease attacking. Until the end of the turn, Events played by opponents cannot damage these characters or remove them from play.

card.title: Old Hermit's Gambit
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play only during your turn in response to an opponent turning a non-character card. You may unturn a target card.

card.title: Slo Mo Vengeance
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: During any turn, you may play, at no cost, a total of X weapon States or Gun States from your smoked pile onto a character you control.
card.flavor: This is the moment when it all does down....

card.title: Surprise, Surprise
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play when attacked. Cut your deck and draw a card. Put the card in your hand or discard it, or play it immediately at no cost and regardless of card type. If the card is in play at the end of the turn, toast it.

card.title: Thunder on Thunder
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: All Edges in play are toasted.
card.flavor: Shock upon shock, old advantages are swept away by the storm.

card.title: Ting Ting's Gambit
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play Ting Ting's Gambit after an attack you declared fails. For the duration of the turn, you may declare subsequent attacks as if all your characters had the ability Independent.

card.title: Victory for the Underdog
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Cancel and smoke any [f] card.
card.flavor: "I could kick abominations all day long."

card.title: Who's the Big Man Now?!
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Toast It. For the duration of the turn, target character's Fighting score is increased by the number of cards controlled by an opponent of your choice. The number of feng shui sites you need for victory is increased by one.

card.title: Bag Full of Guns
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Play on a character you control. Turn to give +1 Fighting until the end of the turn to all characters you control at subject character's location.

card.title: Baptism of Fire
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Play on any character immediately after subject character has been damaged. Subject character gains +2 Fighting. You may play Baptism of Fire during another player's turn.

card.title: Both Guns Blazing
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Subject character gains +1 Fighting for each Weapon State on it. Draw a card when you play a weapon State on subject character. No character may be the subject of more than one Both Guns Blazing.

card.title: Charmed Life
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Play on any character. Subject character is immune to any effects that smoke characters or cards. Character can still be smoked due to damage.

card.title: Claw of the Dragon
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Subject character gains +2 Fighting and Guts. You may play Claw of the Dragon at no cost, and ignoring resource conditions, when a feng shui site you control is seized or burned.

card.title: Comrades in Arms
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Limited. You may ignore resource conditions when playing characters that share a designator with subject character. If you have a Battleground site in your front row, other characters you control that share a designator with subject character gain Toughness: 1
card.flavor: So we meet again... *this* time as allies.

card.title: Fists of Legend
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Unique. Play on any character. Subject character's Fighting score is increased by the number of Unique characters in your smoked pile.

card.title: Heroic Conversion
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Play on any character. If subject character attacks you, you take control of it at the end of the turn.
card.flavor: "I have served those butchers all my life! Blind --- I have been blind!"

card.title: Repulsor Beams
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Limited. When subject site is attacked, turn subject site to reduce damage that target attacking character inflicts to 0 until the end of the attack.
card.flavor: One of the Prof's most useful inventions."

card.title: Stolen Police Car
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Vehicle. During an attack, you may turn Stolen Police Car and flip a coin. Heads: subject character gains Superleap and +2 Fighting until the end of the attack. Tails: return subject character to its owner's hand.

card.title: Training Sequence
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Play on any character. Subject character gains +1 Fighting. Multiple Training Sequence cards can be played on the same character.
card.flavor: Supreme prowess in one montage and a soundtrack tune...

card.title: Undercover
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Play on any character. Subject character can attack back-row sites. Subject can still be blocked by characters at the location it is attacking.

card.title: Average Joe
card.subtitle: Blue-Collar Hero
card.text: Toughness: 1.
card.flavor: "It's up to ordinary folks like you and me to stop these dirt bags, in the name of truth, freedom, and hamburgers with the works."

card.title: Bao Chou
card.subtitle: Avenging Ghost
card.text: Unique. X = the number of characters in your smoked pile. Cannot turn to heal. Heals when a feng shui site you control is seized or burned.

card.title: Big Bruiser
card.subtitle: Kicker of Butts
card.text: Guts. Toughness: 1.
card.flavor: "Was that supposed to hurt or something?"

card.title: Bronze Sentinel
card.subtitle: Automation
card.text: During your turn, toast a feng shui site you have in play to increase Bronze Sentinel's Fighting score until the end of the turn by the number of characters in your smoked pile.

card.title: Capoeira Master
card.subtitle: Martial Artist
card.text: Inflicts +3 damage when intercepting.
card.flavor: "I never saw anybody break a jawbone so beautifully."

card.title: Chinese Doctor
card.subtitle: Wise Physician
card.text: Turn to heal target character.
card.flavor: "Lucky they shot you in the head, Jack. Next time they might hit something important."

card.title: Coffee-Stained Cop
card.subtitle: Wily Veteran
card.text: If Coffee-Stained Cop is smoked by an opponent, all characters you currently control gain +1 Fighting until the end of the turn.

card.title: Dragon Adept
card.subtitle: Versatile Combatant
card.text: Independent.
card.flavor: He's a gourmet cook, an expert at calculus --- and can kick you into next week.

card.title: Dragon Fighter
card.subtitle: Streetfighter
card.text: Guts.
card.flavor: The last honest guy in the wrong part of town.

card.title: Everyday Hero
card.subtitle: Brave Scrapper
card.text: Guts.
card.flavor: If justice is to prevail in the secret war, ordinary people all around the world must stand up for what's right.

card.title: Ex-Commando
card.subtitle: Dangerous Vet
