card.text: Ex-Commando unturns whenever a weapon State or Gun State is played on him.
card.flavor: Secretly, he's glad peacetime isn't so peaceful.

card.title: Friends of the Dragon
card.subtitle: Dragon Supporters
card.flavor: "We need to kick some bad-guy butt. Round up your students, Zheng!"

card.title: Gadgeteer
card.subtitle: Resourceful Techie
card.text: Gains +1 Fighting for each [H] card placed on her.

card.title: The Golden Gunman
card.subtitle: Magic Hero
card.text: Unique. Independent. The Golden Gunman is not a legal target for Events. If the Golden Gunman turns to attack, no other characters you control can turn to attack with him.
card.designators: | golden gun man the magic hero |

card.title: Gonzo Journalist
card.subtitle: Crazed Reporter
card.text: When Gonzo Journalist turns to attack, you may discard X cards and draw X cards. X = up to the number of factions that your pool and the target's controller's pool have in common.

card.title: Grease Monkey
card.subtitle: Gutsy Mechanic
card.text: Turn to play a vehicle State at -1 cost. Turn to heal a character that is the subject of a vehicle State.

card.title: Hacker
card.subtitle: Gun-Totin' Techie
card.text: Any time Hacker is in your hand when an opponent plays an Event that steals Power from your pool or that toasts a card (or cards) other than itself, cancel that Event and put Hacker into play at no cost.
card.comments: Ruling: Hacker can respond to Dangerous Experiment and Inauspicious Reburial, even if they toast 0 cards.

card.title: Iala Mané
card.subtitle: Martial Artist
card.text: Unique. Independent. Can attack during an opponent's turn.
card.comments: One of the Operation Killdeer characters

card.title: Jack Donovan
card.subtitle: Maverick Cop
card.text: Unique. Guts. If one of your sites is burned while Jack Donovan is in your smoked pile, return Jack Donovan to your hand.
card.comments: One of the Operation Killdeer characters

card.title: Jane Q. Public
card.subtitle: Girl Next Door
card.text: If Jane Q. Public is smoked by an intercepting character or by an Event played by an opponent, you gain 2 power.
card.designators: | jane q public girl next door |

card.title: Jason X
card.subtitle: Supersoldier
card.text: Unique. Guts. The cost of all [f] Events is increased by 1 while Jason X is in play.
card.flavor: "I was Johann Bonengel's personal bodyguard, but all that changed the day I met the Prof."

card.title: Joey Paz
card.subtitle: Escrima Master
card.text: Unique. Toughness: 2 against combat damage inflicted by unturned characters and any character whose controller played an Event this turn.

card.title: Johnny Badhair
card.subtitle: Wild Man
card.text: Unique. Guts. Cannot be sacrificed. At the end of a turn in which Johnny Badhair has been smoked, cut your deck to draw a card, and show it to your opponents. If the card is a character that has a resource condition or is a State, return Johnny Badhair to play.

card.title: Johnny Tso
card.subtitle: Heroic Gunman
card.text: Unique. Assassinate against [e] characters. Weapons played on Johnny Tso have no cost.

card.title: Kar Fai
card.subtitle: Kung Fu Master
card.text: Unique. Guts. All other [d] characters you control gain Guts and +1 Fighting while Kar Fai is in play.

card.title: Little Jim
card.subtitle: Rebel Abomination
card.text: Unique. Little Jim heals whenever an opponent plays an Event.
card.flavor: "Home is where my friends are."

card.title: Mad Dog McCroun
card.subtitle: Big Bruiser
card.text: Unique. Toughness: 1. Guts.
card.flavor: "I was just another two-bit thug till Kar Fai rescued me from the Death Ring."
card.comments: One of the Operation Killdeer characters
card.designators: | mad dog mc croun big bruiser |

card.title: Marisol
card.subtitle: Netherworld Mercenary
card.text: Unique. Marisol cannot be the target of damage redirection effects. All damage inflicted on Marisol by sources other than characters in combat is reduced to zero.
card.flavor: Roving fortune wizard gone good.
card.comments: Errata: Should start with "Damage may not be redirected to Marisol." (The redirection card doesn't have to say "target")

card.title: Masked Avenger
card.subtitle: Vigilante Hero
card.text: Takes no damage from characters with a Fighting score of 1.
card.flavor: Goons are grass. She's the lawnmower.

card.title: Maverick Cop
card.subtitle: Gun-Toting Hero
card.text: Takes no damage from Hood characters.
card.flavor: "Let the commissioner scream. I know what needs to get done on these streets."

card.title: Melissa Aguelera
card.subtitle: Commando Vet
card.text: Unique. Tactics. Melissa Aguelera's Fighting is increased by the number of players who control Battleground sites. All other characters you control that have Tactics gain +2 Fighting.

card.title: Netherworld Vet
card.subtitle: Portal Crawler
card.text: Gains +1 Fighting for each Edge controlled by an opponent.

card.title: Old Hermit
card.subtitle: Wily Sorcerer
card.text: Turn Old Hermit and pay 1 Power to unturn any non-character card.

card.title: Oscar Balbuena
card.subtitle: Karate Cop
card.text: Unique. Oscar Balbuena unturns whenever an attack is declared against you.

card.title: The Prof
card.subtitle: Mastermind
card.text: Unique. Turn to unturn target character. The Prof is not affected by Event cards that affect cards in play.
card.flavor: The leader of the Dragons is trapped in the Netherworld.

card.title: Redeemed Assassin
card.subtitle: Heroic Killer
card.text: You can play Redeemed Assassin during an opponent's turn. Redeemed Assassin has Toughness: 1 for the duration of the turn in which he enters play.

card.title: Redeemed Gunman
card.subtitle: Reforming Hood
card.text: Cannot intercept. Gains +2 fighting until end of turn if he turns to attack a turned site.
card.flavor: He's trying --- he's trying so hard --- to be one of the good guys.

card.title: Righteous One
card.subtitle: Loyal Defender
card.text: Any character intercepted by Righteous One while Righteous One is unturned is smoked.
card.comments: Clarification: "... after inflicting damage." goes at the end.

card.title: Ring Fighter
card.subtitle: Martial Artist
card.flavor: She got tired of fighting for money and decided to use her fists to make a difference in the world.

card.title: Scrappy Kid
card.subtitle: Martial Arts Prodigy
card.text: Independent. Never inflicts more than 1 point of damage. Cannot be intercepted.
card.designators: | scrappy kid martial art arts prodigy |

card.title: Serena Ku
card.subtitle: Vengeful Hero
card.text: Unique. Select a designator when Serena Ku is brought into play. She has Toughness: 2 and Ambush in combat with characters with that designator.

card.title: Shamanistic Lieutenant
card.subtitle: Magic Cop
card.text: Any Demon or Abomination in combat with Shamanistic Lieutenant is toasted before it inflicts its damage.

card.title: Silver Band
card.subtitle: Legion of Supporters
card.flavor: Separately, they're pretty good. Together, they're a whirlwind.

card.title: Silver Fist
card.subtitle: Cosmopolitan Hero
card.text: Independent.
card.flavor: "She pretended to be in it for the style, but deep down she cared as much as anybody."

card.title: Silver Jet
card.subtitle: Secret Warrior
card.text: Unique. Any time during any turn in which an Ice character you control is smoked by an opponent, you may play Silver Jet at -X cost. X = cost of that Ice character.

card.title: Stunt Man
card.subtitle: Gutsy Hombre
card.text: Guts. If an opponent plays an Event during your turn, Stunt Man gains Independent until he leaves play.

card.title: Ting Ting
card.subtitle: Martial Artist
card.text: Unique. Independent. Increase Ting Ting's Fighting by 2 for each opponent who controls more Power-generating sites than you. Opponents cannot take control of Ting Ting.

card.title: Zheng Yi Quan
card.subtitle: Kung Fu Master
card.text: Unique.
card.flavor: "Kar Fai raised me like a son. He taught me to fight not for him, but for all humankind."
card.designators: | zheng yi quan kung fu master |

card.title: Guiyu Zui
card.subtitle: Netherworld Demon Site
card.text: Unique. Turn to look at the top three cards in your deck. Discard as many of the three as you choose. Shuffle any remaining cards and place them atop your deck.
card.flavor: The entranceway from the Netherworld to the Underworld is itself a gigantic demon.

card.title: Infernal Temple
card.subtitle: Site
card.text: Infernal Temple provides one [M] resource for each Demon you control.
card.flavor: Long through the night, the unearthly cries of tormented spirits echoed through the countryside.

card.title: Registry of the Damned
card.subtitle: Site
card.text: Limited. Place a counter on this site when an opponent plays a 0-cost Event. During your turn, you may turn Registry of the Damned and remove a number of counters equal to the cost of a character in Registry of the Damned's owner's smoked pile to put that character into play in your control. Character gains the designator "Ghost."

card.title: Chains of Bone
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: [a] cards do not unturn during their controller's establishing shot.

card.title: Feast of Souls
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Gain 1 Power whenever a character you control is smoked. If this card leaves play, the player to your left gains all the Power in your pool.

card.title: Flood on the Mountain
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: [d] characters suffer 1 point of damage at the start of each of your turns.

card.title: Imperial Boon
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Limited. You may turn any Eunuch you control for 1 Power. If you control Gao Zhang, you may turn him for 2 Power. All Eunuchs you control are smoked if Imperial Boon leaves play.

card.title: Underworld Presence
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: No character may turn to heal itself.
card.flavor: Sometimes the dead get tired of waiting.

card.title: Banish
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: All [d] characters in play return to their owners' hands.
card.flavor: "Begone, gnats! Your impudence annoys us!"

card.title: Cyclone of Knives
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: You may look through your deck and toast up to five cards of your choice. Reshuffle your deck afterwards.
card.flavor: The eunuchs do not hesitate to cut away that which they do not need.

card.title: Dance of the Centipede
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Cancel and turn target card.
card.flavor: The Centipede Dance, with its many thirsty blades, stopped even the bravest champions in their tracks.

card.title: Glimpse of the Abyss
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Toast It. You gain X Power. X = the number of feng shui sites controlled by target opponent plus the number of cards in his or her burned-for-victory pile. The number of feng shui sites you need for victory is increased by one.

card.title: Inauspicious Reburial
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: You may toast a number of characters of your choice in an opponent's smoked pile up to the number of [e] resources in your pool.

card.title: Infernal Plague
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: All characters positioned at target location suffer 1 point of damage.
card.flavor: "Shudder, mewling fools, at the incalculable wrath of the Infernal Plague!"

card.title: Necromantic Conspiracy
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Search target opponent's deck. Remove up to four cards that have the same title and that also have a resource condition. You may only play Necromantic Conspiracy once per game. Reshuffle.

card.title: Shifting Loyalties
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: You become the controller of all Mercenary and all Pledged characters in play. They come to your side unturned.
card.flavor: Sorcerous influence can override any noble impulses.

card.title: Tortured Memories
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Take control of target character until the end of the turn. Character comes to your side unturned.
card.flavor: "I saw Keung's head rise before me. Then he told me to blow up the MacMillan Building."

card.title: Deathtrap
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Play on any site. Characters that attack subject site suffer 1 point of damage before they damage subject site, but after combat with intercepting characters is resolved.

card.title: The Demon Within
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Play on any character. Subject character's Fighting score is increased by 2. Character is now a Demon. If this card is played on a character that is already a Demon, that character is smoked.

card.title: Flying Guillotine
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Weapon. If subject character smokes a character in combat, you may inflict 2 points of damage on any other character at its location.

card.title: Inexorable Corruption
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Play on any character or site. Subject character or site takes 1 point of damage at the beginning of each of your turns. Damage counters on subject card cannot be removed by any means.

card.title: Poison Needles
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Play on any card. Subject's controller must pay 1 Power at the end of each of his or her turns or subject is smoked.

card.title: Sphere of Defilement
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Play on any site. Whenever subject site is turned, it and all other sites on its controlling player's side suffer 1 point of damage.

card.title: Sword of Biting
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Weapon. If subject character is smoked in combat, Sword of Biting inflicts 4 damage on each character subject was in combat with. Sword of Biting then goes to the smoked pile.

card.title: Theft of Fortune
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Play on any Edge. At the beginning of each of your turns, you may inflict 1 point of damage on any card that subject Edge's controller also controls.

card.title: Vampiric Touch
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Play on any character. Place a counter on Vampiric Touch whenever a character is smoked. Subject character gains +1 Fighting for each counter on Vampiric Touch. Subject character is smoked at the end of a turn if no characters were smoked during that turn.

card.title: Veiling of the Light
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Play on any feng shui site. Subject site does not count towards a player's feng shui site total for victory purposes.

card.title: Abysmal Absorber
card.subtitle: Netherworld Demon
card.text: When Abysmal Absorber smokes a character in combat, toast the character instead and increase Abysmal Absorber's Fighting by 1.
card.comments: Ruling: If two Abysmal Absorbers toast a character simultaneously, both of them gain +1 Fighting.

card.title: Abysmal Daughter
card.subtitle: Vampiric Demon
card.text: Unique. Place one damage counter on a site of your choice whenever a character is smoked.

card.title: Abysmal Deceiver
card.subtitle: Infiltrator
card.text: Unique. Turn to toast a character you own that is controlled by an opponent. You gain Power equal to the character's cost plus 1.

card.title: Abysmal Horror
card.subtitle: Demon
card.text: Regenerates.
card.flavor: Gao Zhang decrees, "We shall corrupt the very elements, make them homes for the spirits of destruction!"

card.title: Abysmal Prince
card.subtitle: Demon Bureaucrat Mastermind
card.text: Turn and maintain to target an Edge. Target Edge can be affected by any effect that damages characters but cannot be attacked by characters and has no location. Target edge is smoked if it sustains 2 points of damage.
card.comments: Ruling: If an Abysmal Prince turns to make an Edge a target for damage, that Edge can be healed by Events that do not target a specific type of card. For example, Events that specify a target character must be used on a character.

card.title: Abysmal Spirit
card.subtitle: Ghost Assassin
card.text: Assassinate.
card.flavor: Her victims loved her most intensely at the moment she began to rend their flesh.

card.title: Big Brother Tsien
card.subtitle: Demon Hood
card.text: Unique. Once per turn, you may pay 1 Power to give Big Brother Tsien +3 Fighting until the end of the turn.

card.title: Bloody Horde
card.subtitle: Demon Trouble
card.text: Bloody Horde's Fighting score is increased by the number of other Demon Hordes you control plus the number of Demon Hordes in your smoked pile.

card.title: Claw of Fury
card.subtitle: Shadowy Assassin
card.text: Assassinate. Any time Claw of Fury is in your hand when an opponent targets *you* (as opposed to one of your cards or locations) with an Event, you may put Claw of Fury into play at no cost.

card.title: Destroyer
card.subtitle: Demon Martial Artist
card.text: Unique. Cannot be sacrificed. If Destroyer is in your smoked pile at the start of your turn, Destroyer returns to play.

card.title: Doomed Lackey
card.subtitle: Eunuch Pawn
card.text: If Doomed Lackey intercepts in a chain the other interceptors behind him gain Toughness: 1 against combat damage during that attack.

card.title: Eunuch Underling
card.subtitle: Sorcerous Bureaucrat
card.flavor: These attendants to the Emperor are the outer edges of a sorcerous conspiracy that rules ancient China.

card.title: Evil Twin
card.subtitle: Sinister Sibling
card.text: When Evil Twin is played, choose any character in play. Evil Twin takes on the Fighting score*, name, subtitle, and abilities of that character but not its resources and resource conditions.
card.comments: Errata: "Uncopyable. When Evil Twin is played, choose any character in play. Evil Twin takes on the Fighting score, designators, and abilities of that character, but not its resources and resource conditions."

card.title: Gao Zhang
card.subtitle: Center of the Lotus
card.text: Unique. Turn Gao Zhang to change the target of an Event card.

card.title: Ghost Assassin
card.subtitle: Deadly Spirit
card.text: Toast a character in your smoked pile to give Ghost Assassin that character's special abilities until the end of the turn.

card.title: Ghostly Seducer
card.subtitle: Demon Sorceress
card.text: Turn to send any turned character back to its owner's hand.
card.flavor: "I thought she was my lost Anita, but she was not even human."

card.title: Gibbering Horror
card.subtitle: Disgusting Demon
card.text: X = the number of Events in the smoked pile of the opponent to your left.
card.flavor: Sound and fury, signifying death.

card.title: Gnarled Horror
card.subtitle: Demon
card.text: Any character damaged by Gnarled Horror is smoked. Does not affect characters with vehicle States.

card.title: Gnarled Marauder
card.subtitle: Demon
card.text: Any damage Gnarled Marauder inflicts on a site in an attack is also inflicted on the back-row site behind that site.

card.title: Hopping Vampire
card.subtitle: Ancient Monsters
card.flavor: "Your basic East Asian bloodsucker. You'd think having to hop everywhere would slow them down, but it doesn't."

card.title: Imperial Guard
card.subtitle: Ancient Cop
card.text: Imperial Guard's Fighting is increased by the number of Eunuchs you control.

card.title: Jueding Bao-Fude
card.subtitle: Eunuch Sorcerer
card.text: Unique. Turn to inflict 3 points of damage on a target Unique character or target Unique site.
card.flavor: His list of grudges is six feet long.

card.title: Jueding Shelun
card.subtitle: Eunuch Sorcerer
card.text: Unique. You may turn any card in play when Jueding Shelun smokes a character in combat.
card.comments: One of the Operation Killdeer characters

card.title: Kan Li
card.subtitle: Martial Artist
card.text: Unique. You may smoke any States on characters in combat with Kan Li, before combat is resolved.
card.flavor: "You defy the Lotus. Prepare to die."

card.title: Kun Kan
card.subtitle: Earth Demon
card.text: Regenerates. Kun Kan's Fighting score is increased by the number of feng shui sites in your burned for victory pile.

card.title: Mother of Corruption
card.subtitle: Demon Queen
card.text: Unique. Cannot be turned to attack. Cannot be healed.

card.title: Purist Sorcerer
card.subtitle: Buro Infiltrator
card.text: Turn Purist Sorcerer to inflict 1 point of damage on target character. Turn and maintain Purist Sorcerer to control target Buro character.

card.title: Shadow Creeper
card.subtitle: Eunuch Assassin
card.text: Assassinate.
card.flavor: He acts like just another foolish courtier, but there is murder in his heart.

card.title: Shadowy Horror
card.subtitle: Demon
card.text: Regenerates.
card.flavor: "I ain't found a bullet yet that will put a permanent hole in these things."

card.title: Sinister Priest
card.subtitle: Macabre Sorcerer
card.flavor: These loathsome wanderers make the peasantry pay to exorcise spirits they themselves have summoned.

card.title: Snake Man
card.subtitle: Demon
card.text: Snake Man heals at the end of each turn.
card.flavor: These underworld denizens are often mistaken for transformed animals.

card.title: Sung Hi
card.subtitle: Demon Buro Infiltrator
card.text: Unique. Turn to cancel an [f] Event or smoke an [f] State.
card.flavor: They're new to the secret war, so the Lotus are building their intelligence operation.

card.title: Tanbi Guiawu
card.subtitle: Giant Demon
card.text: Unique. If Tanbi Guiawu has not participated in an attack during your turn, it is smoked at the end of your turn.
card.flavor: Without fresh food, it returns to the Underworld.

card.title: Thing with a 1000 Tongues
card.subtitle: Disgusting Demon
card.text: Unique. Sacrifice a character to give Thing With a 1000 Tongues Toughness: 3 until end of turn.
card.flavor: "It's feeding time; toss a priest into the cage."
card.comments: One of the Operation Killdeer characters
card.designators: | thing 1000 tongu tongue tongues disgusting demon |

card.title: Thorns of the Lotus
card.subtitle: Fanatical Archers
card.flavor: They care not what their cause is, only that they can without question shed their blood for it.
card.designators: | thorn thorns lotu lotus fanatical archer archers |

card.title: Tomb Spirit
card.subtitle: Creature
card.text: Toast one of the characters in your smoked pile to give Tomb Spirit +2 Fighting until the end of the turn.

card.title: Vassals of the Lotus
card.subtitle: Ancient Hoods
card.flavor: Bandits and ruffians serve corrupt Lotus officials to slake their lust for gold.
card.designators: | vassal vassals lotu lotus ancient hood hoods |

card.title: Vile Prodigy
card.subtitle: Infant Demon
card.text: Regeneration. Gains +1 fighting at the end of any turn during which it damages its target in an attack. The Fighting bonus lasts until Vile Prodigy leaves play.

card.title: Walker of the Purple Twilight
card.subtitle: Eunuch Sorcerer
card.text: Whenever Walker of the Purple Twilight damages a feng shui site in an attack, you may inflict 2 points of damage on any target in play.

card.title: Walking Corpses
card.subtitle: Undead Servitors
card.text: Cannot turn to change location and cannot be healed.
card.flavor: They weren't buried properly, so now they're back.
card.designators: | walking corps corpse corpses undead servitor servitors |

card.title: White Disciple
card.subtitle: Eunuch Sorcerer
card.text: Turn White Disciple and inflict 1 point of damage on White Disciple to inflict 2 points of damage on any target.
card.flavor: In China, white is the color of death.

card.title: Wu Ta-Hsi
card.subtitle: Eunuch Pledged Infiltrator
card.text: Unique. Turn to cancel an [a] Event or to smoke an [a] State or an [a] Edge.
card.flavor: His squeaky voice should have been a tip-off.
card.designators: | wu ta hsi eunuch pledged infiltrator |

card.title: Xiu Xie Jiang
card.subtitle: Triumvirate Infiltrator
card.text: Unique. Turn to redirect damage inflicted on a character by a single source to a Darkness, Fire, Pledged or Triumvirate character controlled by an opponent.

card.title: Darkness Pagoda
card.subtitle: Netherworld Site
card.text: Unique. After you attack, gain X Power. X = the number of intercepting characters smoked by combat damage during the attack.
card.flavor: The dread sounds of human sacrifice emanate from the Darkness Pagoda.
card.designators: | darkness darknes darkne darkn pagoda netherworld |

card.title: Fire and Darkness Pavilion
card.subtitle: Triumvirate Site
card.text: Unique. Toughness: 2 against damage inflicted by Netherworld cards. You may ignore resource conditions when playing Netherworld Mercenary or Triumvirate cards.
card.flavor: It houses the Molten Heart.
card.designators: | fire darkness darknes darkne darkn pavilion triumvirate |

card.title: Fire Pagoda
card.subtitle: Site
card.text: Unique. Each opponent who starts his or her turn with four or fewer cards in hand must show you his or her hand. Fire Pagoda provides [M][M] for each Fire character you control.

card.title: Ice Pagoda
card.subtitle: Netherworld Site
card.text: Unique. Remove 1 damage counter from each of your cards at the start of your turn.
card.flavor: Secret warriors with justice in their hearts find solace at the Ice Pagoda.

card.title: Thunder Pagoda
card.subtitle: Netherworld Site
card.text: Unique. Characters you control with a Fighting score of 2 or more gain +1 Fighting. You can only declare one attack per turn.
card.flavor: The Thunder Knights' battle cry contains no consonants.

card.title: Blanket of Darkness
card.subtitle: Netherworld Edge
card.text: Unique. Turn and maintain to reduce the damage target character inflicts by 3.
card.designators: | blanket darkness darknes darkne darkn netherworld |

card.title: Counterfeit Heart
card.subtitle: Triumvirate Edge
card.text: Unique. No other Edge cards can become a legal target or subject while Counterfeit Heart is in play.

card.title: Molten Heart
card.subtitle: Triumvirate Edge
card.text: Unique. Any site played or seized by an opponent must be placed in his or her front row. Generates 1 Power for each Triumvirate Edge you control.

card.title: Spirit Pole
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Once per turn, you may play a State from your smoked pile, at normal cost, on a card you control. When played with Spirit Pole, 0-cost States cost 1. Turn Spirit Pole to play a Pagoda site at -1 cost.

card.title: Avenging Thunder
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play in response to one of your sites' being burned for victory or seized. Toast a character that damaged the site this turn and gain Power equal to that character's cost. You may only play Avenging Thunder once per game.
card.flavor: Due to his love of fighting, foes tend to forget the Thunder King's vast sorcerous power.

card.title: Brain Fire
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play in response to an Event. Brain Fire changes the target (or targets) of that Event to another legal target (or targets).
card.comments: Ruling: The target of Brain Fire is the new target of the original effect, not the effect itself. Thus, if Brain Fire is played in response to a Brain Fire, it alters the first Brain Fire to retarget the original effect; i.e., the last Brain Fire played w

card.title: Mark of Fire
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Inflict 1 point of damage a piece on any combination of precisely four target characters or sites.
card.flavor: "Li Ting's idea of equality is everybody on fire at the same time."

card.title: Netherworld Return
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Each player randomly selects a character from his or her smoked pile and returns it to play. Toast Netherworld Return after you play it.
card.flavor: They weren't dead --- they were just visiting the Netherworld!

card.title: Sibling Rivalry
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Cancel and smoke a [m] card.
card.flavor: The Four Monarchs are their own worst enemies.

card.title: Claws of Darkness
card.subtitle: Triumvirate State
card.text: Weapon. Subject character gains +1 Fighting. If subject is still in play at the end of a turn in which it smoked one or more characters in combat, you gain 1 Power.
card.designators: | claw claws darkness darknes darkne darkn triumvirate |

card.title: Enchanted Sword
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Weapon. Pick an opponent when you play Enchanted Sword. When that opponent controls more Power-generating sites than you, subject character's Fighting is increased by the number of that opponent's Power-generating sites.

card.title: Fire Sled
card.subtitle: Netherworld State
card.text: Vehicle. Subject character is not a legal target for effects generated by sites or Edges. Special abilities of any non-Netherworld site targeted by subject character in an attack are canceled until the end of the attack.

card.title: Flying Crescent
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Weapon. Whenever subject character engages in combat with an intercepting character, Flying Crescent inflicts 1 point of damage on the target of the subject character's attack.

card.title: Ice Diadem
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Turn Ice Diadem to heal subject character.
card.flavor: Pi Tui's healing kiss brushes your forhead.

card.title: Shields of Darkness
card.subtitle: Triumvirate State
card.text: Play on a back-row site. Subject site's Body is increased by the number of Triumvirate cards you control.
card.flavor: One of the contributions of Ming I to the Triumvirate was darkness magic to protect the Molten Heart.
card.designators: | shield shields darkness darknes darkne darkn triumvirate |

card.title: Thunder Sword
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Unique. Weapon. Subject character gains +4 Fighting and cannot turn to attack sites.
card.flavor: When you face this sword, it's not the thunder that ends up rolling.

card.title: Butterfly Knight
card.subtitle: Thunder Warrior
card.text: Can make one attack during your turn without turning.
card.flavor: "Held aloft on gossamer wing / I fight and slay / for my Thunder King."

card.title: Darkness Priestess
card.subtitle: Sorceress
card.text: Gain 1 Power for each card sacrificed or toasted by an opponent.
card.flavor: The Darkness Pagoda gains its powerfrom the bloody ceremonies of these savage ritualists.
card.designators: | darkness darknes darkne darkn priestes priestess sorceres sorceress |

card.title: Fire Assassin
card.subtitle: Netherworld Killer
card.text: Pick an opponent and a resource when you play Fire Assassin. X = resources of that type in the opponent's pool. Fire Assassin cannot turn to attack sites.

card.title: Fire Martyr
card.subtitle: Assassin
card.text: When Fire Martyr turns to attack, he gains +4 Fighting until end of turn.
card.flavor: Exposure to fire magic has burned away their instinct for self-preservation.

card.title: Fire Warriors
card.subtitle: Soldiers
card.text: Gains +1 Fighting for each feng shui site you own that is controlled by an opponent.
card.flavor: Li Ting's boys are big on vengance.

card.title: Ice Courtier
card.subtitle: Sorceress
card.text: Turn and maintain to cancel an effect that takes control of a character. If Ice Courtier is in your smoked pile, she may not be toasted.

card.title: Ice Falcons
card.subtitle: Netherworld Spirits
card.text: Independent.
card.flavor: Pi Tui's ferocious pets are as hard to stop as an ice storm.
card.designators: | ice falcon falcons netherworld spirit spirits |

card.title: Ice Healer
card.subtitle: Sorceress
card.text: When an opponent turns a character to heal, you may remove one damage counter from a character you control.

card.title: Ice Shards
card.subtitle: Elite Bodyguards
card.text: Unique. When Ice Shards damages a character in combat, you may smoke any State in play.
card.flavor: Fear their silk-handled blades.
card.designators: | ice shard shards elite bodyguard bodyguards |

card.title: Ice Tiger
card.subtitle: Netherworld Spirits
card.text: While Ice Tiger is in play, Unique Ice characters cannot be targeted by attacks.
card.flavor: The Ice Queen breeds these fierce guardians.

card.title: Ice Warriors
card.subtitle: Netherworld Soldier
card.flavor: These brave soldiers of the Inner Kingdom defend the Ice Pagoda and their beloved queen, Pi Tui.

card.title: King of the Fire Pagoda
card.subtitle: Mastermind
card.text: Unique. He inflicts 1 point of damage on any target when you play a Fire card or when you turn one or more characters to attack.
card.flavor: Li Ting is the calmest and most collected of the Four Monarchs. And the most vicious.

card.title: King of the Thunder Pagoda
card.subtitle: Warlord
card.text: Unique. Any player may take control of King of the Thunder Pagoda at any time by paying 8 Power. All Thunder characters you control gain +1 Fighting.

card.title: Lord Shi
card.subtitle: Netherworld Warrior
card.text: Unique. When Lord Shi attacks, he and all characters participating in the attack with him gain +1 Fighting for the duration of the attack.

card.title: Queen of the Darkness Pagoda
card.subtitle: Netherworld Mastermind
card.text: Unique. Any character that damages her is toasted.
card.flavor: Ming I is feared by even the stoutest warriors.
card.designators: | queen darkness darknes darkne darkn pagoda netherworld mastermind |

card.title: Queen of the Ice Pagoda
card.subtitle: Mastermind
card.text: Unique. Place one damage counter on Queen of the Ice Pagoda to smoke a State on any character you control. All Ice characters you control gain +1 Fighting.

card.title: Soul Diver
card.subtitle: Ice Shaman
card.text: Turn and maintain to give target character the special abilities of a character in an opponent's smoked pile.
card.flavor: They are among the few who can travel from the Netherworld to the Underworld.

card.title: Thunder Champion
card.subtitle: Netherworld Commandant
card.text: If a feng shui site takes 3 or more points of damage inflicted by Thunder Champion in combat in an attack you declared, you may seize that site.

card.title: Thunder Knights
card.subtitle: Netherworld Soldier
card.text: There is no limit to the number of Thunder Knights you can have in your deck.

card.title: Thunder Squire
card.subtitle: Netherworld Warrior
card.text: Sacrifice Thunder Squire to return a Thunder Knight to play from your smoked pile.
card.flavor: Someday, they will be full-fledged Thunder Knights.

card.title: Green Senshi Chamber
card.subtitle: Netherworld Site
card.text: Unique. Turn and inflict X damage on Green Senshi Chamber to give target character Toughness: X until end of turn. X cannot exceed 2.
card.flavor: The turtle lends his shell. Prosperity.

card.title: Orange Senshi Chamber
card.subtitle: Netherworld Site
card.text: Unique. The cost to play Orange characters is reduced by 1. For each faction among the resources in your pool, your maximum hand size increases by one.
card.flavor: The Principle of Diversity assimilates influences into balm for all.

card.title: Shaolin Sanctuary
card.subtitle: Site
card.text: Shaolin Sanctuary provides you with one [C] resource for each Shaolin or Monk character you control.

card.title: White Senshi Chamber
card.subtitle: Netherworld Site
card.text: Unique. White Senshi Chamber provides [C][C] for each Senshi Chamber you control. All Senshi Chambers in play gain Regeneration.
card.flavor: All Six Principles converge to become the White Principle.

card.title: Yellow Senshi Chamber
card.subtitle: Netherworld Site
card.text: Unique. Turn to redirect 1 point of damage from any source to any target in play.
card.flavor: Balm to friend. Harm to foe. Fortune upon fortune.

card.title: Fire in the Lake
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Gain 1 Power whenever an attack is declared against your side.

card.title: Hill of the Turtle
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Each player must spend 1 Power at the start of each of his or her turns or one [H] card of his or her choice that he or she controls is smoked.

card.title: Shield of Pure Soul
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Limited. If a site you control is seized or burned, you gain 1 Power and may search through your deck and select a card. Reshuffle your deck and place the card selected on top of the deck.

card.title: Shifting Tao
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Whenever an opponent declares an attack against your side, you may remove one damage counter from cards you control for each character participating in the attack.

card.title: Beneficial Realignment
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Heal target character or site.
card.flavor: The pendulum swings from woe to weal. Good fortune.

card.title: Blood of the Valiant
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play during an attack. Until the end of the attack, target attacking character takes no damage from intercepting characters.
card.flavor: "The road to victory is slick with the blood of the valiant."

card.title: Confucian Stability
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Cancel and smoke an Event or State as it is being played. Does not affect cards already in play.

card.title: Difficulty at the Beginning
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play when an opponent is playing a card. Your opponent must pay 1 Power in addition to the card's play cost or the card being played is toasted.

card.title: Heat of Battle
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play when attacked by an opponent who controls more Power-generating sites than you. Gain Power equal to the cost of target attacking character. You can only play one Heart of Battle during an attack.

card.title: Into the Light
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Take any card from your smoked pile and place it into your hand.
card.flavor: The Perfect Master's Principle of Reversal teaches us that great defeat must precede profound victory.

card.title: Iron and Silk
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Until the end of the turn, any damage inflicted on subject character when it intercepts characters is reduced to 0.
card.flavor: Embrace the yin principle, and receive your opponents' blows like gifts of honey.

card.title: Laughter of the Wind
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play immediately after a successful attack. All characters that entered combat with the target of the attack unturn.

card.title: Mysterious Return
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Bring a character from your smoked pile into play for the purposes of intercepting an attack against you. Return target character to the smoked pile when the combat is over.

card.title: Natural Order
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Cancel and smoke a [H] card.
card.flavor: The Guiding Hand abhor the technological crutches that support our decadent ways.

card.title: Onslaught of the Turtle
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: All [H] cards are returned to their owners' hands.
card.flavor: The Perfect Master taught that the Turtle Principle is opposed to decadent technology.

card.title: Orange Meditation
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Target character gains +X Fighting until end of turn, and you may discard up to X cards. X = number of states this character is the subject of when Orange Meditation is played.

card.title: Positive Chi
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Each player may take any one card, except a feng shui site, from his or her smoked pile and play it at no cost.

card.title: Progress of the Mouse
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: For the duration of this turn, any Power that target player spends goes into your pool. No characters or sites may be played in response to this card.
card.comments: Errata: This can only be played on an opponent, not yourself.

card.title: Rigorous Discipline
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: For the duration of this turn, target character gains the special abilities of any character in play. This does not include the effects of States.

card.title: Robust Feng Shui
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Redirect any damage done to target feng shui site from a single source to any target in play.
card.flavor: Quan Lo taught the very earth itself the Principle of Redirection.

card.title: Shaolin Surprise
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: If you don't already control target State, pay 1 Power to take control of it. You may remove target State from its current subject and place it on any legal subject in play. If the original subject is still in play at the end of the turn, the State returns to it.

card.title: Shattering Jade
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: All Abominations in play are toasted.
card.flavor: Abominations, equal parts magic and technology, personify everything the Guiding Hand despises.

card.title: Storm of the Just
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Limited. Until end of turn, all characters you control gain +3 Fighting if an opponent who controls more Power-generating sites than you controls a feng shui site you own or has a card you own in his or her burned-for-victory pile.

card.title: Wind on the Mountain
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Return X Event cards of your choice in your smoked pile to your hand. Toast Wind on the Mountain after use.

card.title: Power of the Great
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Play on any feng shui site you control. At the beginning of each of your turns, place one counter on Power of the Great for each Mastermind you control. The number of feng shui sites you need for victory is reduced by one for every four counters on Power of the Great.

card.title: Thunder on the Mountain
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Play on a site you control. All [f] cards come into play turned.
card.flavor: The unwise bird flies high, and is brought down by the vengeance of the sky.
card.comments: The [f] symbol was printed as "m" in the card text.

card.title: Chin Ken
card.subtitle: Kung Fu Master
card.text: Unique. Gains the abilities of each character he is in combat with until combat with that character is resolved.

card.title: Confucian Sage
card.subtitle: Font of Wisdom
card.text: Turn Confucian Sage to look at target player's hand.
card.flavor: "The man who knows the enemy's past knows also the enemy's next maneuver."

card.title: Cop on Vacation
card.subtitle: Martial Artist
card.text: Cop on Vacation gains Guts in combat with cards controlled by opponents who control more cards than you.
card.flavor: "You were right, Sifu: no badge, no worries."

card.title: Elderly Monk
card.subtitle: Sage
card.text: Draw an additional card whenever you draw cards.

card.title: Fong Sai Yuk
card.subtitle: Martial Artist
card.text: Unique. Superleap.
card.flavor: His name and deeds would be forever remembered, even by those who knew nothing of the Hand.

card.title: Gardener
card.subtitle: Devoted Follower
card.text: Turn to remove two damage counters from target feng shui site.

card.title: The General
card.subtitle: Military Mastermind
card.text: Tactics. If The General participates in an attack, all attacking characters gain Tactics for the duration of the attack.

card.title: Golden Candle Society
card.subtitle: Secret Society
card.flavor: They have sworn to drive the foreign invader from the proud soil of their native land.

card.title: Green Monk
card.subtitle: Martial Artist
card.text: Toughness: 1.
card.flavor: Quan Lo trained the Green Monks to fight using the Resistance Principle.

card.title: Instrument of the Hand
card.subtitle: Martial Artist
card.flavor: "Even the noodle lady turned out to be a guerrilla fighting against the foreign powers.

card.title: Kung Fu Student
card.subtitle: Fledgling Shaolin
card.text: Has +1 Fighting if a non-Unique feng shui site in your front row has a Body of 4 or less.

card.title: Old Master
card.subtitle: Kung Fu Master
card.text: Turn and maintain to give all your [C] characters +1 Fighting.

card.title: One Hundred Names
card.subtitle: Legion of Followers
card.text: Cannot turn to attack.
card.flavor: Quan Lo turned dispossessed peasants into a legion ready to defend their land.
card.designators: | one hundred nam name names legion follower followers |

card.title: Orange Monk
card.subtitle: Martial Artist
card.text: Superleap. Orange Monk gains +1 Fighting for each State that is placed on him.

card.title: Quai Li
card.subtitle: Spy
card.text: Unique. Turn Quai Li to inflict 2 points of damage on any unrevealed site.

card.title: Quan Lo
card.subtitle: The Perfect Master
card.text: Unique. All [g] characters you control gain Superleap.

card.title: Red Monk
card.subtitle: Martial Artist
card.text: Red Monk has Superleap if a card you control has been targeted by an Event played by an opponent since Red Monk entered play..
card.flavor: The Red Principle is the Principle of Movement.

card.title: Righteous Fist
card.subtitle: Martial Artist
card.text: Sacrifice Righteous Fist to smoke a State on a card you own.

card.title: Shan Tsu
card.subtitle: Shaolin Master
card.text: Unique. Damage inflicted on Shan Tsu by intercepting characters that have fewer than two resource conditions is reduced to 0.
card.flavor: "You have guts, young warrior but I have the more powerful kung fu."

card.title: Shaolin Master
card.subtitle: Martial Arts Master
card.flavor: The guns of the British meant nothing to those who lived all of the Six Principles of Light.

card.title: Shaolin Monk
card.subtitle: Martial Artist
card.text: +1 damage if you also control a Shaolin Master.
card.flavor: Don't let their passive demeanor mislead you.

card.title: Shaolin Warrior
card.subtitle: Martial Artist
card.text: Pay 1 Power to give all Shaolin Warriors you control Superleap until the end of the turn.

card.title: Shih Ho Kuai
card.subtitle: Martial Arts Master
card.text: Unique. X = the number of [C] resources in your pool.
card.designators: | shih ho kuai martial art arts master |

card.title: Sun Chen
card.subtitle: Legendary Archer
card.text: Unique. Superleap. You may not play States on Sun Chen, but your opponents may.
card.comments: One of the Operation Killdeer characters

card.title: Swordsman
card.subtitle: Foot Soldier
card.flavor: He fight for the honor of China, and will die for Confucian principles.

card.title: Tranquil Persuader
card.subtitle: Mastermind
card.text: Turn and maintain to take control of target character. Character comes to your side unturned. Lose control of character if the Power in your pool does not exceed character's play cost.

card.title: Violet Monk
card.subtitle: Martial Artist
card.text: You may seize any non-feng shui site damaged by Violet Monk in combat.
card.flavor: "Dirk mispronounced them as 'Violent' Monks. But if the glove fits..."

card.title: Virtuous Hood
card.subtitle: Martial Artist
card.text: When Virtuous Hood turns to attack, take a point of Power from the pool of the player with the most Power and give it to the player with the least Power.
card.comments: Ruling: The controller of Virtuous Hood chooses among players that are tied for most or least power.

card.title: Wandering Monk
card.subtitle: Martial Artist
card.text: Unique. If you are closer to fulfilling victory conditions than all of your opponents at the end of a turn, Wandering Monk is smoked.

card.title: Wong Fei Hong
card.subtitle: Kung Fu Master
card.text: Unique.
card.flavor: He taught kung fu, medicine, and revolution.
card.designators: | wong fei hong kung fu master |

card.title: Xiaoyang Yun
card.subtitle: Spy Mastermind
card.text: Unique. During your turn, opponents may not play Events that require resources you have in your pool.

card.title: Yellow Monk
card.subtitle: Martial Artist
card.text: Once per turn when damage is inflicted on Yellow Monk, you may redirect 1 point of that damage to any character in play.

card.title: Chimp Shack
card.subtitle: Site
card.text: You may play Chimp Shack during an attack against you. Turn and maintain to treat Chimp Shack as if it had the rules text of a specific site controlled by an opponent.
card.flavor: "Dig the MO of your enemy, brothers, and shove it up his snout!"

card.title: Burn, Baby, Burn!
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Limited. At the end of your turn, Burn, Baby Burn! inflicts 1 point of damage on each damaged site in play.

card.title: Entropy Is Your Friend
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Limited. When you burn a site, or when a site you control is burned, place a counter on this card. When your characters damage sites, they inflict +X damage. X = number of counters on this card.

card.title: Gorilla Warfare
card.subtitle: Triumvirate Edge
card.text: Limited. When you target a site with an attack, combat damage in excess of the site's Body is inflicted to the site behind it. Goriilla Warfare is the source of this damage.

card.title: "Trust Me, I've Got a Plan"
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play when you declare an attack against a target whose controller is at least as close to fulfilling victory conditions as you are. Attacking characters you control gain Stealth, until the end of the attack.

card.title: Death-O-Rama
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play during an attack. All characters inflict +2 damage on characters during the attack.
card.flavor: Lisa shouldn't have taken the extra propane tanks to the rendezvous.

card.title: Hosed
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play during an attack. Until the end of the attack, each attacking character inflicts 1 point of damage on each of its interceptors immediately before entering combat with that interceptor.
card.comments: Ruling: The source of this damage is each individual character, not Hosed itself.

card.title: In Your Face Again
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play only during your turn. Put a random character from your smoked pile into play. This character cannot be sacrificed, and is smoked at the end of the turn if it is still in play.

card.title: Monkeywrenching
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play during your turn. Turn up to X sites. X = the number of [j] resources in your pool. Sites turned by Monkeywrenching unturn at the end of the turn.

card.title: New Manifesto
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Discard any number of cards from your hand. If one of your feng shui sites is seized, you may return New Manifesto to your hand from your smoked pile.
card.flavor: The Jammers' whacked-out ideology contains 90% recycled parts.

card.title: Nuked
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Choose an opponent and flip a coin. Heads: smoke a site of your choice controlled by that opponent. Tails: you must flip this coin again, this time for the player sitting to the left of the last player the coin was flipped for.
card.flavor: "Blow Things Up! Blow Things Up! Blow Things--- Wait, not *that*!"

card.title: Too Much Monkey Business
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Limited. Play any time during your turn in response to an Event played by an opponent. You may play a character at -2 cost; that character gains Guts and Independent until the end of the turn.

card.title: The Underground
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play when you declare an attack. Pick a designator. Characters with that designator may not intercept this attack.

card.title: Homemade Tank
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Vehicle. Toast It. Subject character gains Toughness: 1 and +4 Fighting. Flip a coin at the start of each of your turns. Heads: Homemade Tank is toasted.

card.title: Tick... Tick... Tick...
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Play on a front-row site. Flip a coin at the start of your turn. Heads: smoke Tick... Tick...Tick... and inflict 4 points of damage on subject site.
card.flavor: "Cut the red wire... no, the green wire... no, the red wire!"

card.title: $10,000 Man
card.subtitle: Jury-Rigged Cyborg
card.text: Toughness: 1. Cannot turn to heal.
card.flavor: "We don't have the technology, but what the heck, let's try and rebuild him anyway."

card.title: Battlechimp Potemkin
card.subtitle: Subversive Leader
card.text: Unique. Turn to unturn any number of [j] characters whose combined play cost does not exceed 4.

card.title: Chimpanzer
card.subtitle: Cyborg Monkey Tank
card.text: Characters intercepting as part of a chain cannot intercept Chimpanzer.

card.title: Chromosome Screamer
card.subtitle: Escaped Abomination
card.text: Guts. Inflicts +2 damage against [f] characters and [f] sites.

card.title: Dallas Rocket
card.subtitle: Fanatic Guerilla
card.text: Ambush against PubOrd and Buro characters. Dallas Rocket Inflicts +3 damage on the target of her attack.

card.title: Demolitions Expert
card.subtitle: Rebel Supporter
card.text: Turn to give target character +3 damage against sites until end of turn.
card.flavor: "You want things blow up? I give you things blow up."

card.title: Dump Warrior
card.subtitle: Scavenger / Scrapper
card.text: You can ignore resource symbols when playing weapons or vehicles on Dump Warrior.

card.title: Edge Warrior
card.subtitle: Subversive Op
card.text: Cannot be intercepted by Buro, PubOrd, or Cop characters.
card.flavor: She can sniff the whiff of law enforcement at a hundred paces.

card.title: Furious George
card.subtitle: Flying Monkey
card.text: Unique. Guts. Cannot intercept. If Furious George turns to attack, no other characters you control can turn to attack with him.
card.flavor: He's too much monkey business.

card.title: Gearhead
card.subtitle: Saboteur
card.text: After Gearhead damages a site in an attack, inflict 2 points of damage on each of the site's controller's turned sites.
card.flavor: Their slogan: "Lean, mean, sand in the Vaseline."

card.title: Gorilla Fighter
card.subtitle: Flying Monkey
card.text: Independent. The cost to play Gorilla Fighter is reduced by the total number of feng shui sites and characters you own that are controlled by opponents or in burned-for-victory piles.

card.title: Grenade Posse
card.subtitle: Netherworld Punks
card.text: Turn to inflict 1 point of damage on all characters at target location. Grenade Posse is not a legal subject of weapon states.
card.flavor: "Fore!"

card.title: Gunrunner
card.subtitle: Netherworld Hood
card.text: Ambush against Cops. Turn to move target weapon State from its subject character to another character at the target's location.
card.flavor: They smuggle weapons from juncture to juncture to find Jammer operations.

card.title: Jamal Hopkins
card.subtitle: Mastermind
card.text: Unique. Except during an attack, turn Jamal and pay 1 Power to rearrange a player's sites; you cannot change the number of columns in the site structure.
card.flavor: His memory is a map of the Netherworld.

card.title: Just Another Consumer
card.subtitle: Scrappy Rebel
card.text: Gains +1 Fighting until the end of the turn if he turns to attack a site that shares a designator with another site in play.

card.title: Mad Bomber
card.subtitle: Netherworld Nutcase
card.text: If Mad Bomber is smoked, inflict 2 points of damage on the front-row site at the location he last occupied.
card.flavor: He puts the "maniac" in pyromaniac.

card.title: Orango Tank
card.subtitle: Ground-Assault Monkey
card.text: Unique. Toughness: 1. All characters at location of target that Orango Tank attacks must intercept. Cannot turn to heal.

card.title: Portal Jockey
card.subtitle: Redeemed Timewalker
card.text: Any time Portal Jockey is in your hand when an opponent plays a character at reduced cost, you may put Portal Jockey into play at no cost. Has Ambush during the turn in which he enters play.
card.comments: Ruling: You may play Portal Jockey in response to a Cave Network. Playing at no cost also counts as "playing at reduced cost".

card.title: Rah Rah Rasputine
card.subtitle: Netherworld Cyborg
card.text: Unique. Damage inflicted on Rah Rah Rasputine by Cyborgs and Abominations is reduced to 0.

card.title: Resistance Squad
card.subtitle: Techie Guerrillas
card.text: If an opponent attempts to look at your hand or force you to discard Resistance Squad, cancel that effect and put Resistance Squad into play at no cost.
card.flavor: "Lookin' for us?"

card.title: Rocket Scientist
card.subtitle: Techie Guerrilla
card.text: Mobility. If an opponent targets Rocket Scientist with an Event, you may inflict 4 points of damage on a site controlled by that opponent.

card.title: Tunnel Ganger
card.subtitle: Netherworld Hood
card.text: Characters controlled by a player with 3 or more Power in his or her pool cannot intercept Tunnel Ganger.
card.flavor: "Well-fed bellies are soft bellies."

card.title: Once and Future Champion
card.subtitle: Netherworld Hero
card.text: Unique. (no text)
card.flavor: Coming Christmas 2000: Return with us to the Netherworld for more butt-kicking action! Who's this guy, you ask? Check our website at http://www.shadowfist.com for the details...

card.title: Open a Can of Whupass
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Limited. Play any time except during an attack. Until the end of the turn, target Character you control gains +X Fighting. X= the number of resources in that Character's resource conditions and resource provisions.
card.flavor: "Anyone else?"

card.title: White Ninja vPAP
card.subtitle: Assassin
card.text: Unique. Ambush. Stealth. The rules text of any Character or Site targeted by White Ninja in an attack is canceled until the end of the turn.

card.title: Andrea Van de Graaf
card.subtitle: Purist Sorceress
card.text: Unique. During any player's Main Shot, you may play [M] Events from your smoked pile at +1 cost. Toast any Event you play in this manner.
card.designators: | andrea van de graaf purist sorceres sorceress |

card.title: Apes of Wrath
card.subtitle: Ornery Monkeys
card.text: When a card you control is smoked or burned by an opponent, Apes of Wrath gains +1 Fighting until it leaves play.
card.flavor: They have an Anger Management problem...
card.designators: | ap ape apes wrath ornery monkey monkeys |

card.title: Ba-BOOM!
card.subtitle: Unstable Monkey
card.text: Unique. Uncopyable. When Ba-BOOM! is smoked by an opponent, smoke all Characters and toast Ba-BOOM!
card.flavor: "If I'm going, you're all going with me!"

card.title: Bandit Chief
card.subtitle: Hood Scum
card.text: Bandit Chief inflicts no combat damage on Characters with Fighting higher than his Fighting.
card.flavor: "Pah! You are no match for me! But wait, what's that behind you?"

card.title: Bandit Hideout
card.subtitle: Battleground Site
card.text: If Bandit Hideout is in your front row, you may turn Bandit Hideout in response to the end of a successful attack you declared to gain 1 Power. You may not turn more than one Bandit Hideout in response to the same attack.

card.title: Black Flag Rebels
card.subtitle: Grim Supporters
card.text: All Rebel, Rabble and Bandit Characters you control gain +1 Fighting.
card.flavor: "We must restore China to glory. Death to the eunuchs!"
card.designators: | black flag rebel rebels grim supporter supporters |

card.title: Blade of Darkness
card.subtitle: Netherworld Killer
card.text: When Blade of Darkness smokes an interceptor by inflicting combat damage, you gain Power equal to the number of resources that interceptor provides.
card.designators: | blade darkness darknes darkne darkn netherworld killer |

card.title: Blue Monk
card.subtitle: Kung Fu Infiltrator
card.text: Choose a designator when Blue Monk enters play. Blue Monk cannot be intercepted by Characters with the chosen designator.
card.flavor: The Blue Principle is the Principle of Obscurement.

card.title: Cave of a Thousand Banners
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Unique. Play face up at the printed cost in your front row. When any Rebel or Rabble Character you control turns to attack, it gains +1 Fighting until the end of the turn.
card.flavor: This giant cave is home to Leung Mui and her rebels.

card.title: Competitive Intelligence
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Sites may not be turned or revealed in response to Competitive Intelligence :: Look at any number of face-down Feng Shui Sites controlled by opponents. You may reveal and turn any of those Sites.
card.flavor: "Of course we knew about that, too."

card.title: Darkness Adept
card.subtitle: Vicious Sorceress
card.text: When any card is smoked, Darkness Adept gains +1 Fighting until the end of the turn.
card.flavor: These zealous disciples of the Darkness Queen thrive on destruction and chaos.
card.designators: | darkness darknes darkne darkn adept viciou vicious sorceres sorceress |

card.title: Darkness Priestess v2
card.subtitle: Netherworld Sorceress
card.text: When any opponent sacrifices or toasts a card, you gain 1 Power.
card.flavor: The Darkness Pagoda gains its power from the bloody ceremonies of these savage ritualists.
card.designators: | darkness darknes darkne darkn priestes priestess v2 netherworld sorceres sorceress |

card.title: Demon Emperor
card.subtitle: Wicked Impersonator
card.text: Unique. Regenerate. When Demon Emperor turns to attack, it gains Stealth until the end of the attack if any Demon Character you control turns to attack with it.

card.title: Desolate Ridge
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Limited. Turn in response to an Event to inflict 2 damage on target Site or Character controlled by the player who played that Event.
card.flavor: The right combination of geography and geomancy can redirect negative chi toward your enemies.

card.title: Die!!!
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Turn X [e] Characters you control to smoke any number of Characters controlled by opponents whose total printed cost is less than X+2. X may be zero.
card.flavor: Gao Zhang may not control the Throne directly, but he makes his influence felt where appropriate.

card.title: Discerning Fire
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Smoke X target cards that share a designator other than Netherworld. X must be greater than one. Power-generating Sites are not legal targets.
card.flavor: "Next time, warn me before you do that! I nearly wet my pants when those soldiers around me suddenly burst into flame."

card.title: Dr. Celeste Carter
card.subtitle: Purist Assassin
card.text: Unique. Assassinate. +1 Fighting for each [M] card in play. -1 Fighting for each [H] card in play.
card.flavor: She's here to terminate a short, furry problem.

card.title: Dr. John Haynes
card.subtitle: Full-Contact Historian
card.text: Unique. Stealth. Toughness: 1. When a card you control is targeted by an Event played by an opponent, that opponent must show you his or her hand, and you may force that opponent to discard one card of your choice.
card.designators: | dr john hayn hayne haynes full contact historian |

card.title: Eagle Mountain
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: No effect if Eagle Mountain is not in your front row. When Characters at this location turn to attack, they gain Toughness: 1 until the end of the attack. Instead, when Eagle Mountain is revealed during an attack, Characters that were at this location when they turned to attack gain Toughness: 1 until the end of the attack.

card.title: Earth Poisoner
card.subtitle: Eunuch Geomancer
card.text: Inflict 2 damage on any Site turned by an opponent while Earth Poisoner is attacking.
card.flavor: Sorcery and geomancy combined force the land to betray those who resist the Lotus.

card.title: Eater of Fortune
card.subtitle: Hungry Demon
card.text: +1 Fighting for each Edge controlled by any opponent. When Eater of Fortune enters play, you may target an Edge :: Smoke that Edge.
card.flavor: “Their strength shall be our strength.”

card.title: Elite Guards
card.subtitle: Competent Pawns
card.text: Eunuch Characters are not legal targets for attacks or Events while Elite Guards is in play. Inflicts +1 damage for each Unique [e] Character you control.
card.designators: | elite guard guards competent pawn pawns |

card.title: Evil Twin v2
card.subtitle: Sinister Sibling
card.text: Uncopyable. When Evil Twin enters play, it copies the printed Fighting, rules text and restrictions of another Character in play. Evil Twin's title becomes "Evil Twin of (Character's title)" and its subtitle becomes "Sinister Sibling of (Character's subtitle)."

card.title: Farseeing Rice Grains
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: You may ignore resource conditions when playing this card by toasting the top 5 cards in your deck :: Discard any number of cards, then draw an equal number of cards.
card.flavor: "The wizard said all rice has eyes, you just have to know how to get them open. Gives me the creeps."

card.title: Festival of Giants
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: All Characters gain Toughness: 2 until the end of the turn.
card.flavor: Fighting on stilts involves a lot of falling and bumping, but very few lasting injuries.

card.title: Final Sacrifice
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play in response to an Event played by an opponent during an attack you declared. Toast an attacker you control whose cost equals or exceeds that Event's cost :: Cancel that Event.
card.flavor: "Move it, you idiots! What are you waiting for? You want me to die for nothing?"

card.title: Flying Sleeves
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Toast It. Change one attacker's target to any Character you control.
card.flavor: Most martial artists block with their arms. Kan Li's students prefer to block with other people.

card.title: Flying Sword Stance
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Not cumulative. Subject Character gains +1 Fighting. Subject gains Superleap against Characters that lack resource conditions.
card.flavor: "Focus, balance, determination. These will allow us to win this day."

card.title: For China!
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: At the end of any turn that any opponent is closer to victory than you, you may unturn one non-Site card.
card.flavor: No rest! We must cleanse China of the eunuch filth!

card.title: Gao Zhang vPAP
card.subtitle: Eunuch Mastermind
card.text: Unique. You may sacrifice a Pawn Character to change the target of an Event. Once per turn, you may play one [e] or [M] card at -1 cost.

card.title: Grizzly Pass
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: +5 Body while no two cards you control have the same title.
card.flavor: The pass is isolated and difficult to reach, but the chi of all the nearby mountains flows through it.

card.title: Hall of Brilliance
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Unique. +1 Body for each Power-generating Site you control. If you control a card titled "Imperial Palace," Hall of Brilliance generates Power for you during every player's Power generation phase.

card.title: Hsiung-nu Mercenaries
card.subtitle: Hired Killers
card.text: Uncopyable. Guts. When you have no Power, smoke Hsiung-nu Mercenaries.
card.flavor: Truce or no truce, the nomads were always willing to spill a little blood for money.
card.designators: | hsiung nu mercenary mercenar mercenaries hired killer killers |

card.title: Imperial Palace
card.subtitle: Site
card.text: Unique. Turn during any player's Main Shot to play a Guard Character or Eunuch Character at -2 cost.
card.flavor: The Palace never sleeps - intrigue is brewing at all hours.

card.title: Inauspicious Return
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Limited. Toast It. You may play up to three 1-cost non-Unique Characters that provide resources from your smoked pile at no cost. These Characters cannot be sacrificed, and gain the designator Undead.
card.flavor: "Arise and do the bidding of your rightful master!"

card.title: Infernal Pact
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: One-Shot. Toast an unturned Character you control :: Search your deck for a card and add it to your hand. Reshuffle.
card.flavor: Gao Zhang is determined to stay in control of the Empire, regardless of the cost.

card.title: Jui Szu
card.subtitle: Outmaneuvered Empress
card.text: Unique. All [e] cards are +1 cost. Turn and maintain to take control of a Feng Shui Site you own that is controlled by an opponent.

card.title: Just Another Consumer
card.subtitle: Scrappy Rebel
card.text: When Just Another Consumer turns to attack a Site that shares a designator with another Site in play, he gains +1 Fighting until the end of the turn.

card.title: Kar Fai
card.subtitle: Kung Fu Master
card.text: Unique. Guts. All other [d] Characters you control gain Guts and +1 Fighting while Kar Fai is in play.
card.flavor: The Great Grand Master of Furious Tiger Kung Fu.

card.title: Leung Mui
card.subtitle: The Black Flag
card.text: Unique. Independent. When Leung Mui turns to attack, you may turn non-Unique Characters you control that have a cost of 2 or less to attack with her as if they had Independent.

card.title: Mad Monk
card.subtitle: Shaolin Traitor
card.text: Unique. Superleap. May not attack a card controlled by an opponent who has one or more [g] resources in his or her pool.
card.flavor: "I have chosen the greater of two evils."

card.title: Möbius Gardens
card.subtitle: Netherworld Feng Shui Site
card.text: When one or more opponents generate or gain Power from an Event played by an opponent, you gain 1 Power.
card.flavor: "We have to pay for the gardener's psychiatrist, but it's worth it."

card.title: Napalm Addict
card.subtitle: Pyromaniac Anarchist
card.text: Guts while attacking. When he smokes a Site by inflicting combat damage, you gain Power equal to that Site's printed cost, or 2 Power if it has no printed cost.

card.title: Obsidian Eye
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Unique. Turn and maintain to treat target Character's rules text as if it were blank.
card.flavor: Ming I's contribution to Gao Zhang's defense was a handful of troops and this loathsome artifact.

card.title: Oliver Chen
card.subtitle: Pledged Saboteur
card.text: Unique. When this card inflicts combat damage on a Site, you may look at the top 7 cards of that Site's controller's deck. You may place one of those cards on the bottom of the deck, and rearrange the others in any order.

card.title: Palace Guards
card.subtitle: Hopeless Pawns
card.text: If in your smoked pile when an attack is declared against a [e] card you control, you may return this card to play at the location of the attack and then must declare it as an interceptor against that attack.
card.designators: | palace guard guards hopeles hopeless pawn pawns |

card.title: Payback Time
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Limited. When an opponent reduces the Body of a Site you control to 0, you gain 1 Power and you may inflict 1 damage each on up to 3 Sites controlled by that opponent.

card.title: Peasant Uprising
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Take control of all non-Unique 1-cost Characters until the end of the turn.
card.flavor: "The Empire has suffered for years under the eunuchs' yoke. Now they take our beloved Harvest of Jade as well. We must destroy them!"

card.title: Petroglyphs
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Turn in response to an effect that redirects damage or changes a target :: Cancel that effect.
card.flavor: The ancient inscriptions point out the true path for any who care to read.

card.title: Pocket Demon v2
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Limited. Play at the start of your turn. No other card you control or play generates Power during your Establishing Shot this turn. Pocket Demon generates Power equal to the number of Power-generating Sites controlled by target opponent, plus the number of cards in his or her burned-for-victory pile, minus the number of cards in your burned-for-victory pile.

card.title: Puzzle Garden
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: No Character inflicts more than 3 damage on Puzzle Garden.
card.flavor: Even the gardeners have a hard time finding their way to the center.

card.title: Rebel Camp
card.subtitle: Site
card.text: Once during each attack that targets Rebel Camp, you may play an Event at -1 cost. When any Character you control joins an attack declared by an opponent, turn Rebel Camp to gain 1 Power.

card.title: Resistance Squad
card.subtitle: Techie Guerrillas
card.text: Any time Resistance Squad is in your hand when an opponent attempts to look at your hand or force you to discard a card, you may play Resistance Squad at no cost in response :: Cancel that effect.

card.title: Righteous Protector
card.subtitle: Heroic Monk
card.text: Turn to redirect the damage from a single source inflicted on target Character to Righteous Protector.
card.flavor: "Tell me before I die...is our Light of Heaven...safe?..."

card.title: Scrounging
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Limited. Play at the start of your turn. No other card you control or play generates Power during your Establishing Shot. Choose State, Edge, Character, Feng Shui Site, or non-Feng Shui Site. Scrounging generates Power equal to the number of cards of the chosen type that target opponent controls, minus the number of cards in your burned-for-victory pile.

card.title: Seven Evils
card.subtitle: Demon Lord
card.text: Unique. Unturns when any opponent turns a Feng Shui Site. Toast a Character you control to give Seven Evils Independent until the end of the turn.

card.title: Shattering Fire
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Inflict X damage on target Character. X= the number of [M] resources in your pool.
card.flavor: The first spell any apprentice sorcerer wishes to learn - with good reason.

card.title: Shi Zi Hui
card.subtitle: Eunuch General
card.text: Unique. Tactics. When Shi Zi Hui turns to attack, draw X cards. X= the number of Characters that turn to attack with him.
card.flavor: Now he applies his military genius to the Secret War.

card.title: Sinister Accusations
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Subject Character gains a designator of your choice other than Eunuch. If you control one or more Eunuch Characters when subject is smoked, you may return Sinister Accusations to your hand.
card.flavor: Slander is a powerful tool when used properly.

card.title: Smiling Heaven Lake
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Turn and choose a resource you have in your pool :: Play a Character ignoring one of the chosen resource conditions.
card.flavor: The lake acts like a feng shui amplifier, reflecting the chi from the surrounding hills.

card.title: Sword of the Dragon King
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Unique. Weapon. [C] Characters and [H] Characters cannot intercept subject Character. Subject gains +X Fighting. X= one-half (round down) the number of [M] resources in your pool.
card.flavor: "They say you can hear the dragon roar as you die."

card.title: Temple of the Angry Spirits
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Unique. Temple of the Angry Spirits inflicts combat damage on Characters as if it had Fighting equal to its current Body.
card.flavor: The spirits here take their peace and quiet _very_ seriously.

card.title: The Blue Cardinal's Guards
card.subtitle: Mercenary Timewalkers
card.text: Once during each attack, you may pay 1 Power to give this card Guts, Stealth, or +3 damage until the end of the attack.
card.flavor: They adapted quickly after their juncture closed.
card.designators: | the blue cardinal cardinals guard guards mercenary timewalker timewalkers |

card.title: The Dragon Throne
card.subtitle: Site
card.text: Unique. Choose a designator when this Site enters play or when you seize this Site. +2 Body while you control any Emperor or Empress Character. If this Site is in your front row, you may play Characters, States, and Edges with the last chosen designator at -1 cost.

card.title: The Emperor
card.subtitle: Imperial Pawn
card.text: Unique. Turn to smoke target non-Unique Character. Sacrifice a Eunuch Character to cancel an Event that targets The Emperor.
card.flavor: Harvest of Jade is a mere shadow of his former self.

card.title: The Monkey Who Would Be King
card.subtitle: Guerrilla Emperor
card.text: Unique. Turn :: Swap every front-row Site with the back-row Site behind it and inflict 1 damage on those Sites. Does not affect locations with only one Site. This may change which Site is targeted by an attack.
card.designators: | the monkey who would be king guerrilla emperor |

card.title: Time Bandits
card.subtitle: Netherworld Mercenary Hoods
card.text: If Time Bandits is still in play at the end of any turn in which they inflicted combat damage on the target of an attack, you gain 1 Power if you declared the attack, or 2 Power if an opponent declared the attack.
card.designators: | time bandit bandits netherworld mercenary hood hoods |

card.title: Titanium Johnson
card.subtitle: Cyborg Bruiser
card.text: Unique. Toughness: X. X= the total number of all cards in all opponents' burned-for-victory piles.
card.flavor: "A bionic what? I wish!"

card.title: True Son of Heaven
card.subtitle: Shaolin Emperor
card.text: Unique. If unturned, generates 1 Power during your Power generation phase. Turn :: All attacking [g] Characters inflict +2 damage until the end of the attack.

card.title: Twin Thunder Kick
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Schtick. Subject Character inflicts +2 damage if it has Superleap. When subject inflicts combat damage on a Character, you may inflict an equal amount of damage on another Character at its location.

card.title: Two Hundred Knives of Pain
card.subtitle: Dangerous Demon
card.text: Gains Regenerate while any opponent is at least as close to victory as you. Inflict 1 damage which cannot be redirected or reduced on this card :: Inflict 3 damage on a Character intercepting it.
card.designators: | two hundred kniv knive knives pain dangerou dangerous demon |

card.title: Ulterior Motives
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Limited. Play if target opponent controls at least one turned non-Character card. You gain one Power, and that opponent may unturn one card he or she controls.
card.flavor: "No strings attached. Really. Just sign here."

card.title: Underworld Tracker
card.subtitle: Demon Cop
card.text: When an effect generated by an opponent removes a card from any opponents' smoked pile and puts it into play or its owner's hand, you may return Underworld Tracker to play.

card.title: Violet Meditation v2
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Limited. Play at the start of your turn. No other card you control or play generates Power during your Establishing Shot. Violet Meditation generates Power equal to the number of Edges and Power-generating Sites controlled by target opponent, minus the number of cards in your burned-for-victory pile.

card.title: Wandering Teacher
card.subtitle: Shaolin Agent
card.text: Any opponent may pay 1 Power to heal Wandering Teacher. Any opponent may pay 1 Power to unturn Wandering Teacher.
card.flavor: These teachers spread Confucian values in AD69.

card.title: Weird Science
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Toast It. Until the end of the turn, the printed Body of all Feng Shui Sites is considered to be equal to the number of letters in the first word of their titles.
card.flavor: "It works! I don't know what it does, but it works!"

card.title: Whirlpool of Blood
card.subtitle: Netherworld Feng Shui Site
card.text: Turn to cancel an effect generated or maintained by the turning of a Feng Shui Site.
card.flavor: "Sooner or later, every Innerwalker gets forced to jump in at gunpoint. It's like destiny or something."

card.title: Who Wants Some?
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Limited. The next attack you declare this turn may have any number of targets, provided that you attack each target with at least one Character. The number of Feng Shui Sites you need for victory is increased by one.
card.flavor: "You? You want some? And you? You want some too?"

card.title: Who's the Monkey Now?
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play in response to an Event played by an opponent that would damage or smoke a card you control :: Cancel that Event, and you may immediately smoke a card controlled by that opponent of the same type that would have been damaged or smoked.

card.title: Xin Kai Sheng
card.subtitle: Sorcerer Emperor Mastermind
card.text: Unique. At the end of your turn, return to play under your control all Characters in any smoked pile that were smoked by combat damage inflicted by this card while he was attacking this turn.
card.designators: | xin kai sheng sorcerer emperor mastermind |

card.title: Abominable Lab
card.subtitle: Site
card.text: Abominable Lab provides one [H] resource for each Buro Character and each PubOrd Character you control.
card.flavor: The resources of an entire juncture are at the Buro's disposal.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Architects deck

card.title: Arcanowave Reinforcer
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: All Characters you control inflict +1 damage and gain the designator Abomination.
card.flavor: The Buro sees mutation as a small price to pay for world domination.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Architects deck

card.title: Buro Godhammer
card.subtitle: State
