card.text: Weapon. Subject Character inflicts +3 damage.
card.flavor: In 2056, God is dead, and the Architects have his hammer.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Architects deck

card.title: CDCA Scientist
card.subtitle: Overzealous Researcher
card.text: When CDCA Scientist is smoked, you may draw up to X cards, then discard up to X cards. X= the number of "CDCA Scientist" cards you control plus the number in your smoked pile.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Architects deck

card.title: CHAR
card.subtitle: BuroMil Cyborg
card.text: CHAR's combat damage is reduced as its Fighting decreases but cannot be reduced or redirected by any other means. CHAR takes no damage from Fire cards.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Architects deck

card.title: City Square
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Unique. Turn to redirect the damage inflicted by a single source on target Site to any Site you control.
card.flavor: The city's chi flow is channeled and magnified by the many streets that converge here.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Architects deck

card.title: Dangerous Experiment v2
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Limited. Toast It. You gain 5 Power, and the opponent to your left may immediately toast a card you control, a card in your smoked pile, or a card in your burned-for-victory pile.
card.flavor: Pressure from the Buro led to quality control problems at the CDCA.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Architects deck

card.title: Helix Chewer
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Play on any Character. Reduce the combat damage inflicted by subject by 1. When subject leaves play, Helix Chewer returns to its owner's hand.
card.flavor: The CDCA calls it science. The Jammers call it torture.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Architects deck

card.title: Helix Rethread
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Play on a Character controlled by an opponent. When subject is smoked, you gain 1 Power.
card.flavor: "Oops, forgot to have you sign the consent form! Ha ha ha haha!"
card.comments: Found in the YotD Architects deck

card.title: Homo Omega vPAP
card.subtitle: Buro Cyborg
card.text: Unique. Toughness: 2. Once during each Main Shot, you may return a Weapon State on this card to its owner's hand :: Play a Weapon State with a different title on this card at -X cost. X= the cost of the returned State.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Architects deck

card.title: Nerve Gas
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Smoke target Character. Does not affect Characters with [M] or [H] resource conditions.
card.flavor: When you journey to the year 2056, always remember to pack a gas mask.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Architects deck

card.title: Neutron Bomb
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Smoke all Characters.
card.flavor: Just what the doctor ordered for the lingering urban resistance problems in 2056 - mondo death toll with no property value depreciation.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Architects deck

card.title: Plasma Trooper
card.subtitle: BuroMil Cyborg
card.text: When Plasma Trooper turns to attack, it gains +X Fighting until the end of the attack. X= the number of Characters controlled by the controller of the target of its attack.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Architects deck

card.title: Prototype X
card.subtitle: Abomination
card.text: Unique. -1 Fighting for each [C] Character in play.
card.flavor: The CDCA still maintains that the Burwell incident was not his fault.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Architects deck

card.title: PubOrd Officer
card.subtitle: Security Cop
card.flavor: "Consumer! Stop! ..." BLAM. BLAM. BLAM. "...or I'll shoot!"
card.comments: Found in the YotD Architects deck

card.title: Robot Arm
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Subject Character gains +2 Fighting. Subject gains Toughness: 1 against damage inflicted by Characters.
card.flavor: "I like it - it's an early model, but it's good enough to rip limbs off and stuff."
card.comments: Found in the YotD Architects deck

card.title: Satellite Intelligence
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Swap the positions of two target Sites controlled by the same controller. This may change which Site is targeted by an attack.
card.flavor: Control the high ground, and the battle is yours before it begins.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Architects deck

card.title: Test Subjects
card.subtitle: Abominations
card.flavor: "The CDCA's plan was to turn demons from the ancient past into super soldiers. It didn't work too well at first."
card.comments: Found in the YotD Architects deck

card.title: Vivisector v2
card.subtitle: Abomination Scientist
card.text: Turn Vivisector and choose a Character other than itself :: Sacrifice that Character. If the sacrifice is successful, you gain Power equal to that Character's cost.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Architects deck

card.title: Birdhouse Cafe
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: At the end of your turn, if any opponent is at least as close to victory as you are, unturn all Characters that participated in attacks this turn.
card.flavor: "The sign says that the parrot packs a .45, and in this place I'm not so sure that's an exaggeration."
card.comments: Found in the YotD Architects, Ascended, and Dragons decks

card.title: Stone Garden
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Turn to remove 1 damage from target Site.
card.flavor: An artist in harmony with the earth can channel and focus chi.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Architects, Ascended, Dragons, and Hand decks

card.title: City Park
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Heal City Park at the end of the turn it is revealed. When a Site you control is burned, you may play City Park face up at no cost.
card.flavor: The parks are the heart and soul of any city's chi flow.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Architects, Ascended, Dragons, Hand, and Lotus decks

card.title: Jade Valley
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Limited. Unless you are closer to victory than all opponents, Jade Valley generates +1 Power and gains +4 Body if any opponent controls a Feng Shui Site you own or has a Feng Shui Site you own in his or her burned-for-victory pile.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Architects, Ascended, Dragons, Hand, and Lotus decks

card.title: Nine Dragon Temple
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: When an opponent reduces Nine Dragon Temple's Body to 0, you gain 3 Power if that opponent is now closer to victory than you.
card.flavor: Those deserving of fortune will find it when faced with oppression.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Architects, Ascended, Dragons, Hand, and Lotus decks

card.title: Floating Restaurant
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: When an opponent plays an Event, you may remove 1 damage from any card you control.
card.flavor: "Take the boat to Chu's, then tell the waiter that you want the Sunless Seabass. He'll hook you up."
card.comments: Found in the YotD Architects, Ascended, and Hand decks

card.title: Perpetual Motion Machine
card.subtitle: Netherworld Feng Shui Site
card.text: You may discard an additional card of your choice whenever you discard.
card.flavor: "If it's impossible in the real world, you can bet it exists somewhere in the Inner Kingdom."
card.comments: Found in the YotD Architects and Dragons decks

card.title: Curio Shop
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Takes no damage from cards that have a cost of 1 that are controlled or played by an opponent.
card.flavor: "You've gotta have good chi to keep this much crockery intact."
card.comments: Found in the YotD Architects, Dragons, Hand, and Lotus decks

card.title: Festival Circle
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Damage may only be removed from Festival Circle when it is seized. If Festival Circle is in your front row, turn and inflict 2 damage on it in response to an Event that targets one or more Characters you control :: Cancel that Event.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Architects and Lotus decks

card.title: Field of Tentacles
card.subtitle: Netherworld Feng Shui Site
card.text: Turn and maintain to cancel the effects and rules text of target non-Feng Shui Site controlled by an opponent.
card.flavor: Unbelievers think they're gross, the Cult is devoted to them, and the reverend is making a few bucks.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Architects and Lotus decks

card.title: Bull Market
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: All players gain 5 Power.
card.flavor: When the Unspoken Name sneezes, the Dow Jones index says "Gesundheit."
card.comments: Found in the YotD Ascended deck

card.title: Covert Operation v2
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Look at target opponent's hand. You may force that opponent to discard one card of your choice.
card.flavor: The Ascended prefer to neutralize you before you even hit the field.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Ascended deck

card.title: Draco vPAP
card.subtitle: Lodge Enforcer
card.text: Unique. Discard a Lodge Character other than "Draco" in response to an Event that targets a card you control or would smoke a card you control :: Cancel that Event.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Ascended deck

card.title: Explosives v2
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Play on an unturned Character. Subject's controller may sacrifice Explosives during an attack :: Subject inflicts +5 damage against the next Site it inflicts combat damage on during this attack.
card.flavor: "Will that be nitro or C-4 today, Potemkin?"
card.comments: Found in the YotD Ascended deck

card.title: Family Estate
card.subtitle: Site
card.text: Turn to play a Pledged Character at -1 cost. When a Lodge Character is smoked, inflict 2 damage on Family Estate.
card.flavor: The Pledged do the Lodge's dirty work.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Ascended deck

card.title: Kinoshita House v2
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Unique. Turn to unturn target attacker. That attacker ceases attacking.
card.flavor: The sublime meditation cottage of the great ninja leader Kinoshita retains the essence of his spirit.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Ascended deck

card.title: Mole Network v2
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play during your Main Shot. Target an opponent who has completed at least one turn :: Steal 1 Power from that opponent.
card.flavor: "There is something you should know. Meet me at the usual place at 9:15 sharp."
card.comments: Found in the YotD Ascended deck

card.title: Operation Killdeer
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Until the end of the turn, target Character inflicts no damage.
card.flavor: The Dragons feel the loss of Jack and Mad Dog in every running gun battle and every wild fight.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Ascended deck

card.title: Paper Trail
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: When an opponent discards a card, you gain 1 Power. You cannot gain more than 2 Power per turn from each "Paper Trail." When this card leaves play, all opponents gain 1 Power.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Ascended deck

card.title: Rat Fink
card.subtitle: Lodge Infiltrator
card.text: Stealth. When Rat Fink bypasses an interceptor using Stealth, you may look at the hand of that interceptor's controller and you may force that opponent to discard a card of your choice.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Ascended deck

card.title: Sam Mallory
card.subtitle: Lodge Killer
card.text: Unique. Toughness: X. X= the number of damage counters on Sam Mallory
card.flavor: For an unstoppable killer, he's a pretty decent guy.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Ascended deck

card.title: Secret Headquarters
card.subtitle: Site
card.text: Limited. When Secret Headquarters is smoked, inflict 2 damage on all Sites you control.
card.flavor: As far as anyone else knows, it's the technical support department. Funny that no one asks why the techs carry guns...
card.comments: Found in the YotD Ascended deck

card.title: Shadowy Mentor
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Play on any Character. You take control of subject Character. Subject gains the designator Pledged.
card.flavor: "I have done you many favors in the past, my young friend. Now, I have one to ask in return..."
card.comments: Found in the YotD Ascended deck

card.title: Sting of the Scorpion vPAP
card.subtitle: Lodge Assassin
card.text: Assassinate. Has Ambush against the target of her attack until the end of the turn she enters play.
card.flavor: Her victims die happy, if that's any consolation.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Ascended deck

card.title: Student of the Bear
card.subtitle: Pledged Martial Artist
card.flavor: Disciples of the Bear School don't bother with the subtle approach.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Ascended deck

card.title: Student of the Shark
card.subtitle: Pledged Hood
card.text: Inflicts +1 damage on damaged Characters and damaged Sites.
card.flavor: Those who study the way of the shark tend to get a bit wild after the blood starts flowing.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Ascended deck

card.title: Suicide Mission
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Target a card :: Smoke that card. That card's controller may immediately smoke any card you control.
card.flavor: The Pledge is a promise to do anything for the Unspoken Name -- even die.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Ascended deck

card.title: The Pledged
card.subtitle: Loyal Initiates
card.flavor: At the lowest levels, the Order of the Wheel looks like any other service or fraternal organization. But go a little higher and the Colt 1911s come out.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Ascended deck
card.designators: | the pledged loyal initiat initiate initiates |

card.title: Pump-Action Shotgun v2
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Weapon. When a Unique Character you control is smoked by an opponent, unturn this card. Turn this card :: subject Character inflicts +3 damage until the end of the turn.
card.flavor: "This time..." KA-CHINK "...I'm going for a little redemption action."
card.comments: Found in the YotD Ascended and Dragons decks

card.title: Blessed Orchard
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: When an opponent declares an attack that targets Blessed Orchard, you may steal 1 Power from that opponent.
card.flavor: The precise rows of the orchard refocus and channel hostile energies.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Ascended and Hand decks

card.title: Jagged Cliffs
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: When Jagged Cliff's Body is reduced to 0, inflict 3 damage on all Characters at its location.
card.flavor: "The main thing I learned that day was getting caught in a rockfall can be extremely painful to your health."
card.comments: Found in the YotD Ascended and Lotus decks

card.title: Bronze Sentinel
card.subtitle: Righteous Automaton
card.text: During your Main Shot, toast a Feng Shui Site you control :: Bronze Sentinel gains +X Fighting until the end of the turn. X= the number of Characters in your smoked pile.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Dragons deck

card.title: Claw of the Dragon
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Subject Character gains +2 Fighting and Guts. When a Feng Shui Site you control is seized or burned, you may play Claw of the Dragon at no cost and ignoring resource conditions.
card.flavor: Dragon style Kung Fu tends to break a lot of bones.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Dragons deck

card.title: Dirk Wisely's Gambit
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Limited. Play when you declare an attack with only one attacker against a target controlled by an opponent who controls at least four cards. When your attacker inflicts combat damage on its target during this attack, you gain 2 Power.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Dragons deck

card.title: Final Brawl
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Inflict 2 damage on all Characters.
card.flavor: Hamlet, Oedipus, Dirty Harry - the classic stories always end in blood.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Dragons deck

card.title: Friends of the Dragon v2
card.subtitle: Student Supporters
card.flavor: "We need to kick some bad-guy butt. Round up your students, Zheng!"
card.comments: Found in the YotD Dragons deck
card.designators: | friend friends dragon v2 student supporter supporters |

card.title: Golden Comeback
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Choose a Character in your smoked pile :: Return that Character to play.
card.flavor: "It'll take more than nine slugs in the chest to put me down when there are still creeps like you in the world!"
card.comments: Found in the YotD Dragons deck

card.title: Hacker
card.subtitle: Gun-Totin' Techie
card.text: Any time Hacker is in your hand when an opponent plays an Event that steals Power from you or that toasts any card other than itself, you may play Hacker at no cost in response :: Cancel that Event.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Dragons deck

card.title: House on the Hill
card.subtitle: Site
card.text: Characters at this location gain Toughness: 1 while intercepting.
card.flavor: "We draw the line here!"
card.comments: Found in the YotD Dragons deck

card.title: Jane Q. Public
card.subtitle: Girl Next Door
card.text: When Jane Q. Public is smoked by an interceptor or by an Event played by an opponent, you gain 2 Power.
card.flavor: "Is that the best you can do? Try again, creep."
card.comments: Found in the YotD Dragons deck
card.designators: | jane q public girl next door |

card.title: Little Jim
card.subtitle: Rebel Abomination
card.text: Unique. When an opponent plays an Event, heal Little Jim.
card.flavor: "Home is where my friends are."
card.comments: Found in the YotD Dragons deck

card.title: Maverick Cop
card.subtitle: Gun-Toting Hero
card.text: Takes no damage from Hood Characters.
card.flavor: "Let the commissioner scream. I know what needs to get done on these streets."
card.comments: Found in the YotD Dragons deck

card.title: Netherworld Vet
card.subtitle: Portal Crawler
card.text: +1 Fighting for each Edge controlled by any opponent.
card.flavor: When you know the Netherworld this well, it's easy to strike your enemies where it hurts most.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Dragons deck

card.title: Redeemed Gunman
card.subtitle: Reforming Hood
card.text: Cannot intercept. When Redeemed Gunman turns to attack a turned Site, he gains +2 Fighting until the end of the turn.
card.flavor: He's trying - he's trying so hard - to be one of the good guys.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Dragons deck

card.title: Sacred Heart Hospital
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Unique. Turn to heal target Character.
card.flavor: "Gunshot wounds, Trauma 1. Demon bites, Trauma 2. Weird recurring glow, please wait outside."
card.comments: Found in the YotD Dragons deck

card.title: Surprise, Surprise
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play any time during an attack that targets a card you control. Immediately cut your deck and draw a card. You may put that card in your hand, discard it, or play it at no cost and regardless of card type. At the end of the turn, toast that card if it is in play.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Dragons deck

card.title: Ting Ting
card.subtitle: Martial Artist
card.text: Unique. Independent. +2 Fighting for each opponent who controls more Power-generating Sites than you. Opponents cannot take control of Ting Ting.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Dragons deck

card.title: Tricia Kwok
card.subtitle: Undercover Cop
card.text: Unique. Gains Toughness: 1 and +1 Fighting while she is the subject of any Weapon State.
card.flavor: With looks like that, you'd think everybody in the city would recognize her. But no one ever does...
card.comments: Found in the YotD Dragons deck

card.title: Cave Network
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: If you control no Characters when an attack is declared against Cave Network, you may turn Cave Network to play a Character with a cost of 3 or less at no cost.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Dragons, Hand, and Lotus decks

card.title: Gambling House
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Limited. If any opponent controls at least two cards that share a designator, you may turn this card during your Main Shot to gain 1 Power.
card.flavor: Dice, cards, tiles, whatever - if it's played for money, you can find it here.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Dragons, Hand, and Lotus decks

card.title: Blade Palm
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Return target card to its owner's hand.
card.flavor: The ancient art of the Blade Palm is known by few, but feared by all.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Hand deck

card.title: Blood of the Valiant
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play during an attack. Until the end of the attack, target attacker takes no combat damage from interceptors.
card.flavor: "The road to victory is slick with the blood of the valiant."
card.comments: Found in the YotD Hand deck

card.title: Blue Monk
card.subtitle: Kung Fu Infiltrator
card.text: Choose a designator when Blue Monk enters play. Blue Monk cannot be intercepted by Characters with the chosen designator.
card.flavor: The Blue Principle is the Principle of Obscurement.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Hand deck

card.title: Confucian Stability
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play in response to an Event or State :: Cancel and smoke that card.
card.flavor: Chance is only for those who have not embraced the Principle of Principles.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Hand deck

card.title: Gardener
card.subtitle: Devoted Follower
card.text: Turn to remove 2 damage from target Feng Shui Site.
card.flavor: Quan Lo's geomancers work diligently to repair the damage of the Secret War.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Hand deck

card.title: Golden Candle Society
card.subtitle: Secret Society
card.flavor: They have sworn to drive the foreign invader from the proud soil of their native land.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Hand deck

card.title: Hands Without Shadow v2
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Schtick. When subject Character is in combat with a Character, you may choose to have subject inflict X-1 combat damage instead of its normal damage. X= damage required to smoke the opposing Character, calculated just prior to inflicting damage, but after all other effects have resolved.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Hand deck

card.title: Inner Sanctum
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: If Inner Sanctum is revealed, you may not place another Feng Shui Site at this location.
card.flavor: Too great a chi flow can be as hazardous as too little.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Hand deck

card.title: Iron and Silk
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Choose any Character :: Until the end of the turn, that Character takes no combat damage while intercepting.
card.flavor: Embrace the yin principle, and receive your opponents' blows like gifts of honey.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Hand deck

card.title: Kung Fu Student
card.subtitle: Fledgling Shaolin
card.text: +1 Fighting while any non-Unique Feng Shui Site in your front row has a Body of 4 or less.
card.flavor: The Guiding Hand has no shortage of students eager to prove themselves.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Hand deck

card.title: Red Monk v2
card.subtitle: Martial Artist
card.text: When an opponent plays an Event that targets a card you control, Red Monk gains Superleap until he leaves play.
card.flavor: The Red Principle is the Principle of Movement.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Hand deck

card.title: Righteous Fist
card.subtitle: Martial Artist
card.text: Sacrifice Righteous Fist to smoke a State on a card you own.
card.flavor: Gracious light shines upon those who give themselves completely to the cause.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Hand deck

card.title: Rigorous Discipline v2
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Copy the printed rules text from any Character to target Character until the end of the turn.
card.flavor: "We can learn much from our enemies. Study them well, and embrace that which is useful."
card.comments: Found in the YotD Hand deck

card.title: Shadowfist
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Play on any Character. Subject takes no combat damage.
card.flavor: "I don't understand it, boss. The old guy whipped us all with his eyes closed and never said nuthin'. Nobody even saw him move. He just smiled at us while we limped away."
card.comments: Found in the YotD Hand deck

card.title: Shan Tsu
card.subtitle: Shaolin Master
card.text: Unique. Takes no damage from interceptors that have fewer than two resource conditions.
card.flavor: "You have guts, young warrior. But I have the more powerful kung fu."
card.comments: Found in the YotD Hand deck

card.title: Shaolin Sanctuary
card.subtitle: Site
card.text: Shaolin Sanctuary provides one [C] resource for each Shaolin Character and each Monk Character you control.
card.flavor: Shaolin temples across China serve as staging grounds for Quan Lo's efforts.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Hand deck

card.title: Shield of Pure Soul
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Limited. When a Site you control is seized or burned, you gain 1 Power and may search your deck and select a card. Reshuffle your deck, then place the selected card on top of your deck.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Hand deck

card.title: The Iron Monkey
card.subtitle: Masked Hero
card.text: Unique. Superleap. When The Iron Monkey inflicts combat damage on the target of his attack, steal half the Power (round down) of his target's controller and give that Power to any player you choose.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Hand deck

card.title: Turtle Beach
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Unique. Turn to redirect the damage inflicted by a single source on target Character to Turtle Beach.
card.flavor: When protection becomes sacrifice, how much can the land withstand?
card.comments: Found in the YotD Hand deck

card.title: Violet Meditation v2
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Limited. Play at the start of your turn. No other card you control or play generates Power during your Establishing Shot. Violet Meditation generates Power equal to the number of Edges and Power-generating Sites controlled by target opponent, minus the number of cards in your burned-for-victory pile.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Hand deck

card.title: Wong Fei Hong vPAP
card.subtitle: Kung Fu Master
card.text: Unique. Once during each of your Main Shots, you may play a [C] State on this card at -3 cost. Toast a [C] State on this card to cancel the effect generated by the turning of a Feng Shui Site.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Hand deck
card.designators: | wong fei hong kung fu master |

card.title: Abysmal Absorber
card.subtitle: Netherworld Demon
card.text: When Abysmal Absorber smokes a Character by inflicting combat damage, toast that Character instead and Abysmal Absorber gains +1 Fighting until it leaves play.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Lotus deck

card.title: Amulet of the Turtle v2
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Play on a Character. Redirect all damage inflicted on subject to this card. Smoke Amulet of the Turtle when it accumulates X damage; any damage in excess of X is immediately inflicted on subject. X= the number of [M] resources in your pool.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Lotus deck

card.title: Discerning Fire
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Smoke X target cards that share a designator other than Netherworld. X must be greater than one. Power-generating Sites are not legal targets.
card.flavor: "Next time, warn me before you do that! I nearly wet my pants when those soldiers around me suddenly burst into flame."
card.comments: Found in the YotD Lotus deck

card.title: Eunuch Underling v2
card.subtitle: Sorcerer Bureaucrat
card.flavor: These attendants to the Emperor are the outer edges of a sorcerous conspiracy that rules ancient China.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Lotus deck

card.title: Evil Twin v2
card.subtitle: Sinister Sibling
card.text: Uncopyable. When Evil Twin enters play, it copies the printed Fighting, rules text and restrictions of another Character in play. Evil Twin's title becomes "Evil Twin of (Character's title)" and its subtitle becomes "Sinister Sibling of (Character's subtitle)."
card.comments: Found in the YotD Lotus deck

card.title: Four Burning Fists
card.subtitle: Demon Martial Artist
card.text: Unique. You must toast a Feng Shui Site you control when Four Burning Fists enters play, otherwise toast this card. Gains +2 Fighting and Regenerate while any opponent is closer to victory than you.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Lotus deck
card.designators: | four burning fist fists demon martial artist |

card.title: Fox Pass v2
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Unique. Turn to change one attacker's target to any Character or front-row Site you control.
card.flavor: Be as the fox, who leads the hounds astray.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Lotus deck

card.title: Glimpse of the Abyss
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Toast It. You gain X Power. X= the number of Feng Shui Sites controlled by target opponent plus the number of cards in his or her burned-for-victory pile. The number of Feng Shui Sites you need for victory is increased by one.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Lotus deck

card.title: Inexorable Corruption
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Play on any Character or Site. Damage on subject cannot be removed. Inflict 1 damage on subject at the start of each of your turns.
card.flavor: "Cringe, you pitiful fools! This is the fate of all who defy the Lotus!"
card.comments: Found in the YotD Lotus deck

card.title: Infernal Temple v2
card.subtitle: Site
card.text: Infernal Temple provides one [M] resource for each Demon Character you control.
card.flavor: Long through the night, the unearthly cries of tormented spirits echoed through the countryside.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Lotus deck

card.title: Kun Kan
card.subtitle: Earth Demon
card.text: Regenerate. +1 Fighting for each Feng Shui Site in your burned-for-victory pile.
card.flavor: These foul demons thrive on desecration.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Lotus deck

card.title: Pocket Demon v2
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Limited. Play at the start of your turn. No other card you control or play generates Power during your Establishing Shot this turn. Pocket Demon generates Power equal to the number of Power-generating Sites controlled by target opponent, plus the number of cards in his or her burned-for-victory pile, minus the number of cards in your burned-for-victory pile.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Lotus deck

card.title: Shattering Fire
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Inflict X damage on target Character. X= the number of [M] resources in your pool.
card.flavor: The first spell any apprentice sorcerer wishes to learn - with good reason.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Lotus deck

card.title: Sinister Priest
card.subtitle: Macabre Sorcerer
card.flavor: These loathsome wanderers make the peasantry pay to exorcise spirits they themselves have summoned.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Lotus deck

card.title: The Hungry v2
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: When you burn a Site for victory, you gain X Power. X= the number of players in the game, to a maximum of 3. When The Hungry leaves play, inflict 2 damage on all Sites you control and all Characters you control.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Lotus deck

card.title: Thing with a 1000 Tongues
card.subtitle: Disgusting Demon
card.text: Unique. Sacrifice a Character :: Thing with a 1000 Tongues gains Toughness: 3 until the end of the turn.
card.flavor: Only the Thing's earthly body was destroyed in Operation Killdeer. He will return...
card.comments: Found in the YotD Lotus deck
card.designators: | thing 1000 tongu tongue tongues disgusting demon |

card.title: Tortured Memories
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Take control of target Character until the end of the turn.
card.flavor: "I saw Keung's head rise before me. Then he told me to blow up the MacMillan Building."
card.comments: Found in the YotD Lotus deck

card.title: Vassals of the Lotus
card.subtitle: Ancient Hoods
card.flavor: Bandits and ruffians serve corrupt Lotus officials to slake their lust for gold.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Lotus deck
card.designators: | vassal vassals lotu lotus ancient hood hoods |

card.title: Walking Corpses
card.subtitle: Undead Servitors
card.text: Cannot turn to change location. Damage cannot be removed from Walking Corpses.
card.flavor: They weren't buried properly, so now they're back.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Lotus deck
card.designators: | walking corps corpse corpses undead servitor servitors |

card.title: White Disciple
card.subtitle: Eunuch Sorcerer
card.text: Turn and inflict 1 damage on White Disciple :: Inflict 2 damage on any target.
card.flavor: In China, white is the color of death.
card.comments: Found in the YotD Lotus deck

card.title: Adrenaline Junkie
card.subtitle: Crazy Bastard
card.text: Characters with Fighting equal to or greater than Adrenaline Junkie's current Fighting cannot be declared as interceptors against him.
card.flavor: Even by Jammer standards, these guys are wacked!

card.title: Arcanorat
card.subtitle: Hideous Monster
card.text: Ambush. Ceases attacking when no other Characters are attacking.
card.flavor: "As promised, the Buro defenses were offline. However, we didn't expect the rats."

card.title: Arcanotechnician
card.subtitle: Buro Scientist
card.text: Turn Arcanotechnician, toast a Character in your smoked pile, and choose a card in your smoked pile :: Return that card to your hand.

card.title: Art of War
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Your hand size is increased by 2. When the player to your left declares an attack, you must predict whether the attack will be successful. If you are incorrect, the player to your left takes control of Art of War.

card.title: Atourina Baktiari
card.subtitle: Fire Mastermind
card.text: Unique. When Atourina Baktiari is damaged by an interceptor, you may inflict 1 damage on all other Characters controlled by that interceptor's controller.

card.title: Avenging Fire
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Limited. Play on a Site controlled by an opponent when that opponent seizes or burns a Site you control. At the start of each player's turn, inflict 1 damage on each Character and Site at this location.
card.flavor: Li Ting's ire is more controlled than his brother's, but no less final.

card.title: Avenging Thunder
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: One-Shot. Play in response to an opponent seizing or burning for victory a Site you control. Choose a Character that damaged that Site this turn :: Gain Power equal to that Character's cost and toast it.
card.flavor: Foes forget the Thunder King's vast sorcerous power.

card.title: Back for Seconds
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Unturn target Character.
card.flavor: "Okay pal, this time the gloves are off!"

card.title: Big Red Button
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Smoke all non-Edge [H] cards you own. Inflict X damage on all Characters and Sites at the location of any card smoked in this manner. X= the number of [H] resources required and provided by the smoked cards at that location.

card.title: Biomass Reprocessing Center
card.subtitle: Netherworld Site
card.text: Unique. Turn a Scientist Character you control and target a Cyborg or Abomination Character :: Target gains +1 Fighting until the end of the turn.
card.flavor: Safe behind guns, walls, and sensors, the Architects prepared to reshape the Netherworld in their image.

card.title: Bite of the Jellyfish
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play when a Feng Shui Site is burned. Steal all the Power of the player who burned that Site. (This includes any Power gained by burning for Power.)
card.flavor: The Ascended always have a contingency plan. You won't know your part until it's too late.

card.title: Blood and Thunder
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play during an attack. Until the end of the attack, all attackers you control inflict +1 damage, and all Thunder attackers cannot have their damaged reduced or redirected, and inflict an additional +1 damage.
card.flavor: Huan Ken does not go to war halfheartedly.

card.title: Blood Fields
card.subtitle: Netherworld Battleground Site
card.text: Unique. Once per turn, if Blood Fields is in your front row, you may copy the rules text of target Site controlled by an opponent to Blood Fields until the end of the turn. Any player who seizes Blood Fields gains 2 Power.

card.title: Blue Senshi Chamber
card.subtitle: Netherworld Site
card.text: Unique. When this card enters play, choose a designator. Turn during your Main Shot :: Change the chosen designator. Turn when you declare an attack :: Target Character cannot be intercepted by Characters with the chosen designator until the end of the attack.

card.title: Bounty
card.subtitle: Killer Edge
card.text: Limited. When one or more Characters you control with Assassinate smoke a Character that is the target of their attack during combat, you gain Power equal to half (round up) the target's cost.

card.title: Brain Fire
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play in response to an Event. Choose an equal number of new and different legal targets for that Event :: These targets replace the original targets of that Event.

card.title: Butterfly Knight
card.subtitle: Thunder Warrior
card.text: If unturned, Butterfly Knight may attack without turning once during your Main Shot.
card.flavor: The elite guardians of the Thunder Pagoda

card.title: Chiu Fa
card.subtitle: Fire Sorcerer
card.text: Unique. You may ignore resource conditions when playing Demon Characters. Turn to play a Demon Character at -1 cost.
card.flavor: Li Ting considers demons a necessary evil.

card.title: Claws of Darkness
card.subtitle: Triumvirate State
card.text: Weapon. Subject Character gains +1 Fighting. If subject is still in play at the end of any turn in which it smoked one or more Characters by inflicting combat damage, you gain 1 Power.
card.flavor: It only takes one scratch.
card.designators: | claw claws darkness darknes darkne darkn triumvirate |

card.title: Cloud Walking
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play during an attack :: All Characters gain Mobility for purposes of intercepting that attack. All interceptors gain Toughness:1 until the end of the attack.
card.flavor: The Netherworld knows no physical laws.

card.title: Colonel Griffith
card.subtitle: BuroMil Mastermind
card.text: Unique. Turn and maintain to give target Character +X Fighting and Tactics. X= the total number of resources required and provided by that Character.

card.title: Colonel Richtmeyer
card.subtitle: BuroMil Intelligence Officer
card.text: Unique. Characters you control at this location that have Ambush use the ability when intercepting, as well as attacking. Opponents cannot play Operation or Gambit Events.
card.designators: | colonel richtmeyer buro mil intelligence officer |

card.title: Conversion Drone
card.subtitle: Arcanowave Robot
card.text: Toughness: 1. You cannot burn Sites whose Body is reduced to 0 by this card. When this card smokes a Character in combat, return it to play under your control. Until it leaves play, its rules text is blank, its printed Fighting and cost are 1, and it gains the designator Abomination.

card.title: Cutting Loose Ends
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: One-Shot. Play any time except during an attack :: Each player, beginning with you and proceeding clockwise, may smoke 1 card other than a Feng Shui Site or Unique Character, and toast up to 3 non-Character cards in a single player's smoked pile.

card.title: Dallas Rocket
card.subtitle: Fanatic Guerrilla
card.text: Ambush against PubOrd or Buro Characters. Dallas Rocket inflicts +3 damage on the target of her attack.
card.flavor: "I was in the Dallas uprisings. This is nothing."

card.title: Darkness Falls
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play when an attack is declared. When interceptors are declared during the attack, randomly choose which attacker at their location they intercept. Their controller may choose the order of chains. All illegal interceptors do not intercept at all.
card.designators: | darkness darknes darkne darkn fall falls |

card.title: Darkness Pagoda
card.subtitle: Netherworld Site
card.text: Unique. At the end of any attack you declared, gain 1 Power for each player who controlled interceptors you smoked by inflicting combat damage that attack. Sacrifice a Character and turn to give target Darkness Character +2 Fighting until it leaves play.
card.designators: | darkness darknes darkne darkn pagoda netherworld |

card.title: Darkness Warriors
card.subtitle: Netherworld Soldiers
card.text: Sacrifice to gain 1 Power.
card.flavor: They would willingly die for their Queen, and they do; both on the battlefield and on the altar.
card.designators: | darkness darknes darkne darkn warrior warriors netherworld soldier soldiers |

card.title: DNA Mage
card.subtitle: Occult Scientist
card.text: Cannot turn to attack.
card.flavor: He mixes biotech and sorcery, with sinister results.

card.title: Dr. Ally Matthews
card.subtitle: Brilliant Scientist
card.text: Unique. Turn and target a Character or Site with X in its rules text :: Increase or decrease the value of X until the end of the turn by up to half (round down) the number of [H] resources in your pool. This cannot reduce X below 0.
card.designators: | dr ally matthew matthews brilliant scientist |

card.title: Dr. Curtis Boatman
card.subtitle: CDCA Scientist Mastermind
card.text: Unique. Opponents' Events that target cards you control are +1 cost. At the beginning of each turn, you may copy the rules text of another Arcano or Scientist Character in play onto this card until the end of turn.
card.designators: | dr curti curtis boatman cdca scientist mastermind |

card.title: Duodenum of Yang Luo
card.subtitle: Demon Entrails
card.text: Unique. Guts. Smoke this card when you control no Netherworld Sites. Cannot be declared as an attacker on a card not at the location of an unrevealed or Netherworld Site.
card.designators: | duodenum yang luo demon entrail entrails |

card.title: Entropy is Your Friend
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Limited. When you burn a Site, or when a Site you control is burned, place a counter on this card. Characters you control inflict +X damage on Sites. X= the number of counters on this card.

card.title: Expendable Unit
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Redirect all damage from one source to a Character you control.
card.flavor: No one is indispensable when replacement troops can be grown in a vat.

card.title: Fanaticism
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Limited. Choose one of Ice, Fire, Darkness, or Thunder when you play this card. All [m] Characters you control with that designator gain +1 Fighting while you control no [m] cards with any of the other designators.

card.title: Feeding the Fires
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Limited. Place a counter on Feeding the Fires when an attack you declared or joined fails. While playing a Fire card, you may remove any number of these counters to reduce the Power paid by up to two per counter.

card.title: Fire Acolytes
card.subtitle: Netherworld Disciples
card.text: When Fire Acolytes are smoked, you may inflict 1 damage on a Character at their location if you control another Fire Character.
card.flavor: The first step on the path of the Fire Righteous
card.designators: | fire acolyt acolyte acolytes netherworld discipl disciple disciples |

card.title: Fire Constructs
card.subtitle: Netherworld Automatons
card.text: Takes no damage from Fire cards. +1 damage against Characters. If Fire Constructs attack, only Characters that cannot be damaged by Fire cards may attack with them or join the attack.
card.designators: | fire construct constructs netherworld automaton automatons |

card.title: Fire Pagoda
card.subtitle: Netherworld Site
card.text: Unique. Turn and maintain and target a Fire Character you own :: that Character is not affected by Events played by opponents and is not a legal subject for States played by opponents.

card.title: Fire Sled
card.subtitle: Netherworld State
card.text: Vehicle. Subject Character is not a legal target for effects generated by Sites or Edges. The rules text of any non-Netherworld Site targeted by subject in an attack is canceled until the end of the turn.
card.flavor: Li Ting employs some of the best geomancers in the business.

card.title: Fire Warriors
card.subtitle: Netherworld Soldiers
card.text: +1 Fighting for each Feng Shui Site you own that is controlled by an opponent or in a burned-for-victory pile.
card.flavor: Li Ting's boys are big on vengeance.
card.designators: | fire warrior warriors netherworld soldier soldiers |

card.title: Fist of Shadow
card.subtitle: Netherworld Monk
card.text: Sacrifice Fist of Shadow and target an Edge :: smoke that Edge and gain 1 Power.
card.flavor: They strike where you least expect it.

card.title: Furious George
card.subtitle: Flying Monkey
card.text: Unique. Guts. Cannot intercept. If Furious George turns to attack, other Characters you control cannot turn to attack with him.
card.flavor: He's too much monkey business.

card.title: Fusion Rifle
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Weapon. Play on any Character. Turn Fusion Rifle to inflict 2 damage on any target at subject's location.
card.flavor: They still haven't got any fusion power plants on-line, but the armament spin-offs are kicking.

card.title: General Fung
card.subtitle: Darkness Warrior
card.text: Unique. Tactics. General Fung inflicts +X damage when attacking. X= the number of Battleground Sites in play.
card.designators: | general fung darkness darknes darkne darkn warrior |

card.title: Genocide Lounge
card.subtitle: Netherworld Site
card.text: Unique. Cannot be seized. If this card is in your smoked pile at the start of your Main Shot and you control no [j] Characters, toast it. Otherwise, return it to play. Turn to immediately play a [j] Event at -1 cost.

card.title: Going Out in Style
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play when a Character you control is smoked by combat damage. Toast that Character :: Inflict X damage, divided any way you choose, on Characters at the location the Character was at when smoked. X= the Character's cost.
card.flavor: Real heroes try not to go down alone.

card.title: Gorilla Encampment
card.subtitle: Site
card.text: Sacrifice during an attack that targets a card other than this one :: All Characters you control inflict +2 damage until the end of the attack.
card.flavor: When the Lotus and Darkness forces arrived, the Jammers were ready for them.

card.title: Gorilla Fighter
card.subtitle: Flying Monkey
card.text: Independent. Gorilla Fighter's cost is reduced by the total number of Feng Shui Sites and Characters you own that are controlled by opponents or in burned-for-victory piles.

card.title: Green Senshi Chamber
card.subtitle: Netherworld Site
card.text: Unique. Turn, inflict X damage on Green Senshi Chamber, and target a Character :: that Character gains Toughness: X until the end of the turn. X cannot exceed 2.
card.flavor: The turtle lends his shell. Prosperity.

card.title: Hall of Portals
card.subtitle: Netherworld Feng Shui Site
card.text: Turn and maintain and choose a Site :: Characters, whether turned or unturned, at this location and that of the chosen Site, may change location to the other of the two without turning.
card.flavor: The Netherworld is also the land of new beginnings.

card.title: Helix Scrambler
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Weapon. Subject Character gains the designator Abomination. Turn Helix Scrambler to inflict 1 damage on a Character at its location. That Character's rules text is considered blank until the end of the turn.
card.flavor: Quick and dirty genetic engineering.

card.title: Hiro Asataka
card.subtitle: Ninja Hacker
card.text: Unique. Independent. Turn and maintain and target an opponent's card that has Tech in its resource conditions and is a Site, Edge, or non-Unique Character :: Take control of that card.

card.title: Hung Hei Kwon
card.subtitle: Legendary Martial Artist
card.text: Unique. Gains +1 Fighting until the end of the attack when each interceptor is declared against him. Once per turn, you may pay 1 Power to cancel an Event that targets him.
card.designators: | hung hei kwon legendary martial artist |

card.title: Ice Commandos
card.subtitle: Elite Strike Force
card.text: Once during your Main Shot, you may play a Weapon or Gun State on Ice Commandos at no cost and ignoring resource conditions.
card.flavor: Pi Tui has been quietly upgrading her forces.
card.designators: | ice commando commandos elite strike force |

card.title: Ice Healer
card.subtitle: Netherworld Sorceress
card.text: When an opponent turns a Character to heal, you may remove one damage from a Character you control.

card.title: Ice Pagoda
card.subtitle: Netherworld Site
card.text: Unique. You may ignore [H] resource conditions when playing States on Ice Characters. Turn to heal a Character at this location.
card.flavor: Secret Warriors with justice in their hearts find aid at the Ice Pagoda.

card.title: Ice Shield
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Subject Character gains Toughness: 2. When subject ceases attacking or ceases intercepting, pay 1 Power or toast Ice Shield.
card.flavor: "It's as temporary as any kind of safety in the Netherworld; it's just more obvious about it."

card.title: Ice Warriors
card.subtitle: Netherworld Soldiers
card.text: Sacrifice Ice Warriors to cancel an Event that targets an Ice Character you control.
card.flavor: They would willingly die for their Queen, but she does not sacrifice them needlessly.
card.designators: | ice warrior warriors netherworld soldier soldiers |

card.title: Imprisoned
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Return target Character to its owner's hand.
card.flavor: "Thank goodness Buro prisons are so poorly built 'cause it sure is easy to get thrown into them"

card.title: Inauspicious Reburial
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Choose up to X Characters in one opponent's smoked pile :: Toast those Characters. X= the number of [e] resources in your pool.
card.flavor: Even the dead are not safe from the Lotus' depredations.

card.title: In Your Face Again
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play during your Main Shot :: Randomly choose a Character in your smoked pile and return it to play. That Character cannot be sacrificed. At the end of the turn, smoke that Character if it is in play.
card.flavor: The Buro has had trouble putting the Jammers down.

card.title: Je Pai
card.subtitle: Seductive Ghost Sorceress
card.text: Unique. Turn during your Main Shot and target an unturned Character :: return that Character to its owner's hand, even if it is now turned.
card.flavor: Death has its own attraction.
card.designators: | je pai seductive ghost sorceres sorceress |

card.title: Jeroen Becker
card.subtitle: Purist Mastermind
card.text: Unique. Your hand size is increased by 3.
card.flavor: "We cannot operate in secret forever. If we kill Boatman, we are well on our way to our goals."

card.title: Junkyard Crawler
card.subtitle: Netherworld Scavenger
card.text: Once during your Main Shot, you may look at the bottom card of your deck. Put that card on the top of your deck or toast it.
card.flavor: "You wouldn't believe the stuff people throw away."

card.title: King of the Fire Pagoda
card.subtitle: Netherworld Mastermind
card.text: Unique. When you declare attackers, you may inflict 1 damage on any card in play, and you may shuffle a Fire Event or Fire State from your smoked pile into your deck.

card.title: King of the Thunder Pagoda
card.subtitle: Netherworld Warlord
card.text: Unique. All Thunder Characters you control gain +1 Fighting. When a player redirects his damage or changes the target of his attack, you may inflict 3 damage on a card that player controls.

card.title: Low-Rent Cyborg
card.subtitle: Self-Made Man
card.text: Inflicts +2 damage on Sites.
card.flavor: "It's amazing what you can do with the right tools and a little duct tape!"
card.designators: | low rent cyborg self made man |

card.title: Lucius Centares
card.subtitle: Thunder Champion
card.text: Unique. +1 Fighting for every Thunder Knight Character you control or have in your smoked pile.
card.flavor: He and the Baron knew no quarter would be given.
card.designators: | luciu lucius centar centare centares thunder champion |

card.title: Lui Man Wai
card.subtitle: Master of the Chambers
card.text: Unique. +1 Fighting for each Senshi Chamber Site in play. All Senshi Chamber Sites you control gain +2 Body.
card.flavor: The Hand's Netherworld presence is due to him.
card.designators: | lui man wai master chamber chambers |

card.title: Lusignan's Automaton
card.subtitle: Sorcerous Jester
card.text: Unique. Your hand size is increased by the Power of the player to your left. You may draw a card when an opponent plays an Event during your turn.
card.designators: | lusignan lusignans automaton sorcerou sorcerous jester |

card.title: Lusignan's Tower
card.subtitle: Netherworld Site
card.text: Unique. You may discard an additional card during your discard phase. When an opponent plays an Event during your turn, he or she must discard a card at random.
card.flavor: "I saw him die, but he was waiting for us there."

card.title: Lusignan the Fool
card.subtitle: Mysterious Jester
card.text: Unique. You may draw an additional card during your draw phase. When opponents play Events during your turn, their Events are played into the toasted pile.

card.title: Man With No Name
card.subtitle: Mysterious Stranger
card.text: Unique. Turn to draw a card. Turn to add a faction resource of your choice to your pool until the end of the turn.
card.flavor: "Everything hinges on him," Lusignan said.
card.designators: | man with no name mysteriou mysterious stranger |

card.title: Mark of Fire
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Target exactly four Characters and/or Sites :: Inflict 1 damage on each target.
card.flavor: "Li Ting's idea of equality is everybody on fire at the same time."

card.title: Maze of Stairs
card.subtitle: Netherworld Feng Shui Site
card.text: Takes no combat damage when only one Character enters combat with it.
card.flavor: "Was that left, down, left, right, up or left, down, right, left, up...? DAMN!!!"

card.title: Midnight Whisperer
card.subtitle: Abomination
card.text: Ambush.
card.flavor: "I will crawl insssside your sssssoul, and there I will learn the sssssecretsssss that will kill you, my delisssscious prey"

card.title: Military Commandant
card.subtitle: Pledged Mastermind
card.text: Turn and maintain and target a Character :: that Character gains +2 Fighting.

card.title: Molotov Cocktail Party
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Schtick. Play on an unturned Character. Sacrifice this card during an attack :: Subject inflicts +2 damage on Sites until the end of the attack. When subject inflicts combat damage on a Site, inflict an equal amount of damage on any other Site at that location.

card.title: Monkey Boy
card.subtitle: Flying Chimp
card.text: Draw a card when a Battleground Site is played or has its Body reduced to 0.
card.flavor: "Laugh while you can."

card.title: Monkey House
card.subtitle: Netherworld Feng Shui Site
card.text: Limited. If any opponent controls more Power-generating Sites than you, you may turn Monkey House :: Discard a Feng Shui Site that is neither Unique nor Limited. If the discard is successful, you gain 1 Power.

card.title: Mr. Red
card.subtitle: Backstabbing Bastard
card.text: Unique. When Mr. Red enters combat with a Site during an attack you did not declare, flip a coin. Heads: if Mr. Red reduces the Site's Body to 0, you may seize the Site.

card.title: Netherworld Portal
card.subtitle: Battleground Site
card.text: When this card is played or seized, it may be placed in any player's Site structure, and that player takes control of it. When the player who placed it last attacks a card at this location, he or she may give one attacker Stealth and Assassinate until the end of the attack.

card.title: Netherworld Return
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Toast It. Starting with the current player and proceeding clockwise, each player randomly selects a Character in his or her smoked pile and returns it to play.
card.flavor: They weren't dead - they were just visiting the Netherworld!

card.title: Nine Cuts
card.subtitle: Shadowy Assassin
card.text: Unique. Assassinate. When Nine Cuts inflicts combat damage on a Character, smoke that Character.
card.flavor: "I don't care about money or if I live or die."

card.title: Ninja Interior Decorators
card.subtitle: Hood Geomancers
card.text: Stealth. When you declare an attack with Ninja Interior Decorators, you may reveal one Feng Shui Site controlled by the controller of their target.
card.designators: | ninja interior decorator decorators hood geomancer geomancers |

card.title: Obsidian Mountain
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: When this card is damaged, inflict 1 damage on all Sites you control other than "Obsidian Mountain".
card.flavor: The mountain does not feel the storm, though all around it is laid waste.

card.title: Ominous Swamp
card.subtitle: Netherworld Feng Shui Site
card.text: +6 Body while in your front row with no Site behind it. You must pay +1 Power when playing a Site behind this one.
card.flavor: "Not the sort of place you'd expect to have good chi, but in the Netherworld, it's almost a vacation spot!"

card.title: Once and Future Champion
card.subtitle: Netherworld Hero
card.text: Unique. Heals 1 damage at the start of your turn. Each time he turns to attack, he gains +1 Fighting and may inflict 1 damage on a Character. Once per turn, you may toast a card when he smokes it in combat.

card.title: Orange Senshi Chamber
card.subtitle: Netherworld Site
card.text: Unique. Your hand size increases by 1 for each faction in your resource pool. <Orange> Characters are -1 cost for all players.
card.flavor: The Principle of Diversity assimilates influences into balm for all.

card.title: Palm of Darkness
card.subtitle: Netherworld Ninja
card.text: Tactics. The rules text of any Site targeted by Palm of Darkness in an attack is canceled until the end of the turn.
card.flavor: Knowing your battlefield is the key to victory.
card.designators: | palm darkness darknes darkne darkn netherworld ninja |

card.title: Paradox Beast
card.subtitle: Purist Prototype Construct
card.text: Unique. Your hand size is reduced by 3.
card.flavor: The Purists created this cubist monstrosity to kill Curtis Boatman.

card.title: Phlogiston Mine
card.subtitle: Netherworld Feng Shui Site
card.text: Unique. Immediately choose a resource when this card is revealed or seized. Once each time that an opponent plays an Event that requires that resource, you may inflict 1 damage, which cannot be redirected or reduced, on this card :: Gain 1 Power.

card.title: Playing Both Ends
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Limited. Play when one opponent declares an attack against another opponent. Predict whether the attack will be successful. At the end of the attack, gain 2 Power if the prediction was correct, otherwise the player who declared the attack may toast a card in your smoked pile.

card.title: Portal Jockey
card.subtitle: Redeemed Timewalker
card.text: Gains Ambush until the end of the turn he enters play. If Portal Jockey is in your hand when an opponent plays a Character at reduced cost, you may play Portal Jockey at no cost.

card.title: Prisoner of the Monarchs
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Subject Character cannot attack, turn or intercept. Subject's controller may toast this card by paying X Power. X= the number of Feng Shui Sites he or she controls plus the number of cards in his or her burned-for-victory pile.

card.title: Proving Ground
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: When Proving Ground is revealed, immediately turn it for no effect. If Proving Ground is face-up, you may turn it to play a Character at -2 cost.
card.flavor: "So you think you're tough, eh? Let's see how tough you really are."

card.title: Pulling Strings
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: One-Shot. Play at the start of your turn if the number of cards in your hand is less than your maximum hand size :: Search your deck for a card and add it to your hand. Reshuffle. Skip the discard and draw phases of this turn.

card.title: Purist Sorcerer
card.subtitle: Buro Infiltrator
card.text: Turn Purist Sorcerer to inflict 1 damage on target Character. Turn and maintain Purist Sorcerer to take control of target Buro Character.
card.flavor: They're slowly infiltrating the CDCA.

card.title: Queen of the Darkness Pagoda
card.subtitle: Netherworld Mastermind
card.text: Unique. When a Character inflicts damage on Queen of the Darkness Pagoda, immediately toast that Character, even if it has left play.
card.flavor: Ming I is feared by even the stoutest of warriors.
card.designators: | queen darkness darknes darkne darkn pagoda netherworld mastermind |

card.title: Queen of the Ice Pagoda
card.subtitle: Netherworld Mastermind
card.text: Unique. Opponents cannot play States on cards you control. At the start of each player's turn, you may remove one damage from any other card you control. All Ice Characters you control gain +1 Fighting.

card.title: Raven Li
card.subtitle: Lodge Troubleshooter
card.text: Unique. Stealth. When Raven Li inflicts combat damage on a Site, you may look at its controller's hand and force him or her to discard a card of your choice.

card.title: Ravenous Devourer
card.subtitle: Hungry Demon
card.text: Sacrifice a Character :: Ravenous Devourer gains +2 Fighting until the end of the turn.
card.flavor: "It's always hungry, and not very discriminating"

card.title: Red Don
card.subtitle: Techie Mastermind
card.text: Unique. When an opponent generates an effect by turning a card, Red Don may immediately gain all rules text related to that ability until the end of the scene. If the ability is turn and maintain, it lasts as long as Red Don maintains it.

card.title: Red Senshi Chamber
card.subtitle: Netherworld Site
card.text: Unique. Characters at this location are not affected by Superleap. Turn Red Senshi Chamber during your Main Shot :: You may declare one attack this turn against a back-row Site.
card.flavor: "The tiger crouches, full of energy and stillness."

card.title: Ring of Gates
card.subtitle: Netherworld Feng Shui Site
card.text: Turn to cancel an effect that would return one or more cards to any players' hands.
card.flavor: The Netherworld is the land of dead ends.

card.title: Scroll of Incantation
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Immediately search your deck for an Event, then reshuffle. You must immediately either play that Event or toast it.
card.flavor: On the scroll is always writ precisely the ritual you need.

card.title: Simon Draskovic
card.subtitle: Cyborg Monster Hunter
card.text: Unique. Toughness: 3 against [M] cards.
card.flavor: I don't care how big it is, or how many teeth, arms, tongues, spleens, or any other body part it has. I can bring it down.

card.title: Skin and Darkness Ravagers
card.subtitle: Netherworld Horrors
card.text: Stealth. +2 damage against Characters.
card.flavor: Malevolent darkness given form and substance.
card.designators: | skin darkness darknes darkne darkn ravager ravagers netherworld horror horrors |

card.title: Smart Gun
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Weapon. Subject Character inflicts +2 damage. When subject inflicts combat damage on a Character, you may inflict 1 damage on all Characters of your choice that share a designator with that Character.
card.flavor: "Smart guns, dumb soldiers. You do the math."

card.title: Spirit Pole
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Once each Main Shot, you may play a State from your smoked pile onto a card you control. States with a printed cost of 0 are +1 cost when played in this manner. Turn Spirit Pole to play a Pagoda Site at -1 cost.

card.title: Storm Riders
card.subtitle: Thunder Warriors
card.text: During an attack that targets a card you control, you may play Storm Riders at -2 cost if you control a Thunder Character, or at normal cost otherwise. At the end of that attack, return Storm Riders to your hand if they are still in play.
card.designators: | storm rider riders thunder warrior warriors |

card.title: Sunless Sea Ruins
card.subtitle: Netherworld Feng Shui Site
card.text: Your hand size is increased by 1. You cannot discard cards during your Establishing Shot unless you skip Power generation.
card.flavor: A crumbling testament to a forgotten past.
card.designators: | sunles sunless sea ruin ruins netherworld |

card.title: Suong Xa
card.subtitle: Netherworld Hero
card.text: Unique. Independent. Play at -2 cost when an opponent who controls at least 4 Power-generating Sites plays or seizes a Site. Once per turn, you may inflict 3 damage on Suong Xa :: She gains Guts until the end of the turn.

card.title: Supercomputer
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Unique. During your draw phase, you may choose to draw 3 cards instead of the number you would normally draw.

card.title: Swarm of Teeth
card.subtitle: Abomination Horde
card.text: Ambush. Cannot be sacrificed. Not a legal subject for States. If this card is in your smoked pile, it is not affected by any effects that would put it in your hand or in play, except that it returns to play when you play a "Swarm of Teeth".

card.title: Swiss Banker
card.subtitle: Pledged Financier
card.text: Turn Swiss Banker to gain 1 Power. When you have no Power, immediately smoke Swiss Banker.
card.flavor: The Ascended's Netherworld operations require immense resources.

card.title: Tangram Alley
card.subtitle: Netherworld Feng Shui Site
card.text: +X Body. When Tangram Alley is revealed or seized, choose an opponent and a resource. X= the number of that resource in that player's pool. X cannot exceed 7.
card.flavor: "Everytime we went in there, it was different."

card.title: Temple of Boundless Meditation
card.subtitle: Netherworld Feng Shui Site
card.text: Unique. Your hand size is increased by 1 for each Senshi Chamber Site in play. Turn and maintain to give target Monk, Master, or Martial Artist Character +3 Fighting.
card.flavor: It's the Hand's main stronghold in the Netherworld.

card.title: That Which Does Not Kill Me...
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play when target Character is damaged by a single source. Until the end of the turn, that Character gains Guts and inflicts +X damage. X= the amount of damage inflicted on the Character by that source.
card.flavor: "...really pisses me off!"
card.designators: | that which do doe does not kill me |

card.title: The Baron
card.subtitle: Masked Avenger
card.text: Unique. Ambush and +2 damage against Thunder Characters. When an opponent spends 4 or more Power at once, you may play The Baron at -2 cost, or at no cost if he or she spent 6 or more Power.

card.title: The Bound
card.subtitle: Netherworld Horror
card.text: Unique. Mobility. +3 damage. Cannot turn to heal. Inflict 1 damage on any Character that enters combat with The Bound if "The Strangled Scream" is in play.

card.title: The Burning King
card.subtitle: Demon Lord
card.text: Unique. You cannot play this card or return it to play if you are closest to victory. Any opponent may discard two cards with a combined cost no less than his current Fighting to take control of him.

card.title: The Displaced
card.subtitle: Netherworld Rabble
card.text: When The Displaced are smoked, you may toast a card in any opponent's smoked pile. When an opponent forces you to discard The Displaced, you may smoke any card that opponent controls.

card.title: The Dis-Timed
card.subtitle: Netherworld Rabble
card.text: Generates 1 Power during your Establishing Shot if you control more Netherworld cards than any opponent. Only one "The Dis-Timed" may generate Power each turn.
card.designators: | the di dis timed netherworld rabble |

card.title: The Eastern King
card.subtitle: Lodge Mastermind
card.flavor: Coming Summer 2001. The Guiding Hand and The Ascended face off in Shaolin Showdown! Find out what happens when this man and his Lodge killers take on Quan Lo and his masters of Kung Fu.

card.title: The Golden Gunman
card.subtitle: Magic Hero
card.text: Unique. Independent. Not a legal target for Events. If The Golden Gunman turns to attack, other Characters you control cannot turn to attack with him.
card.designators: | the golden gun man magic hero |

card.title: The Hub
card.subtitle: Netherworld Site
card.text: Unique. Turn and pay 1 Power to look at target opponent's hand.
card.flavor: It would have been burned to the ground by now, except that no one can find it.

card.title: The Junkyard
card.subtitle: Netherworld Site
card.text: Unique. Turn the Junkyard during an attack that targets a card at this location :: Play a Character or a Weapon, Vehicle or [H] State at -1 cost.
card.flavor: Eventually, all things in the Netherworld end up here.

card.title: The New Heroes
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Unique. All Unique [d] Characters you control gain Toughness: 1 against combat damage.
card.flavor: "Do you think they're ready for this?" "No. Nor were we, when it all began."

card.title: The Prof
card.subtitle: Netherworld Mastermind
card.text: Unique. Not affected by Events. Turn to unturn target Character.
card.flavor: The leader of the Dragons is trapped in the Netherworld.

card.title: The Prof's Gambit
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play when you are either attacking or being attacked by a player who is closer to victory than you. Target one of his or her Characters :: that Character gains -X Fighting until the end of the turn. X= its current Fighting minus one.

card.title: The Strangled Scream
card.subtitle: Netherworld Horror
card.text: Unique. Turn, target a Character in an opponent's smoked pile, and pay Power equal to its cost :: Return target to play under your control.

card.title: The Twisted Gardens
card.subtitle: Netherworld Demon Site
card.text: Unique. Toughness: 1. All Demon, Ghost and Spirit cards you control inflict +1 damage. Smoke this card if "Guiyu Zui" leaves play. While you control "Guiyu Zui", this card gains +3 Body.
card.designators: | the twisted garden gardens netherworld demon |

card.title: Thunder Champion
card.subtitle: Netherworld Commandant
card.text: When Thunder Champion inflicts 3 or more combat damage on a Feng Shui Site during an attack you declared, you may seize that Site.
card.flavor: The mightiest of Huan Ken's warriors.

card.title: Thunder Initiate
card.subtitle: Netherworld Sorcerer
card.text: Turn and target a Thunder attacker :: that Character inflicts +2 damage until the end of the turn.
card.flavor: For subtle manipulations of sorcery, look elsewhere.

card.title: Thunder Knights
card.subtitle: Netherworld Soldiers
card.text: No Max. (You may have more than 5 copies of this card in a deck.) When this card is smoked by an opponent, target Thunder Character you control gains +1 Fighting until the end of the turn.
card.designators: | thunder knight knights netherworld soldier soldiers |

card.title: Thunder Lance
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Weapon. Subject Character inflicts +2 damage. While subject is the only attacker, it gains Ambush.
card.flavor: If you see the butterfly knights dive, then it's too late to run.

card.title: Thunder on Thunder
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Toast all Edges.
card.flavor: The unwise bird flies high, and is brought down by the vengeance of the sky.

card.title: Thunder Pagoda
card.subtitle: Netherworld Site
card.text: Unique. Turn when you declare an attack :: Until the end of the attack, either all Thunder attackers gain +1 Fighting, or one Thunder attacker gains +1 Fighting for each Thunder attacker.

card.title: Thunder Squire
card.subtitle: Netherworld Warrior
card.text: Sacrifice Thunder Squire to return a Thunder Knight Character from your smoked pile to play.
card.flavor: Someday, they will be full-fledged Thunder Knights.

card.title: Thunder Valkyries
card.subtitle: Warrior Maidens
card.text: Thunder Valkyries gain +2 Fighting until the end of the turn in which they enter play.
card.flavor: They're always the first to charge, singing the joys of battle.
card.designators: | thunder valkyry valkyr valkyries warrior maiden maidens |

card.title: Violet Senshi Chamber
card.subtitle: Netherworld Site
card.text: Unique. Turn, target a Character in an opponent's smoked pile and a Character you control :: your Character gains the rules text of the smoked Character until the end of the turn.
card.flavor: The fox remembers what has been discarded.

card.title: Waterfall Sanctuary
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Turn to smoke a State on a Character at this location. If you controlled the Character at that time, you may draw a card.
card.flavor: As you pass beneath the waters, everything is washed away.

card.title: White Senshi Chamber
card.subtitle: Netherworld Site
card.text: Unique. Provides [C][C] for each Senshi Chamber Site you control. All Senshi Chamber Sites gain Regenerate.
card.flavor: All Six Principles converge to become the White Principle.

card.title: Wind on the Mountain
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Toast It. Return X Events from your smoked pile to your hand.

card.title: Wu Ming Yi
card.subtitle: Repentant Demon
card.text: Unique. Regenerate. When Wu Ming Yi smokes a Character in combat, it gains +1 Fighting until it leaves play.
card.flavor: "Yeah he eats people, but they're the bad guys."

card.title: Yellow Senshi Chamber
card.subtitle: Netherworld Site
card.text: Unique. Turn to redirect 1 damage from any source to any target.
card.flavor: Balm to friend. Harm to foe. Fortune upon fortune.

card.title: Three Sectional Staff
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Weapon. Subject Character inflicts +1 damage, or +2 if it has the designator <Martial>. When subject enters combat, flip a coin. Heads: subject inflicts an additional +1 damage this combat, and flip again.
card.flavor: The most difficult to master of the five classic weapons.

card.title: The Unspoken Name
card.subtitle: Lodge Chairperson
card.text: Unique. Cannot turn to attack. Turn to give Stealth until the end of the turn to any number of Characters whose total cost does not exceed 7.
card.flavor: "Our brethren from the past need a lesson in unity."

card.title: The Inner Fire
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: All <Fire> Characters you control provide [C], and may not be taken control of by opponents.
card.flavor: The heart of a zealot burns brighter than the hottest flame.

card.title: The Fox Outfoxed
card.subtitle: State
card.text: May not be played on a Feng Shui Site. You gain all Power gained or generated from subject card.
card.flavor: You taste prosperity. Your foe tastes air.

card.title: The Eastern King v2
card.subtitle: Lodge Mastermind
card.text: Unique. Uncopyable. Not a legal target for Events. When you play him, and at the start of each turn, he gains the rules text of target <Lodge> Character until the target leaves play or the end of the turn.
card.designators: | the eastern king v2 lodge mastermind |

card.title: The Dragon Unyielding
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Limited. Play when a Unique Character you control smokes a Unique Character by inflicting combat damage :: Gain 3 Power.
card.flavor: "What can one old monk do against the mightiest of the Lodge?"

card.title: Temple of the Shaolin Dragon
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Unique. Uncopyable. All [g] Characters you control gain +1 Fighting. If you have another Feng Shui Site in your front row, players who do not control a <Netherworld> Site cannot attack this card.

card.title: Temple of the Monkey King
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Turn and target a Character attacking a card at this location :: Until the end of the turn, cancel target's effects and rules text.
card.flavor: The Monkey King is well known throughout Asia.

card.title: Swordsman
card.subtitle: Foot Soldier
card.flavor: He fights for the honor of China, and will die for Confucian principles.

card.title: TacOps Troopers
card.subtitle: BuroMil Elite
card.text: Tactics. TacOps Troopers gains Mobility while there is a <Battleground> Site in play.
card.flavor: Most people fear the abominations. The smart ones fear them.
card.designators: | tac op ops trooper troopers buro mil elite |

card.title: Sword of the Master
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Unique. Subject Character gains +3 Fighting. When subject enters combat with a Character, all Fighting and damage bonuses on that Character are canceled until the end of combat.
card.flavor: The true master knows that a sword is just a sword.

card.title: Sword Dance
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: You may move each Weapon from Characters you control to any other Character you control. All <Swordsman> Characters who are now the subject of a <Sword> State gain +1 Fighting until the end of the turn.

card.title: Superior Kung Fu
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Not cumulative. Target a Character that is about to enter combat with a Character with a higher Fighting :: Target gains +2 Fighting until the end of the turn.
card.flavor: "In martial arts, the Guiding Hand had no equals."

card.title: Student of the Dragon
card.subtitle: Martial Artist
card.text: Independent. If a card at this location is attacked, Student of the Dragon must be declared as an interceptor.
card.flavor: He knows just enough to get himself in real trouble.

card.title: Spider vs. Mantis
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Faceoff. Turn a Character you control and target an opponent's Character with Fighting no lower than two less than yours. The winner may look at the top 5 cards of the loser's deck, put one on the bottom, and return the others in any order.

card.title: Sliding Paper Walls
card.subtitle: Battleground Site
card.text: Cannot be seized. Any damage in excess of this Site's Body is inflicted on the Site behind it. Turn to swap the positions of this Site and a Site at an adjacent location when an attack is declared on that Site, changing the target of the attack.

card.title: Six Bottles Hwang
card.subtitle: Drunken Master
card.text: Unique. No player may declare interceptors against Six Bottles Hwang. Any opponent may discard 3 cards at random while he is attacking to be able to declare interceptors against him until the end of the attack.
card.designators: | six bottl bottle bottles hwang drunken master |

card.title: Sifu
card.subtitle: Martial Arts Teacher
card.text: All <Student> Characters you control inflict +1 damage.
card.flavor: "No. Attempt the stance again."

card.title: Shui Yu
card.subtitle: Water Demon
card.text: When an interceptor inflicts combat damage on Shui Yu, all other Characters currently intercepting Shui Yu that share a faction resource with that interceptor inflict no damage until the end of the attack.

card.title: Shinobu Yashida
card.subtitle: Pledged Master
card.text: Unique. Inflicts +3 damage on Characters with Fighting of 8 or more.
card.flavor: "Only you are worthy of my sharpest blows, Kar Fai."

card.title: Shaolin Surprise v2
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: If you don't control target State, pay 1 Power :: Take control of that state and place it on any legal subject. If the original subject is in play at the end of the turn, return control of the State and place it on the original subject.

card.title: Shaolin Student
card.subtitle: Fledgling Monk
card.text: Sacrifice Shaolin Student when an opponent burns a Feng Shui Site you control :: Play a <Martial> <Artist> Character at -3 cost.
card.flavor: "Bitter defeat teaches the most profound lessons."

card.title: Shaking the Mountain
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Turn all Characters and Sites at target location.
card.flavor: "One man, in harmony with the six Principles, can shake the Pillars of Heaven."

card.title: Senor Ocho
card.subtitle: Lodge Assassin
card.text: Unique. Assassinate. Ambush while attacking Unique Characters.
card.flavor: "'Will you step into my parlor?' said a spider to a fly" -Mary Howitt

card.title: Sabotage
card.subtitle: State
