card.text: Play on an opponent's Site. Subject cannot be turned.
card.flavor: "Supreme excellence consists in breaking the enemy's resistance by blowing stuff up." - B. Potemkin

card.title: Rend Chi
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Remove X damage from target Character you control and inflict X damage on an opponent's Character at target's location. X= all damage on target.
card.flavor: "Pain is also a weapon."

card.title: Robust Feng Shui
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Redirect all damage done to target Feng Shui Site by a single source to any target in play.
card.flavor: "Quan Lo taught the very earth itself the Principle of Redirection."

card.title: Reinvigoration Process v2
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Turn to play an <Abomination> Character from your smoked pile.
card.flavor: Abominations are the perfect soldiers - able to fight until utterly destroyed.

card.title: Realpolitik
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Smoke target Edge or State.
card.flavor: The Ascended will - and can- do nearly anything to maintain their power over our world.

card.title: Rachel McShane
card.subtitle: Lodge Enforcer
card.text: Unique. Rachel McShane is not affected by opponents' effects that are generated by turning a card.
card.flavor: An eagle can spot its prey from a mile above.

card.title: Quan Lo
card.subtitle: The Perfect Master
card.text: Unique. All [g] Characters you control gain Superleap.
card.flavor: His Six Principles of Light form the cornerstone of the Guiding Hand.

card.title: Primus
card.subtitle: Master of Paradox
card.text: Unique.
card.flavor: Coming this winter. The iron rule of the Architects begins to crumble as buried grudges and secret consipracies surface. The future - and the Secret War - will never be the same again!

card.title: Primeval Forest
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Limited. Generates no Power while damaged or in your back row.
card.flavor: The strongest chi flows are the most easily disturbed.

card.title: Positive Chi v2
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Each player may secretly choose one card, except an Event or Feng Shui Site, in his or her smoked pile. Starting with the current player and proceeding clockwise, each player plays his or her chosen card at no cost.

card.title: Portal Rat
card.subtitle: Netherworld Saboteur
card.text: You may declare an Edge as the target of an attack. Only "Portal Rat" Characters may attack it, and it is considered to be at your choice of its controller's locations until the end of the attack. Smoke the Edge if combat damage is inflicted on it.

card.title: Poison Clan Killers
card.subtitle: Mercenary Assassins
card.text: Unique. If Poison Clan Killers are unturned, they may attack a Character without turning once during your Main Shot.
card.flavor: Spoken of only in fearful whispers.
card.designators: | poison clan killer killers mercenary assassin assassins |

card.title: Point Blockage
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Schtick. Play on a Character without Superleap. Turn to inflict 1 damage on any Character at subject's location. Turn that Character, and it does not unturn during its controller's next Establishing Shot.
card.flavor: A true master needs only the merest touch.

card.title: Plains of Ash
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Unique. Toast 2 cards from your smoked pile :: Plains of Ash gains +1 Body until you lose control of it.
card.flavor: The seeds of the future grow in the ashes of the past.

card.title: Peking Opera Troupe
card.subtitle: Kung Fu Acrobats
card.text: Gains Superleap while you control another <Acrobat> Character or an opponent controls a card you own.
card.flavor: It ain't over until the butt-kicking begins.
card.designators: | peking opera troupe kung fu acrobat acrobats |

card.title: Peasant Mob
card.subtitle: Angry Rabble
card.text: Inflicts +2 damage on any Site with a printed Body of 7 or more and -2 damage on any Site with a printed Body of 5 or less, even if the Site is unrevealed.

card.title: Peasant Leader
card.subtitle: Disgruntled Commoner
card.text: Turn and maintain to take control of target Character with Fighting equal to or less than Peasant Leader's.
card.flavor: "The true strength of China is in its villages."

card.title: Peasant Agitator
card.subtitle: Disgruntled Commoner
card.text: +1 Fighting while you control any other <Peasant> Characters.
card.flavor: "The people are a slumbering dragon. If they are roused, nothing can stop them."

card.title: Path of the Storm Turtle
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Not cumulative. Subject Character gains Toughness: 1 against cards that are not [C] or [M], and are not the subject of a [C] or [M] State. You may substitute [a] for [C] when playing this card on a <Transformed> or <Lodge> Character.

card.title: Path of the Raging Bear
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Not cumulative. Subject Character gains Toughness: X. X= the number of damage counters on subject. You may substitute [a] for [C] when playing this card on a <Transformed> or <Lodge> Character.
card.flavor: The Bear school teaches that pain is a gift.

card.title: Path of the Praying Mantis
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Subject Character takes no damage from opponents' 1-cost cards, and inflicts +2 damage on Characters. You may substitute [a] for [C] when playing this card on a <Transformed> or <Lodge> Character.

card.title: Path of the Lurking Rat
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Subject Character may attack back-row Sites. The rules text of any Site targeted by subject in an attack is canceled until the end of the attack. You may substitute [a] for [C] when playing this card on a <Transformed> or <Lodge> Character.

card.title: Path of the Healthy Tiger
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Subject Character gains Guts while it has more than two damage on it. You may substitute [a] for [C] when playing this card on a <Transformed> or <Lodge> Character.
card.flavor: "They may strike first, but make sure that you strike last."

card.title: Path of the Fire Righteous
card.subtitle: Netherworld State
card.text: Play on a <Fire> Character. Subject gains +1 Fighting, and its damage may not be reduced.
card.flavor: The Hand aren't the only ones who know kung fu.

card.title: Path of the Clever Fox
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Schtick. Turn when subject Character is at a location controlled by an opponent :: Steal one Power from that opponent. You may substitute [a] for [C] when playing this card on a <Transformed> or <Lodge> Character.

card.title: Order Out of Chaos
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Limited. Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. You may toast as many of these cards as you wish. Return the remaining cards to the top of your deck in any order.
card.flavor: "The revolutions will break the Lodge and allow us to reclaim the Mandate of Heaven."

card.title: Order of the Wheel
card.subtitle: Secret Society
card.text: Sacrifice Order of the Wheel, except during an attack, to draw up to two cards.
card.flavor: Foreign merchants, diplomats, and officers, all in the service of the Lodge.

card.title: Opium Den
card.subtitle: Hood Site
card.text: Limited. Turn and maintain to give target Character -2 damage while it is not attacking.
card.flavor: "Control the masses, you control the nation."

card.title: Old Uncle
card.subtitle: Martial Artist
card.text: When you turn this card to attack, you may draw 2 cards. This effect is not cumulative.
card.flavor: He still knows a few tricks.

card.title: Old Man Wu
card.subtitle: Master of the Monkey Style
card.text: Unique. You may redirect exactly 1 damage from each source that would damage Old Man Wu to any Character in play.
card.flavor: "I never thought you were this big a fool, boy."
card.designators: | old man wu master monkey style |

card.title: Novice Students
card.subtitle: Fledgling Martial Artists
card.text: Generates 1 Power during your Establishing Shot while damaged.
card.flavor: Once they learn the harsh lessons of the Secret War, they will be a force to be reckoned with.
card.designators: | novice student students fledgling martial artist artists |

card.title: Natraj Thalnasser
card.subtitle: Lodge Warlord
card.text: Unique. Guts. Cannot be healed by other cards. Except at the end of a turn, Natraj Thalnasser is not smoked if his Fighting is 0.
card.flavor: "No, don't shoot him; you'll just make him mad."

card.title: Mr. X
card.subtitle: Lodge Mastermind
card.text: Unique. Turn and maintain to take control of a Character with a cost no greater than 3.
card.flavor: "I have places to go and people to be."

card.title: Mouth of the Fire Righteous
card.subtitle: Netherworld Master
card.text: Unique. When <Fire> Characters at this location turn to attack, they gain +1 Fighting until end of turn. Once per turn, you may pay 1 Power to inflict 3 damage on a Character at this location.
card.designators: | mouth fire righteou righteous netherworld master |

card.title: "Monkey" Chang
card.subtitle: Transformed Martial Artist
card.text: Unique. When "Monkey" Chang turns to attack, you may choose two Characters in play :: those Characters cannot intercept him during this attack.

card.title: Mo' Monkeys, Mo' Problems
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Limited. Draw a card when you play a <Monkey>, <Ape>, <Chimp>, <Gorilla>, or <Simian> card.
card.flavor: More fun than a temple full of monkeys.

card.title: Miu Tsui Fa
card.subtitle: Butt-Kicking Mom
card.text: Unique. +X fighting. X= the number of damage counters on other [g] Characters you control.
card.flavor: Sai Yuk's mom was a butt-kicking machine, too.
card.designators: | miu tsui fa butt kicking mom |

card.title: Might of the Elephant
card.subtitle: Lodge Enforcer
card.text: X= the number of [a] resources in your pool.
card.flavor: "Our strength comes from our unity."

card.title: Master Swordsman
card.subtitle: Righteous Warrior
card.text: +1 Fighting while the subject of a <Sword> State. While the subject of a Weapon, his damage cannot be reduced.
card.flavor: "True patriots lend their blades to our cause."
card.designators: | master sword swords man righteou righteous warrior |

card.title: Master Killer
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Unique. Subject Character gains +1 Fighting and cannot be intercepted by non-Unique Characters. When subject is smoked by one or more Characters, return Master Killer to play on one of those Characters.
card.flavor: Confucian values don't always include pacifism.

card.title: Master Blacksmith
card.subtitle: Industrious Peasant
card.text: You may ignore resource conditions when playing <Sword> States. Turn to return a <Sword> State from your smoked pile to your hand.
card.flavor: "The heart of China is in its farmers and craftsmen."

card.title: Market Square
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Gain 1 Power when an attack is declared against this card.
card.flavor: "To the merchants, invaders are just more customers."

card.title: Manchu Soldiers
card.subtitle: Imperial Pawns
card.text: No Max. +1 Fighting if you control a <General> Character.
card.flavor: What they lack in skill, they make up for in numbers.
card.designators: | manchu soldier soldiers imperial pawn pawns |

card.title: Manchu Garrison
card.subtitle: Site
card.text: Turn to give a <Manchu> or <Soldier> Character +1 Fighting until the end of the turn.
card.flavor: The Lodge uses the Manchu government to keep China in a stranglehold.

card.title: Manchu Officer
card.subtitle: Military Commandant
card.text: Once each turn, unturn Manchu Officer when any player plays a <Soldier>, <Manchu>, or <Commandant> card.

card.title: Malachi
card.subtitle: Purist Agent
card.text: Unique. Turn to inflict 1 damage on any Character in play, or 3 damage if "Hermes" is in play.
card.flavor: "If the Lotus fail, they create our eventual victory."

card.title: Manchu Bureaucrat
card.subtitle: Corrupt Official
card.text: All effects that target Edges you control are canceled. Turn and sacrifice to return an Edge from your smoked pile to your hand.
card.flavor: "Hitmen I can handle, but bureaucrats scare me!"

card.title: Lodge Politics
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Take control of target [a] card that is not a <Lodge> Character.
card.flavor: A thousand years of consensus ends now.

card.title: Li Yu
card.subtitle: Fire Demon
card.text: Not affected by opponents' 0-cost Events, States, and Edges.
card.flavor: The wrath of the volcano unleashed.

card.title: Li Sen-Hao
card.subtitle: Master of the Mantis Style
card.text: Unique. Discard a [C] card from your hand :: Remove 1 damage from Li Sen-Hao, or Li Sen-Hao inflicts +1 damage to Characters until the end of the turn.
card.designators: | li sen hao master manti mantis style |

card.title: Larcenous Mist v2
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Until the end of the turn, treat the rules text of target Character and all States on or later played on target as blank.
card.flavor: The mists rob you of both sight and self.

card.title: Legacy of the Master
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Play on a Character you control. When subject leaves play, you may place all States on subject that you control, other than "Legacy of the Master", onto a Character you control.
card.flavor: "You are now ready to learn the true art."

card.title: Larcenous Fog
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Play on a Site. Treat subject's rules text as if it were blank.
card.flavor: The land itself forgets what it is.

card.title: Lai Kuang
card.subtitle: Eunuch Sorcerer
card.text: Unique. When an opponent smokes Lai Kuang, you may play a <Demon> Character at -3 cost.
card.flavor: "In killing me, you have only doomed yourselves!"

card.title: Koko Chanel
card.subtitle: Master of Monkey Style
card.text: Unique. Not a legal subject for States. Can attack during an opponent's turn. Unturns at the start of the turn of any player who is closer to victory.
card.flavor: High explosives go with everything.

card.title: Kinoshita
card.subtitle: Lodge Chairperson
card.text: Unique. Stealth. Assassinate. Pay 1 Power during your Main Shot to turn target Character.
card.flavor: "Our brethren from the future need a lesson in humility."

card.title: Kiii-YAAAH!
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play during your Main Shot. Steal up to 3 Power from target opponent who controls three or more Power-generating Sites.

card.title: King on the Water
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Sacrifice King on the Water and target a Character :: Target Character may not intercept subject Character until the end of the turn.
card.flavor: "Strike water, and it only flows around your fist."

card.title: Katie Kincaid
card.subtitle: Gunfighter
card.text: Unique. If Katie Kincaid is the subject of a <Gun> State, flip a coin when she enters combat. Heads: she gains Ambush until the end of combat.

card.title: Juan "El Tigre" Velasquez
card.subtitle: Lodge Killer
card.text: Unique. Stealth. Superleap.
card.flavor: "I'm going to rip your heart out, old man!"
card.designators: | juan el tigre velasquez lodge killer |

card.title: Jenny Zheng
card.subtitle: Promising Student
card.text: Unique. Superleap.
card.flavor: "Nyaaah, nyaaah!!!"

card.title: Jiang Xushen
card.subtitle: Fire Infiltrator
card.text: Unique. You may inflict 1 damage on any card in play when any player plays a [C] State or [C] Event.
card.flavor: He plays a deadly game with the Hand.

card.title: Jade Wheel Society
card.subtitle: Secret Society
card.text: Sacrifice Jade Wheel Society, except during an attack, to discard up to two cards.
card.flavor: The foundation of the Ascended's power in China.

card.title: "I Will Avenge You!"
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Limited. Play when a Character you control is smoked by an attacker or Event controlled by an opponent. Search through your deck for a Character. Show that card to your opponents and put it into your hand. Reshuffle.

card.title: Invincible Chi
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play during your turn. Choose States, Edges, or Sites. Cancel the effects and rules text of all cards of that type until the end of the turn.

card.title: Into the Light
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Return one card from your smoked pile to your hand.
card.flavor: The Perfect Master's Principle of Reversal teaches us that great defeat must precede profound victory.

card.title: Instrument of the Hand
card.subtitle: Martial Artist
card.flavor: "Even the noodle lady turned out to be a guerrilla fighting against the foreign powers."

card.title: Infernal Plot
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: One-Shot. Play during your Main Shot. Target opponent discards his or her hand. Choose X cards from that player's smoked pile, and put them in his or her hand. X= the number of cards discarded.
card.flavor: "You need not kill them. Just distract them."

card.title: Impoverished Monk
card.subtitle: Dedicated Martial Artist
card.text: Gains Toughness: 1 and Superleap while you have no Power. You may not play non-[C] States on Impoverished Monk.
card.flavor: They renounce worldly things for true mastery.

card.title: Iala Mane
card.subtitle: Blind Master
card.text: Unique. Iala Mane can attack during an opponent's turn. All [d] Characters you control gain +1 Fighting and Independent.
card.flavor: Operation: Killdeer left some loose ends.

card.title: Homemade Grenade
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Weapon. Sacrifice Homemade Grenade and flip 3 coins :: Inflict one damage on all opponents' Characters at subject Character's location for each Heads.
card.flavor: "I'm pretty sure the bit that fell out wasn't the pin."

card.title: Hermes
card.subtitle: Purist Agent
card.text: Unique. Turn to draw 1 card, or 3 cards if "Malachi" is in play.
card.flavor: "The seeds of the critical shift have been planted..."

card.title: Heaven's Peak
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Unique. You may draw a card when an opponent turns a Character to change location or to generate an effect.
card.flavor: "Chi follows the winds of fate."

card.title: Healing Earth
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Remove up to X damage from cards you control. X= the number of [C] resources in your pool.
card.flavor: The regenerative powers of the earth are triggered by the transcendent soul.

card.title: Hartwell Iron Works
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Unique. When any Character enters combat with this card, inflict 1 damage on that Character. (Before combat damage is dealt.)
card.flavor: A dangerous place, even for the wary.

card.title: Gong Wei
card.subtitle: Reformed Bandit
card.text: Unique. Once during your Main Shot, you may sacrifice a <Rebel>, <Rabble>, or <Peasant> Character to return a [g] Event from your smoked pile to your hand.

card.title: Geoscan Report
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Limited. Target a Site controlled by an opponent. Reveal that Site. Characters you control inflict +2 damage on that Site until the end of the turn.
card.flavor: "The survey teams started complaining after the Temple incident."

card.title: General Senggelinqin
card.subtitle: Manchu Military Mastermind
card.text: Unique. Tactics. Once during your Main Shot, you may sacrifice a <Soldier> Character to play a <Commandant>, <Colonel>, or <Officer> Character from your hand or smoked pile at -X cost. X= the cost of the sacrificed Character.

card.title: Four Sorrows Island
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Unique. Cannot be healed except when seized. Except during an attack on this card, turn and inflict 2 damage on it and target a Character :: Target may not intercept until the end of the turn.

card.title: Fortune of the Turtle
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Subject Character is not affected by Events played by an opponent.
card.flavor: The turtle symbolizes protection, caution, and forethought.

card.title: Forgotten Shrine
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Turn and maintain and target an opponent's Site :: That Site takes two damage when it is turned.
card.flavor: "...Lost to all but the lone monk whose duty was to tend it."

card.title: Flying Monkey Squad
card.subtitle: Guerrilla Gorillas
card.text: Independent. Superleap.
card.flavor: You're not in Kansas anymore.
card.designators: | flying monkey squad guerrilla gorilla gorillas |

card.title: Fong Sai Yuk vPAP
card.subtitle: Martial Artist
card.text: Unique. Superleap. The rules text of the back-row Site at the location of the target of Fong Sai Yuk's attack is canceled until the end of the turn.

card.title: Flying Kick
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Target Character gains Superleap until the end of the turn.
card.flavor: "Yeah, yeah, we'll give it back to the Hand when we're done with it."

card.title: Fist of the Bear vPAP
card.subtitle: Lodge Enforcer
card.text: Toughness: 1.
card.flavor: Thalnasser chose brute force as the best way to deal with the Hand.

card.title: Fire Infiltrator
card.subtitle: Netherworld Subversive
card.text: +1 Fighting if you have [C] resources in your pool.
card.flavor: Li Ting saw the Muslim rebellion as an opportunity to establish his twisted version in China.

card.title: Feng Kan
card.subtitle: Wind Demon
card.text: You may play Feng Kan at -1 cost for each opponent who controls more Characters than you do.
card.flavor: "Who can see the wind before it arrives?"

card.title: Elephant Gun
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Weapon. Subject Character inflicts +5 damage.
card.flavor: "Even Katie was impressed."

card.title: Faked Death
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Return a Character from your smoked pile to your hand.
card.flavor: The Lodge can write you a death certificate any time they want.

card.title: Eagle vs. Snake
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Faceoff. Turn a Character you control and target an opponent's Character with Fighting no lower than two less than yours. The winner may draw three cards.
card.flavor: Rachel was fast. Su Yin was faster.

card.title: Dragon Mountain
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Unique. Toughness: 1.
card.flavor: The dragon is hidden in the land. Its scales say, "Do not act."

card.title: Dragon Boat Festival
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Limited. Comes into play turned. While this card is unturned, each player's hand size is increased by 2.
card.flavor: A tribute to the drowned scholar Chu Yuan.

card.title: Dragon Dojo
card.subtitle: Site
card.text: You may draw a card when you play a <Student>, <Master>, or <Teacher> Character at this location. This effect is not cumulative.
card.flavor: "Here, we teach discipline, philosophy, and how to kick butt."

card.title: Doctor Shen
card.subtitle: Martial Artist
card.text: Unique. Toughness: 1. At the end of combat, you may heal one damage from any other Character for each combat damage he inflicted on a Character.
card.flavor: "First, do no harm" is not his motto.

card.title: Dark's Soft Whisper
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play when an attack you declared fails and an opponent is one Feng Shui Site away from victory or closer to victory than you. Gain 2 Power.
card.flavor: Defeat becomes victory. The wheel turns.

card.title: Contingency Plans
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Limited. Play when a Feng Shui Site you control is seized or burned :: Play a Feng Shui Site face-up at no cost.
card.flavor: "To be prepared for any contingency is the greatest of virtues." - Sun Tzu

card.title: Commander Corliss
card.subtitle: TacOps Officer
card.text: Unique. Can only be played at any time during an opponent's Main Shot. You do not generate any Power during your next Establishing Shot after you play this card.
card.designators: | commander corlis corliss tac op ops officer |

card.title: Coil of the Snake
card.subtitle: Lodge Assassin
card.text: Stealth. When you turn Coil of the Snake to attack, you may discard and draw a card.
card.flavor: Quick, clean, lethal.

card.title: Chinese Doctor
card.subtitle: Wise Physician
card.text: Turn to heal target Character.
card.flavor: "Lucky they only shot you in the head. Next time they might hit something important."

card.title: Chen Sho Kung
card.subtitle: Master Swordsman
card.text: Unique. Once per turn, you may sacrifice a <Sword> State on Chen Sho Kung to reduce all damage dealt to him by a single source to 0. All <Swordsman> Characters you control gain +1 Fighting.
card.designators: | chen sho kung master sword swords man |

card.title: Charmed Life
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Subject Character is not affected by effects that would smoke it. Subject can still be smoked due to damage.
card.flavor: Dragons have to be lucky _and_ good to last long.

card.title: Charge of the Rhino
card.subtitle: Lodge Enforcer
card.text: When Charge of the Rhino smokes a Character by inflicting combat damage, you may inflict 1 damage on any card at its location.
card.flavor: They bring new meaning to the word "unsubtle".

card.title: Butterfly Swords
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Weapon. Subject Character inflicts +3 damage.
card.flavor: Deadly in trained hands.

card.title: Carnival of Carnage
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Until the end of the turn, when any Character is smoked, you may inflict 1 damage on any Character in play. Each damage inflicted by Carnival of Carnage is considered a separate source of damage.
card.flavor: There's always one more guy to kill.

card.title: Big Mack
card.subtitle: Bar-Room Brawler
card.text: Unique. Toughness: 1. Inflicts +3 damage on Sites.
card.flavor: "Put it on my tab."

card.title: Bear vs. Fox
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Faceoff. Turn a Character you control and target an opponent's Character with Fighting no lower than two less than yours. The winner may play one Event this turn, at no cost and ignoring resource conditions, from the loser's smoked pile.

card.title: Ancient Monument
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Inflict 1 damage on this Site when an attack is declared against it.
card.flavor: Its placid beauty is camouflage for the danger that lies within.

card.title: Ancient Grove
card.subtitle: Site
card.flavor: These bamboo shoots are the mirror of your soul, warrior. When you understand why, you will find the path to mastery.

card.title: 18 Bronze Men
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Limited. Play on a front-row Site. All non-Unique <Shaolin>, <Martial>, and <Kung> <Fu> Characters you control gain +1 Fighting.

card.title: Tiger Hook Swords
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Weapon. Subject Character inflicts +2 damage. If subject is a <Swordsman>, draw a card when subject smokes a Character by inflicting combat damage.

card.title: Tiger vs. Crane
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Faceoff. Turn a Character you control and target an opponent's Character with Fighting no lower than two less than yours. The winner may inflict 1 damage on up to 3 different cards controlled by the loser.
card.flavor: Tsung Jin was the first target.

card.title: Ti Kan
card.subtitle: Metal Demon
card.text: Toughness: 1 against [H] cards. +1 damage against [H] cards.
card.flavor: As warm and caring as steel.

card.title: "Time to Kick Ass!"
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play when an attack is declared against a card you control :: Unturn all your Characters.
card.flavor: "What time is it, Sifu?"

card.title: Tong Su Yin
card.subtitle: Master of the Snake Style
card.text: Unique. Tong Su Yin's Fighting is increased by the number of cards in your hand.
card.flavor: "They say that a snake can never strike farther than half its length. They lie."
card.designators: | tong su yin master snake style |

card.title: "Try My Kung Fu!"
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Not cumulative. Target <Monk>, <Master>, or <Martial> Character gains +1 Fighting and Toughness: 1 until the end of the turn.
card.flavor: "There are only thirty-five of you..."

card.title: Tsung Jin
card.subtitle: Master of the Crane Style
card.text: Unique. When Tsung Jin turns to attack, choose up to X Characters :: The chosen Characters may not intercept Tsung Jin during this attack. X= the number of States on Tsung Jin.

card.title: Two Dragons Inn
card.subtitle: Site
card.text: Unique. At the end of each player's turn, that player loses one Power if he or she controls any Characters and did not declare an attack.
card.flavor: Mr. X tracked Iala Mane to the Inn, and then set up his ambush.

card.title: Underworld Contract
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Limited. Place a counter on Underworld Contract when an attack declared against you fails. Turn and remove X counters to play a <Demon> card at -X cost.

card.title: Walk of a Thousand Steps
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Not cumulative. Subject Character takes -X damage from any source. X= half the damage inflicted, rounded up.
card.flavor: Those who keep the path are kept from harm.

card.title: Web of the Spider vPAP
card.subtitle: Lodge Mastermind
card.text: Gain 1 Power when an opponent plays a card at reduced cost.
card.flavor: Accountants are as important as assassins in the Secret War.

card.title: Wei Fong-Yi
card.subtitle: Master of the Fox Style
card.text: Unique. When Wei Fong-Yi enters combat with a Character, you may choose one State on that Character, and either smoke it or take control of it and place it on Wei Fong-Yi.
card.designators: | wei fong yi master fox style |

card.title: Year of the Snake
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: One-Shot. Play when you are attacking a Site :: Change the target of all your attackers to any one legal card.
card.flavor: After the playful Dragon comes the wily Serpent.

card.title: Yen Fan
card.subtitle: Pledged Traitor
card.text: Unique. Superleap. Not affected by Stealth.
card.flavor: "We cannot sell our freedom and our culture for prosperity. The price is too high, and so I must renounce my Pledge."

card.title: Yen Song
card.subtitle: Shaolin Traitor
card.text: Unique. Stealth. Not affected by Superleap.
card.flavor: "Confucian principles have not brought prosperity to our people. The Wheel can."

card.title: Zheng Yi Quan vPAP
card.subtitle: Kung Fu Master
card.text: Unique. Guts. All <Student> Characters you control gain +1 fighting.
card.flavor: "I try to pass on what Kar Fai taught me. Not just the fighting, but also why we fight."
card.designators: | zheng yi quan kung fu master |

card.title: Alchemist's Lair
card.subtitle: Site
card.flavor: "You were right, old man. The power of immortality is what I sought--and the misery of duality is what I found."

card.title: Arachnae
card.subtitle: Reascended Spider
card.text: Unique. Assassinate. Regeneration.
card.flavor: "We will become more than human, and the force of our Reascension will remake the world." - Dunwa Saleem.

card.title: Arcane Scientist
card.subtitle: Initiate of Paradox
card.text: Turn to draw a card during your Main Shot.
card.flavor: Unbound by the traditions of the Lotus, the Purists took a radical approach to magic.

card.title: Assault Drone
card.subtitle: Arcanowave Robot
card.text: Toughness: 1. Cannot intercept. Assault Drone enters play with four counters on it. Add one counter at the start of your turn. Remove a counter to inflict one damage on any target at this location.

card.title: Battlechimp Potemkin
card.subtitle: Subversive Chimp Mastermind
card.text: Unique. Once during each opponent's Main Shot, you may play a [j] or [H] Event from any player's smoked pile, ignoring resource conditions, and toasting the Event immediately.

card.title: Battle Cry
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Inflict X damage on target Character. X= 2 plus the number of <Battleground> Sites in play.
card.flavor: Huan Ken rarely gets involved unless there's a good fight to be had.

card.title: Battle-Matic
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Vehicle. Subject Character gains Toughness: 1 and +X Fighting. X= the number of Vehicles, Weapons, and [H] States in your smoked pile.
card.flavor: "I never saw a patchwork tank before."

card.title: Beta Beast
card.subtitle: Early Model Abomination
card.text: Toughness: 1 against Characters who provide only one resource.
card.flavor: The second generation prototypes proved more vicious but just as expendable.

card.title: Big Macaque Attack
card.subtitle: Monkey Horde
card.text: +1 Fighting for each <Monkey> Character in play. Not a legal subject for States.
card.flavor: As it turns out, a barrel full of monkeys isn't actually that much fun.

card.title: BK97 Attack Chopper
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Vehicle. Subject Character gains +3 Fighting. Damage subject inflicts cannot be reduced.
card.flavor: "Magic don't mean crap against a minigun."

card.title: Blue Mandarin
card.subtitle: Deceptive Bureaucrat
card.text: Turn and maintain and target a Character. That Character cannot intercept or turn to generate an effect.
card.flavor: In the future, the Hand have to be especially subtle.

card.title: Borrowed Nuke
card.subtitle: State
card.text: One Shot. Play on an opponent's Site, except during an attack. Subject cannot be seized or burned. If an attack on the subject succeeds, smoke all cards at this location. (Including any attackers.)
card.flavor: "No, really, we'll give it back."

card.title: Buro Blue Spear
card.subtitle: Gun State
card.text: Weapon. Subject Character gains +1 Fighting. Turn to inflict 1 damage on target Character at this location.
card.flavor: A BuroMil Grunt's best friend.

card.title: BuroMil Grunt
card.subtitle: Brutal Soldier
card.text: Uncopyable. You may play BuroMil Grunt during an attack against you. Smoke BuroMil Grunt at the end of the turn he is played.
card.flavor: Their military careers are violent and brief.

card.title: BuroMil "Savage"
card.subtitle: Tank State
card.text: Vehicle. Subject Character gains Mobility, +6 Fighting and Toughness: 1.
card.flavor: For the first time, the Architects turned their weapons against each other.

card.title: Cataract Gorge
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Unique. Turn to give target Character Independent until the end of the turn.
card.flavor: The Purists tricked Bonengel into authorizing the construction of the four Nexus towers.

card.title: Cellular Reinvigoration
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Until the end of the turn, target Character gains Guts and is not smoked if its Fighting is 0.
card.flavor: Arcanotech medicine will get you through the fight. Afterwards is your problem.

card.title: Chaos Spirit
card.subtitle: Volatile Construct
card.text: At the end of each player's turn, you must inflict 2 damage on a card the player to his or her left controls.
card.flavor: Creating one is a simple spell. Controlling it....

card.title: Chi Reconfiguration
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Smoke a Feng Shui Site you control, and return a Feng Shui Site in your smoked pile to play in the same position as the smoked Site. This may change the target of an attack.
card.flavor: "The only difference between places is the shape of the chi flows."

card.title: Close Call
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Redirect up to 3 damage from a single source that would damage a Character to a Site controlled by that source's controller.
card.flavor: "OK, that was a little too close."

card.title: Combat Veteran
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Play on a <Soldier>, <Military>, or <Trooper> Character you control. Turn a <Battleground> Site you control to give subject +1 Fighting until the end of turn.
card.flavor: Each battle they see makes them a bit tougher to kill.

card.title: Concourse Godard
card.subtitle: Renegade Supersoldier
card.text: Unique. Any opponent's effect that would remove this card from play except by inflicting damage inflicts 3 damage on him instead.
card.flavor: Too much of a maverick, even for the Jammers.

card.title: Consumer on the Brink
card.subtitle: Disgruntled Everyman
card.text: +1 Fighting for each Unique and Limited Site controlled by opponents.
card.flavor: "Can't...you...just...leave...me...alone?"

card.title: Coral Reef
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Turn when you declare an attack :: Draw a card then discard a card. This ability is not cumulative.

card.title: Corruption
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: All opponents' Characters with a cost or Fighting of 4 or greater take 2 damage and turn.
card.flavor: The Lotus have never seen much value in a clean kill.

card.title: Dark Sacrifice
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Steal 1 Power from target opponent. If you could not, that player must sacrifice a Character of his or her choice.
card.flavor: Ming I takes no prisoners - for long.

card.title: Defiant Bloom
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Limited. Turn to remove 1 damage each from up to 3 cards you control.
card.flavor: Even in the Architects' future, hope survives.

card.title: Deja Vu
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Toast It. Immediately play an Event from your smoked pile (at normal cost) and toast that Event.
card.flavor: It's not just a feeling when you're dealing with the Purists.

card.title: Demon Tank
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Vehicle. Subject Character gains Toughness: 1, Regenerate, and +3 Fighting. Smoke subject if it is a <Demon>.
card.flavor: "Do you know how hard it is to stare down a tank when it's staring back?!?"

card.title: Desdemona Deathangel
card.subtitle: Abomination
card.text: Unique. Ambush. Sacrifice a Character to give Desdemona Deathangel +1 Fighting until the end of the turn.

card.title: Destroyer
card.subtitle: Demon Martial Artist
card.text: Unique. Cannot be sacrificed. If Destroyer is in your smoked pile at the start of your turn, return Destroyer to play.
card.flavor: "There's got to be a better way to keep him down!"

card.title: Destroyer Drone
card.subtitle: Arcanowave Robot
card.text: Toughness: 1. Cannot attack Characters. +4 damage against Sites.
card.flavor: While the Buro was distracted, Omega's drones quickly seized the launch platforms.

card.title: Dirk Wisely
card.subtitle: Man of Action
card.text: Unique. Once per turn, you may unturn him at the end of a successful attack in which he was the only attacker.
card.flavor: "Time to save the world again."

card.title: Dump Scrounger
card.subtitle: Netherworld Scavenger
card.text: Turn this card and toast a Character in your smoked pile to gain 1 Power.

card.title: Dunwa Saleem
card.subtitle: Prophet of the Reascension
card.text: Unique. Generates 1 Power during your Establishing Shot if you control another [H] card. Once during your turn, you may look through your deck for a <Reascended> Character, show it to your opponents, and put it in your hand.

card.title: Energy Flail
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Weapon. Play on a Character. Turn and discard a card :: Inflict X damage on target Character at this location. X= the number of [M] resources provided and required by the subject.

card.title: Entropy Sphere
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Smoke target Character and inflict X damage on a front-row Feng Shui Site you control. X= the target's cost.
card.flavor: "Destruction has a price."

card.title: Entropy Tap
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Limited. Play when a Site you control takes combat damage but its Body is not reduced to 0 :: Gain X Power. X= half (round down) the damage inflicted.
card.flavor: Most geomancers will repair damaged chi. The Purists scavenge it.

card.title: Esteban Vicente
card.subtitle: Geomancer Mastermind
card.text: Unique. When this card comes into play, you may rearrange target player's Site structure; you may not change the number of columns.
card.flavor: "Many have tried to defeat him - and failed."

card.title: FAE Schwartz
card.subtitle: Incendiary Fanatic
card.text: Unique. When this card is smoked, inflict X damage on each Character and Site at his location. X= his Fighting unmodified by damage.
card.flavor: "Boom, baby, boom!"

card.title: Fake Out
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play while you are attacking with more than one Character. Target interceptor ceases intercepting, but its controller may choose to intercept a different attacker with it.
card.flavor: "Mooks ain't any brighter in the future."

card.title: Fallen Heroes
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Toast a Character in your smoked pile to give target Character +X Fighting until the end of the turn. X= the number of resources required and provided by the toasted Character.
card.flavor: The roster is always growing, but the Dragons won't surrender.

card.title: Fearsome Foe
card.subtitle: State
card.text: If subject Character is attacking, each opponent who intercepts must intercept it if he or she can.
card.flavor: The tallest nail gets hammered down first.

card.title: Fist of Freedom
card.subtitle: Rebel Martial Artist
card.text: +2 damage against the target of his attack if no interceptors were declared against him this attack.
card.flavor: They went underground when kung fu was banned.

card.title: Fortress Omega
card.subtitle: Site
card.text: Unique. Toughness: 1. When a non-Unique Character enters combat with this Site, inflict 1 damage on that Character. (Before combat damage is dealt.) Turn to play a <Cyborg> or <Drone> Character at -1 cost.

card.title: Fo Shen
card.subtitle: Eunuch Pawn
card.text: Unique. Turn to look at the top card of an opponent's deck. You may toast that card.
card.flavor: Nobody likes failures or traitors. He's both.

card.title: Free Fire Zone
card.subtitle: Battleground Site
card.text: Limited. Any player who seizes this Site gains 2 Power. If this Site is in your front row, gain 1 Power when you smoke a Site.
card.flavor: The outbreak of civil war was just what the Jammers were waiting for.

card.title: Funky Monkey
card.subtitle: Chimp Pimp
card.text: Unique.
card.flavor: The Jammers take "Disco Inferno" literally as the factions battle for the scariest territory of all - The '70s. Strap on your platform shoes and your Saturday Night Special as Boom Chaka Laka, boogies its way to retailers this summer!

card.title: General Olivet
card.subtitle: BuroMil Military Mastermind
card.text: Unique. Tactics. You may play <Soldier>, <BuroMil>, or <Military> Characters during opponents' turns. May attack during opponents' turns, and <Soldier>, <BuroMil>, or <Military> Characters may attack with him.
card.designators: | general olivet buro mil military mastermind |

card.title: Gloating Laughter
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Limited. Play on a Character you control when you seize or burn a Site for victory. Subject gains +1 Fighting, or +2 if it is a <Eunuch>.
card.flavor: "You cannot stop me now! HAHAHAHAHAHA!"

card.title: Got My Mojo Working
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play in response to an opponent's Event. Choose a Character that the Event would damage or smoke :: Unturn that Character, and it is not affected by the Event.
card.flavor: "Did you really think it would be that easy?"

card.title: Hell Charger
card.subtitle: Demon State
card.text: Vehicle. Subject Character gains +3 Fighting. Remove 2 damage from subject at the start of your turn. Turn Hell Charger to change subject's location.
card.flavor: They can outrun a motorcycle and kick through battleship plate.

card.title: Hexagram Spirit
card.subtitle: Sorcerous Construct
card.text: When this card turns to attack, target an opponent and name a card :: Look at that player's hand, and gain 1 Power for each copy of the named card in it.

card.title: Homemade Tank
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Toast It. Vehicle. Subject Character gains Toughness: 1 and +4 Fighting. Flip a coin at the start of your turn. Heads: Toast Homemade Tank.
card.flavor: "The engine's as big a threat as enemy fire."

card.title: Hot Springs
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Turn and maintain and target a Character :: Target takes no damage from Sites, and is not affected by effects generated by other Sites.

card.title: Ice Sorceress
card.subtitle: Geomancer Mastermind
card.text: Turn and maintain to either add 3 or subtract 2 from target Feng Shui Site's Body. If this would reduce the Site's Body below 1, reduce it to 1 instead.

card.title: Identity Chop Shop
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Limited. Turn and maintain to give or remove a designator of your choice from target Character you control. (This is not considered to change a card's title.)
card.flavor: "New ID? No problem, but impersonating a eunuch's going to cost, eh?"

card.title: IFF Missiles
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Target an opponent :: Inflict 2 damage on each Character that opponent controls who does not share a designator with any other Character that player controls.
card.flavor: "Cookie cutter technology just isn't what it's supposed to be."

card.title: Inoue Oram
card.subtitle: Sorcerer Mastermind
card.text: Unique. Gain 1 power at the start of your Main Shot if you drew any cards during your Draw Phase and the number of cards drawn was even.

card.title: Jack of All Trades
card.subtitle: Resourceful Techie
card.text: Turn this card and sacrifice a State :: Search through your deck for a State with a different title. Show it to your opponents and put it in your hand.
card.designators: | jack all trad trade trades resourceful techie |

card.title: Jason X
card.subtitle: Brainwashed Supersoldier
card.text: Unique. Guts. The cost of all [d] Events is increased by 1.
card.flavor: There's very little Jason X left.

card.title: Jet Pack
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Vehicle. Subject Character gains Mobility and +1 Fighting. Turn and flip a coin :: Heads: Subject gains Superleap and +2 Fighting until the end of the turn. Tails: Inflict 3 damage on subject.
card.flavor: "Just what you need for the morning commute."

card.title: Johann Bonengel
card.subtitle: BuroPresident
card.text: Unique. Opponents cannot play States on cards you control while this card is unturned. Turn to gain 2 Power.
card.flavor: He thought he ruled 2062 with absolute authority.

card.title: Johnny Badhair
card.subtitle: Wild Man
card.text: Unique. Guts. Cannot be sacrificed. At the end of a turn in which this card was smoked, cut your deck, draw a card, and show it to your opponents. If the card is a State or a Character with a resource condition, return this card to play.

card.title: Jury-Rigged Dynamo
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Limited. Play on a Site you control. When an opponent gains Power outside of his or her Establishing Shot, you may either unturn this card, or turn it to gain 1 Power.
card.flavor: "You gotta know where to kick it."

card.title: Just a Rat
card.subtitle: Lodge Survivor
card.text: Stealth. Inflict 2 damage on any Character that Just a Rat bypasses using Stealth.
card.flavor: A few still survive, with distant memories of what they used to be.

card.title: Kar Fai's Last Stand
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Faceoff. Turn a Character you control and target an opponent's Character with Fighting no lower than two less than yours. The winner's Character gains Guts and Toughness: 1 until it leaves play.
card.flavor: "You can't win." "I don't need to."

card.title: Kar Fai's Legacy
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play when a Unique Character you control is smoked. Toast that Character :: Gain Power equal to half (round up) of that Character's cost.
card.flavor: Kar Fai stayed behind to save us all.

card.title: Killing Ground
card.subtitle: Battleground Site
card.text: Any player who seizes this site gains 2 Power. If Killing Ground is in your front row, all of your Characters inflict +1 damage on interceptors, and you may play non-Unique 0-cost non-Feng Shui Sites even if you have already played a Site during your turn.

card.title: King Kung
card.subtitle: Cyborg Gorilla
card.text: Unique. If King Kung enters combat with a Site, he enters combat with all Sites at that location simultaneously. (Divide his combat damage among the Sites.)

card.title: Legion of the Damned
card.subtitle: Undead Soldiers
card.text: When Legion of the Damned turns to attack, you may inflict 2 damage on a Site.
card.flavor: The Lotus now use the Architects' forces against them.

card.title: Louie the Roach
card.subtitle: Lodge Survivor
card.text: Unique. Toughness: 2.
card.flavor: "They've tried to kill me more ways than you can imagine, but they ain't succeeded yet."

card.title: Major Hottie
card.subtitle: Ex-Buro Operative
card.text: Unique. All [j] Characters gain Toughness: 1 against combat damage. Turn during an attack :: All [j] Characters inflict +2 damage until the end of the attack.

card.title: Marauder Gang
card.subtitle: Renegade Cyborgs
card.text: At the end of your turn, smoke this card if it did not attack this turn.
card.flavor: Deserters and brigands who thrive in the chaos of 2062.

card.title: Marauder Lord
card.subtitle: Ruthless Cyborg
card.text: When Marauder Lord turns to attack, he gains +1 Fighting until he leaves play.
card.flavor: Petty warlords who carve out tiny empires in the fringes of order.

card.title: Mark IV Fusion Rifle
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Weapon. Play on a Character. Unturn this card when an opponent targets a card you control with an Event or Site. Turn to inflict 3 damage to a Character or Site at subject's location.
card.flavor: "Yeah, it rocks, _if_ you can figure out the manual."

card.title: Master Gardener
card.subtitle: Elderly Geomancer
card.text: Turn and maintain to cancel target Feng Shui Site's effects and rules text.
card.flavor: Quan Lo found the idea of artificial Feng Shui Sites disturbing.

card.title: Master Hao
card.subtitle: Superior Martial Artist
card.text: Unique. You may choose a Character once per turn while Master Hao is attacking. He takes no damage from that Character until the end of the turn.
card.designators: | master hao super ior martial artist |

card.title: Master Mechanic
card.subtitle: Renegade Techie
card.text: Turn during any Main Shot to play a Vehicle from your smoked pile on a card you control at -1 cost.
card.flavor: "Well, I've seen worse... I think."

card.title: MegaTank
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Vehicle. Subject Character gains +7 Fighting and Toughness: 2. Subject cannot be damaged or removed from play by [f] Events.
card.flavor: The only commuter vehicle you can drive on both sidewalks.

card.title: Memory Palace
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: One-Shot. Lay your entire hand on the table, face up. You may play these cards as if they were in your hand, but cannot discard them. These cards are not in play or in your hand.

card.title: Memory Reprocessing
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Toast It. Immediately play an event from target opponent's smoked pile at normal cost; that player gains 1 Power.
card.flavor: The mind is the window to the soul. The Paradox Cube is the brick.

card.title: Memory Spirit
card.subtitle: Psychic Construct
card.text: When any opponent does not discard any cards during his or her Establishing Shot, Memory Spirit gains +1 Fighting until it leaves play.
card.flavor: It feeds on what you won't let go of.

card.title: Misery Totelben
card.subtitle: Insane Musician
card.text: Unique. Uncopyable. -2 damage. Cannot attack, intercept, or turn. Each of your back-row Sites copies the rules text of the Feng Shui Site in front of it.

card.title: Mobile HQ
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Unique. Vehicle. Subject Character gains +3 Fighting and Mobility. If subject is unturned, turn Mobile HQ to heal target Character.
card.flavor: "You have to stay on the move when operating in 2062."

card.title: Motor Pool
card.subtitle: Site
card.text: Generates no Power while turned. Turn to play a Vehicle on a Character you control at -2 cost.
card.flavor: "It's like a supermarket. Megatanks, aisle three...."

card.title: Mount Makarakomburu
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Unique. Cannot be burned. Mount Makarakomburu can be the target of attacks while in the back row.
card.flavor: Location of the first of the Purists' four towers.

card.title: Mutator
card.subtitle: Probability Spirit
card.text: Once per turn, you may raise or lower by one until the end of the turn any number not written as words on another card at this location. This cannot change a number to zero.

card.title: Newest Model
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Not cumulative. The values of all numbers not written as words in the rules text of subject Vehicle or [H] State are increased by one. Any opponent's effect that would directly remove subject from play smokes Newest Model instead.

card.title: Nexus Tower
card.subtitle: Site
card.text: Unique. The number of Feng Shui Sites you need for victory is reduced by one. Once during your turn, you may play a [M] card at +1 cost from your smoked pile, that card is considered to be Toast-It.

card.title: No Man's Land
card.subtitle: Battleground Site
card.text: Any player who seizes this Site gains 2 Power. If this card is in your front row, turn and maintain and target a Character :: That Character's damage cannot be reduced or redirected by opponents.

card.title: Nuked
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Choose an opponent and flip a coin. Tails: repeat the coin flip with the next player to the left. Heads: choose a Site controlled by that player :: Smoke the chosen Site.
card.flavor: "Blow Things Up! Blow Things Up! Blow Things - Wait, not that!"

card.title: Orbital Laser Strike
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Inflict X damage on target Site. X= the number of [H] resources in your pool.
card.flavor: It was sold to the public as a purely defensive technology.

card.title: Paradox Divination
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Look at the top X cards of your deck, and return them in any order. X= the number of [M] resources in your pool.
card.flavor: The Purists see the future as a series of possibilities to be manipulated.

card.title: Parting Gift
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play when an attack you declared on a Site ends if you did not reduce the Site's Body to 0. Inflict 2 damage on the Site and all Characters at that location. (Including any remaining attackers.)
card.flavor: "Here's a present. Don't mind the fuse."

card.title: Portal Nexus
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Schtick. Subject non-Unique Site has +3 Body. Turn to exchange the positions of Feng Shui Sites you control. This may change the target of an attack.
card.flavor: The heart of the four towers constructed by the Purists.

card.title: Primus
card.subtitle: Master of Paradox
card.text: Unique. When Primus enters play, target an opponent, who cannot respond with Events :: Target player cannot play cards this turn.
card.flavor: "Nothing can stop us from reshaping the world."

card.title: Purist Aspirant
card.subtitle: Expendable Lackey
card.text: Sacrifice to reduce to 0 all non-combat damage from a single source to Characters you control.

card.title: Purist Initiate
card.subtitle: Student Sorcerer
card.text: Your <Purist> cards in play, your hand, your deck, and your smoked pile require and provide [p] instead of [f] and [e]. This card's rules text is still active in your smoked pile.

card.title: Quantum Sorcery
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Turn this card and a [M] Character you control :: Gain one Power or draw a card.
card.flavor: "The Purists have developed a system of magic unlike any I have seen before." - Fo Shen

card.title: Raptor Squad
card.subtitle: Blood-Thirsty Abominations
card.text: Ambush. If Raptor Squad attacks, it does not unturn during your next Establishing Shot.
card.flavor: "If only they didn't stop to eat everything they kill."
card.designators: | raptor squad blood thirsty abomination abominations |

card.title: Rebel Consumer
card.subtitle: Freedom Fighter
card.text: +3 damage against cards controlled by a player who is closer to victory than you.
card.flavor: The Hand are recruiting in 2062.

card.title: Replacement Parts
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Remove up to three damage on subject Character when you play this card. Subject gains +1 Fighting and the designator <Cyborg>.
card.flavor: Like new, only better.

card.title: Rhys Engel
card.subtitle: Purist Mastermind
card.text: Unique. Once per turn, you may discard a card to cancel a Feng Shui Site until the end of the turn or reveal a Feng Shui Site.
card.flavor: Leave Zhang to his demons. We'll show him true power!

card.title: SAM Simian
card.subtitle: Destructive Primate
card.text: Once during your Main Shot you may inflict 2 damage to a Site you control :: SAM Simian gains +2 Fighting until the end of the turn.
card.flavor: Like a bull in a china shop. With missiles.

card.title: Secret Laboratory
card.subtitle: Site
card.flavor: Access to the latest fruits of the military-industrial complex is essential to the secret warrior.

card.title: Sergeant Blightman
card.subtitle: Mutating Soldier
card.text: Unique. Toast It. Cannot turn to heal. Inflict 3 damage on Sergeant Blightman at the start of your turn.
card.flavor: "A good soldier will volunteer for anything."

card.title: Serket
card.subtitle: Reascended Scorpion
card.text: Unique. Opponents cannot declare only one interceptor against Serket. When Serket is intercepted, you choose the order of her interceptors. You may pay 1 Power to inflict 2 damage on any Character which is intercepting her.

card.title: Shaolin Agent
card.subtitle: Undercover Monk
card.text: When Shaolin Agent turns to attack, he gains +X Fighting until he leaves play. X= the number of opponents' cards at his target's location minus 3. X cannot be less than 0.

card.title: Simian Sneaker
card.subtitle: Primate Saboteur
card.text: +1 damage to Sites. Return this card to play when a Site you own is seized.
card.flavor: Sometimes even the Jammers are subtle.

card.title: Smart Missile
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Enters play turned. Turn and sacrifice to inflict 6 damage on target turned Site or target Character that is the subject of a Vehicle.

card.title: Snowblind
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Limited. Toast-It. Target attacker ceases attacking.
card.flavor: Pi Tui doesn't need armies to defend herself.

card.title: Spawn of the New Flesh
card.subtitle: Unstable Abomination
card.text: Unique. Ambush. X= the number of columns in your Site structure.

card.title: Spirit Guardian
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Limited. Turn when an opponent smokes a Character you control to inflict 2 damage on a Character he or she controls.
card.flavor: Tortured souls bound to their sorcerous masters.

card.title: Spirit Shield Generator
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Subject Character gains Toughness: 1. Reduce all non-combat damage inflicted on subject to 0. Damage cannot be redirected to subject.
card.flavor: "I had him dead to rights, but I didn't expect my bullets to get eaten right out of the air."

card.title: Spit and Baling Wire
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Return a Vehicle, Weapon, or [H] State in your smoked pile to play on a Character you control. At the end of the turn, toast that State, even if it is in your smoked pile.
card.flavor: "We should be OK as long as nobody looks at it funny."

card.title: Superior Mastery
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: You may play States on cards you control during any Main Shot.

card.title: Tank Commander
card.subtitle: BuroMil Officer
card.text: You may play <Tank> States on this card at -1 cost. +1 Fighting and Tactics while the subject of a <Tank> State.
card.flavor: "Keep your abominations, this is all I need right here."

card.title: Temporal Realignment
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Toast It. Toast X cards from your smoked pile to shuffle X cards from your smoked pile into your deck.
card.flavor: The masters of paradox know that nothing is immutable, including the past.

card.title: The Dogs of War
card.subtitle: Veteran Soldiers
card.text: +1 Fighting while you control a <Battleground> Site.
card.flavor: They don't cry havoc, they just wreak it.
card.designators: | the dog dogs war veteran soldier soldiers |

card.title: The Pinnacles
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Unique. Place a counter on this card at the end of a successful attack you declared. Remove 3 counters :: Gain 1 Power.
card.flavor: The completion of the fourth tower cemented the Purists' power.

card.title: Thing with a 1000 Tongues
card.subtitle: Abhorrent Abomination
card.text: Unique. Toughness: 2. Regenerate. At the beginning of your Main Shot, sacrifice another Character. If you cannot, turn this card.
card.flavor: Omega used him as a trap for the Dragons.
card.designators: | thing 1000 tongu tongue tongues abhorrent abomination |

card.title: Thunder Swordsman
card.subtitle: Netherworld Knight
card.text: Guts while he is the subject of a <Sword> State.
card.flavor: "Guns are for cowards. This is the weapon of a real warrior."
card.designators: | thunder sword swords man netherworld knight |

card.title: Training Camp
card.subtitle: Battleground Site
card.text: Any player who seizes this card gains 2 Power. If Training Camp is in your front row, turn it to return a <Soldier> Character from your smoked pile to your hand.

card.title: Tunneler Drone
card.subtitle: Arcanowave Robot
card.text: Toughness: 1. May attack back row Sites. The rules text of any Site targeted by Tunneler Drone in an attack is canceled until the end of the attack.

card.title: Ursus
card.subtitle: Reascended Bear
card.text: Unique. Takes no damage from damaged cards.
card.flavor: "We will face the Architects on their own terms."

card.title: Vivisection Agenda
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Limited. Until the end of the turn, gain 1 Power when you sacrifice a card.
card.flavor: They created the nanotech virus that Homo Omega would use to reshape humanity in his image.

card.title: Void Sorcerer
card.subtitle: Mysterious Geomancer
card.text: Target a Site when Void Sorcerer enters play :: Treat that Site's rules text as if it were blank while Void Sorcerer is in play.

card.title: Yung Chang
card.subtitle: Master of the Gardeners
card.text: Unique. Choose a Site you control when Yung Chang enters play. That Site generates an additional Power until you lose control of it. Pay 1 Power to heal a Site.

card.title: Zen Logician
card.subtitle: Esoteric Numerologist
card.text: Your hand size is reduced by 1. Generates 1 Power during your Establishing Shot.
card.flavor: "Power is knowledge."

card.title: Big Ass Car
card.subtitle: Gas-Guzzling State
card.text: Vehicle. Subject Character gains +1 Fighting. Turn to give subject Mobility and Toughness: 1 until the end of the turn.
card.flavor: "There ain't no gas shortage. We got enough to get to Chin's lair with a little left over for Molotovs."
card.designators: | big as ass car ga gas guzzling |

card.title: Big Daddy Voodoo
card.subtitle: Hood Sorcerer
card.text: Unique. Once each turn, you may spend damage counters on him as if they were Power while playing <Hood> cards.

card.title: Big Rig
card.subtitle: Truck State
card.text: Vehicle. Subject Character gains Mobility. Redirect damage inflicted on subject to Big Rig. When Big Rig has 4 damage counters on it, immediately smoke it and inflict all excess damage on subject.

card.title: Billy Chow
card.subtitle: Undercover Shaolin
card.text: Unique. Superleap. You may cancel an Event by discarding a [C] card with a cost equal to that of the Event.
card.flavor: Chin's army had to be stopped from within.

card.title: Binary Spirit
card.subtitle: Duality Construct
card.text: Once each Main Shot, you may either inflict 1 damage, which cannot be reduced or redirected, on Binary Spirit to draw a card, or discard a card to heal 1 damage from Binary Spirit.

card.title: Brick House
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Subject Character gains Toughness: 1.
card.flavor: She's mighty, mighty.

card.title: Buffalo Soldier
card.subtitle: Rasta Rebel
card.text: +3 damage against <Buro> Characters. Other Characters you control with a cost of 2 or less are not affected by opponents' Events.
card.flavor: The Jammers recruited from the fringes of society.

card.title: Burn, Baby, Burn!
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Limited. At the end of your turn, inflict 1 damage on each damaged Site.
card.flavor: "I got your 'Disco Inferno' right here!"

card.title: Car Wash
card.subtitle: Site
card.text: Turn to heal a Character that is the subject of a Vehicle.
card.flavor: "The deluxe wax and the white-glove shine do wonders."

card.title: CB Radio
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Schtick. Play on a Character. All Characters you control gain Tactics. Once per turn you may unturn subject when it uses Tactics.
card.flavor: "That's a 10-4, good buddy. We got bears up on the Interstate."

card.title: Che Gorilla
card.subtitle: Rebel Mastermind
card.text: Unique. X= the number of cards in target opponents smoked pile at the time Che Gorilla enters play.
card.flavor: He gives new meaning to the term "Banana Republic."

card.title: Chinese Connection
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Once per turn you may give an opponent 1 Power to heal target card.
card.flavor: Chinatown is all about who you know.

card.title: Chin's Criminal Network
card.subtitle: Hood Event
card.text: Limited. Gain 1 Power for every three <Hood> cards in play.
card.flavor: Crime does pay.

card.title: Chop Shop
card.subtitle: Hood Site
card.text: Sacrifice a Vehicle and turn to gain Power equal to the Vehicle's cost.
card.flavor: From sports car to spare parts in no time flat.

card.title: Claws
card.subtitle: Unkillable Hood Bruiser
card.text: Unique. Toughness: 2. Play if you control a <Hood> card. Not affected by Stealth, Assassinate, or <Operation> Events. Characters lose Ambush until the end of combat when they enter combat with Claws.

card.title: Curtis Graham
card.subtitle: Urban Revolutionary
card.text: Unique. Turn to inflict 3 damage on target Site.
card.flavor: Potemkin's plan was too much for him to stomach.

card.title: Da Boys
card.subtitle: Hood Enforcers
card.text: X= the number of cards controlled by target opponent at the time Da Boys enter play.
card.flavor: "Round up the boys. We've got a war to fight."
card.designators: | da boy boys hood enforcer enforcers |

card.title: Death Ring
card.subtitle: Underground Hood Site
card.text: Unique. Turn this card and a Character you control, and target an opponent's Character with Fighting no lower than two less than your Character's :: The two Characters enter a Faceoff.

card.title: Dirty Tricks
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Target two opponents. Each looks at the other's hand, and must secretly choose a card to force him or her to discard.
card.flavor: One little bug can create all kinds of trouble.

card.title: Disco
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Limited. Immediately choose a designator when this Site is revealed or seized. Turn when an opponent plays a card with that designator to gain 1 Power.
card.flavor: The bass won't be the only thing thumping tonight!

card.title: Disco Inferno
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Inflict 4 damage on target Site.
card.flavor: "Burn that mother down!"

card.title: Doctor Zaius
card.subtitle: Weird Monkey Scientist
card.text: Unique. When Doctor Zaius smokes a Character by inflicting combat damage, flip a coin. Heads: return the Character to play under your control.
card.designators: | doctor zaiu zaius weird monkey scientist |

card.title: "Do You Feel Lucky, Punk?"
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Flip a coin until you get a total of two Heads :: Inflict X damage on target Character. X= the number of flips minus 1.
card.flavor: "Well, do ya?"

card.title: Earth, Wind, and Fire
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Heal all cards you control. Inflict X damage on target Character. X= the amount of damage healed.

card.title: Everybody Was Kung Fu Fighting
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Play if you control a <Martial>, <Monk>, or <Temple> card. All Characters inflict +1 damage. Smoke this card when you turn a non-Character card.
card.designators: | everybody wa was kung fu fighting |

card.title: Evil Master
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Limited. Play on a Character if you control a <Martial> Character. Subject gains +6 Fighting and the designator <Master>.
card.flavor: Master Chin was determined to control all of San Francisco.

card.title: Fast as Lightning
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play during an attack. Target Character has Ambush against the next Character it enters combat with this attack.
card.flavor: It was a little bit fright'ning!

card.title: Fatty Cho
card.subtitle: Chubby Cop
card.text: Unique. X= the number of cards you discard when you play Fatty Cho.
card.flavor: "He looks heavy, but man, can he move!"

card.title: Fire in the Sky
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Sacrifice a Character to smoke target Character.
card.flavor: "Smells like victory."

card.title: Fists of Fury
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Target an attacker you control. Until the end of the attack, when target inflicts combat damage on a Character, you may inflict an equal amount of damage on another Character at that location.

card.title: Five Fingers of Death
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Subject Character inflicts +2 damage. When subject smokes a Character by inflicting combat damage, toast that Character instead.
card.flavor: "I shall enjoy killing you myself."

card.title: Fox On the Run
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play after an unsuccessful attack. The attack is considered to be a success. You may unturn one Character that was an attacker in that attack.
card.flavor: Serena found the plans, but the Jammers found her.

card.title: Funky Monkey
card.subtitle: Chimp Pimp
card.text: Unique. Opponents cannot steal Power from you. Once each turn, you may give another [j] Character +1 Fighting until the end of the turn.

card.title: Good Ol' Boys
card.subtitle: Righteous Rednecks
card.text: +1 Fighting for every 3 [d] resources in your pool.
card.flavor: "Someday the mountain might get 'em, but the law never will."
card.designators: | good ol boy boys righteou righteous redneck rednecks |

card.title: Heavy Machine Gun
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Weapon. Play on a Vehicle. When the subject of that Vehicle enters combat, you may turn this card to inflict 4 damage, divided any way you choose, on Characters at this location. (Before combat damage is dealt.)
card.flavor: Fifty caliber of pure ballistic mayhem.

card.title: Ice Shaman
card.subtitle: Netherworld Sorcerer
card.text: Turn to inflict 1 damage on any Character. Turn to remove 1 damage from any Character.

card.title: Ice Totem
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Limited. Turn to heal a Character you control.
card.flavor: Pi Tui's followers receive the blessings of their ancestors.

card.title: Ice Vixen
card.subtitle: Stone Cold Fox
card.text: Heal Ice Vixen when a State is played on her.
card.flavor: She's cold as ice.

card.title: Isis Fox
card.subtitle: Soul Sister
card.text: Unique. Each time you declare an attack, Isis Fox gains +1 Fighting until she leaves play.
card.flavor: She's out for vengeance!

card.title: Jack Hades
card.subtitle: Motorcycle Daredevil
card.text: Unique. While the subject of a Vehicle, he gains +1 Fighting, Independent, and Guts. You may sacrifice a Vehicle on him to cancel an Event targeting him that would damage, smoke, or toast him.
card.designators: | jack had hade hades motorcycle daredevil |

card.title: John Tower
card.subtitle: One Bad Mother
card.text: Unique. Independent. When an opponent targets John Tower with an effect, you may play one Character in response. You may spend damage counters on him as if they were Power while doing so.

card.title: Kung Fu Prodigy
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Subject Character gains the designators <Martial> and <Artist>. You may turn any [C] State on subject to reduce any damage inflicted on subject by 2.
card.flavor: They call him the "Chinatown Kid."

card.title: Life in the Fast Lane
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play when a Vehicle leaves play. Inflict 3 damage on all Characters and Sites at the Vehicle's location.
card.flavor: "Call the doctor, I think I'm gonna crash."

card.title: Mad Monkey Kung Fu
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Subject Character gains +3 Fighting. Subject gains Toughness: 2 against damage from non-Character cards.
card.flavor: When Monkey Kung Fu just isn't enough.

card.title: Magnum Justice
card.subtitle: Cop Edge
card.text: Limited. Turn and maintain to give target <Cop> Character +3 damage to Characters.
card.flavor: No appeals.

card.title: Maverick Trucker
card.subtitle: Blue-Collar Hero
card.text: Guts. Toughness: 1. You may play a Vehicle on Maverick Trucker at -1 cost.
card.flavor: It's a tough life, what with Smokeys, "white line fever" and bare-knuckle brawlin'.

card.title: Max Brunner
card.subtitle: Pledged Cop
card.text: Unique. You may treat <Cop> and <Pledged> as matching designators.
card.flavor: The most corrupt cop in San Francisco.

card.title: Mr. Simms
card.subtitle: Hood Lieutenant
card.text: Unique. Once per turn, you may redirect damage inflicted by a non-Character source on a card you control to any Character controlled by the player who controlled the source of the damage.

card.title: Napalm Sunrise
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play during your turn. Inflict 2 damage on each Character and Site at target location.
card.flavor: "Normally oranges and greens together clash, but I think it works here."

card.title: Night Moves
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Limited. Characters intercepting your Characters inflict -1 damage. All opponents gain 2 Power when this card leaves play.

card.title: Nuclear Power Plant
card.subtitle: Site
card.text: Limited. You cannot turn Sites at this location.
card.flavor: "An accident? It's all media hype. Trust me, there's nothing to worry about."

card.title: Nunchuks
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Weapon. Turn to inflict 3 damage, divided any way you choose, on Characters at subject Character's location.
card.flavor: Seems like everybody's got a pair of these things nowadays.

card.title: Outlaw Bikers
card.subtitle: Easy Riders
card.text: Mobility. Once during your Main Shot, you may play a Weapon or Vehicle from your smoked pile on Outlaw Bikers.
card.flavor: They're born losers.
card.designators: | outlaw biker bikers easy rider riders |

card.title: Partners
card.subtitle: Cop State
card.text: Play on a <Cop> Character you control and choose another <Cop> Character. Both Characters gain +1 Fighting. When either Character is smoked, unturn the other, and it gains +1 Fighting until it leaves play.

card.title: Pinball Arcade
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: When an attack you declared succeeds, turn to inflict 1 damage on any card in play.
card.flavor: "He sure plays a mean pinball."

card.title: Political Corruption
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Generates 1 Power if you control at least one Feng Shui Site.
card.flavor: Watergate was just a distraction.

card.title: Punks
card.subtitle: Anarchist Rebels
card.text: +2 damage against Unique cards.
card.flavor: "Disco sucks!"

card.title: Rama Singh
card.subtitle: Freaky Sorcerer
card.text: Unique. When Rama Singh enters play, return an Edge in your smoked pile to play.
card.flavor: "The dawning of a new age is upon us."

card.title: Real Bad Cat
card.subtitle: State of Mind
card.text: Subject Character gains +3 Fighting and Independent.
card.flavor: "That's right, I'm bad!"

card.title: Righteous Bro
card.subtitle: Shaolin Brother
card.text: Superleap. When an opponent generates 6 or more Power, steal 1 Power from that player.

card.title: Rocket Man
card.subtitle: Cyborg
card.text: While attacking, Rocket Man gains Toughness: X and +X damage. X= the number of unturned Characters and turned Sites at his target's location.

card.title: Roller Rink
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Turn to return to your hand a Character in your smoked pile whose cost is less than the amount of damage on this card.
card.flavor: When regular Disco just isn't enough!

card.title: Rookies
card.subtitle: Idealistic Cops
card.text: When this card is targeted or smoked by an opponent's non-Character card, you may gain 1 Power or play up to 2 <Cop> or <Police> cards at -1 cost.
card.designators: | rooky rook rookies idealistic cop cops |

card.title: Serena Chase
card.subtitle: Transformed Stone Fox
card.text: Unique. Stealth. If she is attacking a card controlled by a player who controls 3 or more Sites, gain 1 Power when she damages her target.
card.flavor: Supermodel, jet-setter, black belt, and freelance spy.

card.title: Silver Jet
card.subtitle: Secret Warrior
card.text: Unique.
card.flavor: This fall, you are cordially invited to Red Wedding, the marriage of the Ice Queen to Silver Jet. Anyone who has cause why this marriage should not take place, open fire now or forever hold your peace.

card.title: Simian Liberation Army
card.subtitle: Anarchist Apes
card.text: +3 damage during the turn they enter play. Gain 2 Power when this card smokes a Character with a printed Fighting greater than 7.
card.designators: | simian liberation army anarchist ap ape apes |

card.title: Smoke on the Water
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play when you declare an attack. No player may turn more than one Character to change location this attack.
card.flavor: "No, there isn't a purple principle."

card.title: Snake Fighter
card.subtitle: Hood Martial Artist
card.text: You may inflict 2 damage on a Character at his location when he smokes a Character by inflicting combat damage.

card.title: Soul Doctor
card.subtitle: Ice Priest
card.text: Sacrifice to heal a Character you control.
card.flavor: The path to spiritual purity doesn't come cheap.

card.title: Spencer's Beauties
card.subtitle: Foxy Heroines
card.text: Unique. Independent. Guts. Mobility.
card.flavor: "Good morning, Beauties, I have an assignment for you...."
card.designators: | spencer spencers beauty beaut beauties foxy heroin heroine heroines |

card.title: Spies Everywhere
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Unique. When an opponent targets you, or targets or attacks a card you control, you may look at his or her hand.

card.title: Stick it to The Man!
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Cancel an effect that cancels.
card.flavor: "Take this bomb and shove it!"

card.title: Strange Magic
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Cannot be played during an attack. Change the location of all Characters one column to the left, if possible.
card.flavor: While the battle raged, Rama Singh simply walked into the Monkey House.

card.title: Street Fighter
card.subtitle: Martial Artist
card.text: Guts. Target another Character when Street Fighter enters play. That Character gains +2 Fighting while Street Fighter is in play.
card.flavor: No flashy moves; just deadly force.

card.title: Street Gang
card.subtitle: Young Hoods
card.text: Mobility. Once per turn, you may redirect damage inflicted on this card by an opponent's non-Character card to any Site in play.

card.title: Superfreak
card.subtitle: Abomination
card.text: Unique. While attacking, Superfreak inflicts half (round down) its combat damage as if it had Ambush, and the rest normally. Each is considered to be a separate source of damage.

card.title: Swinging With the Hand
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Redirect all damage inflicted by an opponent's non-Character card to target card.
card.flavor: The Hand don't dance, but they do groove.

card.title: Taggert
card.subtitle: Streetwise Cop
card.text: Unique. Independent. When an opponent turns a Site or plays an Event while Taggert is turned, Taggert gains +1 Fighting until he leaves play.

card.title: The Big Boss
card.subtitle: Hood Mastermind
card.text: Unique. During your Main Shot, you may play one State, Site, Edge, or Character from your smoked pile if it has the designator <Hood>.
card.flavor: "Chin has been a thorn in my side for too long."
card.designators: | the big bos boss hood mastermind |

card.title: The Discombobulator
card.subtitle: Weird Science State
card.text: Unique. Schtick. Play on a Site you control. Turn and maintain to blank the rules text of all Sites at target location.
card.flavor: When Dr. Zaius turned it on, it opened a portal to the '70s.

card.title: The Man
card.subtitle: Lodge Chairperson
card.text: Unique. Once during each opponent's Main Shot, you may play an Edge, Character, or Site.
