card.flavor: It ain't easy to take down The Man: that's why he's The Man.

card.title: The Mantis
card.subtitle: Martial Artist Assassin
card.text: Unique. Assassinate. Toughness: 2 against damage that is equal to or less than his Fighting. You may inflict 1 damage on any Character when he smokes a Unique Character.
card.designators: | the manti mantis martial artist assassin |

card.title: The Nefarious Master Chin
card.subtitle: Hood Mastermind
card.text: Unique. Toughness: 2 while in a Faceoff. Gain 1 Power when you win a Faceoff.
card.flavor: "My army is of an enormous magnitude. Join us, and you will have my eternal gratitude."
card.designators: | the nefariou nefarious master chin hood mastermind |

card.title: The Suits
card.subtitle: Pledged Agents
card.text: +2 damage against Unique cards. If you have [a] [a] [a] [a] in your pool, you may discard this card to look at an opponent's hand.
card.flavor: "You never saw this, and you never saw us."
card.designators: | the suit suits pledged agent agents |

card.title: The White Leopard Club
card.subtitle: Tacky Hood Site
card.text: Unique. +X Body. X= the number of <Hood> Characters in your smoked pile. Turn during any Main Shot to cancel a 0-cost Event.
card.flavor: Where all the scum congregate.
card.designators: | the white leopard club tacky hood |

card.title: Throwdown in Chinatown
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play during your Main Shot. Each player, starting with you and proceeding clockwise, may inflict up to 2 damage, divided any way they choose, on Characters.
card.flavor: Everyone's invited.

card.title: Time Keeps On Slipping
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Limited. Play at the start of your turn. Your cards generate twice as much Power this Establishing Shot. Skip your Main Shot.
card.flavor: "The future is as much of a resource as the past."

card.title: Vassals of Chin
card.subtitle: Hood Martial Artists
card.text: When Vassals of Chin turn to attack, they gain +X Fighting until the end of the attack. X= the number of other <Hood> and <Punk> attackers.
card.designators: | vassal vassals chin hood martial artist artists |

card.title: Walk on the Wild Side
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Play on a <Lodge> or <Transformed> Character. All damage inflicted on subject by [M] cards is increased by 1. While attacking, subject gains +2 Fighting and Toughness: 1.
card.flavor: Some Lodge members are too close to their true nature.

card.title: We Got the Funk
card.subtitle: Superfly Edge
card.text: Unique. Enters play turned. Cannot unturn unless you have six [d] in your pool. Gain 3 Power the first time this card unturns. Turn and sacrifice to search through your deck for a Unique [d] Character, show it to opponents, and put it into your hand.

card.title: We Have the Technology
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Limited. Place a counter on this card at the end of your turn. You may spend these counters as if they were Power while playing non-Character [H] cards.
card.flavor: "Bionics? What do you think this is, the '70s?"

card.title: "You Have Offended Shaolin!"
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Target Character gains Superleap until the end of the turn. When a Site you control is seized, you may return this card to your hand.
card.flavor: "Prepare to die!"

card.title: Zodiac Lounge
card.subtitle: Hood Site
card.text: Unique. If Zodiac Lounge is in the front row, Characters at its location that turn to attack inflict +1 damage until the end of the attack.
card.flavor: '70s style with '60s sensibilities.

card.title: Abominable Lab
card.subtitle: Site
card.text: Abominable Lab provides one [H] resource for each <Buro> Character and each <PubOrd> Character you control.
card.flavor: The CDCA continually breeds new abominations to fight in the civil war.

card.title: Alabaster Javelin
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Weapon. When subject Character is smoked, you may inflict 3 damage on any target.
card.flavor: The provincial official regretted the day he confiscated the alchemist's spear.

card.title: Amulet of the Turtle
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Play on a Character. Redirect all damage inflicted on subject to this card. Smoke Amulet of the Turtle when it accumulates X damage; any damage in excess of X is immediately inflicted on subject. X= the number of [M] resources in your pool.

card.title: Arcane Scientist
card.subtitle: Initiate of Paradox
card.text: Turn to draw a card during your Main Shot.
card.flavor: Unbound by the traditions of the Lotus, the Purists took a radical approach to magic.

card.title: Arcanotank
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Vehicle. Subject Character gains +3 Fighting and Toughness: 1. Turn Arcanotank to inflict 1 damage on all Characters at Arcanotank's location.
card.flavor: A living engine of destruction.

card.title: Assault Squad
card.subtitle: BuroMil Soldiers
card.text: Play at no cost when an opponent declares an attack with 2 or more Characters on a card you control. If you do so, this card must intercept the attack.
card.designators: | assault squad buro mil soldier soldiers |

card.title: Avenging Thunder
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: One-Shot. Play when an opponent seizes or burns for victory a Site you control. Choose a Character that damaged that Site this turn :: Gain Power equal to that Character's cost and toast it.
card.flavor: Foes forget the Thunder King's vast sorcerous power.

card.title: Bag Full of Guns
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Weapon. Turn to give +2 damage until the end of the turn to all Characters you control at subject Character's location.
card.flavor: You can never have enough guns.

card.title: Big Brother Tsien
card.subtitle: Demon Hood
card.text: Unique. Once per turn, you may pay 1 Power to give Big Brother Tsien +3 Fighting until the end of the turn.

card.title: Birdhouse Cafe
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: At the end of your turn, if any opponent is at least as close to victory as you are, unturn all Characters that attacked during the turn.
card.flavor: "The sign says that the parrot packs a .45, and in this place I'm not so sure that's an exaggeration."

card.title: Bird Sanctuary
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Limited. Cannot be healed except when seized. Once each turn, you may inflict 1 damage on this card when an opponent smokes a Character you control that is not a 1-cost foundation :: Gain 1 Power.

card.title: Blade of Darkness
card.subtitle: Netherworld Killer
card.text: When Blade of Darkness smokes an interceptor by inflicting combat damage, gain Power equal to the number of resources that interceptor provides.
card.designators: | blade darkness darknes darkne darkn netherworld killer |

card.title: Blade Palm
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Return target card to its owner's hand.
card.flavor: The ancient art of the Blade Palm is known by few, but feared by all.

card.title: Bleys Fontaine
card.subtitle: Lodge Enforcer
card.text: Unique. Cannot be declared as a single attacker. Once during your Main Shot, you may target a location :: All cards at that location become turned.
card.flavor: "Some moles like secrecy. I prefer the direct approach."

card.title: Blood Reaver
card.subtitle: Killer Abomination
card.text: Takes no damage from the target of its attack.
card.flavor: One of the CDCA's worst successes.

card.title: Blue Monk
card.subtitle: Kung Fu Infiltrator
card.text: Choose a designator when Blue Monk enters play. Blue Monk cannot be intercepted by Characters with the chosen designator.
card.flavor: The Blue Principle is the Principle of Obscurement.

card.title: Bomb Factory
card.subtitle: Site
card.text: Turn and maintain to give target Character +1 damage to Sites.
card.flavor: With the Monkey House gone, the Jammers went to ground.

card.title: Both Guns Blazing
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Subject Character gains +1 Fighting for each Weapon on it. Draw a card when you play a Weapon on subject. No Character may be the subject of more than one "Both Guns Blazing".

card.title: Brain Fire
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play in response to an Event. Choose an equal number of new and different legal targets for that Event :: These targets replace the original targets of that Event.

card.title: Bulletproof Monk
card.subtitle: Martial Artist
card.text: Toughness: 1 while attacking.
card.flavor: The Hand have learned how to deal with guns.

card.title: Bull Market
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: All players gain 5 Power.
card.flavor: When the Unspoken Name sneezes, the Dow Jones index says "Gesundheit."

card.title: Buro Godhammer
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Weapon. Subject Character inflicts +3 damage.
card.flavor: In 2062, God is dead, and the Architects have his hammer.

card.title: Butterfly Knight
card.subtitle: Thunder Warrior
card.text: If unturned, Butterfly Knight may attack without turning once during your Main Shot.
card.flavor: The elite guardians of the Thunder Pagoda.

card.title: Captain Liu
card.subtitle: Pledged Cop Mastermind
card.text: Unique. Tactics. All <Cop> Characters you control gain Toughness: 1.
card.flavor: Law without justice.

card.title: Cave Network
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: If you control no Characters when an attack is declared against Cave Network, you may turn Cave Network to play a Character with a cost of 3 or less at no cost.

card.title: CDCA Scientist
card.subtitle: Overzealous Researcher
card.text: When CDCA Scientist is smoked, you may draw up to X cards, then discard up to X cards. You need not discard the same number that you draw. X= the number of "CDCA Scientist" cards you control plus the number in your smoked pile.

card.title: CHAR
card.subtitle: BuroMil Cyborg
card.text: CHAR's combat damage cannot be reduced or redirected. CHAR takes no damage from <Fire> cards.
card.flavor: The most feared weapon in the Architects' arsenal.

card.title: City Hospital
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Turn to remove 1 damage from a Character. Unturn this card when a Character you control is smoked.
card.flavor: All secret warriors eventually end up here, or in the morgue.

card.title: City Park
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Heal City Park at the end of the turn it is revealed. When a Site you control is burned, you may play City Park face up at no cost if you have not played a Site this turn.

card.title: City Square
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Unique. Turn to redirect the damage inflicted by a single source on target Site to any Site you control.
card.flavor: The city's chi flow is channeled and magnified by the many streets that converge here.

card.title: Claw of Fury
card.subtitle: Shadowy Assassin
card.text: Assassinate. When an opponent targets you (not a card or location you control) with an Event, you may play Claw of Fury from your hand at no cost.

card.title: Claws of Darkness
card.subtitle: Triumvirate State
card.text: Weapon. Subject Character gains +1 Fighting. If subject is still in play at the end of any turn in which it smoked one or more Characters by inflicting combat damage, you gain 1 Power.
card.flavor: It only takes one scratch.
card.designators: | claw claws darkness darknes darkne darkn triumvirate |

card.title: Close Call
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Redirect up to 3 damage from a single source that would damage a Character to a Site controlled by that source's controller.
card.flavor: "OK, that was a little too close."

card.title: Cognitive Spirit
card.subtitle: Self-Aware Construct
card.text: Select a Character when this card attacks :: That Character may not intercept until the end of the attack.

card.title: Confucian Stability
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play in response to an Event or State :: Cancel and smoke that card.
card.flavor: Chance is only for those who have not embraced the Principle of Principles.

card.title: Curio Shop
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Takes no damage from opponents' cards that have a cost of 1.
card.flavor: "You've gotta have good chi to keep this much crockery intact."

card.title: Dallas Rocket
card.subtitle: Fanatic Guerrilla
card.text: Ambush against <PubOrd> or <Buro> Characters. Dallas Rocket inflicts +3 damage on the target of her attack.
card.flavor: "I was in the Dallas uprisings. This is nothing."

card.title: Dangerous Experiment
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Limited. Toast It. You gain 5 Power, and the opponent to your left may toast a card you control, a card in your smoked pile, or a card in your burned-for-victory pile.
card.flavor: The CDCA became ever more reckless as the civil war raged.

card.title: Darkness Warriors
card.subtitle: Netherworld Soldiers
card.text: Sacrifice to gain 1 Power.
card.flavor: They would willingly die for their Queen, and they do; both on the battlefield and on the altar.
card.designators: | darkness darknes darkne darkn warrior warriors netherworld soldier soldiers |

card.title: Death-O-Rama
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play during an attack. All Characters inflict +2 damage on Characters during the attack.
card.flavor: Lisa shouldn't have taken the extra propane tanks to the rendezvous.

card.title: Derek Han
card.subtitle: Martial Artist
card.text: Unique. Pay 1 Power to give him Superleap until the end of the turn. Pay 2 Power :: He is not affected by Events until the end of the turn.
card.flavor: Shih Ho Kuai's best student.

card.title: Die!!!
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Turn X [e] Characters you control to smoke any number of opponents' Characters whose total cost is less than X+2. (X may be zero.)
card.flavor: "They dare to defy me? Kill them! Kill them all!"

card.title: Dirk Wisely's Gambit
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Limited. Play when you declare an attack with only one attacker against a target controlled by an opponent who controls at least four cards. When your attacker inflicts combat damage on its target during this attack, gain 2 Power.

card.title: Discerning Fire
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Smoke X target cards that share a designator other than <Netherworld>. X must be greater than one. Power-generating Sites are not legal targets.

card.title: Drug Lab
card.subtitle: Hood Site
card.text: Limited. Smoke Drug Lab when it is damaged by a <Cop> card.
card.flavor: There's always been a brisk business selling fools their own destruction.

card.title: Edge Warrior
card.subtitle: Subversive Op
card.text: Cannot be intercepted by <Buro>, <PubOrd>, or <Cop> Characters.
card.flavor: She can sniff the whiff of law enforcement at a hundred paces.

card.title: Entropy Sphere
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Smoke target Character and inflict X damage on a front-row Feng Shui Site you control. X= the target's cost.
card.flavor: "Destruction has its price."

card.title: Entropy Tap
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Limited. Play when a Site you control takes combat damage but its Body is not reduced to 0 :: Gain X Power. X= half (round down) the damage inflicted.
card.flavor: Most geomancers will repair damaged chi. The Purists scavenge it.

card.title: Everyday Hero
card.subtitle: Brave Scrapper
card.text: Guts.
card.flavor: If justice is to prevail in the secret war, ordinary people all around the world must stand up for what's right.

card.title: Ex-Commando
card.subtitle: Dangerous Vet
card.text: Ex-Commando unturns when a Weapon or <Gun> State is played on him.
card.flavor: Secretly, he's glad peacetime isn't so peaceful.

card.title: Explosives
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Play on an unturned Character. Subject's controller may sacrifice Explosives during an attack :: Subject inflicts +5 damage against the next Site it inflicts combat damage on during this attack.
card.flavor: "Will that be nitro or C-4 today, Potemkin?" (Jammer deck) "Are you sure Tsien? Potemkin took the C4." (Lotus deck)

card.title: Faked Death
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Return a Character from your smoked pile to your hand.
card.flavor: The Lodge can write you a death certificate any time they want.

card.title: Family Estate
card.subtitle: Site
card.text: Turn to play a <Pledged> Character at -1 cost. When a <Lodge> Character is smoked, inflict 2 damage on Family Estate.
card.flavor: The Pledged do the Lodge's dirty work.

card.title: Family Home
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Generates an additional Power if the player to your left has more Power than you.
card.flavor: "This is why I keep fighting."

card.title: Father of Chaos
card.subtitle: Spirit of Destruction
card.text: Unique. Father of Chaos takes no combat damage from Characters whose Fighting is less than the number of cards in their controller's hand.

card.title: Festival Circle
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Cannot be healed except when seized. If Festival Circle is in your front row, turn and inflict 2 damage on it in response to an Event that targets one or more Characters you control :: Cancel that Event.

card.title: Field of Tentacles
card.subtitle: Netherworld Feng Shui Site
card.text: Turn and maintain to cancel the effects and rules text of target non-Feng Shui Site controlled by an opponent.
card.flavor: Tentacles coming up through the floorboards can really drive down property values.

card.title: Final Brawl
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Inflict 2 damage on all Characters.
card.flavor: Hamlet, Oedipus, Dirty Harry - the classic stories always end in blood.

card.title: Fire Acolytes
card.subtitle: Netherworld Disciples
card.text: When Fire Acolytes are smoked, you may inflict 1 damage on a Character at their location if you control another <Fire> Character.
card.flavor: The first step on the path of the Fire Righteous.
card.designators: | fire acolyt acolyte acolytes netherworld discipl disciple disciples |

card.title: Fire Mystic
card.subtitle: Netherworld Sorcerer
card.text: When an opponent plays an Event, you may inflict 1 damage on a card that player controls.
card.flavor: "Li Ting's followers understand the fine art of retribution."

card.title: Fireworks Factory
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: When an opponent reduces Fireworks Factory's Body to 0, you may smoke a Character that opponent controls if he or she is now closer to victory than you.
card.flavor: "Not the wisest place to have a gunfight."

card.title: Floating Restaurant
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: When an opponent plays an Event, you may remove 1 damage from any card you control.
card.flavor: "Take the boat to Chu's, then tell the waiter that you want the Sunless Seabass. He'll hook you up."

card.title: Flying Sleeves
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Toast It. Change one attacker's target to any Character you control.
card.flavor: Most martial artists block with their arms. Kan Li's students prefer to block with other people.

card.title: Flying Sword Stance
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Not cumulative. Subject Character gains +1 Fighting. Subject gains Superleap against Characters that lack resource conditions.
card.flavor: "Focus, balance, determination. These will allow us to win this day."

card.title: Four Burning Fists
card.subtitle: Demon Martial Artist
card.text: Unique. You must toast a Feng Shui Site you control when Four Burning Fists enters play, otherwise toast this card. Gains +2 Fighting and Regenerate while any opponent is closer to victory than you.
card.designators: | four burning fist fists demon martial artist |

card.title: Fox Pass
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Unique. Turn to change one attacker's target to any Character or front-row Site you control.
card.flavor: Be as the fox, who leads the hounds astray.

card.title: Furious George
card.subtitle: Flying Monkey
card.text: Unique. Guts. When Furious George enters combat, inflict 1 damage on each Character he is in combat with. (Before combat damage is dealt.)

card.title: Gambling House
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Limited. If any opponent controls at least two cards that share a designator, you may turn this card during your Main Shot to gain 1 Power.
card.flavor: Dice, cards, tiles, whatever - if it's played for money, you can find it here.

card.title: Garden of Bronze
card.subtitle: Netherworld Feng Shui Site
card.text: Gain 3 Power when an opponent burns one of your other Feng Shui Sites for Power.
card.flavor: It's both an art installation and chi-feedback resonance enhancer, Johnny.

card.title: Genghis X
card.subtitle: BuroMil Supersoldier
card.text: Unique. Genghis X has Guts while there is at least three damage on him.
card.designators: | genghi genghis x buro mil super soldier |

card.title: Glimpse of the Abyss
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Toast It. Gain X Power. X= the number of Feng Shui Sites controlled by target opponent plus the number of cards in his or her burned-for-victory pile. The number of Feng Shui Sites you need for victory is increased by one.
card.flavor: "Yessss! I am ssso evil!"

card.title: Golden Candle Society
card.subtitle: Secret Society
card.flavor: They have sworn to drive the foreign invader from the proud soil of their native land.

card.title: Golden Comeback
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Choose a Character in your smoked pile :: Return that Character to play.
card.flavor: "It'll take more than nine slugs in the chest to put me down when there are still creeps like you in the world!"

card.title: Golden Mile
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Unique. Turn to gain 1 Power when an opponent spends 3 or more Power at one time.
card.flavor: If you have the right chi, you get the best deals.

card.title: Gorilla Fighter
card.subtitle: Flying Monkey
card.text: Independent. Gorilla Fighter's cost is reduced by the total number of Feng Shui Sites and Characters you own that are controlled by opponents or in burned-for-victory piles.

card.title: Gruff Lieutenant
card.subtitle: Pledged Cop
card.text: Stealth.
card.flavor: The Order of the Wheel recruits high-ranking police officers to keep them hip to the action on the streets.

card.title: Hacker
card.subtitle: Gun-Totin' Techie
card.text: When an opponent plays an Event that steals Power from you or that toasts any card other than itself, you may play Hacker from your hand at no cost in response :: Cancel that Event.

card.title: Hands Without Shadow v2
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Schtick. When subject Character is in combat with a Character, you may choose to have subject inflict X-1 combat damage instead of its normal damage. X= damage required to smoke the opposing Character, calculated just prior to inflicting damage, but after all other effects have resolved.

card.title: Healing Earth
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Remove up to X damage from cards you control. X= the number of [C] resources in your pool.
card.flavor: The regenerative powers of the earth are triggered by the transcendent soul.

card.title: Heat of Battle
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play during an attack on a card you control by an opponent who controls more Power-generating Sites than you. Gain Power equal to the cost of target attacking Character. You can play only one "Heat of Battle" each attack.

card.title: Helix Rethread
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Play on a Character controlled by an opponent. When subject is smoked, you gain 1 Power.
card.flavor: "Oops, forgot to have you sign the consent form! Ha ha ha haha!"

card.title: Hidden Sanctuary
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Limited. At the end of an attack you declared, you may remove up to X damage from each Character that attacked. X = the number of <Sanctuary> cards you control.

card.title: Homemade Tank
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Toast It. Vehicle. Subject Character gains Toughness: 1 and +4 Fighting. Flip a coin at the start of your turn. Heads: Toast Homemade Tank.
card.flavor: "The engine's as big a threat as enemy fire."

card.title: Ice Diadem
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Turn Ice Diadem to heal subject Character.
card.flavor: Pi Tui's healing kiss brushes your forehead.

card.title: Ice Healer
card.subtitle: Netherworld Sorceress
card.text: When an opponent turns a Character to heal, you may remove one damage from a Character you control.

card.title: Inner Sanctum
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: If Inner Sanctum is revealed, you may not place another Feng Shui Site at its location.
card.flavor: Too great a chi flow can be as hazardous as too little.

card.title: Inoue Oram
card.subtitle: Sorcerer Mastermind
card.text: Unique. If you drew any cards during your draw phase, gain 1 Power at the start of your Main Shot if the number of cards drawn was even.

card.title: Instrument of the Hand
card.subtitle: Martial Artist
card.flavor: "Even the noodle lady turned out to be a guerrilla fighting against the foreign powers."

card.title: Iron and Silk
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Choose any Character :: Until the end of the turn, that Character takes no combat damage while intercepting.
card.flavor: Embrace the yin principle, and receive your opponents' blows like gifts of honey.

card.title: Isomorphic Spirit
card.subtitle: Paradox Construct
card.text: +2 Fighting while two or more non-Edge cards in play have the same title.
card.flavor: Truly fearful symmetry.

card.title: Jaded Cop
card.subtitle: Corrupt Pawn
card.text: Not affected by 0 or 1-cost Events.
card.flavor: Nothing shocks you after walking a beat for 15 years.

card.title: Jade Valley
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Limited. While any Feng Shui Site you own is controlled by an opponent or in an opponent's burned-for-victory pile, and you are not closer to victory than all opponents, Jade Valley generates +1 Power and gains +4 Body.

card.title: Johnny Tso
card.subtitle: Heroic Gunman
card.text: Unique. Assassinate against [e] Characters. You may play Weapons on Johnny Tso at no cost.

card.title: Just Another Consumer
card.subtitle: Scrappy Rebel
card.text: When Just Another Consumer turns to attack a Site that shares a designator with another Site in play, he gains +1 Fighting until the end of the turn.

card.title: Kallisti
card.subtitle: Daughter of Entropy
card.text: Unique. Flip a coin when Kallisti smokes a Character by inflicting combat damage. Heads: remove 3 damage from her and you may inflict 3 damage on any Character.

card.title: Kan Li
card.subtitle: Martial Artist
card.text: Unique. When Kan Li enters combat, you may smoke any States on Characters he is in combat with.
card.flavor: "You defy the Lotus. Prepare to die."

card.title: Karate Cop
card.subtitle: Martial Artist
card.text: Gains +2 damage and Toughness: 1 while any opponent is closer to victory than you.
card.flavor: Law-enforcement, HK style.

card.title: Kar Fai's Crib
card.subtitle: Site
card.text: Unique. You may play [d] States at -1 cost. Turn to play a Character, ignoring one resource condition.
card.flavor: The Dragons remember, and they keep up the fight.

card.title: Kinoshita House
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Unique. Turn to unturn target attacker. That attacker ceases attacking.
card.flavor: The sublime meditation cottage of the great ninja leader Kinoshita retains the essence of his spirit.

card.title: Kung Fu Student
card.subtitle: Fledgling Shaolin
card.text: +1 Fighting while any non-Unique Feng Shui Site in your front row has a Body of 4 or less.
card.flavor: The Guiding Hand has no shortage of students eager to prove themselves.

card.title: Liquidators
card.subtitle: Pledged Enforcers
card.text: +1 damage while you control any <Lodge> Characters.
card.flavor: The Lodge has assets on both sides of the law.

card.title: Lord Hawksmoor
card.subtitle: Thunder Champion
card.text: Unique. Guts. Gain 2 Power if he is smoked by an opponent.

card.title: Lord Shi
card.subtitle: Netherworld Warrior
card.text: Unique. When Lord Shi attacks, until the end of the attack, all attackers (including him) gain +1 Fighting and Tactics.
card.flavor: Only he knows what the Monarchs could have been.

card.title: Magog
card.subtitle: Unstoppable Abomination
card.text: Unique. Guts. When an opponent's Site generates an effect while Magog is attacking, inflict 2 damage on that Site.

card.title: Mark of Fire
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Target exactly four Characters and/or Sites :: Inflict 1 damage on each target.
card.flavor: "Li Ting's idea of equality is everybody on fire at the same time."

card.title: Mathemagician
card.subtitle: Arcane Student
card.text: Provides an additional [p] while in play.
card.flavor: "Once something is absolutely understood, it becomes mathematics, even magic."

card.title: Mole Network
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play during your Main Shot. Target an opponent who has completed at least one turn :: Steal 1 Power from that opponent.
card.flavor: "There is something you should know. Meet me at the usual place at 9:15 sharp."

card.title: Napalm Addict
card.subtitle: Pyromaniac Anarchist
card.text: Guts while attacking. When he smokes a Site by inflicting combat damage, gain Power equal to that Site's printed cost, or 2 Power if it has no printed cost.

card.title: Nerve Gas
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Smoke target Character. Does not affect Characters with [M] or [H] resource conditions.
card.flavor: When you journey to the year 2062, always remember to pack a gas mask.

card.title: Neutron Bomb
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Smoke all Characters.
card.flavor: Just what the doctor ordered for the lingering urban resistance problems in 2062 - mondo death toll with no property value depreciation.

card.title: Nightclub
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Turn to inflict 1 damage on target interceptor.
card.flavor: The hottest spots have the best chi.

card.title: Night Market
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Limited. Turn during your turn in response to an opponent's Event :: Gain Power equal to that Event's cost.

card.title: Nine Dragon Temple
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: When an opponent reduces Nine Dragon Temple's Body to 0, gain 3 Power if that opponent is now closer to victory than you.
card.flavor: Those deserving of fortune will find it when faced with oppression.

card.title: "Now You've Made Us Mad"
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Gain 1 Power for each damaged Character you control.
card.flavor: Nietzsche said: "That which does not kill us makes us kick more butt." Or something like that.
card.designators: | now youve made u us mad |

card.title: Operation Killdeer
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Until the end of the turn, target Character inflicts no damage.
card.flavor: The Dragons feel the loss of Jack and Mad Dog in every running gun battle and every wild fight.

card.title: Pain Feedback
card.subtitle: State
card.text: One point of subject Character's combat damage is redirected back onto itself.
card.flavor: It kills you slowly.

card.title: Paradox Garden
card.subtitle: Site
card.text: Turn to look at the top card of your deck. You may put it on the bottom.
card.flavor: "It makes the Mobius Garden seem normal."

card.title: Payback Time
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Limited. When an opponent reduces the Body of a Site you control to 0, you gain 1 Power and may inflict 1 damage each on up to 3 Sites controlled by that opponent.

card.title: Phillippe Benoit
card.subtitle: Pledged Assassin
card.text: Unique. Stealth.
card.flavor: "Your pleading for mercy reminds me of a line from Sartre."

card.title: Pocket Demon
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Limited. Play at the start of your turn. No other card you control or play generates Power during your Establishing Shot this turn. Pocket Demon generates Power equal to the number of Power-generating Sites controlled by target opponent, plus the number of cards in his or her burned-for-victory pile, minus the number of cards in your burned-for-victory pile.

card.title: Poison Thorns
card.subtitle: Dangerous Hoods
card.text: Toughness: 2 against <Cop> and <Police> cards. When they inflict combat damage on a Site controlled by a player who is closer to victory than you, gain 1 Power.
card.designators: | poison thorn thorns dangerou dangerous hood hoods |

card.title: Professional Killer
card.subtitle: Mercenary Hood
card.text: Stealth while attacking alone.
card.flavor: He's just in it for the money.

card.title: Pump-Action Shotgun
card.subtitle: Gun State
card.text: Weapon. When a Unique Character you control is smoked by an opponent, unturn this card. Turn this card :: subject Character inflicts +3 damage until the end of the turn.
card.flavor: "This time..." KA-CHINK "...I'm going for a little redemption action."

card.title: Purist Aspirant
card.subtitle: Expendable Lackey
card.text: Sacrifice to reduce to 0 all non-combat damage from a single source to Characters you control.

card.title: Quantum Sorcery
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Turn this card and a [M] Character you control :: Gain one Power or draw a card.
card.flavor: "The Purists have developed a system of magic unlike any I have seen before." - Fo Shen

card.title: Rachel McShane
card.subtitle: Lodge Enforcer
card.text: Unique. Rachel McShane is not affected by opponents' effects that are generated by turning a card.
card.flavor: An eagle can spot its prey from a mile above.

card.title: Realpolitik
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Smoke target Edge or State.
card.flavor: The Ascended will - and can - do nearly anything to maintain their power over our world.

card.title: Redeemed Gunman
card.subtitle: Reforming Hood
card.text: Cannot intercept. When Redeemed Gunman turns to attack a turned Site, he gains +2 Fighting until the end of the turn.

card.title: Resistance Squad
card.subtitle: Techie Guerrillas
card.text: Any time Resistance Squad is in your hand when an opponent attempts to look at your hand or force you to discard a card, you may play Resistance Squad at no cost in response :: Cancel that effect.

card.title: Rust Garden
card.subtitle: Netherworld Feng Shui Site
card.text: If an opponent seizes or burns Rust Garden, inflict 2 damage on every other Site he or she controls.
card.flavor: "Right after we blew it up, we found old mufflers in the Sacred Grove and a junked 'bot in the Lily Pond."

card.title: Scrounging
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Limited. Play at the start of your turn. No other card you control or play generates Power during your Establishing Shot. Choose State, Edge, Character, Feng Shui Site, or non-Feng Shui Site. Scrounging generates Power equal to the number of cards of the chosen type that target opponent controls, minus the number of cards in your burned-for-victory pile.

card.title: Security
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Subject Site gains +4 Body.
card.flavor: "Remote cameras, electronic sensors, automated machine gun emplacements - all they cost is money, and the Ascended have that to burn."

card.title: Shadowy Mentor
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Play on any Character. You take control of subject Character. Subject gains the designator <Pledged>.
card.flavor: "I have done you many favors in the past, my young friend. Now, I have one to ask in return..."

card.title: Shaolin Sanctuary
card.subtitle: Site
card.text: Shaolin Sanctuary provides one [C] resource for each <Shaolin> Character and each <Monk> Character you control.
card.flavor: Shaolin temples across China serve as staging grounds for Quan Lo's efforts.

card.title: Shield of Pure Soul
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Limited. When a Site you control is seized or burned, you gain 1 Power and may search your deck and select a card. Reshuffle your deck, then place the selected card on top of your deck.

card.title: Shih Ho Kuai
card.subtitle: Martial Arts Master
card.text: Unique. X = the number of [C] resources in your pool.
card.designators: | shih ho kuai martial art arts master |

card.title: Sinister Priest
card.subtitle: Macabre Sorcerer
card.flavor: These loathsome wanderers make the peasantry pay to exorcise spirits they themselves have summoned.

card.title: Sports Car
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Vehicle. Subject Character gains Mobility and +2 damage, except against Characters that are the subject of a Vehicle.
card.flavor: "The paint job make it less obvious that you had to plow through a bunch of mooks."

card.title: Steven Wu
card.subtitle: Zen Gunman
card.text: Unique. Independent. Cannot have his damage redirected or reduced. Opponents cannot take control of him.
card.flavor: "The bullet knows the way."

card.title: Stone Garden
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Turn to remove 1 damage from target Site.
card.flavor: An artist in harmony with the earth can channel and focus chi.

card.title: Street Riot
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play during an attack you declared on a Site. Inflict X damage, divided any way you choose, on non-attacking Characters at the location of the attack. X = the number of attackers.
card.flavor: Some quick rabble-rousing can often turn a fight around.

card.title: Student of the Bear
card.subtitle: Pledged Martial Artist
card.flavor: Disciples of the Bear School don't bother with the subtle approach.

card.title: Sub-Machine Gun
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Weapon. Play on a Character. Turn to inflict 1 damage on all Characters at subject's location, except the subject.
card.flavor: Prefered by mooks everywhere.

card.title: Suicide Mission
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Target a card :: Smoke that card. That card's controller may smoke any card you control.
card.flavor: The Pledge is a promise to do anything for the Unspoken Name - even die.

card.title: SWAT Team
card.subtitle: Cop Pawns
card.text: Tactics.
card.flavor: The Ascended have the world's police forces at their disposal.

card.title: Tank Warfare
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: You may play <Tank> States from your smoked pile at -1 cost. <Tank> Characters and Characters that are the subject of <Tank> States cannot turn to attack Sites if two or more players control such Characters.

card.title: Temple of Celestial Mercy
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Unique. Your hand size is increased by 2
card.flavor: Once a sanctuary; now a prize in the secret war.

card.title: Test Subjects
card.subtitle: Abominations
card.flavor: "The plan was to turn demons from the ancient past into supersoldiers. Didn't work too well at first."

card.title: The Iron Monkey
card.subtitle: Masked Hero
card.text: Unique. Superleap. When The Iron Monkey inflicts combat damage on the target of his attack, steal half the Power (round down) of his target's controller and give that Power to any player you choose.

card.title: The Legacy
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Unique. At the end of your turn, put a counter on this card if you control any <Thunder> cards. Do likewise for <Fire>, <Darkness>, and <Ice>. Remove 4 counters :: Gain 1 Power.

card.title: The Reconstructed
card.subtitle: Standard Abominations
card.flavor: "After they put down the India insurgency, they become synonymous with terror."

card.title: Thunder Bishop
card.subtitle: Netherworld Sorcerer
card.text: Turn and maintain to give target Character Toughness: 1.
card.flavor: They inspire the Thunder King's warriors to ever greater glories.

card.title: Thunder Sword
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Unique. Weapon. Subject Character gains +4 Fighting and cannot turn to attack Sites.
card.flavor: When you face this sword, it's not the thunder that ends up rolling.

card.title: Ting Ting
card.subtitle: Martial Artist
card.text: Unique. Independent. +2 Fighting for each opponent who controls more Power-generating Sites than you. Opponents cannot take control of Ting Ting.

card.title: Tommy Hsu
card.subtitle: Hood Sorcerer
card.text: Unique. Sacrifice a <Hood> card to inflict 1 damage on any target. Once per turn, you may inflict 3 damage on him to change the target of an Event.

card.title: Tortured Memories
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Take control of target Character until the end of the turn.
card.flavor: "I saw Keung's head rise before me. Then he told me to blow up the MacMillan Building."

card.title: Tricia Kwok
card.subtitle: Undercover Cop
card.text: Unique. Gains Toughness: 1 and +1 Fighting while she is the subject of any Weapon State.
card.flavor: With looks like that, you'd think everybody in the city would recognize her. But no one ever does...

card.title: Turtle Beach
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Unique. Turn to redirect the damage inflicted by a single source on target Character to Turtle Beach.
card.flavor: When protection becomes sacrifice, how much can the land withstand?

card.title: Turtle Island
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Cannot be damaged or removed from play by opponents' Events. Cannot be burned.

card.title: Vassals of the Lotus
card.subtitle: Ancient Hoods
card.flavor: Bandits and ruffians serve corrupt Lotus officials to slake their lust for gold.
card.designators: | vassal vassals lotu lotus ancient hood hoods |

card.title: Virtuous Hood
card.subtitle: Martial Artist
card.text: When Virtuous Hood turns to attack, take a point of Power from the pool of one of the players with the most Power and give it to one of the players with the least Power.

card.title: Vivisector
card.subtitle: Abomination Scientist
card.text: Turn Vivisector and choose a Character other than itself :: Sacrifice that Character. If the sacrifice is successful, gain Power equal to that Character's cost.

card.title: Void Sorcerer
card.subtitle: Mysterious Geomancer
card.text: Target a Site when Void Sorcerer enters play :: Treat that Site's rules text as if it were blank while Void Sorcerer is in play.

card.title: Walking Corpses
card.subtitle: Undead Servitors
card.text: Cannot turn to change location. Damage cannot be removed from Walking Corpses.
card.flavor: They weren't buried properly, so now they're back.
card.designators: | walking corps corpse corpses undead servitor servitors |

card.title: White Disciple
card.subtitle: Eunuch Sorcerer
card.text: Turn and inflict 1 damage on White Disciple :: Inflict 2 damage on any target.
card.flavor: In China, white is the color of death.

card.title: Who's the Monkey Now?
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play in response to an Event played by an opponent that would damage or smoke a card you control :: Cancel that Event, and you may smoke a card controlled by that opponent of the same type as a card that would have been damaged or smoked by the Event.

card.title: Yellow Geomancer
card.subtitle: Crafty Monk
card.text: Turn to redirect one damage inflicted on a Site to any other target.
card.flavor: Taking them on sometimes does more harm than good.

card.title: Aether Spirit
card.subtitle: Invisible Construct
card.text: Stealth. +X damage, X = the number of [M] cards you control.
card.flavor: What you can't see can kill you.

card.title: Akani Hideo
card.subtitle: Ice Steward
card.text: Unique. Your effects cannot be canceled by opponents.
card.flavor: He keeps the Ice Pagoda running smoothly.

card.title: Arena Warrior
card.subtitle: Thunder Knight
card.text: Turn and target an opponent's Character :: The two Characters enter a Faceoff.
card.flavor: They fight for Huan Ken's favor.

card.title: Armies of the Monarchs
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: All Unique Characters inflict -1 damage. All your non-Unique Characters inflict +1 damage.
card.flavor: No matter how good your kung fu, if all your enemies come at you at once, youÕre done for!

card.title: Artillery Strike
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Discard X [f] cards to do two times X damage to target Character or Site. Reload: discard 1 card at random.
card.flavor: "Fire in the hole!"

card.title: Ashes of the Fallen
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Toast a non-Unique Character in your smoked pile to return a [d] Event to your hand.
card.flavor: The lessons of defeat are the harshest.

card.title: Assassin Bug
card.subtitle: Killer Abomination
card.text: If Assassin Bug damages a Unique Character, smoke that Character.
card.flavor: When Boatman wants somebody gone, he sends these.

card.title: Battle Arena
card.subtitle: Battleground Site
card.text: Any player who seizes this Site gains 1 Power. While this Site is in your front row, all Characters you control gain both Toughness: 1 and +1 damage while in a Faceoff.

card.title: Bei Tairong
card.subtitle: Lodge Traitor
card.text: Unique. Superleap. +1 damage to cards controlled by a player with [a] in his or her pool.
card.flavor: She couldn't take what the Lodge had become.

card.title: Big Bruiser vPAP
card.subtitle: Kicker of Butts
card.text: Toughness: 2. +3 Fighting while not the subject of a State.
card.flavor: "Was that supposed to hurt?"

card.title: Bio-Salvage
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Limited. Put a counter on this card when an opponent smokes a Character you control. Remove 3 counters :: Gain 1 Power.
card.flavor: Waste not, want not.

card.title: Black Market Connections
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Limited. Toast your deck if you play or seize a Limited or Unique Site, or if one you own is revealed. When an opponent reveals or turns a Limited or Unique Site, turn to either draw four cards or gain two Power.

card.title: Black Ops Team
card.subtitle: Buro Assassins
card.text: When Black Ops Team enters play, except during an attack, it must enter a Faceoff with an opponent's Character if possible. Heal Black Ops Team at the end of a Faceoff it wins.
card.designators: | black op ops team buro assassin assassins |

card.title: Blood Lust
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Limited. Gain Power equal to the number of damaged Characters controlled by opponents.
card.flavor: The warriors of the Monarchs revel in the blood of their foes.

card.title: Blow Things Up!
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Smoke target Site.
card.flavor: It's not just a motto, it's a lifestyle.

card.title: BoBo Splitter
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Weapon. Sacrifice to inflict 1 damage on every Character at subject Character's location. Reload: Jam Jam Tech 1
card.flavor: "It's all fun and games until somebody loses a head."

card.title: Bomb Factory
card.subtitle: Site
card.text: Turn and maintain to give target Character +1 damage to Sites.
card.flavor: With the Monkey House gone, the Jammers went to ground.

card.title: Bonebreaker Jun
card.subtitle: Thunder Dome Champion
card.text: Unique. Toughness: 1. You may play Faceoff Events at -1 cost. Unturn Bonebreaker Jun at the end of a Faceoff he was involved in.
card.flavor: Only Huan Ken has defeated him in single combat.

card.title: Bouncing Benji
card.subtitle: Mass-Produced Abomination
card.text: +1 damage. Reload: discard a card.
card.flavor: "Kill all you want. We'll make more."
card.designators: | bouncing benji mas mass produced abomination |

card.title: Brass Monkey
card.subtitle: Simian Automaton
card.text: Opponents cannot intercept Brass Monkey unless they pay one Power for each interceptor they declare against him. Reload: 2

card.title: Bribery
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Give an opponent 1 Power and target a Character he or she controls with a printed numerical Fighting of 5 or less :: Take control of target until the end of the turn.
card.flavor: Money talks.

card.title: "Bring It"
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Unique. Schtick. Turn to redirect all damage from a single source to subject Character. Sacrifice to give subject Guts until the end of the turn. Reload: 1
card.flavor: "Who's first?"

card.title: Broken Wheel Brigade
card.subtitle: Netherworld Soldiers
card.text: Discard an Event, State, or Edge to reduce damage inflicted on this card from a single source by 1.
card.designators: | broken wheel brigade netherworld soldier soldiers |

card.title: Buddhist Monk
card.subtitle: Martial Artist
card.text: +X Fighting. X = the number of Power-generating Sites you control minus two. X cannot be less than 0.

card.title: BuroMil Scout
card.subtitle: Recon Soldier
card.text: While BuroMil Scout is attacking, other attackers inflict +1 damage.

card.title: Butterfly Armor
card.subtitle: Thunder State
card.text: If subject Character is unturned, it may attack without turning once during your Main Shot. If subject is unturned at the beginning of any player's turn, it takes 2 damage, which cannot be reduced or redirected.

card.title: Cassandra
card.subtitle: Netherworld Seer
card.text: Unique. Turn to look at the top 5 cards of your deck. You may put as many of these cards as you wish on the bottom of your deck in any order, and return the rest to the top of your deck in any order.

card.title: Chamberlain
card.subtitle: Skin and Darkness Zealot
card.text: Unique. Assassinate. Heals when a Unique Character is smoked. Once during your Main Shot, if Chamberlain is unturned, he may attack a Character with a Fighting of 5 or higher without turning.
card.designators: | chamberlain skin darkness darknes darkne darkn zealot |

card.title: Chi Detachment
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Play on a Character during any player's Main Shot. Subject provides no resources and its rules text is considered blank.
card.flavor: "Your kung fu is strong. Let's see how you do without it...."

card.title: Chizu
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Play on a <Netherworld> Site you control. All cards that are [C] or [M] have blank rules text while at this location. Reload: 1
card.flavor: You wouldn't think property values in the Netherworld could get worse....

card.title: Contest of Arms
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Toast It. Faceoff. Turn a Character you control and target an opponent's Character with Fighting no lower than two less than yours. The winner may return an Event from his or her smoked pile to hand.
card.flavor: To the victor go the spoils!

card.title: Corrupt Bookie
card.subtitle: Pledged Hood Gambler
card.text: When a Faceoff effect is generated, gain one Power and predict who will win. If your prediction is correct, gain one Power. If incorrect, or if there is no winner, smoke this card.

card.title: Dark Traveler
card.subtitle: Netherworld Hero
card.text: +2 Fighting for each Feng Shui Site in your smoked pile.

card.title: Demonic Plague
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Limited. Inflict one damage on target Character. During your turn, you may return exactly one "Demonic Plague" to your hand when a Character you control is smoked by an opponent.

card.title: Diamond Beach
card.subtitle: Netherworld Feng Shui Site
card.text: Toughness: 2
card.flavor: If you have attuned to enough Feng Shui sites in your life, you can shape anything you want - but only within the Netherworld.

card.title: Dragon Graveyard
card.subtitle: Netherworld Feng Shui Site
card.text: Gain 1 Power when 3 or more combat damage is inflicted on this card. If this card is in your hand when an opponent's effect attempts to look at your hand or force you to discard, you may discard it to cancel that effect and gain 2 Power.

card.title: Dr. Jean-Marc Ngubane
card.subtitle: Buro Scientist Double Agent
card.text: Unique. Turn to unturn target [f] Character or turn target [m] Character.
card.flavor: Sent by Boatman as a spy and an assassin.
card.designators: | dr jean marc ngubane buro scientist double agent |

card.title: Dr. Timbul Damiri
card.subtitle: Fugue Sorcerer
card.text: Unique. Turn this card and choose another Character :: Sacrifice that Character. If the sacrifice is successful, return the Character to play under its owner's control at the same location. If it was turned, it enters play turned.

card.title: Echo Cancellation
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Limited. Play when an opponent plays a non-Event, non-foundation card with the same title as a card he or she controls or has in his or her smoked pile :: Cancel and smoke the played card.

card.title: Escher Hotel
card.subtitle: Netherworld Feng Shui Site
card.text: Unique. All Sites you control are considered to be in the front row. (Back-row Sites are also still considered to be back-row Sites.) This does not allow your back-row Sites other than Escher Hotel to be attacked.

card.title: Evil Whispers
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Limited. Play when an opponent spends 2 or more Power at one time :: Gain 1 Power.

card.title: Exile Village
card.subtitle: Battleground Site
card.text: Any player who seizes this Site gains 1 Power. If this card is in your front row, it generates one Power during your Establishing Shot if you have more different faction resources in your pool than any other player.

card.title: Fakhir-al-Din
card.subtitle: Fire Warlord
card.text: Unique. Toughness: 1 against damaged Characters. When Fakhir-al-Din enters play, inflict two damage on all other Characters.
card.flavor: Li Ting sent him to stop the Dragons.

card.title: Fire Sword
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Weapon. Subject Character gains +2 Fighting and +2 damage.
card.flavor: Flames danced on the blade of Fakhir's sword.

card.title: Frag the G!
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Limited. When an opponent's Site becomes turned, inflict 1 damage on it.
card.flavor: Nik let out a yell, and the rabble stormed the Ice Pavilion.

card.title: Friends in Low Places
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Limited. Gain 1 Power when an opponent plays a 0-cost Event.
card.designators: | friend friends low plac place places |

card.title: Green Sage
card.subtitle: Tough Old Monk
card.text: Toughness: 2. All other Characters you control at this location gain Toughness: 1
card.flavor: "The willow bends but does not break."

card.title: Gus Andropolous
card.subtitle: IKTV Reporter
card.text: Unique. Independent. When he turns to attack, you may look at the hand of his target's controller. When an opponent looks at your hand or forces you to discard, you may look at that player's hand and force him or her to discard a card.
card.designators: | gu gus andropolou andropolous iktv reporter |

card.title: Helix Mine
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Subject Character inflicts -1 damage. If this card is in your hand when an opponent's effect attempts to look at your hand or force you to discard, you may discard this card to smoke a Character he or she controls.

card.title: Ho Chen
card.subtitle: Master of the Flawless Strike
card.text: Unique.
card.flavor: This winter, Z-Man Games brings you another exciting Shadowfist expansion as hopping vampires, over-the-top kung fu, and a new faction appear in Seven Masters versus the Underworld.
card.designators: | ho chen master flawles flawless strike |

card.title: Ice Pavilion
card.subtitle: Netherworld Feng Shui Site
card.text: Unique. All Characters at this location gain Regenerate.
card.flavor: Created by Pi Tui for her wedding ceremony.

card.title: Ice Tigers
card.subtitle: Netherworld Spirits
card.text: Prior to combat, you may turn Ice Tigers to inflict 2 damage on a Character that is about to enter combat with another Character you control.
card.designators: | ice tiger tigers netherworld spirit spirits |

card.title: IKTV Special Report
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Limited. Play when an opponent plays a Unique Character, takes control of a Character, or plays a Character at reduced cost :: Gain 2 Power.
card.flavor: Bringing you the breaking news, or making it up as needed.

card.title: Information Warfare
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play when an opponent declares an attack. Change the target of one attacker to any legal target.
card.flavor: "Feint, bluff, and illusion win more wars than force of arms."

card.title: "Is that all you got?"
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Choose a Character in your smoked pile with a printed numerical Fighting of 5 or less :: Return that Character to play.
card.flavor: "My turn."
card.designators: | i is that all you got |

card.title: Jan Zvireci
card.subtitle: Pledged Lackey
card.text: Unique. Turn and choose an opponent, who cannot respond with Events :: Look at that player's hand and remove an Event. Until the end of the turn, you may play that card, ignoring resource conditions. Return it to its owner's hand at end of turn if you did not play it.

card.title: Jormungandr
card.subtitle: Reascended Snake
card.text: Unique. Assassinate. Toughness: 2 while attacking a target controlled by an opponent with more Power than you. Heals at the beginning of any turn if you have at least 1 Power.

card.title: Jueding Shelun vPAP
card.subtitle: Ghost Sorcerer
card.text: Unique. During your Main Shot you may return to play a single one-cost Character that requires or provides resources.
card.flavor: "Now you will pay!"

card.title: Kauhuhu
card.subtitle: Reascended Shark
card.text: Unique. Mobility. Independent. Gains Toughness: 1 until the end of the turn when a Character at his location is smoked.

card.title: Leaping Tiger Troupe
card.subtitle: Shaolin Acrobats
card.text: Superleap. Draw a card for every different faction resource in your pool when this card comes into play.
card.flavor: Acrobats provided entertainment for Pi Tui's guests.
card.designators: | leaping tiger troupe shaolin acrobat acrobats |

card.title: Little Grasshopper
card.subtitle: Energetic Kid
card.text: You cannot play States on this card. +1 damage while you control any <Master> Characters.
card.flavor: The youngest disciples of the Guiding Hand.

card.title: Lodge Machinations
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Cannot be played during an attack or if you control any <Pledged> cards. Choose a Power-generating Site you control and an opponent's Site. They must either be both Feng Shui or both non-Feng Shui :: Reveal both Sites. If both Sites are in play, each player takes control of the other's Site. (Place them in any legal position.)

card.title: Loyalty Officer
card.subtitle: Buro Soldier
card.text: Characters you control cannot have the target of their attack changed. You may discard this card to cancel an effect that would take control of any Characters you control.

card.title: Mad Scientist
card.subtitle: Unorthodox Techie
card.flavor: If you haven't done at least one experiment in the middle of a raging thunderstorm, you aren't the real deal.

card.title: Mano a Mano
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Faceoff. Turn a Character you control and target an opponent's Character with Fighting no lower than two less than yours. The winner may inflict X damage on any Character controlled by the loser. X = the printed Fighting of the winner's Character.

card.title: Monkey vs. Robot
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Faceoff. Turn a Character you control and target an opponent's Character with Fighting no lower than two less than yours. The winner may inflict 5 damage on any Site.

card.title: Morphic Spirit
card.subtitle: Sorcerous Construct
card.text: Toughness: 1 while you have at least two different faction resources in your pool. +1 Fighting if you have three, or +2 Fighting if you have four or more.

card.title: Napalm Belcher
card.subtitle: Netherworld Abomination
card.text: Toughness: 1. Turn to inflict 2 damage on all Characters and Sites at target location.
card.flavor: Designed as living artillery.

card.title: Never Surrender
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Limited. Play when an opponent burns a Site you control :: Put this card into your burned-for-victory pile. Gain 3 Power if that opponent is now as close or closer to victory than you.

card.title: Ninja Six
card.subtitle: Enigmatic Agent
card.text: Unique. Stealth. At the start of your turn you may add or remove a designator from Ninja Six until the beginning of your next turn.

card.title: Official Harassment
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Play on a Character. Turn and maintain a Character you control :: Turn subject, and it cannot unturn.
card.flavor: The Lodge doesn't need to have you killed to take you out...

card.title: Ogre
card.subtitle: Ancient Monster
card.text: +2 damage to <Netherworld> Sites. Play at no cost when an opponent steals Power from you or takes control of a Character you own.
card.flavor: The Lotus' shock troops in the Netherworld.

card.title: Orange Sage
card.subtitle: Wise Monk
card.text: Turn to return a card that is neither [g] nor [C] from your smoked pile to your hand.
card.flavor: "There is a world beyond China, young one."

card.title: Ornamental Garden
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Subject Site generates an additional Power if it is in the front row. Any damage inflicted on subject is doubled.
card.flavor: They bring good chi, but are fragile.

card.title: Paradigm Recoding
card.subtitle: State
card.text: You control subject Edge.
card.flavor: "There is no advantage you can hold that cannot be turned against you."

card.title: Paradox
card.subtitle: Void Entity
card.text: Unique. Uncopyable. Turn and shuffle Paradox into your deck :: Search your deck and set aside a card. Reshuffle, and put that card on top of your deck.
card.flavor: It knows everything. It knows nothing.

card.title: Paradox Garden
card.subtitle: Site
card.text: Turn to look at the top card of your deck. You may put it on the bottom.
card.flavor: "It makes the Mobius Garden seem normal."

card.title: Peacock Summit
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: +2 Body for each different faction resource in your pool.

card.title: Police Station v2
card.subtitle: Site
card.text: Turn and maintain Police Station to give target <Cop> character +2 Fighting, or turn to inflict 2 damage on target <Hood> Character or <Hood> Site.

card.title: Rebecca Dupress
card.subtitle: Pledged Mastermind
card.text: Unique. You may play States on her at -3 cost. Gain 1 Power when you seize a <Netherworld> Feng Shui Site.

card.title: Red Dragon Troupe
card.subtitle: Sinister Acrobats
card.text: Cannot be intercepted by damaged Characters.
card.flavor: Assassins disguised as entertainers.
card.designators: | red dragon troupe sinister acrobat acrobats |

card.title: RedGlare Chapel
card.subtitle: Netherworld Site
card.text: Unique. Turn to unturn "Reverend RedGlare". Turn to inflict 1 damage on every other turned Site.
card.flavor: Thanks to its onboard computers, the Reverend's deadly chapel is smarter than he is.

card.title: Reluctant Hero
card.subtitle: Netherworld Outcast
card.text: Independent. Once per turn, you may unturn this card when an attack you declared fails.
card.flavor: "Sometimes you have to get involved."

card.title: Reverend RedGlare
card.subtitle: Netherworld Mercenary
card.text: Unique. Choose a designator when Reverend RedGlare enters play. Turn to inflict 3 damage on target Character that has the chosen designator.

card.title: Reverend Zebediah Paine
card.subtitle: Demon Hunter
card.text: Unique. Cannot be sacrificed. Assassinate against Demon Characters. Pay 2 Power to return him to play. You cannot return "Reverend Zebediah Paine" to play more than once per turn.

card.title: Ring of Ice
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Unique. Schtick. Subject Character gains +1 Fighting. Turn to smoke a State on a card you control. If you control "Ring of Silver", turn this card to smoke any State.
card.flavor: Pi Tui placed the ring on Silver Jet's finger.

card.title: Ring of Silver
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Unique. Schtick. Turn to give subject Character Guts until the end of the turn. If you control "Ring of Ice", subject gains Guts, and you may turn this card to unturn subject.
card.flavor: Silver Jet placed the ring on Pi Tui's finger.

card.title: Robbing the Kong
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play when you join an attack. If target attacker you control reduces a Feng Shui Site's Body to 0 by inflicting combat damage this attack, you may seize that Site.

card.title: Scrappy Kid
card.subtitle: Martial Arts Prodigy
card.text: Independent. Cannot inflict more than 1 damage. Cannot be intercepted.
card.designators: | scrappy kid martial art arts prodigy |

card.title: Secret Pact
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: One-Shot. Play during your Main Shot. You must have at least two resources each from two different factions in your pool to play this card. Draw four cards, gain 2 Power, or return a card from your smoked pile to your hand.

card.title: Secrets of Shaolin
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play during any Main Shot in response to a 0-cost Event :: Cancel that Event.
card.flavor: The Hand possesses the secret knowledge of the ancients.

card.title: Shamanistic Punk
card.subtitle: Hood Sorcerer
card.text: +1 damage to <Cop> and <Police> cards. -1 damage to <Demon> and <Spirit> cards.
card.flavor: They crave wealth, not wisdom.

card.title: Shell Game
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Target player reveals the top three cards of his or her deck. The player to his or her left puts one on the bottom of the deck, and target puts the other two into his or her hand.
card.flavor: The Ascended can give you what you want in such a way that you regret it.

card.title: Silver Jet vPAP
card.subtitle: Secret Warrior
card.text: Unique. Independent. Toughness: 1. When you declare him as an attacker, name a card, which cannot be played in response :: His target's controller must show you his or her hand and discard all cards with that title.

card.title: Skin and Darkness Zealots
card.subtitle: Netherworld Horrors
card.text: Assassinate. When Skin and Darkness Zealots enter combat with a Character, treat that Character's rules text as if it were blank until the end of combat.
card.designators: | skin darkness darknes darkne darkn zealot zealots netherworld horror horrors |

card.title: Slo Mo Vengeance
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play X Weapon or <Gun> States at no cost from your smoked pile onto a Character you control.
card.flavor: This is the moment when it all goes down...

card.title: Snowfall
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: All Characters cease attacking.
card.flavor: Pi Tui flew into the air, her arms outstretched. The snow began to fall, and everyone drifted off into gentle slumber.

card.title: Sonic Reducer
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Unique. Weapon. Turn to turn target Character at subject Character's location and inflict X damage to it. X = one-half target's Fighting (round up).
card.flavor: Ain't no loser!

card.title: Spin Doctoring
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: When a Character you control that requires resources is smoked, you must return a random card from your smoked pile to your hand.

card.title: Stand Together
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Limited. You must have at least two resources each from two different factions in your pool to play this card. Choose a designator when you play this card. All Characters with that designator gain +1 Fighting.

card.title: Stone Dolmens
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Turn to smoke a State on a card you own.
card.flavor: A place for rituals of cleansing.

card.title: Stone Spirals
card.subtitle: Netherworld Feng Shui Site
card.text: Gain 1 Power when an opponent plays a card at a reduced cost due to a card he or she controls.

card.title: Ten Thousand Agonies
card.subtitle: Demon Lord
card.text: Unique. All damage inflicted on Ten Thousand Agonies is increased by 1.
card.flavor: Shelun cast his spell and the demon appeared, towering above the Dragons.
card.designators: | ten thousand agony agon agonies demon lord |

card.title: The Bazaar
card.subtitle: Netherworld Battleground Site
card.text: Unique. Any player who seizes this card gains 1 Power. If this Site is in your front row, you may turn it to draw a card, then shuffle one card from your hand into your deck.
card.flavor: "Everything's for sale-but there might be a few dents."

card.title: The Enemy of my Enemy
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Once per turn, you may give an opponent one Power :: Draw two cards.
card.flavor: The Ascended prefer to have you fight their battles.

card.title: The Forest of Fallen Banners
card.subtitle: Netherworld Site
card.text: Unique. Generates no Power if there are Characters at this location. Draw a card when a Character you control is smoked by an opponent.
card.flavor: An eerie testament to the savagery of mankind.
card.designators: | the forest fallen banner banners netherworld |

card.title: The Ickies
card.subtitle: Netherworld Rabble
card.text: At the end of your turn, steal 1 Power from any one opponent who is closer to victory than you. Only one "The Ickies" may trigger each turn.
card.flavor: They want their IKTV.
card.designators: | the icky ick ickies netherworld rabble |

card.title: The Orange Principle
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Shuffle X cards from your hand into your deck :: Draw X+1 cards.
card.flavor: The principle of diversity brings the blessings of good fortune.

card.title: "There's Always One More..."
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Toast It. Randomly return a Character from your smoked pile to play.
card.flavor: "It's like playing Whack-a-Mole."
card.designators: | ther there theres alway always one more |

card.title: The Thunder Dome
card.subtitle: Netherworld Site
card.text: Unique. Turn to look through your deck for a Faceoff Event, show it to your opponents, and put it in your hand. Turn to immediately play a Faceoff Event from your smoked pile. That card is considered to be Toast-It.

card.title: Throne of Skulls
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Unique. Gain 1 Power when a Unique Character is smoked.
card.flavor: A new skull appears whenever a hero dies.

card.title: Thunder Apprentice
card.subtitle: Fledgling Sorcerer
card.text: Turn to give target Character +1 damage until the end of the turn.
card.flavor: The most junior of Huan Ken's clergy.

card.title: Thunder Gladiator
card.subtitle: Netherworld Warrior
card.text: You may substitute [m] for each resource condition of a Faceoff Event. This card's rules text is still active in your smoked pile.

card.title: Tracer Implant
card.subtitle: Arcanowave State
card.text: When subject Character turns, it takes 1 damage and you may unturn a Character you control. Smoke this card if you control its subject.

card.title: Trade Center
card.subtitle: Site
card.text: Feng Shui Sites to the immediate right and left of this card generate no Power.
card.flavor: "Old Mr. Tsang told me that it would cut off my chi, but I couldn't exactly cancel a billion-dollar contract, could I?"

card.title: Transmogrification
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Smoke a State on target Character, and inflict X damage on that Character. X= the cost of the State.
card.flavor: Pi Tui waved her hand and the weapon became an albino python.

card.title: Two-Face
card.subtitle: Punk Anarchists
card.text: Unique. Turn to take control of exactly two non-Unique Characters you do not control. They must each either cost 1 or neither require nor provide resources.

card.title: Uprising
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Return to play from your smoked pile one plus one-half of X (round down) <Rebel> and <Rabble> Characters that are not Unique. X must be at least 3.

card.title: Verminous Rain
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Cancel the effects and rules text of target Site until the end of the turn. Reload: Toast two random cards in your smoked pile.
card.flavor: Vermin and pestilence bring corruption and ill fortune.

card.title: Violence Junkies
card.subtitle: Crazy Rabble
card.text: When you play Violence Junkies from your hand, sacrifice an unturned Character. Must intercept attacks at their location.
card.flavor: Dangerous to everyone.
card.designators: | violence junky junk junkies crazy rabble |

card.title: Void
card.subtitle: Entropy Spirit
card.text: Unique. Toughness: 1. Once per turn, you may sacrifice a Character to unturn this card. Once per turn, you may toast a Character you control to heal this card.

card.title: Wandering Hero
card.subtitle: Netherworld Ally
card.text: +1 Fighting for every Character you control that shares one or more designators with one or more cards in play.
card.flavor: Warriors from forgotten times, looking for a cause.

card.title: War of Attrition
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Every player chooses a Character he or she controls if possible :: Smoke those Characters.
card.flavor: "When I gave the Unspoken Name the latest intelligence from 2063, he laughed for several minutes straight."

card.title: Wasting Curse
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Characters with a cost of 4 or more take 1 damage when they unturn.
card.flavor: The Lotus sow sorrow and pain with vile maledictions.

card.title: Wave Disruptor
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Inflict two damage on all opponents' Characters that provide more than 1 resource. Reload: 1

card.title: Wedding Gifts
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: One-Shot. Gain one Power for each unturned Character you do not control.
card.flavor: "We get all this neat stuff just for getting married... We gotta do this more often."

card.title: Wrath of the Monarchs
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Cancel and smoke a non-Unique <Netherworld> card.
card.flavor: In the Netherworld, it's not wise to anger the Monarchs.

card.title: Xiaoyang Yun
card.subtitle: Spy Mastermind
card.text: Unique. During your turn, opponents cannot play Events that require resources in your pool.
card.flavor: "No, I know you too well."

card.title: Yakuza Enforcer
card.subtitle: Killer Hood
card.text: Yakuza Enforcer takes no damage from cards you own. You cannot redirect damage to Yakuza Enforcer.
card.flavor: "Traitors deserve no mercy."

card.title: Zino the Greek
card.subtitle: Netherworld Information Broker
card.text: Unique. Turn to look at target player's hand. Take one card from that player's hand and put it on top of their deck. That player may pay 1 Power to take control of Zino the Greek.

card.title: 200 Guys With Hatchets and Ladders
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Limited. Smoke all non-Unique Characters you control when this card leaves play. When an opponent plays a Unique Character, you may return up to X 1-cost Characters from your smoked pile to play. X= the Unique Character's cost.
card.designators: | 200 guy guys with hatchet hatchets ladder ladders |

card.title: 401k Squad
card.subtitle: Mutated Soldiers
card.text: Toughness: 1. When this card comes into play, discard a card. Target opponent must discard X cards at random. X= the cost of the card you discarded.

card.title: Aerial Bombardment
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Inflict X damage, divided any way you choose, on Characters controlled by an opponent. You may not inflict more than 3 damage on any Character. X= the number of one type of resource in that player's pool.
card.flavor: BuroMil isn't happy until even the rubble is destroyed.

card.title: Ang Dao the Corrupt
card.subtitle: Demon Warrior
card.text: Unique. Regenerate. When Ang Dao the Corrupt enters play you may move any Weapons onto him.
card.flavor: He once challenged hell itself. He failed.

card.title: Ape Nuts
card.subtitle: Crazy Cyborg Monkeys
card.text: Takes no damage from Sites. If you attack, Ape Nuts must be declared as an attacker if possible.
card.flavor: The mad scientists crank these guys out by the dozens.
card.designators: | ape nut nuts crazy cyborg monkey monkeys |

card.title: Arcanogardener
card.subtitle: CDCA Scientist
card.text: When this card enters play, you may inflict one damage each on up to four Sites. Turn and maintain to give a Feng Shui Site you control +3 Body.

card.title: Arcanoleech
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Limited. Play on an opponent's front-row Feng Shui Site. When subject generates Power for an opponent, this card generates one Power for you.

card.title: Balanced Harmonies
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Limited. Turn to remove all damage from cards you control. Inflict an equal amount of damage, divided any way you choose, on your cards. This damage cannot be reduced or redirected. You cannot put enough damage on a card to equal or exceed its Fighting or Body.

card.title: Baptism of Fire
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Play on a Character when damage is inflicted on it. Subject gains +2 Fighting.
card.flavor: "It's just a flesh wound. You'll get used to them."

card.title: Beneficent Tao
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Heal target Feng Shui Site. You may Reload this card when the Body of a Site you control is reduced to 0.
card.flavor: Stories and rumors say the Seven Masters possess lost secrets of geomancy.

card.title: Blanket of Darkness
card.subtitle: Netherworld Edge
card.text: Unique. Turn and maintain to reduce the damage target Character inflicts by 3.
card.designators: | blanket darkness darknes darkne darkn netherworld |

card.title: Bloody Horde
card.subtitle: Demon Trouble
card.text: Bloody Horde's Fighting is increased by the number of other <Demon> <Hordes> you control, plus the number of <Demon> <Hordes> in your smoked pile.

card.title: Boundless Heaven Sword
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Unique. Weapon. This card's cost cannot be reduced, even when returning it to play. Subject Character gains +10 Fighting and its damage cannot be reduced or redirected. Turn to give subject Superleap until the end of the turn.

card.title: Brain Tap Rifle
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Weapon. Play on a Character. Turn to inflict 1 damage on target Character. You may look at target's controller's hand or reveal a Site he or she controls.
card.flavor: "Mind reading's much easier when the brain's not in the skull anymore."

card.title: Buddha's Palm
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Target a Character that is about to enter combat with a Character you control and toast the top X cards of your deck :: Inflict X damage on target. X= the number of [C] resources in your pool.

card.title: Buro Scientist
card.subtitle: Loyal Researcher
card.text: Once per turn, when you play a [H] Event or [H] State, you may unturn a Character.
card.flavor: Not all of the CDCA sided with Boatman.

card.title: Celestial Stance
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Schtick. Subject Character gains Superleap. Pay 1 Power to inflict 2 damage on target Character at subject's location.

card.title: Cenotaph
card.subtitle: Undead Assassin
card.text: Unique. Assassinate. X= the number of Characters in your smoked pile.
card.flavor: "There is no innocent blood. Only blood."

card.title: Chi Syphon
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Play on a Feng Shui Site you control and choose an opponent's Feng Shui Site. Subject's rules text is considered to be blank, and it gains the rules text of the other Site.
card.flavor: "Your good fortune is now ours."

card.title: Cobra Clan Stalkers
card.subtitle: Transformed Animals
card.text: Stealth. +2 damage while you have Power.
card.flavor: Kong Jun She tricked the transformed animals into declaring war on the Seven Masters.
card.designators: | cobra clan stalker stalkers transformed animal animals |

card.title: Combat Courtship
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Faceoff. Turn a Character you control and target an opponent's Character with Fighting no lower than two less than yours. The winner gains Power equal to the number of resources provided by the loser's Character.
card.flavor: Love hurts.

card.title: Cry of the Forgotten Ancestor
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Cancel and smoke target [M] card.
card.flavor: The Lodge was founded in the 11th century with the express purpose of driving magic from the world.

card.title: Curtain of Fullness
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Target player must discard three cards at random.
card.flavor: The stars hold a thousand might-have-beens, none to be beheld by mortal eyes.

card.title: Deep-Cover Rebels
card.subtitle: Subversive Operatives
card.text: You may attack back-row Sites. You may return a Character with a cost of 2 or less from your smoked pile to play when this card is smoked.
card.designators: | deep cover rebel rebels subversive operativ operative operatives |

card.title: Desolation
card.subtitle: Underworld Demon King
card.text: Unique. Uncopyable. Opponents cannot take control of Desolation. Any Event targeting this card costs 1 extra Power to play.
card.flavor: Eruption of the Underworld; the heavens weep.

card.title: Eight Pillars of Heaven Array
card.subtitle: Event
