card.text: Limited. Target X Characters you control that share a designator. Each Character gains +2 damage and Toughness: 1 until the end of the turn. X must be at least 2.

card.title: Essence-Absorbing Stance
card.subtitle: Kung Fu State
card.text: Schtick. Turn to heal subject Character and inflict X damage to target Character that is about to enter combat with subject. X= the amount of damage healed.

card.title: Evil Chanting
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Either inflict 4 damage on target [s] Character, or all [e] Characters gain +2 damage until the end of the turn. Reload: Discard a non-Character [M] card.
card.flavor: "Oh no! Evil chanting!"

card.title: Feast of Souls
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Gain 1 Power when a Character you control is smoked. When this card leaves play, the player to your left steals all your Power.
card.flavor: The Lords of the Underworld demand tribute.

card.title: Fighting Spirit
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Toast It. Play when you have at least two [d] Events in your smoked pile :: Select two of them at random. If they have the same title, toast them; otherwise, return them to your hand.

card.title: Four Mountains Fist
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Schtick. Subject Character gains +1 damage. When subject enters combat, you may choose to have it inflict no damage this combat. At the time it would have inflicted combat damage, instead inflict half that amount (round down) on all opponents' Characters at this location. (This is not combat damage.)

card.title: Geomantic Spirit
card.subtitle: Sorcerous Construct
card.text: When Geomantic Spirit enters play, you may return a Feng Shui Site from your smoked pile to play. (You cannot if you are one Site away from victory.)

card.title: Ghost Wind
card.subtitle: Master of the Liquid Sword
card.text: Unique. When you smoke an opponent's Character and Ghost Wind is not smoked at the same time, gain 1 Power. You cannot gain more than 2 Power per turn this way. May be played at no cost if an opponent controls 5 or more Characters.

card.title: Glimpse of Brief Eternity
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Target an opponent :: Reveal the top five cards of that player's deck. You may smoke one non-Site card that shares a designator with any of these cards. Put the revealed cards on the bottom of the deck in any order.
card.flavor: "Rhys, I could see...everything."

card.title: Gold Lion
card.subtitle: Master of the Wah-Shan Clan
card.text: Unique. Superleap against opponents who have Power in their pool. Once per turn, you may discard a card to heal X damage on him. X= the cost of the discarded card.
card.designators: | gold lion master wah shan clan |

card.title: Grey Mountain
card.subtitle: Transformed Elephant Chieftain
card.text: Unique. Toughness: 2. +1 Fighting for each <Transformed> and <Lodge> card in play. Mobility while a <Transformed> or <Lodge> card is the target of an attack.

card.title: Haunted Forest
card.subtitle: Site
card.text: Haunted Forest copies the rules text of any Site to the immediate left of it.
card.flavor: Li Mao had heard stories of the evil that lurked in the dark forest.

card.title: Ho Chen
card.subtitle: Master of the Flawless Strike
card.text: Unique. Superleap against opponents who have 3 or more cards in their hand. Once per turn, you may discard a card to do X damage to target Character about to enter combat with Ho Chen. X= the cost of the discarded card.
card.designators: | ho chen master flawles flawless strike |

card.title: Hopping Vampire
card.subtitle: Ancient Monster
card.text: At the end of any turn in which one or more "Hopping Vampire" you control smoked a Character with combat damage, you may return exactly one "Hopping Vampire" to play. This ability is active while in your smoked pile.

card.title: Hordes of Saboteurs
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Smoke a Feng Shui Site you control if this card leaves play. Turn this card and a Character you control to cancel an ability maintained by or an effect generated by turning a Site.

card.title: Ice Sword
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Weapon. Subject Character gains +3 Fighting. You may remove 2 damage from one of your cards when subject inflicts combat damage.
card.flavor: Not all weapons in Pi Tui's arsenal are high-tech.

card.title: Incarnate Abstraction
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Subject Edge is also an Uncopyable <Spirit> Character with a printed Fighting of X. X= twice subject's cost, or 1 if the cost is 0. (The Character is still controlled by the Edge's controller, who must choose a location for it.)
card.flavor: Any concept can be given shape and form.

card.title: Invincible Earth Sword
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Unique. Weapon. This card's cost cannot be reduced, even when returning it to play. Subject Character gains +10 Fighting, takes no damage from Sites, and is not affected by Sites' effects. Turn to give subject Toughness: 3 until the end of the turn.

card.title: Invincible Stance
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Schtick. Subject Character gains Toughness: 1. Pay 1 Power :: Subject gains Toughness: 3 until the end of the turn.
card.flavor: The swords were like a light spring rain against Sky Dragon's skin.

card.title: Jade Palace of the Dragon King
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Unique. You may remove one damage from any card you control when a Character is smoked.
card.flavor: A place of wondrous magic and fantastic treasures, now all but forgotten.

card.title: Jaguar Warriors
card.subtitle: Elite Darkness Soldiers
card.text: All interceptors inflict -1 damage while this card is attacking.
card.flavor: Swift and silent, they fall upon the unprepared with their razor claws.
card.designators: | jaguar warrior warriors elite darkness darknes darkne darkn soldier soldiers |

card.title: Jenaya Ou
card.subtitle: Vengeful Sorcerer
card.text: Unique. When non-combat damage is inflicted on this card, you may inflict an equal amount of damage on any target in play.

card.title: Jiang Fei
card.subtitle: Seductive Ghost
card.text: Unique. Comes into play with two counters on her. Place a counter on her at the start of your turn. Remove a counter and target a Character :: Target cannot intercept her this turn.

card.title: Kick 'em When They're Down
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Inflict 2 damage on every damaged Character and 1 damage on every damaged Site.
card.flavor: "It's easier this way!"

card.title: Killing Rain
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Inflict 2 damage on all Sites.
card.flavor: Corruption of the heavens; Corruption of the lake; Misfortune.

card.title: Know Your Enemy
card.subtitle: Kung Fu State
card.text: Schtick. Play on a Character. Prior to combat, you may turn this card to copy the rules text of a Character subject is about to enter combat with onto subject until the end of the turn.

card.title: Kong Jun She
card.subtitle: Master of the Forbidden Stance
card.text: Unique. Regenerate. -1 Fighting for every other Character you control. Once per turn, you may discard two cards to toast a card in an opponent's smoked pile.
card.designators: | kong jun she master forbidden stance |

card.title: Kunlun Clan Assault
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Inflict 3 damage, divided any way you choose, on target Characters and/or Sites.
card.flavor: The Kunlun were legendary for their prowess in battle.

card.title: Leopard Clan Warriors
card.subtitle: Transformed Animals
card.text: Once per turn, you may turn a <Mountain> Site you control to give your choice of Stealth or Ambush to all "Leopard Clan Warriors" until the end of the turn.
card.designators: | leopard clan warrior warriors transformed animal animals |

card.title: Li Mao vPAP
card.subtitle: Accidental Hero
card.text: Unique. When an opponent plays an Event, Li Mao gains +1 Fighting until he leaves play. Superleap while his Fighting is greater than 5.
card.flavor: Some people were born for greatness, others just stumble into it.

card.title: Li Mao vPAP
card.subtitle: Young Master
card.text: Unique. When Li Mao enters play, choose a resource. He is not affected by Events that require that resource. Discard a non-Character [C] or [M] card to give him Superleap until the end of the turn.

card.title: Lin
card.subtitle: Moon Sorceress
card.text: Unique. Turn to remove all damage and any States you wish from target Character you own or control. Takes no damage from cards you control. Damage cannot be redirected to Lin.

card.title: Long Axe and Short Axe
card.subtitle: Martial Artist Assassins
card.text: Unique. Double all damage bonuses from Weapons this card is the subject of. While the subject of a Weapon, cannot be targeted by effects that are generated by turning a card.
card.designators: | long axe short martial artist assassin assassins |

card.title: Lui Yu Min
card.subtitle: Shaolin Master
card.text: Unique. His damage cannot be reduced or redirected. Superleap against opponents who control a Site you own or have a Site you own in their burned for victory pile.

card.title: Lunar Sword
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Unique. Weapon. Subject Character gains +X Fighting. X= the number of resources required and provided by that Character.

card.title: Master Bowman
card.subtitle: Heroic Archer
card.text: When Master Bowman turns to attack, you may inflict 1 damage on any card at the location of his target.
card.flavor: He's number one with an arrow.

card.title: Material Transcendence
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Play on a Character. Subject is not a legal subject for other States. Subject is an Edge, not a Character. Damage cannot be redirected to subject.
card.flavor: The gift of transcendence has strings attached.

card.title: Miasma
card.subtitle: Stealer of Souls
card.text: Unique. Regenerate. When a Character is smoked, put a counter on Miasma. Remove a counter to inflict one damage on a Character at Miasma's location.

card.title: Monkey Fools the Tiger
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Give an opponent 1 Power to redirect all damage done to a card you control by a Character that player controls back to that Character.
card.flavor: To defeat your enemy, turn his energy against him.

card.title: Monkeywrenching
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play during your turn. Turn up to X Sites. All Sites turned by this card unturn at the end of the turn. X= the number of [j] resources in your pool.

card.title: Monsoon
card.subtitle: Flying Swordsman
card.text: Unique. Superleap. May attack back-row Sites.
card.flavor: "You're lucky I happened to come by, or you'd be dead for sure!"

card.title: Mountain Fortress
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Turn and maintain to give target Character +X Fighting. X= the amount of damage on this card.
card.flavor: Isolated in the mountains, the Masters seldom interfere in worldly affairs.

card.title: Netherflitter
card.subtitle: Weird Science State
card.text: Vehicle. Subject Character gains +1 Fighting and Mobility, and takes no damage from Characters whose Fighting is even.
card.flavor: It's not so bad once it gets off the ground.

card.title: Neural Stimulator
card.subtitle: Arcanowave State
card.text: Schtick. Turn while subject Character is attacking to give subject Ambush against the next Character it is in combat with this attack.
card.flavor: Thirty seconds of bullet time; four months of aftereffects.

card.title: No Shadow Kick
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Schtick. When subject Character enters combat with another Character, inflict X damage on that Character. (Before combat damage is dealt.) X= subject's Fighting.
card.flavor: Made famous by Wong Fei Hong.

card.title: Occult Kung Fu
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Play on a Character and choose a non-Unique Character in your smoked pile. Subject gains +1 Fighting and the rules text of that Character.
card.flavor: The Seven Masters were the greatest warriors of the martial arts world.

card.title: One Thousand Swords
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Weapon. Play on a Character. Turn and pay 1 Power to give all Characters you control Mobility until the end of the turn. Turn and pay 1 Power to inflict one damage each on up to four Characters at this location.

card.title: Orange Master
card.subtitle: Martial Artist
card.text: X= The number of different faction resources in your pool.
card.flavor: "The Principle of Diversity is the ultimate weapon, for it contains all other weapons."

card.title: Ordinal Spirit
card.subtitle: Mathematical Construct
card.text: Takes no damage from any card with 14 or more letters in its title.

card.title: Out For Blood
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Limited. Play if you have more Characters in your smoked pile than any other player. Toast a Character in your smoked pile :: Gain 2 Power.

card.title: Pao Yeh Pao Lo Mi
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Either target [s] Character gains +3 Fighting until the end of the turn, or cancel a [e] Event. Reload: Discard a non-Character [C] card.
card.flavor: A prayer to ward off evil and fortify the spirit.

card.title: Peacock Clan Warriors
card.subtitle: Transformed Animals
card.text: Tactics. +1 Fighting for each opponent with only one kind of faction resource in his or her pool.
card.designators: | peacock clan warrior warriors transformed animal animals |

card.title: Penal Soldiers
card.subtitle: BuroMil Conscripts
card.text: Must intercept attacks at their location. Cannot attack while you do not control a <Colonel>, <Commandant>, or <General> card.
card.designators: | penal soldier soldiers buro mil conscript conscripts |

card.title: Phoenix Stance
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Schtick. Subject Character gains Regenerate. Pay 1 Power :: Subject gains Guts until the end of the turn.
card.flavor: The ancient masters could heal their bodies by focusing their will.

card.title: Poison Clan Warriors
card.subtitle: Hood Martial Artists
card.text: Sacrifice to inflict 2 damage on target Character.
card.flavor: "Dread poisoners and killers for hire, they are the most evil of the martial arts clans."
card.designators: | poison clan warrior warriors hood martial artist artists |

card.title: Rapid Response Team
card.subtitle: PubOrd Cops
card.text: You may play Rapid Response Team during any Main Shot. You may fill your hand to your maximum hand size when Rapid Response Team enters play.
card.designators: | rapid response team pub ord cop cops |

card.title: Rat Clan Spies
card.subtitle: Transformed Animals
card.text: Stealth while you control a <Lodge> or <Transformed> Character that requires resources.
card.designators: | rat clan spy sp spies transformed animal animals |

card.title: Ready For Action
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Once per turn, you may unturn subject Character when an attack is declared and subject is not an attacker.
card.flavor: "Lock and load!"

card.title: Red Bat
card.subtitle: Master of the Kunlun Clan
card.text: Unique. Independent. +1 Fighting for each Event in your smoked pile. May be played at no cost if any opponent has 8 or more Events in his or her smoked pile.

card.title: Red Master
card.subtitle: Martial Artist
card.text: Superleap while undamaged.
card.flavor: Stillness becomes action; the tiger strikes.

card.title: Righteous Heaven Stance
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Subject Character gains Mobility, Superleap, and +2 Fighting.
card.flavor: No man, nor even an army, can stand against the righteous power of heaven.

card.title: Rogue Scientist
card.subtitle: CDCA Defector
card.text: Turn and discard two cards :: Look at the top three cards of your deck. Put one in your hand and the others on either the top or the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.title: Shadow Legion
card.subtitle: Elite Ex-Buro Soldiers
card.text: Can be played during any Main Shot. If you played Shadow Legion from your hand during your turn, you may search your deck for any [p] card, show it to all players, put it in your hand, and reshuffle.
card.designators: | shadow legion elite ex buro soldier soldiers |

card.title: Shaolin Defender
card.subtitle: Guardian Monk
card.text: When an attack is declared against a <Garden> Site you control, you may play this card at -1 cost. Superleap while you control a <Garden> Site.

card.title: Shaolin Monkey
card.subtitle: Simian Martial Artist
card.text: When Shaolin Monkey enters play, he gains one of the following: Independent, Guts, or Mobility.
card.flavor: Monkey see, Monkey Fu.

card.title: Shaolin Swordsman
card.subtitle: Martial Artist
card.text: Superleap while the subject of a <Sword> or [C] State.
card.flavor: The Lotus used the enmity between Shaolin and Wudang to their advantage.
card.designators: | shaolin sword swords man martial artist |

card.title: Shaolin vs. Wudang
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Turn any number of Characters you control. Each Character enters a Faceoff with target Character whose Fighting is no lower than two less than its own. All these Faceoffs are simultaneous, and no Character may be in more than one. The winner of each Faceoff gains 1 Power.

card.title: Shards of Warped Reflection
card.subtitle: Fractured Construct
card.text: Unique. Uncopyable. Immediately when this card enters play, its printed Fighting becomes equal to the printed Fighting of any Character, and its printed rules text copies the rules text of a different Character.
card.designators: | shard shards warped reflection fractured construct |

card.title: Shrieking Witch Heads
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Inflict X damage on target Character. X= the number of Characters in your smoked pile.
card.flavor: Shrieking and wailing, the tortured spirits flew out from within Miasma's cloak.

card.title: Shu Kan
card.subtitle: Tree Demon
card.text: Unique. Cannot attack unless you pay 1 Power when you declare him as an attacker.
card.flavor: Evil takes root; nature is corrupted.

card.title: Shung Dai
card.subtitle: Guardian Monk
card.text: Unique. Toughness: 1. Cannot be intercepted by Characters with a cost of 3 or less.
card.flavor: Condemned by the gods to guard the Boundless Heaven Sword for all eternity.

card.title: Sir Gawain
card.subtitle: Timewalker Knight
card.text: Unique. Guts. When you play a Weapon on Sir Gawain, draw a card. Reload: 1.
card.flavor: "Perfidy broke the Round Table. For honor and glory, I now serve the Thunder King."

card.title: Sky Dragon
card.subtitle: Master of the Invulnerable Stance
card.text: Unique. Takes no combat damage.
card.flavor: He lives alone on a mountaintop, working each day to perfect his kung fu.

card.title: Solar Sword
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Weapon. Subject Character gains +2 damage, or +3 if a <Sword> Character. When a <Sword> Character you control is smoked, you may return this card to play at no cost.

card.title: Soul Theft
card.subtitle: State
card.text: If subject Character is smoked due to damage and you did not control subject, return it to play under your control. It gains the designator <Undead>.

card.title: Storming the Gates of Hell
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Limited. Play when you declare an attack. All your attackers gain +2 Fighting until the end of the attack. At the end of the attack, smoke all those Characters.
card.flavor: "Is that all we have to worry about?"

card.title: Sword Saint
card.subtitle: Spiritual Warrior
card.text: Not a legal subject for non-Weapon States. When he smokes a Character by inflicting combat damage while attacking, that Character's controller gains Power equal to the smoked Character's cost.

card.title: Terracotta Warriors
card.subtitle: Ghost State
card.text: Schtick. Play on a front-row Site. Turn to inflict 2 damage on target Character at this location.
card.flavor: Guardian spirits bound to stone for all eternity.

card.title: The Book of Wrath
card.subtitle: Thunder Edge
card.text: Unique. Turn and maintain and target an opponent's Character :: Gain 1 Power when that Character is smoked.
card.flavor: Huan Ken neither forgives nor forgets.

card.title: The Celestial Eye
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Unique. Schtick. Play on a Character. Turn to place two counters on this card. Remove X counters and turn :: Inflict X damage on all Characters and Sites at target location.

card.title: The Lady or the Tiger?
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Target opponent must discard three cards at random. Look at the top five cards of target's deck, and divide them into two piles. Without looking, target may put one pile in his or her hand. Put the other pile on the bottom of the deck in any order.

card.title: The Queen's Wrath
card.subtitle: Darkness Event
card.text: Smoke target Character with a cost or Fighting of 1. Reload: Sacrifice a Character with a cost or Fighting of 1.
card.flavor: Don't make her angry. You wouldn't like her when she's angry.
card.designators: | the queen queens wrath darkness darknes darkne darkn |

card.title: The Shattered Mirror
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Until the end of the turn, replace one designator in target Character's rules text with a designator of your choice other than <Netherworld>.
card.flavor: The broken shards reflect a million worlds that never were.

card.title: The Swords Unite
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Look through your deck for a <Sword> State, show it to your opponents, put it in your hand, and reshuffle. If the card was "Boundless Heaven Sword" or "Invincible Earth Sword", gain 2 Power if the other is in play.

card.title: Thousand Sword Mountain
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Unique. Once during your turn, you may spend one damage on this card as if it were Power to play a Character or State.
card.flavor: "Only one sword is the sword you seek."

card.title: Thunder Captain
card.subtitle: Netherworld Knight
card.text: Gain 1 Power if Thunder Captain inflicts combat damage on the target of his attack. Gain 1 Power if Thunder Captain is removed from play by an opponent's Event.

card.title: Thunder Inquisitor
card.subtitle: Netherworld Sorcerer
card.text: Turn and maintain and choose a Character :: That Character inflicts -X damage. X= Thunder Inquisitor's Fighting at the time you turned him.

card.title: Ting Ting's Bandits
card.subtitle: Righteous Hoods
card.text: When this card inflicts combat damage on a Site, the Site's controller reveals a card from his or her hand. You may force him or her to discard either that card, or a random one from the rest of his or her hand. This effect is not cumulative.
card.designators: | ting tings bandit bandits righteou righteous hood hoods |

card.title: Tom Donovan
card.subtitle: Hard-Boiled Detective
card.text: Unique.
card.flavor: Heroes, spies and G-men battle for the ultimate prize as Shadowfist plunges into the pulp era! Get ready for a world of mystery and danger as Two-Fisted Tales of the Secret War hits shelves in the summer of 2004.

card.title: Tranquil Persuader
card.subtitle: Mastermind
card.text: Turn and maintain to take control of target Character. This ability ceases to be maintained if the Power in your pool is less than or equal to the Character's cost.

card.title: Uncontrolled Mutation
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Not cumulative. Double target Character's Fighting until the end of the turn. Smoke target at the end of the turn.
card.flavor: Exposure to arcanowave energy has some nasty but occasionally useful side effects.

card.title: Underworld Gateway
card.subtitle: State
card.text: You may play exactly one "Underworld Gateway" on an opponent's Site when you seize or burn a Site that player controls. If you control three "Underworld Gateway", you win the game. Reload: Discard a Feng Shui Site.

card.title: Unexpected Rescue
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play during an attack against a card you control. Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you either reveal a Character or have revealed five cards. Play that Character at no cost if you have sufficient resources. Reshuffle. The Character cannot be sacrificed. Put it on top of your deck at the end of the attack if it is still in play.

card.title: Wah-Shan Clan Warriors
card.subtitle: Martial Arts Students
card.flavor: The Wah-Shan were the most numerous of the clans of the Seven Masters.
card.designators: | wah shan clan warrior warriors martial art arts student students |

card.title: Wall of a Thousand Eyes
card.subtitle: Netherworld Feng Shui Site
card.text: Characters attacking Sites you control cannot use Ambush, Stealth, Superleap, or Tactics.
card.flavor: "The place wouldn't be half as creepy if the freaking eyes would just blink in unison."
card.designators: | wall thousand ey eye eyes netherworld |

card.title: Wandering Monk
card.subtitle: Martial Artist
card.text: Unique. If you are closer to victory than all opponents at the end of a turn, smoke Wandering Monk.

card.title: Wandering Swordsman
card.subtitle: Heroic Warrior
card.text: Independent. +3 damage during any turn in which an attack you declared failed.
card.flavor: Knights-errant who roam the countryside, fighting for honor and justice.
card.designators: | wandering sword swords man heroic warrior |

card.title: "We Need Bigger Guns!"
card.subtitle: State
card.text: All combat and non-combat damage subject Character inflicts is increased by 1.
card.flavor: "And it even has a silencer!"

card.title: Wing of the Crane
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Smoke target Character. Return it to play under its owner's control at the end of the next player's turn if it is still in the smoked pile.

card.title: Wolf Clan Hunters
card.subtitle: Transformed Animals
card.text: +X Fighting while attacking. X= The number of other attacking <Transformed> Characters.
card.flavor: The wolf packs led the charge against the clans of the Seven Masters.
card.designators: | wolf clan hunter hunters transformed animal animals |

card.title: Wondrous Illusion
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Heal all Sites you control and smoke all States on them. Turn all Feng Shui Sites you both own and control face-down and rearrange your Sites. This cannot move a Site to a position that was not previously occupied. This may change the target of an attack.

card.title: Wu Bin of Turtle Island
card.subtitle: Wandering Sorcerer
card.text: Unique. Independent. When you play him from your hand, look through your deck for any card and put it in your hand.
card.flavor: He knows many wondrous secrets.
card.designators: | wu bin turtle island wandering sorcerer |

card.title: Wudang Monk
card.subtitle: Martial Artist
card.text: Once per turn, you may copy the rules text of a non-Unique Character to this card until the end of the turn.

card.title: Wudang Mountain
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Unique. Turn to remove one or two damage from a Character you control, and inflict one damage on an opponent's Character.
card.flavor: Wudang Mountain has many secrets. Only one man knows them all.

card.title: Wu Man Kai
card.subtitle: Master of Wudang Mountain
card.text: Unique. Once per turn, you may discard a card to cancel a Character until the end of the turn. Once per turn, you may discard 2 cards to cancel a Site, Edge, or State until the end of the turn.
card.designators: | wu man kai master wudang mountain |

card.title: Xiang Kai
card.subtitle: Poison Clan Chieftain
card.text: Unique. When Xiang Kai turns to attack, you must inflict 2 damage each to target Character and target Site.
card.flavor: "I killed the old man, and now I'll kill you!"

card.title: Ape City
card.subtitle: Jungle Site
card.text: Unique. All Characters you control that are not <Monkey>, <Ape>, <Gorilla>, <Simian>, or <Chimp> inflict -1 damage.
card.flavor: Legends speak of a city of apes deep within the jungle.

card.title: Athena
card.subtitle: Reascended Owl Mastermind
card.text: Unique. Your hand size is increased by 3. +X Fighting. X= the number of [H] in your pool.
card.flavor: "I knew she was trouble the moment I laid eyes on her."

card.title: Aztec Mummy
card.subtitle: Undead Guardian
card.text: Takes double damage from <Fire> cards. Turn a <Temple> or <Tomb> Site you control to give this card +1 Fighting until the end of the turn. Turn a <Priest> or <Priestess> Character you control to give this card Toughness: 1 until the end of the turn.

card.title: Aztec Pyramid
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: At the end of the turn, if this card is unturned and there is no coin on it, flip a coin and leave it on this card. At any time a player has to flip a coin, you may immediately remove the coin on this card, and its result is the result of the flip. Turn to remove the coin on this card.

card.title: Bad Colonel
card.subtitle: Pledged Hood Warlord
card.text: Turn and maintain to take control of a <Soldier> card. All <Soldiers> you control gain the designator <Hood> and +1 damage.

card.title: Blitzkrieg
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Limited. Unturn all attacking <Soldier> Characters.
card.flavor: They struck like lightning, crushing all in their path.

card.title: Booby Trap
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play during an attack on a Site you control. Inflict 3 damage on that Site and all Characters at its location.
card.flavor: "I knew we couldn't hold it, so I wired the joint to blow."

card.title: Booby-Trapped Tomb
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: When this Site is revealed, you may inflict 3 damage on target Character at its location.
card.flavor: The ancients do not welcome visitors.

card.title: Breath of the Dragon
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Limited. Until the end of the turn, target attacker gains Toughness: 2 and +3 damage.
card.flavor: ÒThe ashes of my enemies disperse in the wind.Ó

card.title: Bullwhip
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Limited. Weapon. Subject Character gains +1 damage while this is unturned. Turn to turn a Character at subject's location; that Character ceases intercepting.
card.flavor: There was a loud crack, and the dagger went flying from Xitllali's hand.

card.title: Captain Jake Molloy
card.subtitle: Daredevil Pilot
card.text: Unique. Guts. Mobility. When he is targeted by a non-Character card, you may discard a card of the same type to cancel the effect targeting him.

card.title: Carmen Zhou
card.subtitle: Leader of the Swords of Heaven
card.text: Unique. Gains +1 Fighting until she leaves play when a Feng Shui Site is revealed.
card.flavor: No one suspected who she was.
card.designators: | carman carmen zhou leader sword swords heaven |

card.title: Casbah
card.subtitle: Site
card.text: If this Site is in your front row when an opponent plays a 0-cost Event, you may steal 1 Power from him or her.
card.flavor: In the old quarter market there are a thousand ways a man might profit... or perish.

card.title: Chang
card.subtitle: Red Scorpion Hood Martial Artist
card.text: Unique. When he is damaged, you may inflict 1 damage on any Character at his location. When he smokes a Character by inflicting combat damage, remove X damage from him. X= half (round up) the cost of the smoked Character.
card.designators: | chang red scorpion hood martial artist |

card.title: Charge of the Righteous
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Limited. Put a counter on this card when an attacker you control is smoked. Turn and remove all counters to give an attacker +X Fighting until the end of the turn. X= the number of counters removed.

card.title: Cliffhanger
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Limited. Play when a Unique Character you control that requires resources is smoked by an opponent. Cut your deck and reveal the top card. You may play it at no cost, regardless of type.
card.flavor: Just when you think things canÕt get worse...

card.title: Colonel Wilhelm Reiger
card.subtitle: Buro Agent
card.text: Unique. All <Battleground> Sites you control gain Toughness: 1. Turn a <Battleground> Site you control to give target <Soldier> Character +2 Fighting until the end of the turn.

card.title: Curse of Itzcoliuhqui
card.subtitle: Darkness State
card.text: Subject Character inflicts -1 damage. When subject is declared as an attacker or interceptor, its controller must discard one card at random.
card.flavor: Xitllali spoke, and instantly his flesh began to wither.
card.designators: | curse itzcoliuhqui darkness darknes darkne darkn |

card.title: Damsel in Distress
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Faceoff. Turn a Character you control and target an opponent's Character with Fighting no lower than two less than yours. The winner may return a Character with a cost of 3 or less from his or her smoked pile to play.

card.title: David Maxwell
card.subtitle: Man About Town
card.text: Unique. Generates one Power during your Establishing Shot. Immediately return "The Nemesis" to its owner's hand when this card enters play.

card.title: Deadly Hands
card.subtitle: Kung Fu State
card.text: Play on a Character. Discard a card :: Subject gains +1 Fighting until the end of the turn.
card.flavor: The secret technique of the Jade Dragon masters.

card.title: Deathtrap
card.subtitle: State
card.text: When any Character enters combat with subject Site, inflict 1 damage on that Character. (Before combat damage is dealt.)
card.flavor: Watch where you step.

card.title: Difficulty at the Beginning
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play when an opponent plays a card. Toast that card unless its controller pays 1 Power.

card.title: Disguise Kit
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Play on a non-Unique Character that requires no resources. Characters that require resources cannot intercept subject.
card.flavor: ÒI dunno. She was just some ordinary skirt. Nobody special.Ó

card.title: Disintegrator Ray
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Weapon. Subject Character gains +1 Fighting. If subject smokes a Character by inflicting damage, toast that Character instead.

card.title: Dr. Amanda Snow
card.subtitle: Treasure Hunter
card.text: Unique. Guts. Not affected by effects generated by opponents' Sites, and takes no damage from them. Once per turn, you may play a State on her from any player's smoked pile, ignoring resource conditions.

card.title: Dr. Ivan Vasilovich
card.subtitle: Mad Scientist
card.text: Unique. Heal all [j] Characters when he enters play. Turn to gain 2 Power when an opponent plays an Event.
card.flavor: "They called me mad? Fools, I'll show them all!"

card.title: Dr. Klaus Herrbruck
card.subtitle: CDCA Scientist
card.text: Unique. All non-Character, non-Site [H] cards in your smoked pile have Reload: 1.
card.flavor: "With our science, think of what you could achieve..."
card.designators: | dr klau klaus herrbruck cdca scientist |

card.title: Drugged!
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Subject Character inflicts -2 damage. Damage inflicted on subject cannot be reduced.

card.title: Eisenriese
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Vehicle. Subject Character gains +1 Fighting, Toughness: 1, and +3 damage to Sites.
card.flavor: The iron behemoth crashed through the jungle, spitting fiery death.

card.title: Electro-Gauntlet
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Weapon. Play on a Character. This card enters play with 1 counter on it. Put 1 counter on this card at the start of your turn. Turn to put 1 counter on this card. Turn and remove X counters to give subject +X damage until the end of the turn.

card.title: Elsa Winterhagen
card.subtitle: Supersoldier
card.text: Unique. You may inflict 3 damage on this card, which cannot be reduced or redirected, to redirect all damage that would be inflicted on her by a single source to any Character that is not the source of the damage.

card.title: Faceless Minions
card.subtitle: Cultist Swarm
card.text: When this card is smoked, all opponents' Characters at this location take 1 damage.
card.flavor: The world never lacks for fools.
card.designators: | faceles faceless minion minions cultist swarm |

card.title: Far Too Much Dynamite
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play when a Character you control is smoked by target Character that was intercepting or attacking it :: Smoke target.
card.flavor: ÒIs that possible?Ó

card.title: Femme Fatale
card.subtitle: Sinister Seductress
card.text: Turn during an attack on a card you control. Target Character controlled by an opponent gains Mobility until the end of the attack, and must be declared as an interceptor if possible.

card.title: Fire Martyr
card.subtitle: Netherworld Assassin
card.text: When he turns to attack, he gains +4 Fighting until the end of the turn.
card.flavor: Exposure to fire magic has burned away their instinct for self-preservation.

card.title: Fortuitous Chi
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Play on a Character you control. Subject and all characters you control sharing a designator with it cannot turn to attack Characters. They cannot be removed from play by, and take no damage from, opponents' Events.

card.title: Gangsters
card.subtitle: Hood Muscle
card.text: +1 damage to Characters.
card.flavor: ÒAlright boys, take care of him.Ó

card.title: G-Man
card.subtitle: Pledged Agent
card.text: +1 Fighting for each card in opponents' burned-for-victory piles.
card.flavor: ÒThis is a raid!Ó

card.title: Guard Tower
card.subtitle: Battleground Site
card.text: Any player who seizes this Site gains 1 Power. If this Site is in your front row, turn and maintain and target a Character :: While intercepting, target inflicts its combat damage at the same time that an attacker with Ambush would.

card.title: Gun Moll
card.subtitle: Dishy Hood
card.text: Turn and maintain and target a Character :: Steal 1 Power from target's controller at the beginning of his or her Main Shot. (Cards may be played in response to the theft.) Target cannot attack this card.

card.title: "Hammer" Harrison
card.subtitle: Hood Bruiser
card.text: Unique. Takes no damage from Characters whose cost is less than 3.
card.flavor: Strong as an ape, and twice as ugly.

card.title: Heroic Agents
card.subtitle: Legion of Supporters
card.text: Cannot attack Characters. When this card is smoked by an opponent, you may steal up to 2 Power from him or her.
card.flavor: Heroes don't stand alone.
card.designators: | heroic agent agents legion supporter supporters |

card.title: Hidden Tomb
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: You may play States on Hidden Tomb at -1 cost.
card.flavor: In dark jungles and vast deserts, secrets await.

card.title: Hired Bodyguard
card.subtitle: Cheap Hood Muscle
card.text: While intercepting, gains +2 Fighting and Toughness: 2.
card.flavor: ÒRemove Mr. Donovan Ð and donÕt be gentle.Ó

card.title: Hired Killer
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Schtick. Play on a <Hood> Character. Turn subject to inflict X damage on target Character. X= subject's cost.
card.flavor: ÒIt's just business. Nothing personal.Ó

card.title: Hypnotized!
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Turn target Character. Until the end of the turn, target cannot intercept, and its rules text is blank.
card.flavor: ÒSleeeeep...Ó

card.title: Insidious Plan
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Limited. Put a counter on this card at the end of your turn. Sacrifice to either gain X Power or draw X cards. X= the number of counters on this card.

card.title: Invisi-Ray
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Unique. Subject Character cannot be attacked. Reload: Sacrifice a [H] card.
card.flavor: Somehow, these things always manage to fall into the wrong hands.

card.title: Itzcoliuhqui
card.subtitle: Undead King
card.text: Unique. Takes double damage from <Fire> cards. Turn a <Temple> or <Tomb> Site you control to play an <Undead> Character from your smoked pile. Sacrifice a non-<Undead> Character to heal Itzcoliuhqui.

card.title: Jade Dragon Monk
card.subtitle: Mysterious Martial Artist
card.text: Superleap. Once per turn while this card is attacking, you may cancel an Edge or State until the end of the attack.
card.flavor: The order of the Jade Dragon was steeped in mystery.
card.designators: | jade dragon monk mysteriou mysterious martial artist |

card.title: John Fenris, the Iron Man
card.subtitle: Reascended Wolf Hero
card.text: Unique. Uncopyable. Toughness: 1. Guts. Once per turn, you may copy the printed text of any other Character to this card until the end of the turn.
card.designators: | john fenri fenris iron man reascended wolf hero |

card.title: Khalid Al-Haddad
card.subtitle: Fire Assassin
card.text: Unique. Assassinate. When he smokes the target of his attack, gain 1 Power or draw 2 cards.

card.title: K'tongo
card.subtitle: The White Ape
card.text: Unique. When he enters play, immediately toast any number of cards in your smoked pile at random. X= the number of cards toasted.

card.title: Kwan Lung-Wei
card.subtitle: Jade Dragon Master
card.text: Unique. Not a legal subject for States. Not affected by Events.
card.flavor: The order of the Jade Dragon passed down the teachings of the Perfect Master.
card.designators: | kwan lung wei jade dragon master |

card.title: Lair of the Nemesis
card.subtitle: Secret Feng Shui Site
card.text: Unique. Place a counter on this card at the start of your turn if it is unturned. You may spend counters on this card as if they were Power to play Unique [d] Characters. Turn and maintain to give target [d] Character Toughness: 1.

card.title: Lateral Reincarnation
card.subtitle: Event
card.flavor: The events of Two-Fisted Tales have changed the Secret War forever! See how the future and the modern day have changed in Critical Shift, coming from Z-Man Games next summer.

card.title: Lord Wolfgang Thaler
card.subtitle: Thunder Champion
card.text: Unique. Toughness: 1. Not affected by Events. An Event's controller may pay 1 Power to have him be affected by it, either while playing the Event, or at the start of the Event's resolution.

card.title: Madame Yen
card.subtitle: The Dragon Lady
card.text: Unique. Assassinate. Once per turn, you may remove one damage from her to inflict two damage on a Character at her location.

card.title: Marmojet
card.subtitle: Flying Monkey
card.text: Mobility. Once per turn, you may give another Character at this location Mobility until the end of the turn.
card.flavor: ÒAs if regular flying monkeys werenÕt enough...Ó

card.title: Mask of The Nemesis
card.subtitle: Secret Identity State
card.text: Unique. Subject Character gains +2 Fighting and Stealth.
card.flavor: ÒJustice is blind, but I see everything.Ó
card.designators: | mask the nemesi nemesis secret identity |

card.title: Master of Disguise
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Play on a Character you control and target a Unique Character. Subject is considered to be Unique and to have the same title as target. (Subject also has its own title.)
card.flavor: ÒI thought you were out of town.Ó

card.title: Mount Erebus
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Unique. Uncopyable. When you seize this Site, and it remains in your front row until the start of your next turn, you win the game.
card.flavor: The center of everything.

card.title: Murder By Night
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play during any Main Shot :: Discard a card at random and return this card to play as a Character with a printed Fighting of 3, Assassinate, and Toast It. Sacrifice it at the end of the turn. (The Character is not an Event.)

card.title: Necromantic Conspiracy
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: One-Shot. Search target opponent's deck for up to four cards with the same title that require resources. Toast those cards and reshuffle.

card.title: Obsidian Dagger
card.subtitle: Darkness State
card.text: Weapon. Subject Character gains Assassinate and +1 damage. Turn when a Character is sacrificed to gain 1 Power.
card.flavor: Stained with the blood of a thousand sacrifices.
card.designators: | obsidian dagger darkness darknes darkne darkn |

card.title: Plots and Intrigues
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Reveal X of your face-down Feng Shui Sites to gain X Power.
card.flavor: ÒTrust in God, but tie up your camel.Ó Ð traditional Arab proverb

card.title: Poisoned!
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Inflict 1 damage on all interceptors. They also inflict -1 damage until the end of the attack. Reload: [e] [e] [e] 1
card.flavor: There was a hissing sound and the guards fell to the floor.

card.title: Priestess of Itzcoliuhqui
card.subtitle: Darkness Sorceress
card.text: When you sacrifice a card, you may turn exactly one "Priestess of Itzcoliuhqui" to Reload a card in your smoked pile.
card.designators: | priestes priestess itzcoliuhqui darkness darknes darkne darkn sorceres sorceress |

card.title: Priest of the Unnameable
card.subtitle: Cult Leader
card.text: When Priest of the Unnameable attacks, you may immediately name a card. That card cannot be played during the attack.
card.flavor: The knowledge of what may be comes at a high price.

card.title: Probability Manipulator
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Unique. Turn to raise or lower by one until the end of the turn any number not written as words on another card. This cannot change a number to zero.

card.title: Public Enemy No. 1
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Unique. Play on a Character, except during an attack. Characters gain Ambush while attacking subject.
card.flavor: "Wanted alive, in theory."

card.title: Rabenfels Castle
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Unique. Turn and maintain to give all Sites at target location Toughness: 1.
card.flavor: A place of perverted science and occult power.

card.title: Rampage!
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Limited. All Characters you control inflict +1 damage while attacking and -1 damage otherwise.

card.title: Red Scorpion Killers
card.subtitle: Hood Martial Artists
card.text: Sacrifice a Character to either inflict 1 damage on target Character or Site or give this card +1 Fighting until it leaves play.
card.designators: | red scorpion killer killers hood martial artist artists |

card.title: Repression
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: When you play this card, choose a designator that has not been chosen for another "Repression" in play. All Characters with that designator gain -1 Fighting.

card.title: Resistance Fighters
card.subtitle: Partisan Rebels
card.text: Takes no damage from non-Character cards. Damage cannot be redirected to this card.
card.flavor: Any rebellion, justified or not, catches the Jammers' attention.
card.designators: | resistance fighter fighters partisan rebel rebels |

card.title: Ritual of Death
card.subtitle: Darkness Event
card.text: Sacrifice a Character to either smoke target Character with a cost of three or less, or give all of an opponent's Characters -1 damage until the end of the turn.
card.flavor: Itzcoliuhqui demands blood.
card.designators: | ritual death darkness darknes darkne darkn |

card.title: Ritual of the Unnameable
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Limited. Choose a card type :: Reveal and toast the top card of your deck. If the card was of the chosen type, gain 2 Power. If not, inflict 1 damage on all Characters you control.
card.flavor: ÒThe truth comes only through madness.Ó

card.title: Rocket Team
card.subtitle: Heavily-Armed Soldiers
card.text: Turn this card and a Site you control to turn and inflict 2 damage on an opponent's Site.
card.flavor: By giving the German army advanced weapons, the Buro planned to change the course of history.
card.designators: | rocket team heavily armed soldier soldiers |

card.title: Rope Bridge
card.subtitle: Trap State
card.text: Schtick. Play on a Site. Sacrifice to inflict 2 damage on all Characters at this location.
card.flavor: ÒYou think this thing is safe?Ó

card.title: Running Out of Time
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Not cumulative. Play on a Character you control. Subject gains +3 Fighting and cannot be healed. At the end of each turn, inflict 1 damage on subject, which cannot be reduced or redirected.

card.title: Scales of the Dragon
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Schtick. No Character may be the subject of more than one "Scales of the Dragon". Turn to reduce the damage inflicted on subject Character by a single source by 2.

card.title: Secret Wisdom of the Ancients
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Turn to place any number of [C] Events and [C] States from your hand face-up on the table. You may play these cards as if they were in your hand, but cannot discard them. Toast all these face-up cards when this card leaves play.

card.title: Seedy Dive
card.subtitle: Hood Site
card.text: Turn to unturn any number of non-Unique <Hood> Characters whose total cost is less than or equal to 3.
card.flavor: ÒIt was a hangout for every grifter, yegg, and button man in the city.Ó

card.title: Sinister Research
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Toast It. Toast any number of <Scientist> Characters you control or have in your smoked pile to return an equal number of cards from your smoked pile to your hand.

card.title: Sir Arthur Broome
card.subtitle: Eccentric Patron
card.text: Unique. Immediately return "Voice of the Unnameable" to its owner's hand when this card enters play. Turn to force an opponent to discard 2 cards at random. Turn to discard up to 2 cards form your hand.

card.title: Spear of Destiny
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Unique. Weapon. You must have at least 4 faction resources of the same type to play this card. Play on a Character. Turn to cancel, turn, and inflict 1 damage on all Characters and Sites at subject's location.

card.title: Spirit of the Gun
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Subject Character's printed Fighting is X. X= the number of <Gun> States in play and in your smoked pile. Subject's combat damage cannot be reduced or increased.

card.title: State of Emergency
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Limited. Fill your hand to six cards.
card.flavor: When faced with insurrection, the Buro has three plans: overwhelming force, overwhelming force, and overwhelming force.

card.title: Stolen Plans
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Limited. Play when an opponent is closer to victory than you and an opponent gains, generates, or steals Power due to an Event he or she played :: Gain an equal amount of Power.

card.title: Stormtroopers
card.subtitle: Brutal Soldiers
card.text: Ambush against Characters that provide more than one resource.
card.flavor: Both Boatman and Bonengel planned to harness the German war machine to their own ends.

card.title: Supersoldier Serum
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Play on an unturned Character during any Main Shot. Subject gains +2 Fighting.

card.title: Swords of Heaven
card.subtitle: Secret Society
card.text: +1 Fighting for each [g] or [C] State this card is the subject of. Heal them when a [g] or [C] State is played on them.

card.title: Temple of the Jade Dragon
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Unique. Turn and discard two cards of the same type to return a card of the type discarded from your smoked pile to your hand.

card.title: Tesla Lightning Blaster
card.subtitle: Gun State
card.text: Weapon. Play on a Character. Turn and pay 1 Power to inflict 4 damage on target Character at subject's location.
card.flavor: ÒBehold! The power of lightning at my command!Ó

card.title: Tesla Lightning Cannon
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Weapon. Turn subject Site and pay 1 Power to inflict X damage on target Character at subject's location. X= the number of [H] in your pool.

card.title: Teutonic Knights
card.subtitle: Thunder Secret Society
card.text: +1 damage for each [m] Site and each [m] Edge you control.
card.flavor: ÒTheir faith is their strength.Ó
card.designators: | teutonic knight knights thunder secret society |

card.title: The Ape is Loose!
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Target an attacking Character :: Until the end of the attack, target gains +2 damage and is not affected by Events that would damage it or remove it from play.
card.flavor: ÒRun!Ó

card.title: The Blue Moon Club
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Unique. When a Character inflicts combat damage on this card, inflict 2 damage on that Character. Turn to place a counter on this card. Turn and remove X counters to gain one-half (round down) X Power.

card.title: The Crystal Skull
card.subtitle: Darkness State
card.text: Unique. Schtick. Play on a Site. Sacrifice a Character you control and turn :: All Characters you control gain +1 Fighting until the end of the turn.
card.flavor: They say it feeds on blood and souls.
card.designators: | the crystal skull darkness darknes darkne darkn |

card.title: The Golden Gunman's Gambit
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Limited. Play prior to combat between an attacker you control and an interceptor. The attacker unturns and ceases attacking. Inflict X damage on the interceptor. X= half (round up) the attacker's Fighting.
card.designators: | the golden gun man mans gambit |

card.title: The Ivory Goddess
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Unique. Schtick. Play on a Character, except during an attack. Cannot be smoked except by subject leaving play or becoming an illegal subject. The number of Feng Shui Sites you need for victory is reduced by one. Your hand size is increased by one.

card.title: The Jade Dragon
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Unique. Schtick. Play on a front-row Site. Subject gains Toughness: 1 and cannot be burned. Generates 2 Power during your Establishing Shot.
card.flavor: "You want the girl, Mr. Maxwell? We want the Dragon."

card.title: The Nemesis
card.subtitle: Masked Avenger
card.text: Unique. Stealth. Opponents cannot take control of him. Play at -2 cost if you control "David Maxwell". Immediately return "David Maxwell" to its owner's hand when this card enters play.

card.title: The Red Harvest
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Limited. Play during your Main Shot. Until the end of the turn, gain 1 Power and discard a card (if possible) when an opponent smokes a Character you control.

card.title: The Ruby Eye
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Unique. Your Characters cannot have their damage reduced or the target of their attacks changed. Pay 1 Power at the start of your Main Shot or toast this card.

card.title: The Underground
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play when you declare an attack. Choose a designator. Characters with that designator cannot intercept this attack.

card.title: The Unnameable
card.subtitle: Spirit of Madness
card.text: Unique. Cannot be intercepted. Any player may sacrifice a Character when declaring interceptors to be able to intercept The Unnameable this attack.

card.title: "They Came Out of Nowhere!"
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play during an attack. Your Characters gain Mobility until the end of the attack. You have an additional opportunity this attack to declare interceptors, after all other players have done so.

card.title: "Throw Me the Idol..."
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Target opponent may allow you to gain 2 Power. If he or she does, give a Character that player controls +2 Fighting until it leaves play.
card.flavor: ÒTrust me.Ó

card.title: Thugs
card.subtitle: Hoods
card.text: +1 Fighting while the subject of one or more States.
card.flavor: The lowest scum of the Red Scorpion criminal empire.

card.title: Tomb of Itzcoliuhqui
card.subtitle: Ancient Feng Shui Site
card.text: Unique. Turn to play an Edge at -1 cost. +1 Body for each Edge you control.
card.flavor: The Indians call it cursed, and will not venture near it.

card.title: Tom Donovan
card.subtitle: Hard-Boiled Detective
card.text: Unique. Toughness: 1. +1 Fighting for each opponent who has Power.
card.flavor: "Twenty dollars a week, plus expenses."

card.title: Tommy Gun
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Weapon. Play on a Character. Unturn this card when an opponent's Character is smoked. Turn to inflict 1 damage on a Character at this location.

card.title: Tong Hatchetman
card.subtitle: Red Scorpion Hood
card.text: Assassinate. If unturned, this card may attack a Character without turning once during your Main Shot.
card.flavor: As silent and deadly as the cobra.

card.title: Tools Of The Trade
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Subject Character gains Assassinate. If subject is a <Hood>, it gains Stealth and takes no damage from Sites and States.
card.flavor: ÒHand me that can opener. I got work to do.Ó

card.title: "Torch the Place!"
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play during an attack against a Site :: Inflict X damage on that Site. X= the number of Characters attacking it.
card.flavor: "Leave nothing standing!"

card.title: Tortured by Madness!
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Target player must divide his or her hand into three parts. Look at all the parts, and force target to discard all the cards in one of them.
card.flavor: ÒThe things I saw that day still haunt my nightmares.Ó

card.title: Tough as Nails
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Target a Character and flip a coin until it comes up heads :: Target gains Toughness: X until the end of the turn. X= the number of flips.

card.title: Twisted Horror
card.subtitle: Madness Spirit
card.text: Toughness: 3 against cards controlled by players who control Edges.
card.flavor: "As I fled, I heard my friends screaming."

card.title: Ubermensch
card.subtitle: Superior Soldier
card.text: Gains Toughness: 1 until the end of the turn when a 0-cost card is played.
card.flavor: ÒThose who stand against us will be ground beneath our heels.Ó

card.title: Vincent "The Jackal" Benilli
card.subtitle: Lodge Hood Mastermind
card.text: Unique. All other <Hood> Characters you control gain Stealth.
card.flavor: If it was dirty, you could be sure Benilli was involved.
card.designators: | vincent the jackal benilli lodge hood mastermind |

card.title: Voice of the Unnameable
card.subtitle: Maniacal Mastermind
card.text: Unique. Immediately return "Sir Arthur Broome" to its owner's hand when this card enters play. Turn and pay X Power :: Smoke all other Characters whose Fighting is less than or equal to X.

card.title: Wild Gorillas
card.subtitle: Primitive Monkeys
card.text: When this card is smoked, you may return a <Monkey> card other than "Wild Gorillas" from your smoked pile to your hand.
card.designators: | wild gorilla gorillas primitive monkey monkeys |

card.title: Xitllali
card.subtitle: Darkness High Priestess
card.text: Unique. Once per turn, you may pay 1 Power to cancel all opponents' Characters and States at this location until the end of the turn.
card.flavor: Her beauty is matched only by her madness.
card.designators: | xitllali darkness darknes darkne darkn high priestes priestess |

card.title: X-Ray Specs
card.subtitle: Weird Science State
card.text: Schtick. When subject Character turns to attack, you may look at target opponent's hand. Characters attacking cards you control cannot use Ambush, Stealth, and Assassinate.
card.designators: | x ray spec specs weird science |

card.title: Year of the Monkey
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: One-Shot. Target opponent sets aside his or her hand. Look through target's deck for an equal number of cards, put them in target's hand, and reshuffle. At the start of that player's turn, target must discard either his or her hand or the set-aside hand; the other becomes his or her hand.

card.title: "You Fell Into My Trap!"
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play when an opponent declares an attack against a Site you control and you control no Characters :: Play a Character with a cost of 3 or less at no cost.
card.flavor: "Bwahahahaha!"

card.title: Yuen Sheng
card.subtitle: Red Scorpion Mastermind
card.text: Unique. Stealth. When this card enters play, look at every opponent's hand, and choose a card from each one. Set these cards aside. They are still part of those players' hands, but cannot be played or discarded while he is in play.

card.title: Zeppelin
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Vehicle. Subject Character gains Mobility. Smoke subject when this card leaves play. Turn to inflict 3 damage on target Site at this location, and 1 damage on all Characters other than subject at this location.

card.title: Yosef Halevi
card.subtitle: Kabalist Sorcerer
card.text: Unique. Independent. Twice a turn, you may pay 1 Power to give this card +3 Fighting until the end of the turn.
card.flavor: "It is every man's duty to fight evil."

card.title: The Willow Bends...
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play when a card is damaged, but not removed from play :: Heal that card.
card.flavor: ...but the femur usually breaks.

card.title: Yippee-Yi-Yo-Kiii-YAAAH!
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: One-Shot. You must have at least two resources each from two different factions in your pool to play this card. Gain X Power, where X= the number of columns in your Site structure.

card.title: Whispers in the Dark
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Subject Character gains -4 damage while at the same location as a Character you control.
card.flavor: The Purists have many tricks, but fear itself is often enough.

card.title: Wild Spirits
card.subtitle: Free-Range Constructs
card.text: Turn to exchange the locations of two Sites controlled by one player. This may change the target of an attack.
card.flavor: Contradictions clothed in flesh.
card.designators: | wild spirit spirits free range construct constructs |

card.title: Wall Running
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Subject Character cannot be intercepted by Characters whose cost is less than or equal to subject's.
card.flavor: Novices practice in zero-g before learning that gravity is a matter of chi alignment.

card.title: University Library
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Turn :: Put a card from your hand face-up on this card. You may play it as if it were in your hand, but cannot discard it, and it is not in play. Toast the face-up card when you lose control of University Library or when you use this ability again.

card.title: Two-Headed Horror
card.subtitle: Demon State
card.text: Toast It. Play on a Character and choose another Character with lower Fighting :: Smoke the chosen Character. Subject gains the chosen Character's rules text.
card.flavor: Each was a force on his own; in this horrific union, they are unstoppable.

card.title: Triad Punks
card.subtitle: Wired Hoods
card.flavor: No matter how subtle you are, you can't run the world without some muscle on the street.
card.designators: | triad punk punks wired hood hoods |

card.title: Thunder Stick
card.subtitle: Gun State
card.text: Weapon. Subject Character inflicts +3 damage while this card is unturned. Turn and maintain to give +1 damage to all your Characters while they are at this location.
card.flavor: By providing modern weapons to his allies, Huan Ken hoped to seize many Feng Shui sites in the West.

card.title: Thunder in the West
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Each player must choose one non-Site card he or she controls :: Toast the chosen cards.
card.flavor: Troubled times mean hard choices.

card.title: Thunder Bird
card.subtitle: Mighty Spirit
card.text: Unique. +X Fighting. X= the number of Feng Shui Sites in play.
card.flavor: The most powerful creature of the sky.

card.title: Texas Jack Cody
card.subtitle: Lodge Ranger
card.text: Unique. Pay 1 Power prior to combat with target Character intercepting him :: Smoke target.
card.flavor: He leaves a trail of bodies behind, but he always gets his man.
card.designators: | texa texas jack cody lodge ranger |

card.title: Swift Eagle
card.subtitle: Brave Warrior
card.text: Unique. Independent. Discard a Feng Shui Site to cancel an Event which targets this card.
card.flavor: "This 'Thunder King' is no more our friend than the white men were."

card.title: Street Sweepers
card.subtitle: Enhanced Martial Artists
card.flavor: The rogue abominations demanded an organized response.
card.designators: | street sweeper sweepers enhanced martial artist artists |

card.title: Strange Ore
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Discard X cards and target X unrevealed Sites :: Reveal those Sites. If any of them are Unique, gain 1 Power.
card.flavor: Perennial tears descend in gems.

card.title: Steam-Powered Tricycle
card.subtitle: Weird Science State
card.text: Vehicle. Subject Character inflicts +3 damage. Characters with exactly two designators in their title cannot intercept subject.
card.flavor: High-performance machine. Low-performance driver.

card.title: Skin and Darkness Bats
card.subtitle: Netherworld Horrors
card.text: Sacrifice to give target Character -2 damage until the end of the turn.
card.flavor: One dies willingly that the rest might feed.
card.designators: | skin darkness darknes darkne darkn bat bats netherworld horror horrors |

card.title: Song, The Little Dragon
card.subtitle: Heir Apparent
card.text: Unique. Takes -X damage from any source. X= half the damage inflicted, rounded up.
card.flavor: One of eleven people in the Syndicate who know the terrible secret of 2071.
card.designators: | song the little dragon heir apparent |

card.title: The Steam Laundry Company
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Unique. Turn to heal a non-Unique Site.
card.flavor: Coffee, mud, blood - they can get rid of any stain.

card.title: Six-Gun
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Weapon. Play on a Character during any Main Shot. Subject gains +4 damage to Characters.
card.flavor: "That's one bullet for each of you."

card.title: Single-Action Devolver
card.subtitle: Weird Gun State
card.text: Weapon. Enters play with 6 counters on it. Add a counter at the start of your turn. Turn, target a Character at this location, and remove counters equal to target's cost :: Until it leaves play, target's printed Fighting is 1 and it has the designator <Monkey>.

card.title: Simple Paper Fan
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Weapon. Play on a Character. Once per turn, you may redirect one damage that would be inflicted on subject to another Character at this location.
card.flavor: The monks could use two ounces to deflect a thousand pounds.

card.title: The Silent Cowboy
card.subtitle: Six-Gun Shaolin
card.text: Unique. Pay 1 Power :: This card takes no damage from interceptors until the end of the turn.
card.flavor: His guns speak for him.
card.designators: | the silent cowboy six gun shaolin |

card.title: Sheriff Agathon
card.subtitle: Demon Boss
card.text: Unique. Regenerate. If you have three or more cards in your hand, during any Main Shot you may discard your hand to return a Character to its owner's hand.

card.title: Shurikens
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Weapon. Play on a Character. Turn to inflict 1 damage on a Character at this location.
card.flavor: Thwip! Thwip! Thwip!

card.title: Shaolin Hoedown
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Toast It :: Every player, starting with you and going clockwise, may choose a Character he or she controls. All chosen Characters are taken control of by the player to the left. Each player who gave away a Character gains Power equal to its cost.

card.title: Shao the Killer
card.subtitle: Master of Dim Mak
card.text: Unique. Uncopyable. Not a legal subject for States. Once per turn, you may smoke a Character when he enters combat with it. (Before combat damage is dealt.)

card.title: Senoritas
card.subtitle: Three Sisters
card.text: Turn a <Gun> or <Rifle> State on this Character to inflict 2 damage on any Character at this location.
card.flavor: Brains, beauty, and a trio of Winchesters.

card.title: The Seven
card.subtitle: Roving Heroes
card.text: Unique. Independent. Not affected by opponents' Events, Sites, Edges, and States.
card.flavor: Samurai roaming the west, seeking only justice.
card.designators: | the seven roving hero heroe heroes |

card.title: Scrounging
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Limited. Play at the start of your turn. No other card you control or play generates Power during your Establishing Shot. Choose State, Edge, Character, Feng Shui Site, or non-Feng Shui Site. Scrounging generates Power equal to the number of cards of the chosen type that target opponent controls, minus the number of cards in your burned-for-victory pile.

card.title: Salaryman
card.subtitle: Corporate Killer
card.text: Ambush while attacking Characters.
card.flavor: He just does his job. His job happens to be killing.

card.title: Sacred Wigwam
card.subtitle: Thunder Site
card.text: Turn to cancel an effect that would return a card to play from any smoked pile.
card.flavor: A toehold of power for the Thunder King.

card.title: Reverend Adam Wither
card.subtitle: Evil Preacher
card.text: Unique. The first time he enters combat during a turn, inflict X damage on one Character he is in combat with. (Before combat damage is dealt.) X= the number of [M] in your pool.

card.title: Rise of the NeoBuro
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Limited. Turn and put two cards from your hand on the bottom of your deck :: Draw three cards.
card.flavor: In 1936, Bonengel is working tirelessly to rebuild his dream of a perfect world.

card.title: Reinvigoration Seed
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: When a Character you control is smoked, you must sacrifice exactly one "Reinvigoration Seed" :: Return that Character to play turned.
card.flavor: Even the abominations find death more appealing.

card.title: Revenge on the Patent Office!
card.subtitle: Weird Science Event
card.text: Inflict 2 damage on target Character and 2 damage on the front-row Site at its location.
card.flavor: "How about this? Is this 'physically possible'?"

card.title: Ranchers
card.subtitle: Cowboy Heroes
card.text: Toughness: 1 while the subject of any <Gun> States.
card.flavor: "Territory folks should stick together."
card.designators: | rancher ranchers cowboy hero heroe heroes |

card.title: Redeemed Pirate
card.subtitle: Shaolin Sailor
card.text: Once per turn, you may discard X cards :: Heal X damage from this card. Reload: Discard your hand.
card.flavor: An Opium War survivor, now following Quan Lo.

card.title: Rainmaker Floyd
card.subtitle: Wandering Con Man
card.text: Unique. Toughness: X. X= the number of columns in your Site structure.
card.flavor: He's got eight different scams - and he's been tarred and feathered only once.

card.title: Railroad Workers
card.subtitle: Steel-Driving Rabble
card.text: You may sacrifice exactly one "Railroad Workers" when you play a Site :: Gain 1 Power.
card.flavor: A great army laying siege to nature in her strongest citadel.
card.designators: | railroad worker workers steel driving rabble |

card.title: Queen of the Ice Pagoda
card.subtitle: Netherworld Mastermind
card.text: Unique. All <Ice> Characters you control gain +1 Fighting. Inflict one damage on this card :: Smoke a State on any Character you control.

card.title: Prudence Nightingale
card.subtitle: Sinister Schoolmarm
card.text: Unique. When a Character enters combat with this card, the other Character's printed Fighting becomes equal to its cost until the end of combat.
card.flavor: Few truly wish to learn what she knows.

card.title: Pony Express
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Limited. When an opponent discards a card, you may choose a Character that this card has not chosen this turn :: That Character gains +1 Fighting until it leaves play.

card.title: Potlatch
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: One-Shot. Put a Feng Shui Site you control in another player's burned-for-victory pile :: Gain 3 Power.
card.flavor: "Really, you shouldn't have!"

card.title: Personality Shard
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Play on a Character, and choose an opponent's Character :: Subject gains the other Character's rules text.
card.flavor: The latest fashion in 2066 - give a loved one a little piece of your soul.

card.title: Open a Can of Whupass
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Limited. Play any time except during an attack. Until the end of the turn, target Character you control gains +X Fighting. X= the number of resources in that Character's resource conditions and resource provisions.
card.flavor: "Anyone else?"

card.title: One-Eye Chan
card.subtitle: Chinatown Elder
card.text: Unique. Select State, Edge, Event, or Character when this card enters play. Once during your Main Shot, you may play one card of that type from an opponent's smoked pile at regular cost, ignoring resource conditions. Events played in this manner are Toast It.

card.title: Nothing Happens
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Cancel target Site until the end of the turn. Any opponent may pay you 1 Power to cancel this effect. Reload this card if they do so.
card.flavor: "Wait for it... wait for it..."

card.title: Nitro Jack
card.subtitle: Unsavory Demolitions Expert
card.text: Unique. Uncopyable. Stealth. When he inflicts combat damage on a Site, and its Body is not reduced to 0, smoke it. When he is smoked while at a location you control, smoke a Site at that location.
card.designators: | nitro jack unsavory demolition demolitions expert |

card.title: Night Horror
card.subtitle: Rogue Abomination
card.text: Ambush. Can be played during an opponent's turn. May attack during an opponent's turn.
card.flavor: With their handlers gone, many abominations ran amok.

card.title: Nihilist
card.subtitle: Cybernetic Ninja
card.text: Gain 2 Power when he reduces a Feng Shui Site's Body to 0. Draw a card when he smokes a Character.
card.flavor: "Life is without value. Especially yours."

card.title: Netherflitter
card.subtitle: Weird Science State
card.text: Vehicle. Subject Character gains +1 Fighting and Mobility. While attacking, subject takes no damage from Characters whose Fighting is even.
card.flavor: It's not so bad once it gets off the ground.

card.title: Morse Code Poet
card.subtitle: Magical Telegraph Operator
card.text: +1 Fighting for every column in your Site structure.
card.designators: | morse code poet magical telegraph operator |

card.title: Naikute
card.subtitle: Tribal Chief
card.text: Unique. When he enters play, you may return a Weapon to play from your smoked pile onto him.
card.flavor: "Our braves have the strength of sky in their hearts, as well as bows in their hands."

card.title: Moonlight Raid
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Until end of turn, target Character you control gains Stealth and you gain 1 Power when that Character inflicts combat damage on the target of its attack.

card.title: Monkey Pirates
card.subtitle: Simian Scalawags
card.text: Once per Main Shot, you may play an Event from an opponent's smoked pile at +1 cost, ignoring resource conditions. The Event is considered to be Toast It.
card.designators: | monkey pirat pirate pirates simian scalawag scalawags |

card.title: Military Commandant
card.subtitle: Pledged Mastermind
card.text: Turn and maintain and target a Character :: that Character gains +2 Fighting.
card.flavor: "Terminate, with extreme prejudice."

card.title: Midnight
card.subtitle: Demon Horse
card.text: Unique. All your Characters at this location gain Mobility. Pay 1 Power to change the target of an effect that targets this card or "Reverend Adam Wither".

card.title: Math Bomb
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Smoke all Characters whose Fighting is odd.
card.flavor: The equation does not describe the explosive, it is the explosive.

card.title: Mars Colonist
card.subtitle: Expendable Student
card.flavor: The Syndicate now control the future, but the Secret War burns hotter than ever throughout history. Look for the Critical Shift set in 2007, and check www.shadowfist.com for all your Shadowfist needs.

card.title: Mah-Jongg Parlor
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Limited. Turn and pay one Power :: Put a counter on this card. Turn and remove all counters from this card :: Gain Power equal to twice the number of counters removed.
card.flavor: Never bet against the house.

card.title: Liquored Up
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Target Character gains Guts until the end of the turn.
card.flavor: "You made me spill my drink!"

card.title: Living Legend
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Unique. Subject gains +2 Fighting, cannot be taken control of, and its damage cannot be reduced or redirected.
card.flavor: "Who's next?"

card.title: Lateral Reincarnation
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Unique. You must have at least 3 resources of the same type to play this card. Sacrifice a Character and choose a non-Unique Character in an opponent's smoked pile with the same cost or less :: Return the chosen Character to play under your control.

card.title: Just a Scratch
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Heal target Character that has at least 3 damage.
card.flavor: "Don't think this'll stop me from putting you down like the mad dog you are."

card.title: Kunlun Clan Assault
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Inflict 3 damage, divided any way you choose, on target Characters and/or Sites.
card.flavor: The Kunlun were legendary for their prowess in battle.

card.title: Johann Bonengel
card.subtitle: NeoBuroPresident
card.text: Unique. When you play a 1-cost [f] Character from your hand, and not due to this card, you may immediately play a second 1-cost [f] Character from your hand or smoked pile at no cost.

card.title: Joshua Norton
card.subtitle: Emperor of the USA
card.text: Unique. Your Characters cannot be attacked while he is unturned. Turn during your Main Shot :: Look at target opponent's hand. Gain 2 Power if it contains at least three cards with different costs that aren't Feng Shui Sites.
card.comments: Tag (unprinted): "Before he went mad, he was what he later claimed to be."

card.title: Jessica Ng
card.subtitle: CDCA Scientist
card.text: Unique. Tactics. In addition to inflicting normal combat damage on a Site, this card may also inflict half as much combat damage (round up) on another Site to the immediate left, right, or behind that Site.

card.title: Jia Baoyu
card.subtitle: Lovelorn Shaolin Agent
card.text: Unique. Superleap. When he turns to attack, draw three cards if he is the only attacker.
card.flavor: "I will never forget her."

card.title: Jessica Ng
card.subtitle: Corporate Mastermind
card.text: Unique. All opponents play with the top card of their decks face-up. You may play these cards at +1 cost, ignoring resource conditions.
card.flavor: She looked into Jia's eyes with no hint of recognition.

card.title: The Jackson Gang
card.subtitle: Heroic Outlaws
card.text: Unique. When this card damages the target of its attack, steal 1 Power from the target's controller.
card.flavor: Out of money, out of time, and out of luck.
card.designators: | the jackson gang heroic outlaw outlaws |

card.title: Isothermal Zodiac
card.subtitle: Weird Science Event
card.text: Choose a player who controls a copy of the first card in alphabetical order by title, ignoring everything but letters :: That player gains 1 Power.
card.flavor: Proponents claimed that as more people moved west, the territories would produce more water.

card.title: Involuntary Embalming
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Target a Character and toast X cards from your smoked pile at random :: Target gains +X Fighting until it leaves play. X= half (round up) the number of toasted cards.
card.flavor: There is no act so horrifying that the Lotus will not commit it.

card.title: Inconvenient Debt
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play when an attack is declared. Target an opponent's unturned Character that could legally attack the target of the attack. That Character cannot turn in response :: Target turns and joins the attack.

card.title: The Insidious Dr. Fermat
card.subtitle: Mad Mathemagician Mastermind
card.text: Unique. Independent. When he enters combat, immediately cancel all Characters he is in combat with and States they are the subject of until the end of combat.
card.designators: | the insidiou insidious dr fermat mad mathemagician mastermind |

card.title: Hydrophobia
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Choose a designator when this card enters play. Subject Character cannot attack or intercept cards with that designator, and cannot change location to that of a card with that designator. (Attacking is not considered to be changing location.)

card.title: Hyper Alloy Blade
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Weapon. Subject Character inflicts +2 damage and cannot have its damage reduced or redirected.
card.flavor: The alloys that can be manufactured in zero-g will hold an edge a molecule thin.

card.title: Huichen Kan
card.subtitle: Dust Demon
