card.text: Stealth. While this card is attacking, Characters controlled by its target's controller cannot change location.
card.flavor: What good are bullets against a storm?

card.title: Horse Thief
card.subtitle: Lodge Operator
card.text: Stealth. When an opponent plays an Event during your turn, gain Power equal to the Power he or she spent.
card.flavor: Subtle, efficient, gone before dawn.

card.title: Hoosegow Jackson
card.subtitle: Desperate Outlaw
card.text: Unique. Guts. When you play this card, immediately start an auction by bidding exactly one Power. The winning bidder is considered to have played this card.

card.title: The Honorable Earl Mason
card.subtitle: Hangin' Judge
card.text: Unique. Turn, target a Character, and pay that Character's cost :: Smoke target.
card.flavor: "The law 'round here is whatever I say it is."
card.designators: | the honorable earl mason hangin judge |

card.title: High Noon
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Limited. Faceoff. Turn a Character you control and target an opponent's Character with Fighting no lower than two less than yours. Put the loser's Character in the winner's burned-for-victory pile.
card.flavor: Eventually, it must come down to this.

card.title: Hideout
card.subtitle: Site
card.text: Attacks cannot be declared against Characters at this location unless you control no other legal targets.
card.flavor: "Yeah, we're surrounded all right. Now, you gonna call or fold?"

card.title: Gunslinger
card.subtitle: Pledged Assassin
card.text: Turn to enter a Faceoff with target Character. The winner gains 1 Power.
card.flavor: "By the time you draw, you'll already have six bullets in you."

card.title: Gunboat Diplomacy
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Limited. When an opponent turns a non-Character card, you may inflict 1 damage on any card he or she controls.

card.title: The Golden Spike
card.subtitle: Railroad Event
card.text: One-Shot. Play if you have at least three columns in your Site structure. You may immediately play a card from your smoked pile at no cost, regardless of type.
card.flavor: When it was hammered in, it created the world's longest feng shui site.

card.title: Gamma Beast
card.subtitle: Third-Generation Abomination
card.text: +1 Fighting for each <Abomination> in play.
card.flavor: At Dao Biotech, Boatman started recreating arcanoscience.

card.title: Gambler
card.subtitle: Lucky Bastard
card.text: Twice a turn, you may flip a coin :: Heads: this card gains +2 Fighting until the end of the turn. Tails: it takes 1 damage.
card.flavor: Lucky to be alive.

card.title: Frenzy of the Shark
card.subtitle: Lodge Killers
card.text: Toughness: 1 against damaged Characters. +X Fighting. X= the number of damaged Characters in play.

card.title: Flesh Eater
card.subtitle: Bloodthirsty Demon
card.text: Regenerate. When this card reduces a Site's Body to 0, you may return a card from your smoked pile to your hand.
card.flavor: "Nobody goes out alone after dark anymore."

card.title: Fistful of Dollars
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: At the beginning of each opponent's Main Shot, he or she may place a counter on this card to gain 1 Power. Turn and remove X counters :: Gain X Power.

card.title: Fire Woman
card.subtitle: Crazed Pyromaniac
card.text: +1 Fighting for each damaged Feng Shui Site you control.
card.flavor: Pyromania is a cruel and hungry mistress.

card.title: Fire Ants
card.subtitle: Deadly Insects
card.text: No Max. +X damage to Characters. X= the number of other attacking "Fire Ants".
card.flavor: March. Scorch. Feed.
card.designators: | fire ant ants deadly insect insects |

card.title: Fermat's Last Stand
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: All Characters you control gain +1 Fighting until they leave play, then take 1 damage.
card.flavor: "Under extreme duress, our deepest truths are revealed."

card.title: Fermat's Soldiers
card.subtitle: Secret Shock Troops
card.text: Ambush against Characters controlled by players who control more cards than you.
card.flavor: "With a few loyal men to carry out my brilliant plans, I will be unstoppable!"
card.designators: | fermat fermats soldier soldiers secret shock troop troops |

card.title: Fastest Gun in the West
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Unique. Subject Character gains Ambush.
card.flavor: "Walk away, kid. Just walk away."

card.title: Exiled Monk
card.subtitle: Shaolin Outcast
card.text: Heal this card at the end of each attack.
card.flavor: "I have been away for a long time, but I still remember what I learned."

card.title: Elephant Gun
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Weapon. Subject Character inflicts +5 damage.
card.flavor: "Even Katie was impressed."

card.title: Evacuation: 2066
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Sacrifice X Characters :: Unturn X Characters.
card.flavor: "You misunderstand, doctor. You are Plan B."

card.title: Echo and Silence
card.subtitle: Twin Assassins
card.text: Unique. Ambush. If they inflict combat damage during the Ambush period, they also inflict combat damage at the normal time.

card.title: Dust Storm
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play during an attack :: The first interceptor currently assigned to each attacker ceases intercepting.
card.flavor: "There ain't much to see out there at the best of times."

card.title: Dr. Quentin Higginsbotham
card.subtitle: Weirder Scientist
card.text: Unique. Turn :: Reveal all front-row Sites and rearrange each player's front-row Sites. This may change the target of an attack.

card.title: Dr. Curtis Boatman
card.subtitle: Corporate Scientist Mastermind
card.text: Unique. Opponents must pay you 1 Power to declare attackers against your cards. All <Arcano> and <Abomination> Characters you control gain +1 Fighting.
card.flavor: "It's not the world, but it will do."
card.designators: | dr curti curtis boatman corporate scientist mastermind |

card.title: Donner Lake
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Unique. At the beginning of your Main Shot, all Characters at this location gain +1 Fighting until they leave play and you must sacrifice a Character at this location.
card.flavor: Men like to believe that they're not savages.

card.title: Devil's Rope
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Schtick. Play on a Site. Once per turn, you may sacrifice a Character at this location to place X counters on Devil's Rope. X= that Character's Fighting. Remove a counter :: Inflict 1 damage on any Character at this location.

card.title: Dog Soldiers
card.subtitle: Thunder Braves
card.text: When this card turns to attack, you may unturn a Power-generating Site you control. (No card can unturn another card more than once a turn.)
card.designators: | dog soldier soldiers thunder brav brave braves |

card.title: Devil's Mountain
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Unique. Turn to redirect all damage inflicted on a Site by a single source to a Character you control.
card.flavor: Animals stay away. Men aren't always so smart.

card.title: Detonating Corpses
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play when a Character you control is smoked by combat damage. All opponents' Characters at that location take damage equal to the smoked Character's printed Fighting.
card.flavor: "The dead will serve - one way or another."

card.title: Demon Whiskey
card.subtitle: Rotgut Horde
card.text: When an opponent burns a Site, you may return this card to play from your smoked pile.
card.flavor: "I'm telling you, that stuff will kill you."

card.title: Daughter of Flame
card.subtitle: Fire Assassin
card.text: Assassinate. When this card attacks, its target's controller must discard two cards at random.
card.flavor: She meant for cleansing flames to burn the fog from San Francisco.

card.title: Dan Dammer, Jammer Slammer
card.subtitle: Fanatic Cop
card.text: Unique. Guts. Toughness: 3 against [j] cards. Not affected by [j] Events.
card.flavor: The Buro's toughest cop also had the highest-rated show on the Cop Channel.
card.designators: | dan dammer jammer slammer fanatic cop |

card.title: Data Theft
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Turn a [y] Character you control and target a player :: Reveal the top 3 cards of that player's deck. You may play one of those cards at normal cost, regardless of type, and replacing each resource requirement with [H].
card.flavor: "Whatever you know, so do we."

card.title: Curse of Discord
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Target two interceptors :: Inflict damage on each equal to the other's Fighting.
card.flavor: "Brother will fight brother. It is the way of things."

card.title: Coyote Clan Scavengers
card.subtitle: Transformed Animals
card.text: Ambush against Characters with resource conditions.
card.flavor: "How can the Lodge keep its power if we cannot prevent entire bloodlines from going feral?"
card.designators: | coyote clan scavenger scavengers transformed animal animals |

card.title: Crazed Preacher
card.subtitle: Dangerous Zealot
card.text: Sacrifice this card and turn two Sites you control :: Smoke all non-Unique Characters at his location.
card.flavor: "Why bother to repent? The end is upon us right now."

card.title: Corrupt Land Agent
card.subtitle: Pledged Flim-Flam Man
card.text: Turn when an opponent plays a Site :: Gain 1 Power.
card.flavor: "By the time we learned he didn't own the Baxter Mine, he was probably halfway to Bolivia."
card.designators: | corrupt land agent pledged flim flam man |

card.title: Corporate Hacker
card.subtitle: Sleep-Deprived Operator
card.text: Turn to look at the top three cards of an opponent's deck. You may put one of those cards on the bottom of the deck, and return the other two to the top of the deck in any order.

card.title: Children of the Sharp Knives
card.subtitle: Self-Destructive Cultists
card.text: Cannot turn to heal. Inflict 1 damage on this card at the end of your Main Shot.
card.flavor: "It's time, little poppet."
card.designators: | children sharp kniv knive knives self destructive cultist cultists |

card.title: Celestials
card.subtitle: Chinatown Secret Society
card.text: You may play this card at no cost during an attack by an opponent who is one Feng Shui Site away from victory. +1 Fighting while you control any Unique Characters.

card.title: Chain Lightning
card.subtitle: Thunder Event
card.text: Target four Characters :: Inflict 4 damage on one, 3 on another, 2 on another, and 1 on the last.
card.flavor: Huan Ken's fury is truly a sight to behold - from a safe distance.

card.title: Cavalry Regiment
card.subtitle: Horseback Heroes
card.text: Independent. When you play this card from your hand, you may choose a Character :: Unturn that Character, and it gains Independent until the end of the turn.
card.designators: | cavalry regiment horseback hero heroe heroes |

card.title: Bountiful Fields
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Once per turn when you play a State, you may draw a card.
card.flavor: In a land of plenty, many things can be harvested.

card.title: Bridge of Birds
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: You may play Characters during other players' Main Shots.
card.flavor: The Seven Masters come and go for their own reasons, and in their own ways.

card.title: Boot Hill
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Limited. If any opponent is closer to victory than you, turn and discard a Character that is not a foundation :: Gain 1 Power.
card.flavor: Most gunfighters end up here, with a body full of lead.

card.title: BoneChill
card.subtitle: Reprogrammed Pawn
card.text: When this card enters play, you may immediately toast a Character in an opponent's smoked pile. This card's printed rules text copies that of the toasted Character.

card.title: Boiler Room
card.subtitle: Mad Science Site
card.text: Limited. If this Site is in your front row, turn it and discard a card at random :: Gain 1 Power.
card.flavor: "Emergency pressure release valve? Don't think we've got one. Why?"

card.title: Bloody Herd
card.subtitle: Vampire Cattle
card.text: Toughness: 1. Prior to combat with a Character, you may copy the rules text of that Character onto this card until it leaves play or until it copies another card this way.

card.title: Blood Eagles
card.subtitle: Abomination Scouts
card.text: When this card turns to attack, you may give another Character Ambush and +1 damage until the end of the attack.
card.flavor: "Damned things smell you from a mile above..."
card.designators: | blood eagl eagle eagles abomination scout scouts |

card.title: Big Red Barn
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: +2 Body for each Character you control.
card.flavor: A farm needs good chi as much as it does workers.

card.title: Blasting Crew
card.subtitle: Railroad Workers
card.text: When this card turns to attack, inflict 2 damage on all Sites at the location of its target.
card.flavor: "Wait, you'll pay us to do this?"

card.title: Black Ophir
card.subtitle: Gorilla Bartender
card.text: Unique. Cannot be intercepted by Characters whose Fighting is lower than this card's.
card.flavor: "Water? What kinda saloon you think this is?"

card.title: Avenging Darkness
card.subtitle: Vengeance Spirit
card.text: Unique. Uncopyable. Ambush. Play only when an opponent burns a Feng Shui Site you control. If Avenging Darkness would successfully inflict combat damage on a card, toast that card instead.
card.designators: | avenging darkness darknes darkne darkn vengeance spirit |

card.title: Bait and Switch
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play during an attack you declared, when you no longer control any attackers. Turn a Character you control :: The attack does not end. Instead, that Character becomes an attacker.

card.title: Arcanovirus
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Target a Character with a printed numerical Fighting of 5 or less :: Smoke target. Alternately, pay 2 additional Power :: Smoke all Characters with a printed numerical Fighting of 5 or less.
card.flavor: Boatman simply took over Dao Biotech.

card.title: Anastasia
card.subtitle: Orphan Ice Ward
card.text: Unique. When this card smokes a Character by inflicting combat damage, you may heal a card. (Including this one.)
card.flavor: Pi Tui took pity on her, once.

card.title: Agathon's Deputies
card.subtitle: Demon Cops
card.text: Regenerate. If you control no other <Demon>, <Police>, or <Cop> cards at the end of your Main Shot, smoke this card.
card.flavor: Don't cry for help too loudly. They may just answer.
card.designators: | agathon agathons deputy deput deputies demon cop cops |

card.title: Agent Tanaka
card.subtitle: CDCA Ninja
card.text: Unique. Ambush. Assassinate.
card.flavor: "I no longer have the power I once did. That does not mean I am without resources." - Curtis Boatman

card.title: Blade Palm
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Return target card to owner's hand.
card.flavor: The ancient art of the Blade Palm is known by few, but feared by all.

card.title: Burned for Victory
card.subtitle: Former Feng Shui Site
card.text: This card is to be put into your Burned for Victory pile. It counts towards victory.
card.flavor: Sic transit gloria mundi.

card.title: Katie Kincaid
card.subtitle: Gunfighter
card.text: Unique. If Katie Kincaid is the subject of a Gun State, flip a coin when she enters combat. Heads: she gains Ambush until the end of combat.
card.comments: Alternate-art topless promo.

card.title: Silver Band
card.subtitle: Legion of Supporters
card.flavor: Separately, they pretty good. Together, they're a whirlwind.
card.comments: Alternate-art promo. Given to Silver Band (demo team) members.

card.title: Sting of the Scorpion
card.subtitle: Lodge Assassin
card.text: Assassinate. Has Ambush against the target of her attack until the end of the turn she enters play.
card.flavor: Her victims die very happy, if that's any consolation.
card.comments: Alternate-art topless promo.

card.title: Who Wants Some?
card.text:
Player # _________
Signature ________
card.comments: Scorekeeping card from the convention-long Who Wants Some format. Printed in 2000 and 2003.

card.title: Zhu Maichen
card.subtitle: Martial Arts Mastermind
card.text: Unique. When this card enters combat with a Character, you may inflict damage equal to that Character's cost on any other Character at this location.
card.designators: | zhu maichen martial art arts mastermind |

card.title: Zheng Yi Quan
card.subtitle: Master of the World
card.text: Unique. Guts. Your opponents cannot generate effects from Feng Shui Sites, but you do so as if you controlled those Sites. (This does not allow you to reveal unrevealed Sites.)

card.title: Zero-G Sumo
card.subtitle: Enhanced Colonist
card.text: Toughness: X. X= the number of Unique and Limited Sites controlled by opponents.
card.flavor: Mass times acceleration is still force.

card.title: Xu Mei, The Dragon
card.subtitle: Cybernetic Martial Arts Master
card.text: Unique. Ambush. Other Characters you control cannot be intercepted.
card.flavor: "The understanding that comes from designing your own cyberware will allow your chi to flow properly."
card.designators: | xu mei the dragon cybernetic martial art arts master |

card.title: Willow Step
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Reload: 1. Target a Character that is about to enter combat :: Target gains Toughness: 2 until the end of combat.
card.flavor: "Be where your enemy isn't."

card.title: Xin Ji Yang
card.subtitle: Evil Princess
card.text: Unique. When this card turns to attack, inflict 1 damage each on up to X target cards. X= the number of [M] cards you control.
card.designators: | xin ji yang evil princes princess |

card.title: The Unspoken Name
card.subtitle: Pledged Renegade
card.text: Unique. Unturn this card when an auction occurs.
card.flavor: "The Pledged lack direction. They are a tool waiting for a hand to grasp them."

card.title: Wailing Apparition
card.subtitle: Vengeful Ghost
card.text: Turn and maintain and target an opponent's Character :: Target cannot be healed.
card.flavor: Her haunting cry lets no one rest.

card.title: Twelve Thousand Skulls
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Unique. When an opponent's Character is smoked, you may give a Character you control +1 Fighting until it leaves play.

card.title: Turing Machine
card.subtitle: Chi-Hating Silicon
card.text: When a Site is smoked or burned, this card gains +1 Fighting until it leaves play.
card.flavor: Potemkin found a use for the crude, angry AIs they'd stolen.

card.title: Turbo Boost
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Limited. Until the end of the turn, target Character gains Mobility and +2 damage.
card.flavor: "What do you mean there's no off switch?"

card.title: True Believer
card.subtitle: Indoctrinated Pawn
card.text: When this card leaves play, you may give target Character -1 damage until the end of the turn.
card.flavor: To become a Purist, one must understand that madness is just the price of entry.

card.title: Triumphant Heroes
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Return a non-Unique foundation Character from your smoked pile to play.
card.flavor: When the Purists' plans went awry, Zheng Yi Quan attuned to every feng shui site in the world at once.

card.title: Three Days to Retirement
card.subtitle: Cop State
card.text: Limited. Schtick. All effects that could legally target subject Character must target it if they target any Character you control.
card.flavor: "Just this last case, and I'm done."

card.title: Temporal Anomaly
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Choose an Edge in your smoked pile or pay the cost of an Edge in an opponent's smoked pile :: Return that Edge to play under your control.
card.flavor: Sometimes, everything happens at once anyway.

card.title: Summer Fire Palace
card.subtitle: Netherworld Site
card.text: Unique. When an attack you declared ends, you may inflict 2 damage on any card.

card.title: Symphonic Disciples
card.subtitle: Insane Orchestra
card.text: When this card is smoked by an opponent, you may smoke target Edge.
card.flavor: They once spent seven and a half hours tuning up.
card.designators: | symphonic discipl disciple disciples insane orchestra |

card.title: Taiko Drummer
card.subtitle: Martial Arts Student
card.text: Sacrifice :: All your Characters gain +X Fighting until the end of the turn. X= the number of Feng Shui Sites you control minus the number of cards in your Burned for Victory pile.
card.designators: | taiko drummer martial art arts student |

card.title: Street Sensei
card.subtitle: Hood Martial Artist
card.text: Influence: 1
card.flavor: He's forgotten more about combat than you'll ever learn.

card.title: Stunt Driving
card.subtitle: Death-Defying Event
card.text: Target Character gains Guts and +2 Fighting until the end of the turn.
card.flavor: You're not doing it right unless at least two wheels are off the ground.

card.title: Squadron-Leader Holz
card.subtitle: Retired Soldier
card.text: Unique. Takes no damage from cards that provide more than 1 resource.
card.flavor: When presented with no options, the best soldiers make their own.

card.title: Solar Flare
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: If you have [M] [M] you may inflict 4 damage on target Character. If you have [C] [C] you may heal 4 damage from target card. If you have [H] [H] you may reveal and/or turn up to 4 target Sites.

card.title: Soul of the Wolf
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Subject Character gains Stealth and +1 Fighting.
card.flavor: "We all have fangs; some of us just need to sharpen them."

card.title: Shard of the Molten Heart
card.subtitle: Triumvirate Relic Edge
card.text: Unique. Uncopyable. Your other [m] Edges are not affected by Events. Turn and maintain :: Cancel target Edge.

card.title: Smugglers
card.subtitle: Black-Market Operators
card.text: Turn when a Character you control is smoked :: Gain 1 Power.
card.flavor: To live outside the law, you must be honest.
card.designators: | smuggler smugglers black market operator operators |

card.title: Silverback
card.subtitle: Revolutionary Monkey Leader
card.text: Unique. Pay Power equal to the cost of a Character this card is about to enter combat with :: Take control of that Character.
card.flavor: Once Potemkin's disciple, now his rival.

card.title: Sidekick
card.subtitle: Scrappy Teenager
card.text: Target another Character when this card enters play. Target gains +1 Fighting while this card is in play. When target is smoked, copy target's rules text onto this card until it leaves play.

card.title: Shadowy Mentor v2
card.subtitle: State
card.text: You control subject Character. Subject gains the designator <Pledged>.
card.flavor: "I have done you many favors in the past, my young friend. Now I have one to ask in return..."

card.title: Shaolin Saboteur
card.subtitle: Agent of the Blue Principle
card.text: Turn and maintain :: When target card unturns, it takes 2 damage.
card.flavor: Quan Lo found the Syndicate's combination of chi and technology horrifying.

card.title: Sewer Demon
card.subtitle: Noxious Monster
card.text: Once per turn, you may sacrifice a Character :: Unturn this card.
card.flavor: There is great power in what modern society discards.

card.title: Security Officers
card.subtitle: Corporate Cops
card.text: Toughness: 1 while you control any other <Cop> Characters.
card.flavor: "Private police. Private army. What's the difference?"
card.designators: | security officer officers corporate cop cops |

card.title: Secret Plans for World Domination
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Limited. Smoke this card if a Feng Shui Site you control is seized. When you seize a Feng Shui Site, gain 1 Power and you may search your deck for a card, reshuffle, and put that card on top of your deck.

card.title: Scramble Suit
card.subtitle: State of the Art Tech
card.text: Subject Character cannot be intercepted by Characters controlled by players with cards in their hands. Any player may discard his or her hand when subject turns to attack.

card.title: Safety Third!
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Target a Character and flip a coin :: Heads: smoke target. Tails: inflict 1 damage on all Characters you control. [C] cards are not affected by this card.
card.flavor: Most Jammers are surprised it's that high on the list.

card.title: Sacred Heart Hospital
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Unique. Turn :: Heal target Character.
card.flavor: "Gunshot wounds, Trauma 1. Demon bites, Trauma 2. Weird recurring glow, please wait outside."

card.title: Rogue Shaper
card.subtitle: Netherworld Mercenary
card.text: Mobility and cannot be intercepted while at the location of a <Netherworld> Site.
card.flavor: "Sure, I can reverse gravity in the antechamber, but it'll cost you."

card.title: Reprogramming
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Target a Character :: Target's controller chooses whether target takes 4 damage or is canceled until it leaves play.
card.flavor: The Syndicate consider elimination a last resort for valuable assets.

card.title: Rei Okamoto
card.subtitle: Hacker Mastermind
card.text: Unique. Influence: 4. Turn :: Change the target of an Event.
card.flavor: Everybody uses her code. Nobody spots the backdoors.

card.title: Reentry Squad
card.subtitle: Space Monkeys
card.text: Mobility. Once per attack, you may pay 1 Power when this card is declared as an attacker :: Until the end of the attack, this card gains +4 Fighting, Guts, and is not smoked when its Fighting is reduced to zero. Smoke it at the end of the attack.

card.title: Reascension Spy
card.subtitle: Undercover Salaryman
card.text: Turn and maintain and choose a damaged Character :: Take control of that Character.
card.flavor: "I think we can offer you a very competitive benefits package."

card.title: Rebel Without a Cause
card.subtitle: Disaffected Saboteur
card.text: If you have [j] in your pool, you may discard this card when an opponent's effect causes one or more cards to be returned to play or played from a smoked pile :: Toast one of those cards.

card.title: Rainforest Ruins
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: +2 Body for each opponent who is closer to victory than you. You may play this card face up at -1 cost for each opponent who is closer to victory than you.
card.flavor: The jungle reclaims its territory.

card.title: Reascension Agenda
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Opponents' Events cannot target more than one of your Characters. Sacrifice :: Return a Character from your smoked pile to your hand.
card.flavor: "The Prophet has rejoined his children. It begins."

card.title: Project Apocalypse
card.subtitle: Doomsday Site
card.text: Unique. Toughness: X. Enters play with one counter. Add a counter at the start of your turn if this card is in your front row. When there are four counters, you win the game. X= the number of counters.

card.title: Petal's Attendant
card.subtitle: Eunuch Sorcerer Assassin
card.text: Assassinate. You may inflict two damage on a Character when this card enters play. +1 Fighting while you have more [M] resources than each opponent.
card.designators: | petal petals attendant eunuch sorcerer assassin |

card.title: Probability Soldiers
card.subtitle: Agents of the Uncertainty Principle
card.text: You may flip a coin when this card attacks :: Heads: unturn this card.
card.flavor: How do you kill someone who isn't dead until he stops to check?
card.designators: | probability soldier soldiers agent agents uncertainty principle |

card.title: Palace of Virtual Light
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Unique. Turn and discard your hand :: Gain 1 Power.
card.flavor: In rare circumstances, the principles of geomancy can apply to constructs that should exist only in the imagination.

card.title: Panzer X
card.subtitle: Tank State
card.text: Vehicle. Subject Character gains +2 Fighting and Toughness: 1. Turn :: Inflict 2 damage on the target of subject's attack.
card.flavor: World War Two engineering meets Arcanotech.

card.title: Noriko Watson
card.subtitle: Razor Girl
card.text: Unique. Ambush. +2 damage to Sites. While intercepting, this card inflicts its combat damage at the same time an attacker with Ambush would.
card.flavor: It's a hard life on the streets. It's harder above them.

card.title: Orange Divination
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Look through the top X cards of your deck, where X = the number of [C] resources in your pool. Select two cards and set them aside, reshuffle, and place the two cards on top of your deck in any order.
card.flavor: "What you hear may be false; what you see is true."

card.title: Northern Long Fist
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Limited. Schtick. When subject Character enters combat with an interceptor, you may choose to have subject inflict no damage this combat. At the time it would have inflicted combat damage, instead inflict 1 plus that amount on the target of the attack.

card.title: Mystical Cosine
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Play under the control of any player. You must play with your hand face-up. When an attack against you succeeds, the player to your left takes control of this card.

card.title: Nanovirus
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Subject Character cannot be healed. Inflict 2 damage on subject at the start of its controller's turn.
card.flavor: "No, I don't think your insurance policy's going to cover this."

card.title: New Recruits
card.subtitle: Netherworld Soldiers
card.text: Choose a designator when this card enters play. All <Soldier> Characters have Toughness: 1 against Characters with that designator.
card.designators: | new recruit recruits netherworld soldier soldiers |

card.title: Moon Base
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Turn :: Inflict 1 damage on target attacker.
card.flavor: Once a military base, now leased to the highest bidder.

card.title: Muscle Car
card.subtitle: Homemade Tank State
card.text: Vehicle. Subject Character gains +3 Fighting and Guts.
card.flavor: Necessity is the mother of invention. This car's just a mother.

card.title: Master Yuen
card.subtitle: Teacher of the Red Principle
card.text: Unique. Toughness: 1. Turn two Sites you control :: Target [C] Character gains Superleap until the end of the turn.

card.title: Melting Flesh Squad
card.subtitle: Unruly Abominations
card.text: Guts. Cannot turn to attack unless another [f] Character with a different title is also attacking.
card.flavor: The street sweepers quickly learned to always work in teams.
card.designators: | melting flesh squad unruly abomination abominations |

card.title: Ming I's Chosen
card.subtitle: Darkness State
card.text: Schtick. Subject Character gains +X Fighting. Toast subject at the end of your turn if it did not attack that turn. X= the number of Characters controlled by opponents.
card.flavor: Some believe it a blessing. Others are less naïve.
card.designators: | ming i is chosen darkness darknes darkne darkn |

card.title: Mistress of Blotted Moonlight
card.subtitle: Darkness Spirit
card.text: Unique. Play at -X cost. X= the number of Power-generating Sites you control. Inflict 3 damage on a Power-generating Site you control :: Cancel an Event that targets this card.
card.designators: | mistres mistress blotted moonlight darkness darknes darkne darkn spirit |

card.title: Lightning Strike
card.subtitle: Thunder Event
card.text: Each Character at target location takes damage equal to its cost.
card.flavor: "Don't worry! Lightning never strikes the same --"

card.title: malloc()
card.subtitle: Resurrected Hacker
card.text: Unique. Toughness: 1. Once during your Main Shot, you may choose a resource :: All non-Event cards that require or provide that resource have their rules text blanked until the end of the turn.

card.title: Mars Colonist
card.subtitle: Expendable Student
card.flavor: She said she loved the lower gravity, the tang of the hydroponics, and the red earth unspoiled by terraforming. Of course, she knew her geomantic studies would eventually change everything.

card.title: The Library of Souls
card.subtitle: Site
card.text: Unique. Once per turn you may target a [e] Character in your smoked pile and pay Power equal to its cost plus 1 :: Return target to play.
card.flavor: "There is much to learn from the dead."

card.title: Li Han
card.subtitle: Kung Fu Prodigy
card.text: Unique. Guts. +1 Fighting for each [d] Character in play.
card.flavor: The third-greatest martial artist of his generation.

card.title: Lenny Wu
card.subtitle: Martial Artist Cop
card.text: Unique. When this card enters combat with a Character, that Character gains -1 Fighting until the end of the turn.

card.title: LaGrange Four
card.subtitle: Orbital Feng Shui Site
card.text: Unique. Turn :: Unturn target non-attacking Character.
card.flavor: An entire city in space, designed to the principles of feng shui.

card.title: Kamikaze Cosmonauts
card.subtitle: Outer-Space Saboteurs
card.text: When this card turns to attack a Site, immediately turn that Site.
card.flavor: Too many years alone on a crumbling space station drove them insane.
card.designators: | kamikaze cosmonaut cosmonauts outer space saboteur saboteurs |

card.title: Keeper of Echoes
card.subtitle: Recursive Spirit
card.text: Unique. +X Fighting. You may immediately discard up to two cards when this card enters play. X= the total cost of those cards.
card.designators: | keeper echo echoe echoes recursive spirit |

card.title: Junior Executive
card.subtitle: Corporate Agent
card.text: Influence: 2
card.flavor: There is nothing to the Syndicate but a web of favors, debts, and personal connections -- but that is more than sufficient.

card.title: Jigsaw Beast
card.subtitle: Modular Abomination
card.text: Unique. Ambush. Reload: Sacrifice a [H] Character. +X Fighting. X must be at least 1.
card.flavor: Uglier than the sum of its parts.

card.title: Julienne Wong
card.subtitle: Political Mastermind
card.text: Unique. Toughness: 1 for each different faction resource in your pool.
card.flavor: "Life was supposed to be easier when the good guys ran the world."

card.title: Iron Hands Ma
card.subtitle: Rebel Martial Artist
card.text: Unique. Toughness: 1. +3 damage to Characters.
card.flavor: The law is strong, but the outlaws are ten times stronger.
card.designators: | iron hand hands ma rebel martial artist |

card.title: The Iron Palace
card.subtitle: Secret Feng Shui Site
card.text: Unique. Turn and maintain :: Target Character gains Toughness: 1.
card.flavor: Xin Kai Sheng wanted a more defensible capital.

card.title: The Inner Garden
card.subtitle: Site
card.text: Turn :: Return a [C] State you own to your hand. Turn :: Play a [C] State at -1 cost.
card.flavor: Tranquility is a fortress of the mind.

card.title: Inside Man
card.subtitle: Connected Hood
card.text: Turn X Influence :: This card gains +X Fighting until the end of the turn.
card.flavor: Somebody in your organization owes the Syndicate a favor.

card.title: Improvised Weapons
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Weapon. Enters play with 1 counter. When subject Character enters combat, place a counter on this card. Subject Character inflicts +X damage. X= the number of counters.
card.flavor: "You take the hockey stick. I've got dibs on the lobster."

card.title: Impossible Men
card.subtitle: Self-Made Paradoxes
card.text: When this card turns to attack, you may immediately turn 1 card controlled by each opponent.
card.flavor: Few among the Purists expected their Paradox Cubes to start hatching.
card.designators: | impossible man men self made paradox paradoxe paradoxes |

card.title: Ice Blessing
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Limited. Heal one or two cards controlled by opponents and gain 1 Power per card chosen. (You cannot heal undamaged cards.)
card.flavor: For a fleeting moment, you feel the cool kiss of Pi Tui.

card.title: Ice Carvers
card.subtitle: Netherworld Mystics
card.text: You may remove 1 damage from a card you control at the end of each turn.
card.flavor: Only the most talented may attempt the likeness of their Queen.
card.designators: | ice carver carvers netherworld mystic mystics |

card.title: Howling for Blood
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play during an attack :: Target Character gains +X damage and Toughness: X until the end of the attack. X= 1, or 2 if target is an <Abomination>.
card.flavor: "The foaming spittle means they're ready."

card.title: Hydroponic Garden
card.subtitle: Martian Feng Shui Site
card.text: When this card is seized or burned, gain 1 Power and you may play a Feng Shui Site face-up at no cost.
card.flavor: The terraforming process requires careful management of chi flow.

card.title: Hot Zone
card.subtitle: Wasteland Site
card.text: Turn and maintain :: Cancel target Site.
card.flavor: A nanotech accident reduced most of North America to gray goo.

card.title: Homicide Detective
card.subtitle: Jaded Cop
card.text: Cannot be intercepted by Characters whose Fighting is less than the number of cards in their controller's hand. Once per turn, you may pay 1 Power :: All players draw 3 cards.

card.title: Hirake Kazuko
card.subtitle: Corporate Mastermind
card.text: Unique. Influence: 4. Turn and maintain :: Take control of target non-Unique Character.
card.flavor: "Everybody has a price. Not all of them are worth paying."

card.title: Hit Squad
card.subtitle: Violent Gangsters
card.text: Turn :: Turn target Character.
card.flavor: A carload of heavily armed gunmen makes a great diversion.

card.title: Harbinger
card.subtitle: Secret Herald of the Fire King
card.text: Unique. Play only if you control a <Secret> card. When this card enters combat, inflict 2 damage on every card it is in combat with.

card.title: Haunted
card.subtitle: Ghost State
card.text: All damage inflicted on subject card is increased by 1. You may Reload this card when subject is smoked.
card.flavor: "The voices came to me again last night. They told me that my blood was trapped inside my body -- and I should let it out."

card.title: The Hegemeister
card.subtitle: Tank State
card.text: Unique. Vehicle. Subject Character gains +3 Fighting and Mobility. Subject cannot be intercepted by Characters that are not the subject of a Vehicle.
card.flavor: "Target acquired, buddy! Who wants a hug?"

card.title: Habbakuk
card.subtitle: Floating Feng Shui Site
card.text: Unique. All <Lodge> Characters you control gain +2 Fighting. Turn :: Draw 3 cards.
card.flavor: In its halls, the old families will either unite or destroy each other.

card.title: The Hand of the Underworld
card.subtitle: Killer Demon
card.text: Unique. Mobility. At the end of the turn in which this card entered play, return it to your hand unless you sacrifice a Character.

card.title: Gathering the Fire
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Inflict X damage on target card. X= the number of <Fire> cards in play.
card.flavor: "Focus yourself, then strike with incendiary fury."

card.title: General Gog
card.subtitle: Abomination Mastermind
card.text: Unique. Tactics. Once per turn when this card uses Tactics, you may unturn it, and the attack is considered to be a success.

card.title: Geoffrey Smythe
card.subtitle: Cultist Traitor
card.text: Unique. Turn :: Turn target Site, inflict 1 damage on it, and cancel it until the end of the turn.
card.flavor: Purity is relative.

card.title: The Gimp
card.subtitle: Nanotech Mutant
card.text: Unique. All Sites at the location of the target of this card's attack are canceled until the end of the turn. Any Character intercepting this card is canceled until the end of the turn.

card.title: The Gray
card.subtitle: Spirit of Absence
card.text: Unique. Uncopyable. The rules text of all Characters you do not control is considered to be blank. Any opponent may pay you 1 Power :: This card's rules text is blank until the end of the turn.

card.title: Frenzy Engine
card.subtitle: Arcanowave State
card.text: Play on a Site. When you declare attackers, any that were at this location gain +1 damage until the end of the attack.
card.flavor: "When you have fewer troops to throw at a problem, you need to throw them harder."

card.title: Floating Teeth
card.subtitle: Darkness Horrors
card.text: When you sacrifice a Character, this card gains +1 Fighting until it leaves play.
card.flavor: Once they bite you, they don't let go.
card.designators: | floating teeth darkness darknes darkne darkn horror horrors |

card.title: Forgotten Temple
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Limited. Turn at the end of any opponent's turn in which at least one card you own was smoked :: Gain 1 Power.
card.flavor: Consecrated ground, healing the scarred earth of a terrible massacre.

card.title: Freelance Platoon
card.subtitle: Abandoned Pledged Agents
card.text: Stealth. When this card damages the target of its attack, you may draw a card.
card.flavor: "Just because we don't get orders doesn't mean the mission stops."
card.designators: | freelance platoon abandoned pledged agent agents |

card.title: Flambards
card.subtitle: Fire Secret Society
card.text: When this card enters or leaves play, inflict 1 damage on all opponents' Sites.
card.flavor: Lost souls remade by their allegiance to the Fire King.

card.title: Feral Regression
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Subject Character's rules text is blank. It gains +X Fighting if it is <Lodge> or <Transformed>. X= the number of [a] resources required and provided by subject.
card.flavor: "I am still a man. They have not taken that away from me. Yet."

card.title: Elephant Style
card.subtitle: State
card.text: Subject Character gains Toughness: X. X= 1 + the number of [C] provided by subject.
card.flavor: Strikes unfold like the great beast's trunk; blows that would fell a horse are easily received.

card.title: Everything Falls Apart
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Limited. When any player declares one or more attackers, he or she gains 1 Power. No player may gain more than 2 Power this way per turn.

card.title: Echo Distortion
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Copy a Site's rules text to target Site until the end of the turn.
card.flavor: "There are no perfect reflections."

card.title: Dimitri Lyapunov
card.subtitle: Cybernetics Mastermind
card.text: Unique. Pay 1 Power or turn :: Return any card from your smoked pile to play as a 1-Fighting Toast-It Character with the title "Drone". The rest of the card is treated as if it were printed blank.

card.title: Devendra Chalal
card.subtitle: The Burning Hand
card.text: Unique. +3 damage. Cannot be intercepted by Characters with a cost of 2 or less.
card.flavor: "If the world ends in three years, why not let them all burn?"

card.title: Demonic Alliance
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Turn and maintain :: Target Character gains Regenerate.
card.flavor: In Empire of Evil, the plans of the Lotus come to fruition and could change the Secret War forever!

card.title: Cybermod Parlor
card.subtitle: Site
card.text: If there is only one Site at a location you control, you may play this card into the front row at that location. (Move the other Site to the back row.)
card.flavor: The place to go when you want to pimp your chi.

card.title: Cyborg Mermaid
card.subtitle: Aquatic Saboteur
card.text: Guts. Once per turn, you may inflict 1 damage on all your Sites :: This card gains +2 Fighting until the end of the turn.

card.title: Delay the Inevitable
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play in response to an Event, State, or Edge :: Cancel that card, and put it face up in front of the player who played it. He or she may play it normally at no cost, but cannot do so this turn.
card.flavor: Time is only there to keep everything from happening at once.

card.title: Corporate Warfare
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Influence: 2. Sacrifice :: Smoke target Edge.
card.flavor: The Syndicate can mobilize entire industrial sectors with as little as a single text message.

card.title: Crane Stance
card.subtitle: State
card.text: The next time subject Character would take damage, reduce the damage to zero and sacrifice this card instead.
card.flavor: "Adopt the stance, grasshopper, and wait."

card.title: Cloaca
card.subtitle: Demon King of the Hong Kong Sewers
card.text: Unique. Sacrifice a Character and choose Event, Site, or Edge :: This card is not affected by cards of the chosen type until the end of the turn.
card.designators: | cloaca demon king hong kong sewer sewers |

card.title: Christine Winter
card.subtitle: Fractured Sorcerer Prodigy
card.text: You may sacrifice a Character when this card is smoked :: Return this card to play turned.
card.flavor: She barely noticed when her own body died.

card.title: Cheng Hu Bai
card.subtitle: Red Master
card.text: Unique. Superleap. Can attack back-row Sites. Cannot be declared as an attacker on front-row Sites.

card.title: Cannibal's Banquet
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Limited. Play when a Character you control is smoked by an opponent. You gain Power equal to half (round down) that Character's cost.
card.flavor: "Those who can no longer fight may feed the rest."

card.title: Catching Bullets
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Play in response to an Event that targets a Character you control :: Cancel the Event, and put the card face up in front of you. You may play it, ignoring resource conditions, as if it were in your hand, but cannot discard it. Toast it at the end of your next turn if it is unplayed.

card.title: Cannibal Army
card.subtitle: Albino Horde
card.text: When an opponent plays a Site, you may inflict 1 damage on a card that he or she controls.
card.flavor: An army marches on its stomach. This one marches on yours.

card.title: Buzzsaw Arm
card.subtitle: Brutal Weapon State
card.text: Weapon. Subject Character gains +2 damage. When subject enters combat with a Character, that Character gains -1 Fighting until it leaves play.
card.flavor: "Come get some!"

card.title: Bush Pilot
card.subtitle: Rugged Hero
card.text: Mobility. You may attack back-row Sites if this card is declared as an attacker.
card.flavor: "That scar? I got it in the Congo saving the life of a beautiful heiress."

card.title: Burning Man
card.subtitle: Fire Secret Agent
card.text: Stealth. Play only if you control at least one <Secret> card. +2 damage.
card.flavor: Sent by Li Ting to 2068 to bring back the Syndicate's technology.

card.title: Bull Market v2
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Limited. Every player gains 5 Power.
card.flavor: Even without their feng shui sites, the Lodge still pull the strings of high finance.

card.title: Box of Bones
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Turn when a Character is healed :: Inflict X damage on a Character. X= the amount of damage healed.

card.title: The Blind
card.subtitle: Sorcerer Assassin
card.text: Unique. Assassinate. +X Fighting. Immediately choose an opponent when this card enters play and at the start of each of your turns. X= the number of cards in the chosen player's hand at that time.

card.title: Botzilla
card.subtitle: Behemoth Mechanical Lizard
card.text: Unique. Guts. Inflict 2 damage on any opponent's card that turns while Botzilla is attacking.
card.flavor: "Well, there goes Nichinan-cho."

card.title: Bouncing the Rubble
card.subtitle: Edge
card.text: Limited. Put a counter on this card when a Site's Body is reduced to 0. Turn and remove all counters :: Inflict damage on target Site equal to the number of counters.

card.title: Black Helicopter Squad
card.subtitle: Pledged Agents
card.text: +2 damage. Cannot be declared as an attacker unless a Unique Character is also attacking.
card.flavor: "I'm not authorized to tell you why we have to kill you."
card.designators: | black helicopter squad pledged agent agents |

card.title: Arctic Fortress
card.subtitle: Feng Shui Site
card.text: Takes no damage from Characters that are the subject of States.
card.flavor: Too tough to storm, too cold to besiege.

card.title: Black Belt Rebels
card.subtitle: Fanatic Nationalists
card.text: You may play this card from your smoked pile at -2 cost when an opponent who is closer to victory than you declares an attack on a card you control.
card.designators: | black belt rebel rebels fanatic nationalist nationalists |

card.title: Arcanomoth
card.subtitle: Metamorphic Abomination
card.text: If you have [f][f][f] before you play this card, you may pay 2 additional Power while doing so to give it +4 Fighting and Toughness: 1 until it leaves play.

card.title: Acupressure Master
card.subtitle: Martial Artist
card.text: Toughness: 1. When damage inflicted on this card is reduced by Toughness, you may remove X damage, divided any way you want, from cards in play. X= the amount of damage reduced.

card.title: Anubis
card.subtitle: Reascended Jackal
card.text: Unique. Stealth. Gains +1 Fighting until he leaves play when any Character is smoked.
card.flavor: "Death provides many answers."

card.title: Ape Shall Kill Ape
card.subtitle: Event
card.text: Faceoff. Turn a Character you control and target an opponent's Character with Fighting no lower than two less than yours. The winner may blank the text of a Site controlled by the loser until it leaves play.
card.flavor: ...usually with high explosives.
